1.content: Before you open up your new toy box, who is inside?
1.title: All the choices!

111.content:
You fly up the stairs two at a time, gripping the new brightly colored box so tightly your hand loses circulation. Slamming your bedroom door shut, you throw the package onto the bed and quickly dive after it, salivating in anticipation. Ripping through the airholes in the top, you quickly empty its contents onto the soft quilt.

The tiny teenaged popstar bounces on his butt several times before coming to a stop. He rubs his eyes with small plump fists, attempting to adjust to the light, blinking fearfully as he regains focus. You smile evilly, waiting for his eventual understanding to set in. Several seconds later the young man's eyes go wide in fear as he realizes how big you are, and how small he is. His 'flight' reflexes kick in and he jumps to his feet, running quickly in the other direction.

"Where do you think you're going cutie?" You ask smugly. Using only your pointer finger and thumb, you lift the young star up by the collar of his shirt, exposing his tanned stomach and rising boxers under baggy black jeans. Licking your lips, thinking about all the fun you are going to have, you drop him into the palm of your hand. His hands lay behind him, holding him up for support and one of his two feet hang off the end of your hand, dangling listlessly. He shakes uncontrollably and you love the feel of the small vibrations. Not taking his wide eyes off of you, you notice all the details of his body. His firm, plump butt rests on the lines of your palm. His chest rises and falls quickly with his frightened erratic breaths.

Moving your hand closer to your face you take a few moments to study him. His small, perfectly symmetrical body is covered in a pale green t-shirl, baggy black jeans with a plain black belt, and a pair of large orange and brown sneakers. His smooth arms are riddled with slight muscle and his adorable hands are perfectly manicured with several rings. Two necklaces drape his slumped shoulders and slender neck. There isn't a trace of hair on his face, nor a single blemish. His elegent white teeth are hidden behind his pale lips. Chubby squirrel cheeks sit on either side of his perfectly shaped nose. His arched eyebrows are as beutifully blond as his elegant locks.

You hold him up by your mouth and begin to...

1111.content:

He cries out at your slimy, smelly tongue covering him but he's completely helpless. Using your fingers, to slip and rip his clothing off of him, leaving his succulent young body exposed.

"It's been a while since I've had someone as tasty as you," you tease him.

"P...please don't eat me," Jesse stammers helplessly.

You laugh horribly. "But you're young, hot boy-body is too delectable to pass up. Let's get something clear here: I'm going to eat you, and you can't prevent it from happening!" Jesse's shoulders sag as he realizes there is no hope. You resume licking the boy up. Since you haven't drank in a while, your saliva is gluey and white and it sticks to every inch of his appetizing body. He groans as the wetness encases him. Once he's all good and sticky, you throw him into your mouth.

Jesse screams out as he finds himself in wet, hot darkness. Your smelly breath is all he can breathe in as he sits on your tongue, your copious saliva still encasing him. You decide to tease him a little bit by rolling him around on your tongue but ultimately you decide it's time to go down the hatch. Your tongue gives way and Jesse slips helplessly down your throat. You feel him squirming delightfully on your way down and you hear his muffled screams as he struggles to escape your stomach acid. Finally, the struggling dies down and then it stops altogether. Now to find your next meal toy...

You ignore the question and inhale deeply into the empty shoe. It contains the familiar salty sweet scent of boy feet... delicious. The laces start rattling up one nostril, and you settle the shoe on your bed. It will be a nice memento of your meal when you are through with it. The aroma is a stronger version of the sweaty shoe, as it is obviously the source. The plump foot shakes invluntarily, as the strong sniffing must tickle the young star.

112.content:
Today's your birthday and you are super excited. You come from a planet called Gigantica, where almost everything is the same as Earth. There are only two differences, one being your technological advancements. The second is the size of the inhabitants. As you are average height here, you would roughly be considered a small giant on Earth. Be that as it may, your planet's entertainment business is the only lacking industry.

This problem was easily solved when your scientists discovered a way of connecting your satelites to those of Earth. That's how you first saw them; those adorable little Earth boys. You had to have them! So you compiled a list of all the great teen boy celebrities and gave it to your parents as a birthday wish list. Last night they journeyed to Earth and abducted your new captives, captives which were at that very moment in the cage in front of you. They all looked dazed, frightened, and utterly confused. Some are tied with bows, some have them on their head, some have already taken them off. Maybe by next year you can abduct some regular, non-celebrity boys. Maybe you can even make the government supply you with a sacrifice a day for fear of your planet destroying theirs. But one thing at a time.

"Well don't my new little pets look cute?"

A dark-skinned lad with large tattooed biceps and a white tanktop stands up from where he has been cowering with the others, stepping forwad. You recognize him as Lil Bow Wow. He pushes Chris Brown, Chingy, and Lil Romeo out of the way as he walks to the bars, a determined look on his face. You can't help but smile, knowing he isn't feeling nearly as confident as he appears to be. "Hey, we're not your pets! We're not toys! We're human beings!" As your smile deepens, he flinches a little. His voice cracks as he changes tone ever so slightly. "Wh-what ummm... What are you gonna do with us?"

"Interesting question my adorable little friend. Your Lil Bow Wow right?"

"No! I'm not Lil, I'm just Bow Wow now! I hate it when people say that!"

"Well, excuse me," you giggle, "but you look little to me. Anyway, I was gonna just play with you guys till I get bored..."

Corbin Bleu now steps up toward the bars from the back where he had been huddled, crying, with Zac Efron. The fact that they were holding each other, consoling one another, aroused you a little bit. "But when your done, we can go home, right?"

"Of course not. Your mine now." A chorus of fresh screams rang out, ranging from adolescent to manly.

Bow Wow pushed Corbin away, speaking to you directly again. "You can't do that! Why can't we leave when your done us?"

"Well, I was wondering what to do with you boys when I get bored. I can squish you, tear you up, use you as sex toys, put you up my butt. Anything." The screams turned to crying, and you could see that all the boys ecept Bow Wow were clutching each other, shaking in fear. "But since I first saw you guys in person, another idea hit me. Your all so cute... I was thinking you may even be cute enough to eat."

"Say what?" Bow Wow screamed. But it was too late, you had already reached your hand in from the top of the cage and pulled him out.

"Yeah, I've been wondering how delicious you would all taste. There's so many recipes I'd like to try; kid-ka-boy, Peanut Butter and Jimmy, Boys and Berry Pie, Cutie Pie, Meatboys, etc. Since you've got such a big mouth, why don't I start by tasting you. If your as flavorful as I thought, you are all going on a one way trip into my stomach!"

You ignore the sobbing and screaming, focusing on the little teen singer in your hand. You noticed that his skin is a different color than the majority of the other morsals. Maybe you'll take all the darker ones out and stuff them with marshmellows, caramel, nuts, nouget, cherries, and jelly to make them into chocolates. But first thing's first.

You'd like him to perform for you later, but right now let's just have a lick... or suck... or mouthful.
112.title: Lil Bow Wow

114.title: An entire band

1141.content:
Ah nothing beats a delicious Happy Meal from McDonalds! You open the bag and begin unwrapping and devouring the contents first the hamburger, then the salty fries how they melt in your mouth. As you wash down your meal with a huge cup of soda you begin searching for the toy prize and the dessert. No dessert! You push down through the wrappers until your hand finds a cardboard box. You immediately notice the Disney logo and a large stylized JB on the container. With a sigh you set the toy box down on the table and inspect if briefly still upset that they forgot to include dessert. With a startled jump you notice the box shifting back in forth as if there were a mouse inside. A little grossed out you carefully open the container and cautiously peer inside. To your surprise three marsh mellow sized young men dressed quite uniquely from head to toe. stare up at you while cowering instinctively and shielding their eyes from the sudden influx of light. They are speaking to each other, but their tiny voices are too low for you to hear. Your eye also catches that one of the young men is sitting on a honey container and another is resting his tiny boot clad foot on a catchup packet. Your initial surprise subsides as your hunger returns. One of the tiny little men, with the support of the others, shouts up to you in a squeaking voice: "Hey is this some sort of simulation! We have a concert in an hour, and we like sorta need ta get going." the little man pauses and consults with the other two. "Oh, and we need a shower! This place smells like a french fry factory."

With a sudden onset of amusement combined with a full rush of appetite you glance down at your little captives now understanding that desert and the prize are one in the same!

"Uh, sorry little guys I would love to help you, but I paid good money for this meal and you along with the help of those tasty condiments are about to be the last course."

The little men gaze at one another for an instant as if unconvinced you are real, then in a burst they start jumping at the wall of cardboard trying, in vain, to escape.

You smile down and licking your lips prepare to pluck up the first little JB McNugget.
1141.title: Jonas Brothers

By your fortune it is Joe! He is wearing his trademark salmon colored canvas shoes, tight jeans and a white t-shirt which shows off his beautiful long dark hair and brown eyes.

"Hello Joe!" Your eyes dance with glee as you bounce the panicking little dude up and down in front of your face.

114332211.content:
"Hey Man like what the fuck is this?!" Tom Parker felt his way around the dark room in search of a door or at least one of his mates. "I don't know Tom, but it is way fucked up. I don't even remember how we got here" Max, following the sound of his band mate's voice manages to find Tom and sat near him in the stale dark room. Soon Siva Kaneswaran, Jay McGuiness and Nathan Sykes also make their way through the darkness to find their friends. "Does anyone remember anything?" Nathan asks with a bit of fear in his voice. "I don't know man, like I remember being in our room before the concert... and there was a man at the door... with some sort of crystal thing... The room seemed to get bigger... nah I really don't know man! Does anyone else feel like the room is moving?"

Moans of acknowledgement and then silence as the 5 young men listened to the world beyond their dark room. The sensation of gentle movement.. a jarring thud... and the sound of scratching on the roof all passed by quickly as the men murmured to each other in dismay.

A deafening ripping sound gave way to a blinding light from above "What in the fuck?" Max George and the others got to their feet and tried to gaze upward towards the opening in the room shielding their eyes in the process.

"Hey! What's going on? Is there anyone up there?!" Tom cried upward as loud as he could. Even as their eyes adjusted all they could see is endless white. And then a massive face appeared its features partially obscured by the shadow cast by the light from behind. The face didn't say anything but an evil grin spread across his face and after eyeing the young men the giant licked his lips.

"Uh guys, I don't like the looks of this!" Siva spoke in a loud terrified whisper. The face quickly disappeared and the room began to tilt. "Ah shit! Hang on guys!!" Jay gave out a warning to his mates as the room forced them onto the walls and then sliding out of control through the opening...

In a clump the 5 men landed on what felt like a massive pillow. The immediately tried to get to their feet and see what was around them. They stood in a tight circle their mouths wide open "Oh my God man this is not good ... holy fuc..." The boys gasped and reacted to the strange new world. They found themselves on what seemed to be a giant comforter the size of two football pitches. On one end a head board rose towards the skies like a tall building. "Uh guys... " Nathan's voice triggered they 5 men to track his way... only to see the giant once again looming over them in full form.

The giant held the room... container that once held them. "I am .... so glad you came!"

“Yo! Come in!” Adam kicks chills on a couch playing Halo as he shouts for the door to open. The four young men all lounging in different parts of the living room barely look up as a rather handsome older man with a pin strip suit enters. “Hello boys!” he seems not to care for their lack of manners “I am with the record company, I just need you to sign a few papers so we can start stamping out your CD’s. You know just the rights to your image and stuff for the current release.” Slade, closest to the devilishly sleek man, nods and says “Yeah sure thing dude!” Slade signs the paper placed quickly in front of him. Soon the other boys have joined in eager to start selling their albums. The man, who has yet to identify himself, walks to the door. “Pleasure doing business with ya boys!” he closes the door and everything goes black.
“Dude! What the fuck!” Slade tries to hold himself steady as the ground beneath him shakes violently. Across the pitch black room Mike Kitlas holds braces himself against a wall waiting for what he assumes in his mind to be an earthquake to end. Greg Garrity managed to find a corner where he huddles helplessly clung to Adam Juwig . The world shook for what seemed like an eternity; then with a final upheaval it stopped. The 4 men wait in pitch black silence. As they begin to feel around they realize the furniture is gone. The floor and walls seem to be made of some sort of particle board. Mike pounds his fists against the wall in desperation calling for help. As he does this a scrapping sound originates from above them. They all track the noise with their ears just to have their eyes flooded with light.

You rush to the door with delight. You ordered bite-sized bands on line and you are sure this is the delivery. The UPS man has you sign the delivery acknowledgement and speeds away. Since these little men will be food when you are through you debate whether to open your new package in the kitchen or the living room.

Zayn Malik, Harry Styles, Niall Horan, Liam Payne, Louis Tomlinson stepped cautiously from the strange room.

"Where are we?" Louis kicked the thick cardboard that previously had inprisoned him trying to get the make of it.
"Don't know matey, but it sure is odd." Harry Styles scrached his head trying to find focus on something in the shadows beyond the blinding light. The five men, unaware of their bite sized status ventured onto the table surface only to jump as the mysterious "room" moved away. A voice from above knocked poor Niall on his bottom.

"Hello boys! Welcome to my collection." Zayn was the first to see your massive face entering the beam of the lamp light but soon the others followed. They whispered among themselves cowering at your sight. Finally, Harry found the courage to speak on behalf of the group. "Uh hello? Is this real?" His boldness turned to terror as your massive hand left the shadows quickly pouncing on him plucking him kicking helplessly from the table surface. You eyed your little boy band morsel with an evil grin. "I'm 'fraid so little man. Your luck on the X Factor has taken a decidely negative turn. The lot of you are mine to play with and upon whom to dine!"

Zayn Malik, Niall Horan, Liam Payne, and Louis Tomlinson stared upward in horror. Above them clenched firmly between your fingers was their fellow band member Harry Styles. He kicked and squirmed, but it was to no avail. "Hey! Put me down! Don't you know who we are?! You're gonna get in a bit a trouble for this!"

You examine your soon to be meal with glee. "Little man I know exactly who you are! You are another group of comely lads who have been handed a career based on little else. I wonder how your taste and texture will compare to J.C.?" Rather than let the cockly little git respond you commense. With thumb and forefinger you pry his tiny boots from his feet. You pluck away the dark socks and watch his soft pink feet curl from the cool air. "Help help!!" you ignore the cries the little boy band morsel makes to his comrads below. They in turn continue to stare on in disbelief as articles of Harry's stylish clothing rain down in front of them. With shirt now removed, you momentarily allow little Harry to touch the table one last time. He lets out a gasp and begins to run for his band mates... you quickly trip him up grabing him by his right ankle. You dangle him over your cavernous mouth like a bunch of grapes and begin to lower him in. "Wait wait! Please no please hrmph...." His tiny squeaks are muffled as your tongue covers his face. Soon he is waist deep in your mouth. A flip of the belt and his skinny jeans begin to liberate from his slender legs... The boys below watch as two kicking legs soon become two soles... and then nothing... You just swollowed Harry Styles!

Smacking your lips you look downward and exclaim "delicous! Now who's next?"

He kicks his stylish boot covered feet helplessly as if still trying to run. You start to bring him closer for a chilling monologue when his t-shirt begins to rip! His lean meaty little upper body is completely exposed as he falls downward letting out a squeaky sounding yell. Luckly, for your stomach, you catch the lad in the palm of your left hand. His struggle to stay afloat seems to have dislodged his remaining boot which has sunk to the bottom.
         You open the lid. "I think you need to simmer for a while!" and replace the lid. His little protests continue as you whistle merrily placing him on the stove top and starting the burner. You place it on low... you are in no hurry.

114332222222222222222211.content:
"Drew! Like where are we?" Wesley felt his way along the floor, its strange particle board like texture seemed like odd. "I don't know, like, I remember we were in our dressing room before the show and uh...." the young man's voice drifted off trying to remember what happened next. Drew found a shoe and its movement in the dark stale environment prompted him to let out a startled yelp. "Yo! What the fuck man?" the shoe and the foot inside belonged to Keaton who, like the other young men found himself searching around this dark mysterious room. Drew laughed at the startling of his friend. "Whatever happened we must have had a good time." They all laughed with a hint of concern in their voices. The ground rumbled beneath them and they could hear strange noises coming from all around. "Whoa! I think we are in an earthquake!" Drew hung on to Keaton as they both slid back and forth on the strange flooring. The rumbling came to an abrupt halt. After what seemed like an eternity in stale darkness and silence a sound returned, this time from above and the room began to fill with bright light.
         The three little men looked up towards the blinding light. Drew and Keaton were next to each other in the middle of the room, Wesley had made his way to a corner. As the world around them came into view Wesley saw his cap laying nearby and grabbed it. The men explored their environment: the room was featureless and brown. It seemed to be particle board, but the texture was like nothing they had seen before. They Wesley glanced upward toward the light, all he could see was infinite bright whiteness. "Yo! Like what is this?!" his brother and friend shrugged... and then the world began to move again. The room began to rotate slowly forcing the three hot young men to slide to the wall and then up the wall. "Whoa! Bros what is this shit!?" Drew cried out as he tripped over the edge of the wall tumbling out into the unknown. Wesley and Keaton followed shortly behind. They saw Drew staring at something and they matched his gaze. A massive face was smiling at them across a massive wooden plain. "My God, like is this real? Who is that dude?"
         "Hello boys! I hope you had a good trip." The giant's voice boomed across the table knocking Keaton on his butt. "I took the liberty of shrinking your skate boards on the way out of your dressing room. You dudes should have negotiated for better security in your contracts. Oh, by the by, which one of you hot little dudes would taste the best? I am guessing it is Drew." The giant's words hung in the air, Drew instinctively looked down at his abs which were still covered in a shirt, the other two men just stared frozen with fear. The young men glanced behind them, the room, a massive cardboard shoe box in reality, blocked their path for escape. Finally, Drew gathered the courage to speak. "Uh dude, like, we don't know what's going on here, but we really need to get back so we don't miss our show. If you could like, put us back to normal that would be totally, like uh cool."


Wesley Stromberg, Keaton Stromberg, and their best friend Drew Chadwick
114332222222222222222211.title: Emblem3!

1143322222222222222222111.title: Drew gets eaten...

11433222222222222222221112.content:
The candles are lit, a fine glass of wine is having its time to breathe and you are hungry.

You look at the magic silver cover adorning the main dish. Your mind focuses on what you would like to eat and with a slight twist you hear a chime.. it worked! Before lifting your cover you stop to listen to your meal.

"Whoa dude! What just happened" Wesley's voice squeaks slightly inhibited by the metal cover. "I don't know we were at the party and now we are in this dark room" Drew chimed in. "This is so trippy and....." Keaton's tiny voice trailed off as you lift the cover. All three men gasp and point at your massive form in front of them while glancing around trying to make sense of their new world. For the time you enjoy their muscular little forms. Keaton is wearing a pair of black jeans, t-shirt and a backwards cap. Wesley is in a sweater and board shorts with a pair of flip flops. Drew is in a white shirt and jeans with gold colored boots. The tiny men don't seem to accept their eyes as they walk around the plate soaking in the massive glasses and utensils on the massive expanse that is your dining room table.

Finally Wesley gathers the courage and speaks directly to you "Yo! Is this some sort of simulation? My brother and Drew have a show to do in an hour and we gotta get back!"

His normally baritone voice has a squeak to it that is delightful. You lean in close enough your tiny captives can feel the wind of your voice. "I'm afraid this is quite real my meaty little man. I am sorry, did you boys have.... big plans.. .for later?"
11433222222222222222221112.title: New Beginning

114332222222222222222211121.content:
"Bro! I thinks this shit is real!" Drew and the two brothers spin to run away from your towering figure. Drew reaches the edge of the plate and dashes behind the wine bottle. Wesley manages to climb inside the nearby fruit bowl. Keaton looks back and forth for his place to hide screaming a tiny squeak as your massive hand close around him.

"Keaton Keaton.. don't you look tasty!" Keaton kicks wildly pinched by the back of his shirt with your massive fingers. "Please please don't don't e e ea" Keaton can't quite wrap his mind around your plans. "Eat you?" you help him out. The tiny man nods with a whimper and an anxious swallow.

"Those sneakers are really hot. May I have a peek at what's inside?" Keaton shakes his head in the negative as you close in with your thumb and forefinger. "Wow such worn laces, I bet you just slip them on and off your little feet" you pry gently on both sneakers simultaneously pulling them off the tiny man's heels. "You must have spent hours skateboarding with these! I need a sniff!"

Keaton tries to hold back as you raise his sock covered feet up to your nose. The smell is pungent and as wonderful as you imagined. The tiny man's musk is powerful. His toes curl as they reach your nostrils. Before you realize it your tongue has lashed out for move information.
114332222222222222222211121.title: They try to run.

1143322222222222222222111211.content: Keaton winces as your tongue wraps around his sock covered feet. The socks, already damp from his nervous sweat now are utterly drenched in your sticky saliva. With a rock back of your head and insertion the tiny boy band member is ankle deep "I am going to save you for more enjoyment later!" Keaton continues to whine and struggle as you drop him into a water glass and he rises to the surface.
1143322222222222222222111211.title: Keep going

choices: Drew does a good first move.
1143322222222222222222112.content: The Giant focused on Drew intently while the little man spoke. "Allow me to help you better understand what is happening my scrumptious looking little man, I have shrunken you with the intent of playing with you as my own personal toys and then, when satisfied, consuming you. Now, I am also quite fond of games and will gladly let any or all of you go back to your wonderful lives, but you must win a little game first." The three men whisper feverishly back and forth with one another ending with Wesley responding. "Uh giant dude, like, how do we know you will play fair?" The giant chuckles with an evil grin. "You don't little man, but as you can see your options are quite limited. You either play for the chance to survive, or I get a tasty three boy meal by default. Decide quickly before I get bored with the idea." The young men feverishly reconvene and Keaton comes back this time with the response. "Alright dude, but this is totally crazy. What's this game about anyway?" The giant beams with the bite-sized man's response. "Well 'dude' I would like you three boys to play a game of strip skate boarding, I know you are familiar with it." The young men gesture in acknowledgement. "It is simple then, you keep all your cute little clothes on those tight little bodies for 3 hours... and you are free to go. When you go nude, you are mine dude." The giant emphasized his final word with a lick of the lips and a barely perceivable glance towards Drew. The giant presented the little men with their skate boards and gave them a few minutes to warm up. "Alright Drew, let's see what you can do. Keep me entertained if you want to earn all of your points!"

We want to go home now!"

The giant seems even happier than he was before. "Drew! My dear dear little man. I am afraid you have forfeited the game. I was so hoping to save the best for last. Your two friends are still in the running and may survive, but you just made yourself mine upon whom to dine!" Drew let off a yell and tried to make a dash for it. The giant's massive hand's shadow passed over Wesley and Keaton on route to its prey. Drew let off a yelp as two massive fingers tripped him onto the surface of the table and grasped him by his right ankle. "Let me go! Let me go!" he shouted and struggled as the giant proceeded to unlace his boots pulling them off one by one stopping to savor the smell of each. He re positioned the little man so that Drew's lats sat firmly between the giant's thumb and forefinger. Gingerly, the giant popped off Drew's belt and tugged away his white jeans. "I promise I will play, just don't eat me!" Drew clenched his athletic feet trying to keep his protective clothing from leaving his body. His stomach churned as once again he was inverted his shirt now hanging down showing his hot abs. Keaton and Wesley looked on in horror as their buddy dangled high above them completely naked. The Giant held drew like a bunch of grapes above his massive form. He started to lower the struggling little man when he paused and said "nice abs Drew, well, good bye now." Drew screamed as he plummeted from the grip of the giant and went unceremoniously silent as he slipped between the giant's lips. The two remaining men saw the quivering soles of Drew's feet sticking out from between the giant's gaping smile... and with a loud gulp, he was gone.
         The giant patted his stomach and looked downward. "One naughty, but very tasty, little boy band member gone, two good little men to go!" His wink caused Keaton to shiver.
114332222222222222222211211.title: Drew defalts the game...

1143322222222222222222112111.content:
"Ok Wesley let's see what you've got?" The two men tense up as if to protest, but then quickly compose themselves. Wesley performs his first move and does a great job. "Wow! Impressive. Maybe you two tasty looking little fellas will not be joining poor Drew."

Next up is Keaton who swallowed a bit as he went to show his skills. He did a simple kick flip but did not manage to land on his board.

"Tsk tsk Keaton my dear I need you to loose the right sneaker." Wesley's brother choked up a bit as he used his left toes to pry at the heel of his right foot and kick off the well worn sneaker. "Let's have a sniff!" The tiny skater scrambled aside as the giant plucked up his discarded Converse. "Yum! I hope your feet taste as good as they smell!" Keaton's eyes teared up more as he choked in disgust.

"Alright Wesley my muscular little dude. I am afraid we need to up the game. Let's see you do an Indy Grab.
The giant smiled as the tiny man showed hesitation. "I I can't ..... "
"You can't do the move? Oh, my you boys are giving yourselves up far too qu....." the tiny man gathered up the courage to interject. "I can't remember what the move is!" The giant pondered for a moment. "Well Wesley, I am afraid that is going to cost you your ball cap and your shirt." Wesley seemed slightly relieved as he removed both articles of clothing.

"Ok Keaton." The giant set a small ramp down for the tiny band member. "Let's see you do a cave man." Keaton eyed his brother for confidence and then made his move. He managed some air time, but crashed to the table surface upon his return."

Keaton momentarily curled into a ball and struck the table with his tiny fist. "Wow Keaton. That was quite a wipeout. I think you would do a better job without that awkward shoe and both socks getting in the way." Keaton cried as he pulled off his left shoe and plucked away both of his socks.

"Keaton... I am so sorry guy! I have to get a little taste while they are fresh." Keaton cried out as the giant's massive right hand swept in to pluck him up. Hanging by his t-shirt he found himself elevated at a tremendous speed. In a moment he was directly in the giant's face. "Wha what are you... no!" Keaton thought he was going to be devoured but the giant only inserted the tiny man ankle deep. "Ummm delicious!" Wesley squirmed as the giant sucked and slurped at his bare feet. Below Wesley looked down at his own Van covered feet and cringed.
After what felt to both tiny brothers as an eternity the giant pulled Keaton out and returned him to the table below.

The game continued. Soon Keegan found himself stripped to a pair of underwear.

"Let's make this next one... interesting." The two tiny men looked on as the giant set up a ramp with a wide gap between. The giant then laid his massive head down. "Keegan, if you make this jump, you are a free man. If not.... "the giant licks his lips and winks.

"You can do this bro! I know you can do this!" Wesley tries to give his little brother confidence as he gets a running start. The tiny man skillfully picks up speed and jumps into the air. The giant's massive tongue sticks out as he reaches the apex and Keegan cries out at his board goes on without him.

"No nooooooo!" Keegan slides down the wide pink tongue and disappears between the giant's lips!

Wesley cries out as the giant sits up still playing with his brother inside his mouth. After a few agonizing moments the giant reaches between his lips and retrieves a pair of underwear, his brother a lumps passing down the giant's throat.

"Wesley, Wesley my dear little man this must be so difficult for you. If you would like, I can go ahead and polish you off; a quick and delicious ending."

The tiny man looked around, and then picked up his skateboard.

"The game continues" the giant smiles with delight.

The giant's massive right hand passes over the three little men like a raptor on its prey. Drew lets off a yell and dash for it. Within a few short seconds he is dangling by the collar of his shirt the breath of the giant directly against his face. The giant pulls off Drew's right shoe and then his left while he kicks, dangling helplessly. "That's one." the giant says as he sets the displaced footwear on the table surface in front of the two brothers. "That's not one, that's two!" Drew lashes out with his sock covered feet in protest. He collects himself and jumps to his feet. "Whoa! This place is really big. How are you so large broh?" There is some shock in the bite size little man's voice, but not as much as one would expect for someone in such a terrifying situation.

The giant looks down at his little toy and responds with a bit of dismay. "Justin! Your entourage sold you to an outfit called Edible Toys..." Justin stares upward with a blank expression. "I am going to play with you... and then devour you! Justin you are food now... I like own you... "

The tiny singer seems to be processing the new information... as if he were still a bit high. "That's not gonna work broh, I have a concert tomorrow. My fans need me."

The giant's eyes roll as he slides gently slides a bowl of pretzels towards Justin. "I guess you are right. Feeling the munchies?"

11533212222222222222222221.content:
Jake held the phone out to take yet another selfie for his fans. He was wearing a hip-hop style hat flipped backwards, baggy jeans and loose laced Timberland boots. He made sure his cheesy smile looked just right, then touched the shutter icon....The camera phone clattered as it fell to the path, its owner vanished into thin air!

Instantly the world turned black. He remembered standing, but now he was laying down. Where am I? he thought to himself as his mind slowly came back on-line. The ground beneath him felt like particle board. The Earth seemed to be shaking as if he were in an earthquake, but aside from a few dim spots in the ceiling there was no light to get a bearing. He sat up cautiously and reached for his cell phone to get some light... missing... Maybe he was in a plane or a truck or something, the movement was rather steady and it did not end as you might expect even from the longest of earth quakes. The air was stale and stuffy. The steady movement of the room would occasionally increase in what felt a bit like an elevator ride... "Where the hell am I! Hello?!" Jake Miller shouted into the darkness. There was no reply.

After what seemed like an eternity he heard what he could swear was a delivery person asking for a signature. More movement, another sense of sinking, and then a loud thud. From above the ceiling made a loud scraping noise, as if the roof of the building were being torn away by a giant. The ceiling disappeared instantly with fresh air and light pouring into the cell.

Jake's stomach fluttered with butterflies, but he managed to stand shielding his eyes against light he had not seen at least for hours. His irises began to adjust, he could make out what appeared to be a light fixture high above the room. His brain registered that the light was large, but he couldn't process it. The room around him was brown and featureless. There were no windows or doors; it looked like the inside of a giant box. "Yo! What's going on?! Is somebody out there who can here me!" The bright light from above dimmed slightly... Jake's mouth dropped in shock and he fell backwards at what he saw. The dimly lit silhouette of a man, a massive man's face, blocked out the lamp and peered downward at him.

The massive face had a pleased toothless smile and just hovered there blinking. After what felt like an eternity Jake returned to his feet and gathered the courage to speak again. "Hey! What is this?! Who the hell are you?! Is this some sort of a prank?"
11533212222222222222222221.title: Yum!

"Tsk, tsk my narcissistic little man, I am afraid this is no prank! You were the one who advertised how beefy your muscles where, taking a snap shot of your lean abs or plump biceps and sending them out for the world to see. You were advertising to be played with and eaten yes?"

Jake looked concerned for an instant and then cracked a big grin as if he understood what was really happening. "Nah dude this is syck! Yo Joey! Edgar! the joke IS up my brothers. Open this box and get me outta here!" He looked up defiantly at the massive face and flexed mockingly. His overconfidence turned to terror as a massive hand made its way over the wall of his cardboard cell and moved for him. "Hey! What the fuck! Noooooo!" Jake tried to dart away from the encroaching hand only to find himself trapped in the corner of the box. He instinctively balled up in protest as the massive fingers pushed him around violently finally getting a firm grip on the back waist of his jeans. He lurched up to run and found himself kicking at the air. As impossible as it was at this point the butterflies in his belly intensified as he found himself swiftly moving upward past the protective boundaries of his cardboard cell. He cried out in protest kicking and clawing at the air, but the fingers which held tight to his jeans were well beyond his control. A second massive hand approached and managed to get a firm hold on the back of his t-shirt. He pondered slipping out of it for an instant, but the fall was too great.

You form two possible plans. Both plans will keep them both restrained and will enhance their flavour. It depends on what you're in the mood for.

You consider each option as you pick each twin up in turn and start removing their clothes, casually ignoring their protests. One option is to tie them together with liquorice strings. They'd be powerless to move and they'd taste sweeter. The other option is to fry them along side a few strips of bacon. You then wrap the twins up in the bacon, sort of like pigs in blankets.

What are you in the mood for?
12513.title: Eat them both together!

125131.content:
Your hunger urges you on, you can't wait to cook them. You decide to eat them both at the same time, raw, alive and wiggling (as much as one can wiggle when tied to your twin brother).

Grabbing hold of Dylan, you begin the arduous yet necessary task of stripping him. Cole seems to think this means he's being let off, so he sits down and watches, relieved that it's not him that's about to become your next snack. The look on his face soon disappears, however, when you deposit the now naked Dylan back in the box and pick up Cole, repeating the process.

"You're going to eat us both, aren't you?" asks Cole, his little body shaking with fear.

"And I just thought you played the smarter twin on TV. You really are quite on the ball, aren't you?" you say very casually as you remove the last of his clothes. Since Cole is the one already in your hand, you take a moment to smell him. Judging from his scent, you decide that strawberry liquorice string would go best with these two. You fish a packet out of the fridge and withdraw a couple of strings. Putting the twins back to back, you start by winding the liquorice around their legs. You then take another string and tie it around their bellies, pinning their arms to their sides. It's now impossible for them to reach their restraints, they certainly can't bend down enough to bite through them. They're helpless and fully aware of it.

"You know, too many sweets will rot your teeth," says Cole in a very 'matter-of-fact' way.

"They say that about sweet, succulent boys as well, but you know what?"

"What?" asks Dylan, the twin currently facing away from you as you raise the two of them up.

"I don't care."
125131.title: The Sweet Snack that is Zac and Cody.

1251311.content:
The twins let out one long simultaneous scream as they make their way slowly but surely into your mouth. You have to open your jaws wider than usual because there's two of them at once, but ultimately they're smaller than your usual snacks. You slowly ease them in, feet first, using your tongue to welcome them in. You feel the liquorice start to come loose, but that's fine. It's not as if they're in any position to escape. Next your tongue caresses their upper bodies. You can even feel the difference between them, especially when it comes to Dylan's tantalisingly tubby tummy. Soon their heads are inside as well, and you close your mouth, reducing their screams to mere muffled yells.

They struggle against their restraints, jostling themselves around on your tongue, mingling their flavours together. This is what you had hoped would happen. The two may be twins, but they each have a slightly different flavour. They'd have been delicious seperately, of course, but together they compliment each other perfectly. With a little careful chewing, you manage to undo the restraints and seperate the twins.

Inside your mouth, Cole is the first to be swallowed. He reaches out for his brothers hand as he begins to feel himself slipping down, but Dylan's too busy struggling for his own life. Cole's slender bare body quickly slips down your throat and into your stomach, taking a few chewed strands of liquorice with him. You keep Dylan in your mouth a little longer, but finally swallow him as well. You feel sorry for Cole, seeing as his considerably plumper brother is about to land on him, but considering that he's now in your stomach, you reckon that that's the least of his problems.

You sit back and relax in order to digest your snack better. Eating twins was something very special indeed. You wonder now if you should just grab a single boy as your next snack, or search the box in hope of finding another set of tasty twins.
1251311.title: Bye bye guys.

12513112.content:
You search the contents of your box, and to your great surprise, you find not one, but two sets of twins! James and Oliver Phelps, the tall, slender Weasley twins ...and Luke and Elliott Tittensor, the British soap stars.

Oooh! Decisions, decisons.
12513112.title: More twins!

1251312.content:
Holding the trapped twins in your hand, you take a moment to look at them. You just know that they're going to taste so sweet, but you can't help but wonder if you can make them taste sweeter. You take out two dipping pots that you keep reserved for such an occasion. Sweet, rather than savoury.

Which one do you dip them in?
1251312.title: Dip, dip, dip!

Without the background clutter you notice even more what a handsome specimen he is. He is wearing a tight white t-shirt, and a pair of stylish jeans. He looks towards the screen and stops. He walks towards the screen and you realize he is looking at you. “Hey cousin can you give me a hand here?” he doesn’t seem to realize you are much larger than he is at this point.

"Yeah man, hey no offense, but you should take a look at my Crossfit website, might help you loose a few pounds. I would suggest eating more lean meat and exercise." Kenny returned to the dressing room and returned in a tailored suit with a blue tie that matched his eyes perfectly.

A while later Kenny returned in a white shirt, blue slacks with dress loafers for his final shoot. "Is this almost finished, I need to get on to my next appointment."

The director smiled warmly. "Of course Mr. Santucci! We just need to finish the full body scan. Must catch every beautiful detail for your adoring fans."

"Do I need to strip down? So no details are missed?" Kenny seemed quite eager to show off his body.

"Not at all, the scanner will be able to adjust for clothes. Please step up on the reconstruction platform." Kenny showed some hesitation at what had been said, but shrugged and opened the Lucite door and stepped onto the glowing white platform. "Kenny dear young man, you might feel a bit disoriented during the process. Just breathe deeply."

Kenny's attention tracked to the door of the chamber which locked with an abrupt snap. "Hey, how many of these dolls do they plan on selling anyways?"

With the door locked and the machine ready to do its magic the director turned to the hot man in the glass with a grin that looked a bit more sinister than any he had worn before. "Oh, we shall fetch a rather handsome price on just this one." Kenny's brow furrowed as the device hummed to life. Kenny took a deep breath as he found himself actually feeling a bit dizzy. Kenny Noticed the height marks on the side of the chamber, a strange sort of vertigo overtook him as he noticed his 6'1" self looking squarely at the mark for 5'6" "Dude! What the fuck is this! Let me outta here man!" Kenny's eyes grew wide as his mind processed what was happening. He kicked and pounded at the thick plastic chamber, but to no avail. He watched as the marks on the side of the chamber appeared to move up past him... 5 feet, 4 feet, 3 feet... He would have thought it just a trick but the weird man and the studio seemed to move up too. At the 2 inch mark the machine's persistent hum finally stopped. The chamber floor was now a vast plane but it was of no matter, Kenny had managed to stay near the door.

"I am afraid your interview has been canceled." The director triggered the lock mechanism on the door and opened it. Kenny reacting to the great size of his captor stepped back, then made a run for it. "Where do you think you are going Mr. Beautiful?"

Kenny sprinted with every bit of his strength across the floor of the studio. He didn't know what was going on, but he was definitely going to have words with his agent! With heightened senses he heard his own breath, the sound of his loafers clicking against the cold hard floor, and the sound of the director sweeping in from behind. "Noooooooooo!" Jack finished his interview and exited the Big Brother set. "Jack, why don't you step in here for a moment." Jack walked by the man in a suit and entered the room. I said I was sorry, what the hell more do they want? the tall beefy young man thought to himself as he entered the room and heard the door close behind him. With the click of the door the room went dark. "Whoa! What the hell" Jack made his way through the pitch black room to where the door should have been, but all he could feel was smooth wall.

"Ah shit whoa!" Jack shifted on his white canvas sneakers as the ground beneath him moved. "Hey! Is anyone else feeling this earthquake... yo! hello!"

Jack sighed impatiently when he heard a scratching and scraping noise from above. Suddenly, a burst of bright light came through an increasing opening in the ceiling. Jack covered his eyes as they adjusted to the rapid change.

The room seemed different. There was no longer any furniture and the door was gone. Was my elimination some sort of challenge? Am I still on the show? Jack thought to himself with hope. His eyes adjusted to the light and he stared upward in search of answers. "Whoa! What the fuck!" Jack stumbled backwards onto his bottom and crawled to a corner of the room. Above, a giant face similar to the guy that led him into the room, was peering down with a smile.

Jack returned to his feet and walked forward. "Hey! What the hell is this? Is it some sort of prank?"

The massive face did not respond immediately but continued to smile down on him for a time then spoke. "Jack the network highers me to... shall we say... 'save face' when a contestant does something that gives us a bad name." Jack's expressionate brow furrowed in confusion. "Jack, the network needs you to disappear without a trace....I am going to eat you."

"What the h...." Jack spun on his sneakers to run only to remember the doorless room... A massive shadow passed over the hunky reality star and a massive set of fingers wrapped around him.

A knock at your door and with it a mysterious package. It is wrapped in brown paper and there are two small holes in the top covered in a mesh screen. Nothing gives a hint to the content of the box but a red stamp that says "LIVE SPECIMENS HANDLE WITH CARE."

You take the package inside and untie the string that holds the paper in place. Under the plain wrapping there is a box that looks ancient in origin. It has a mahogany finish with ivory inlays and inscriptions in what appears to be ancient Sanskrit and images of mouths with tiny people inside. There is a bit of parchment taped to the box with a note written in English:

Dear Reader:

Materialism and shallowness has swept across the globe much as it did in ancient times. In this great vessel you will find the male member of the show 90210 a program that spreads this woeful lack of character by promoting popularity and fame based on physical beauty and wealth. Play with them and eat them at your will and in doing so help to eliminate the plastic. The box will find its way back to me.

The Keeper

You laugh at the note and do not take it seriously. A friend or two knows you would like to shrink down the male cast members of 90210 and you figure one of them has pulled this off. You are still curious of the box's contents and with luck a look inside may reveal who is playing a joke on you.

Carefully you lift the somewhat heavy wooden lid and place it on the table. Below you are shocked to see 13 tiny very handsome young men all decked out in very fashionable clothing. Some are huddled on the bottom of the box while others seem to be orientating themselves. Slowly you recognize the actors: Tristan Wilds, Josh Henderson, Dustin Milligan, Michael Trevino, Kellen Lautz, Brandon Michael Vayda, Adam Gregory, Tristan Wilds, Trevor Donovan

12533222222212222222214.content:
(I apologize that this and the rest of the chapters in this stack will be in first person instead of second.)

Finally. Silence. It’s funny, on TV they always make it sound like the five stages of grief/coping occur in order, each stage needing to be passed before moving onto the next. But I’ve found, based on my years of causing grief to young men everywhere, that it’s completely cyclical. One stage may lead to another, but the order is never the same. It changes depending on the meat- lad- in question. And there is always some residual emotion from past stages, which come back in waves, reigniting the whole process. I could always be more scientific, removing the variables, only having one little treat at a time so that they can’t feed off of each other’s emotions. I could plot their reactions and chart the stages. But really, this is about my pleasure… not the betterment of mankind. I do it because boys are absolutely delicious, and torturing them before they flail, dissolving alive slowly in my roiling gut, turns me on to no end. Really, their feelings are irrelevant, as only my pleasure is pertinent. If my pleasure is directly proportional to their pain… then so be it.
Take my current stock for example; easily procured (you can call it kidnapped, but I loathe the term when “procured” or “harvested” or “culled” are so much more accurate, as they are merely foodstuffs), easily shrunken to the sizes of small mice, easily stuffed into the cages in the kitchen they are currently moping in. They all had a relatively similar progression. True, the older ones were quicker to return to anger and stir up the veal. But basically it followed a standard trend.
It began with questions: “Who are you?!” “What have you done to us?!” “Why?!” “What do you want from us?!” “Do you really think you can get away with this?!” When answered, these quickly dissolved into denial: “Yeah right!” “You’re fucking crazy, guy!” After I showed them my recipe book, and a huge case filled with ‘mementoes’ (shrunken skater clothes, cellphones, book bags, etc.) half of them went to anger, cursing and threatening, and screaming: “Help us!” “Let me out of here!” “Who do you think you are?!” “You’re sick, man!” “Fucking psychopath!” While the other half immediately started pleading and begging, “Please dude…” “I’ll do anything!” “Oh God!” “I’m too young for this!” “Think of our families!” “Think of all we have to live for!” As if I could ever feel bad for creatures as useless at their current size as insects are to a child with a magnifying glass. Again, I told them how worthless they were to me, making clear all the pleasure I derived from their torment and tastes. Like clockwork that sent them all over the board. Some went back to denial, some increased their bargaining, some screamed, some cried, some cursed, some did a combination. They fed off of one another like they knew I was about to do to them. So I casually turned on the ‘training video’ and began reading my handwritten cookbook, complete with pictures. Every once in awhile I’d glance up and see one of them staring at me with wide eyes, looking at me casually planning their fates, and I’d lick my lips at their appearance, making them scamper to the other side of the cage to watch more of the film.

125332222222122222222142.content:
I had created the video over the course of a few months, after realizing my explanations were getting tiresome for me. As I say in the opening narration, it isn’t fair to me to have to explain to my food why it is going to be eaten. Nobody consoles their steak! The video does a good job of showing every single fate that may await the terrified youths. I took great pains to record me torturing with fire, knives, feet, push pins, etc. I chopped, I diced, I slowly grated, I mashed, I squeezed, I pressed, I ripped, I bit, I pierced, I punctured, I tore into, I dismembered, I disemboweled, I forced them to screw each other, I forced them to have fuck my titanic cock, I forced them to hump with my wriggling tongue and moist humid mouth, I forced them to have sex in my gaping puckered monstrous ass. I explained their slow digestion process should they be swallowed alive, (which in truth, outside of the video, I always did). The writhing is so much fun, tickling my insides, when swallowed alive. Plus, the taste of blood overpowers the tender flesh and supple, salty skin. So I always prefer to keep them alive and kicking. They saw tortures I never would have been able to commit had they been at regular size. They saw psychological tortures which were more effective having been seen than they would be if I had committed them on these young men instead. They saw forced gay sex which, to their delicate heterosexual minds- and they all were straight in this batch- were the worst of all. And they saw me eating. They saw my teeth gnash, or my lips slurp, or my tongue lick, followed by swallow after swallow after swallow. Countless bulges drifted down my throat and I captured every sound, every struggling scream, every audible gulp, every plop into my waiting stomach, every moan of pleasure. They saw me gobble up soccer teams, and suck weightlifters into my open maw like they were spaghetti. They saw their own weakness, their desperation, their powerlessness. They transitioned from male human beings into mere toys for my pleasure, and food for my enjoyment (as they weren’t even big enough to sustain me on their own). In turn they saw me transition from male human being to glowing god. They saw my control, my power, my lack of compassion, my insatiable appetite for both their torture and their bodies. 1253322222221222222222222222222222222222.content: Weekly Chris holds out his phone for yet another vine clip. He touches the screen for record and gets a strange sensation. The world goes black and he feels as if he were everywhere and nowhere at the same time. After what feels like an eternity his world comes back into focus. He is standing on a black platform looking out at what looks to be a giant room. "What the fuck bro?" the Youtuber mutters to the air as he begins to cautiously make his way across the black plane of the stage towards whatever lies beyond. The giant room appears to be some sort of kitchen. He tests the world beyond the black stage with the toe of his right Van sneaker. He then hops down to the massive marble surface below. "Yo! What is this place? Hello?"
1253322222221222222222222222222222222222.title: Weekly Chris!

1253322222221222222222222222222222222222.content:
Chris spies the massive room before him. It is a kitchen but from his perspective it looks like a vast canyon. The granite surface is smooth and cold against his light blue Van sneakers. Feeling vulnerable Chis puts his hood over his ball cap covered head and tightens the strings. It is daytime and the kitchen is filled with light allowing him to see many details. He looks behind him trying to figure out how he got to where he is. The black stage appears to be a computer screen with a mark that says "iWonkavision" in a label below. He realizes he has activated part of the screen by stepping on a keyboard that is projected in front of the screen and steps back. He realizes he is on a counter top island and across from him he sees a stove and a magnet holding sharp looking knives. He instinctively reaches for his phone.. dude its gone the little man thinks to himself. He looks down at his feet thinking of what to do next, when his eyes return to the surroundings he is startled to see a person standing where there certainly wasn't one before! The giant smiles in a way that makes Chris uncomfortable.

"Hello my little man! Welcome to my kitchen!" the giant's enthusiastic voice booms loudly over Chris knocking him back a bit.

"Yo bro! What is this? I was like about to do a Vine post when like suddenly I was here and all. What is this man?!" Chris's voice squeaks a bit from your perspective. You give a chuckle and respond to your newest toy. "Well, perhaps it would be easier if I just showed you!" Without giving your tiny captive time to respond you quickly sweep him off his little feet holding him by the back of his sweatshirt. "Let me go! Let me go!" Chris's tiny protests are of no consequence. You briskly escort you now kicking little toy over to a case on the other side of the kitchen. Gently you set the little man down on his sneakers and let him explore a bit.

Chris looks down past his sneakers into the strange glass case. Below him there are tiny glass displays. There are trendy looking clothes mounted on boards in the displays and Chris squints to make out the labels. "The Miuccio Brothers... what is this? Where are the Miuccio Brothers?"

"Well Chris, the Miuccio Brothers also came though my special device just like you. We played a bit and... then I devoured them one by one."

The words hand in the air for a bit as the little man processes what he has learned. "Dude! No way man! No fucking way!" He looks around for an escape. There isn't one. He tries to run across the slick glass case only to find himself once again swept upward between pinched fingers.

Then, the screen goes black and an image starts to take form. A cute guy starts to form. He is not facing the screen and seems a bit disoriented. "Hello! Hello! Yo! What is this?" Finally his form comes into full resolution. From Cody's perspective the world around him has just came into full resolution. He turns and his eyes go wide as they meet yours "What the fuck man! Like, what just happened?!"

Nick wears a white t-shirt and black jeans that meet a pair of black boot covered feet. You don't answer you new toy at first but savor the little man's confusion.

"I'm not sure!" you exclaim with mock concern. "What is the last thing you remember?"

Cody paces a bit still remaining on the imaging platform. "I don't know, like I was recording a new Vine when like everything just faded into this! Are you like in another room or something? Your image is coming in real clear man!" Poor little fella thinks this I'm on a screen you chuckle to yourself.

He immediately jumps to his feet and blinks wildly. "Holly shit! Dude! This is real!" He begins to scurry a bit around his local environment trying to get bearings.

"Yeah, I'm afraid it is." you respond to his revelation with dull interest. You reach to a nearby shelf and retrieve a marsh mellow. "Perhaps this will put things into perspective my tasty little man."

Cody jumps back as you set the marshmallow next to him. "Holly fuck! I'm the size of a marshmallow! Oh my God! I've gotta get back to normal size!"

12533222222222221.content:
The box arrives! You remove the wrapping and carefully cut away the tape holding the container closed. There are holes in the top keeping the special contents from perishing. You have a special play table designed for your purchase with various tools and slippery glass walls that will prevent any escape. You also picked up a couple of cats and have let them go without food for a day or so to get them in the hunting mood should one of your little toys escape.

Gently you tip the box hearing with delight the comotion the action causes. One after another the little men plop down onto the table's surface:

Chris Colfer
Kevin McHale
Cory Monteith
Mark Salling
Harry Schum
Dijon Talton
Max Adler
Chord Overstreet
Darren Criss
John Groff
Grant Gustin
Jacob Artist
Dean Geyer

Damian McGinty
Samuel Larsen

12533222222222221.title: Yessireee!

choices: No, lets keep on with this start.
125332222222222212.content: Lets start this story another way....
125332222222222212.title: Something else.

choices: Play with him... then of course eat him!
1253322222222222121.content:
You fiddle with the dial. His beautiful form comes into focus. He is looking around, disorientated. His beautiful long blond locks fall in front of his face. He is wearing a blue t-shirt and jeans with a pair of Chucks clinging to his proportionately large feet. As his perfect form finally tunes into solid form he continues to search for a moment, when he stops and spins around to focus on you. "Hey! What's going on here?"

Chord Overstreet is now yours!
1253322222222222121.title: Yes!

choices: There is still some play time in him... of course, then eat him.
12533222222222221212.content:
"What do you remember?" you ask your new toy, your mouth is watering with anticipation. You feign a look of concern as if you are as surprised as he is to find him miniaturized as he is.
         "Well, I was about to leave home for work when this strange drone like thing approached me. It had "Edible Toys" painted on it, I saw a flash and felt this strange tingling sensation and now I am here! Please help me get back to normal!" Chord, obviously buying your look of concern, steps forward and plops down from the stage of the black box that resembles a TV. He walks up to your massive face placing his hands on his hips.
         "Wow, that is concerning, especially when you stop to consider you are doll sized, and I am definitely looking forward to eating you...." The words hang in the air, your little captive steps back towards the box and glances up to see "Edible Toys" plastered across the top of the box he just arrived in. He lets off a yelp and darts back and forth looking for an escape. You let him scurry back and forth a bit before plucking him up by collar of his t-shirt. Your already large appetite swells when your capture reveals his delicious abs.
         "Let me go! Let me go! Help! Help!" he kicks helplessly in your grasp.
12533222222222221212.title: Play with him... then of course eat him!

125332222222222212122.content:
Your little captive reaches into his pocket for his cell phone! You watch as the little man fumbles with the screen, grunting and whining a bit as he discovers his device does not work. "Sorry little guy, the Edible Toy miniaturization device automatically renders electronic devices inoperable." You cheerfully pluck the little device from his meaty little hands. You watch as Chord continues to whimper a bit uncontrollably while his face shows his cogs turning. "Please, put me back to normal! I'll make it worth your while."
         You ponder this briefly, "nah, sorry dude! This is simply priceless." You seal your words by plucking off one of Chord's shoes and giving it a savored sniff. "Ummm delicious!" You set the shoe aside and pluck off Chord's no show sock. Five, plump athletic toes wiggle helplessly.
125332222222222212122.title: There is still some play time in him... of cour...

1253322222222222121222.content:
Chord's tiny little stomach churns with butterflies. He hangs powerlessly in your grasp dangling by the neck of his t-shirt. His mind rushes as he thinks about escape, how he got here, and how cold his foot is. "Darin Criss was standing next to me!" his sense of confidence begins to build. "He'll let the authorities know and I'll be set free!"
         Rather than speak you walk across the room watching Chord sway on the threads of his t-shirt. You place him in a clear glass beaker next to the Edible Toys device and press a button marked "memory." The look of hope on Chord's handsome little face fades quickly as you adjust the resolution knob and a familiar face comes into focus. "Darin! Over here!" Chord tries to warn his buddy, but it is of no use. Darin manages to mutter "What the..." before you grasp him, quickly pluck his struggling form of clothing and swallow him whole. Chord watches as Darin's head gets shoved into your mouth instantly muffling his cries for help, soon all that remains of the hunky crooner are his plump little soles passing between your lips.
         "Yum!" you look back towards the jar at your disheartened little boy toy. Now let's continue.
1253322222222222121222.title: Keep going!

choices: Ah, he looks so sad.... time to eat him!
12533222222222221212222.content: You reach into the jar, once again hoisting the beefy blonde morsel up by the back of his shirt. He continues to struggle and protest. You decide it is time to see a bit more of his beautiful upper torso. Plopping him down on the table you grasp the bottom of his t-shirt with both hands and tug upward. He tries to stay in his protective garment, he knows what comes after nudity, but his struggles are in vain. You marvel at the well sculptured biceps, juicy pectorals, and lean washboard abs now completely revealed. You also smile at the scene, a hot guy, used to being large and in charge, now a bite sized morsel standing with one shoe on and one off minus a blue t-shirt and a buddy.
12533222222222221212222.title: This is fun!

125332222222222212122222.content:
You keep going! Chord is on a table with nowhere to go. You watch in delight as your little man toy runs from one end of the table to the other hobbling a bit as he goes with his lopsided footwear. Both of you are startled by a chime emanating from the "Edible Toys". "Hmm what have we here?" you look at Chord with eager eyes. "Poor lad, I don't like to be overstocked in celebrity boy toys. With a new arrival, I will have to uh 'move inventory'" you eye him as you say this licking your lips. He looks over at the pile of clothes that once contained Darin and his face shows he knows you mean business. You whistle as you hastily push a few buttons and adjust the receiver knob. As the drone's new capture begins to resolve, you quickly snatch up Chord from the edge of the table. "Wouldn't want you doing anything rash. My cat would not enjoy you nearly as much as I will."
         With Chord returned to the jar you focus on the next toy! Blake Jenner's form begins to take shape! Another hunky man with long hair, this time brown. He wears a gray sweat shirt and t-shirt, jeans, and grey skater sneakers! This time you manage to remember poor little Chord and push him out of sight of the platform along with Darin's clothes. Blake resolves with his back to you.
125332222222222212122222.title: Keep playing!

choices: Make him sing for you, and then eventually eat him!
1253322222222222121222222.content:
You expect the usual surprise as your bite sized little hunk realizes his new reality, but his behavior is different. You hear him speaking calmly about relationship? It takes a moment for you to realize he is practicing a script! The little guy must have had his back turned on the drone when it went through the sequence. If he was at a studio, he might have been standing on a black floor looking at the very type of black background he was looking at now in his shrunken state.
         But how do I break it to him that he is my new toy? You ponder to yourself. Quietly you reach around and obtain the jar containing your soon to be making an exit boy toy. You drop him out on the table. He spies his work mate and goes right for the bait. "Blake! Blake! You are in danger you've got to get out of here!" You laugh a little inside knowing that neither little man is going to "get out of here."
         Blake spins around and focuses on the sound of Chord's approach. "Hey, you're late, hey man, what happened to y........" his eyes flicker their attention from Chord to the room... to you. "Hello, Blake welcome to my collection." Your evil grin spreads as his face stays frozen in shock. "Chord, my dear boy, it has been a pleasure, but as I said before when one come in one has got to go!" Chord lets off a yell and starts to run. Without effort you pluck him up removing his remaining sneaker. You savor the scent and pull each of his big pink feet into your mouth. He continues to protest as you lower him like a bunch of grapes towards your mouth. "Please! Don't do this! Oh God don......" his cries are muffled as he plunges head first between your lips. Your tongue explores every delicious surface as you proceed to taste his upper torso. You feel the sensation of his jeans against your lips. With a flip and a pop his belt and buttons are free. He tenses up inside your mouth sensing your actions outside. His toes clench in vain has you tug gently, slowly at the cuffs of his jean legs pulling him ever deeper inside. Much more slowly than with Darin you savor his form in your mouth. He still continues to protest with a periodic garbled yell from within your oral cavity.
         As you relish the final moments of your meaty Chord Overstreet bonbon, your third captive decides to make an exit. With a mouth full of his beefy colleague you glide out and gently pluck Blake up by his right ankle. He lets off a terrible protest. As a final signoff to a delicious guest you allow Blake's fair lock covered head, now matted with saliva one last look at the outside world and his buddy Blake. "Let me out let me....." with an unceremonious flip of your lip his head disappears and a terrified Blake watches dangling upside down between your fingers as a lump moves gently down your throat towards an acidic stomach below. His eyes trail from the lump that was Chord... back to your face.
1253322222222222121222222.title: Let him find you.

12533222222222222.content: How about a LOGO show like one with jeffery self and cole escola maybe?
12533222222222222.title: Keep surfiing.

125332222222222222222222.title: A Spanish Show

1253322222222222222222222.content: Nico Tortorella looks rather tasty!
1253322222222222222222222.title: No

12533222222222222222222221.content:
It has arrived! You move the specially made wooden box that holds your new boy toy over to the the table. Gently you remove the security bands and open the tiny door at the side of the container. Patiently you wait off to one side for the contents to emerge. After a few minutes you see a handsome little figure step out into the light. Nico Tortorella is fashionably clothed in a tailored white shirt and patterned neck tie with skinny trousers and a pair of trendy olive colored converse sneakers. His trousers are hipster short allowing you a glance at his yummy looking ankles and low cut socks.

You stay silent as your little plaything tries to figure out where he is. He scans the comparative massiveness of your kitchen with awe... until he meets your eyes. He immediately turns on his hot little heels and makes for the door of the container. Sadly for the young man the door has a remote that allows you to close the door before he can make it. Panic stricken he turns again for an escape. The beautiful little man darts across the table and tries to find a hiding place. You chuckle a bit as he runs behind a bowl of fruit and finds himself stuck to a surface covered in a thin layer of honey!

You casually circle the table to watch your morsel struggle. He is barely keeping his balance being held upright by his sneakers. "Tsk tsk tsk... where do you you think you are going?" You sweep in watching his eyes trail upward as your hand reaches in and plucks him upward by the waist of his skinny pants. He struggles of course and you hear a pleasing little sound as both of his sneakers dislodge from his long tender feet!

He continues to struggle between your fingers as you whistle plucking his sneakers up and placing them aside. "Mementos you see" you explain to him as if he would understand. "I like to remember all of the little men I have played with and gobbled up."
12533222222222222222222221.title: Yes he does!

125332222222222222222222211.content:
Nico Tortorella is now shrunken and yours! Just moments before you watched with glee as your little toy discovered his new reality and tried, in vain, to escape.
