"Hmm, I know I will. You're so tasty!" Opening your mouth again, you pop the top half of Tom's body into your mouth. Taking a gentle grip on his waist with your lips, you let go of his legs. You move so tongue so as to pull the rest of him into your mouth. You may not have prepared him, but his natural flavour is just sensational. The saliva is building in your mouth, but you slosh him around gently for a while to really experience his wonderful taste. You don't bite down because you want to feel him whole, alive and still wriggling within you. Finally you swallow, and you feel his slender naked body slide down your throat and into your stomach.

You pat your belly. He was good, but hardly filling.
13411.title: Down he goes.

choices: Zac Efron, Cody Linley and Joe Jonas
Rupert Grint, Devon Murray and Robert Pattinson
134111.content:
Once you realise that having just one boy as a snack barely fills you up, you decide that it's time for a proper meal. True, you shouldn't snack before dinner, but you decide to view Tom as merely the appetiser. Now it's time to prepare the main course.

You decide to use three boys for this meal, but which three?
134111.title: Browse the box for another snack.

1341111.content:
You decide you'd like some variety, so you take Zac, Cody and Joe out of the box, holding Cody in one hand and the other two in the other. Zac seems too scared to even move, whereas Cody and Joe are struggling like mad to get free from your grip.

"Struggle all you want. The only thing you'll accomplish is being a minor distraction while I'm trying to think of how best to cook you three." This serves to scare Zac stiffer, and to make the other two struggle all the more. The kicking, twisting and crying is getting a little irritating, so you find a large, smoothly curved bowl to place the boys in. They sit at the centre of the bowl, all three of them trembling. Now you can finally think.

You could just fry them, of course. Nice and quick. Then again, you recently came across a set of instructions for making meatballs with your own custom filling. You basically pack the meat tightly around your choice of filling and cook them. Well, why not fill them with teenage male celebrities? Spaghetti and maleballs, you'd call them ...or maybe you'd think of a name later.
1341111.title: Zac Efron, Cody Linley and Joe Jonas

choices: They sense something's up and refuse.
13411112.content:
You've been wanting to try this for a while, so now's your chance. They'll have to be stripped, of course ...and they'd need to remain in a sitting position while you packed the meat around them. Plus, there's no way to stop them from bursting out of the balls once they're inside. You could threaten them, of course, but these boys are in a desperate situation, they'd do anything to escape.

Then it hits you! You just have to dose them up. The drugs should be out of their system by the time they've been cooked inside the meatballs. All you need is something to make them less resistant, a mild tranquiliser. You find just the thing on the top shelf of the medicene cabinet. You crush up the pills and dissolve them in some orange juice. You pour this into a much smaller bowl and place it at the centre of the bowl containing the boys, who rapidly back away against the sides.

"W-What's that?" asks Joe.

"Orange juice," you say in a friendly tone. "I expect you guys are thirsty after being trapped in that box for so long." They look up at you, fear etched onto their faces.

"You're going to eat us, aren't you?" Cody blurts out.

"What? After I've just eaten Tom Felton? No, I'm nicely full, thanks," you lie. "Believe it or not, but I'm actually concerned for you. I don't want you to get dehydrated, so drink up."
13411112.title: Drug them first.

choices: Make them the centre of the meatball.
134111121.content:
They hesitate for just a moment, then as one they all kneel at the rim of the smaller bowl and start to drink. It seems they really were thirsty. You just about manage to hold back a grin as they lap it up. Once they're finished, they sit back on the bottom of the bowl.

"That hit the spot," sighs Joe.

"So, if you're really not going to eat us, what are you going to do?" asks Zac.

"Hey ...guys ...do you feel a little ...you know ...polar bear?" asks Cody.

"Polar bear?" slurs Joe. "No, I don't feel no ..." One by one the boys slump over. You remove the smaller bowl and quickly pick up Zac.

"I'm going to strip you naked now, so that your clothes don't intefere with your flavour," you tell him very directly.

"Sure ...yeah, that sounds nice," says Zac, a rather dopey grin on his face. You proceed to remove Zac's clothes, marvelling at his toned and muscular body. Cody and Joe soon follow, and you marvel at the lovely extra bit of puppy fat that they have over Zac. Finally all three boys are naked and lying in the bowl, going nowhere. It doesn't take you long to process the meat and make it nice and soft in your hands, ready to be packed around the boys.

So the question is, do you pack it round them entirely, with their whole bodies curled up inside the meatball? Or do you force them into a sitting position and pack the meat around them so that their heads stick out? Eventually the tranquiliser will wear off, and they may just survive the cooking process. If they do, your sadistic side wants to be able to hear their pleas for mercy.

What to do?
134111121.title: They drink.

choices: Mmm, I like the second idea more.
1341111211.content: Last choice before preparing the meatboys... Yeah, my name is better, what are you gonna do about it? Do you just want the heads sticking out, or would you rather craft the giant balls of meat around their midsections, letting their arms legs, and head all stick out. This way after the drugs wear off you could taste them all over, before nibbling away at the center.
1341111211.title: Leave their heads sticking out.

134111122.content:
The three boys eye the bowl of juice warily. Joe and Cody look up into your face, trying to read your expression. You're making it as hard for them as you can, but ultimately a fairly understandable sense of paranoia takes over. Zac's about to drink from the bowl when both Joe and Cody grab him by the shoulder and pull him back.

"Don't drink, Zac. It's a trick," says Joe.

"We're sure of it," says Cody, scowling up at you. Their defiance irritates you. If they won't drink, you'll never be able to get them to stay still long enough to make them into meatballs. There's only one course of action. You'll have to eat one of them to scare the other two into doing as they're told. Zac seems the least rebellious, whereas Joe and Cody have very openly refused to do as you say. Do you eat Zac in order to scare the other two? Or do you eat either Joe or Cody to ensure Zac's co-operation as well as the co-operation of whoever you choose to spare.
134111122.title: They sense something's up and refuse.

1341111221.content:
You decide to sacrifice Zac in order to hopefully gain the obedience of Joe and Cody. You figure you'll get more satisfaction out of terrifying them into submission anyway. You stand up straight, glaring down at the boys in the bowl. Joe and Cody are standing their ground, but Zac still seems a little confused as to why he can't have some orange juice.

"You refuse to drink? You refuse my kindness?" you say in a low, stern tone.

"Yes," states Joe firmly. Cody nods in agreement.

"You two have upset me greatly. Now see what happens when I'm upset!" Your hand darts into the bowl and your fist wraps around Zac. As you raise him up and out of the bowl, Joe and Cody start yelling. They call out his name, demand that you release him, the kind of stuff you'd expect. Zac just looks plain petrified. You can feel him trembling in your grip. Keeping your stern, stony look, you strip Zac naked. This provokes renewed cries from the boys down below, but there's nothing they can do to save their friend now.

You take hold of Zac's waist with your thumb and forefinger. You raise him up to your mouth, licking your lips. Before he can utter his last words, you open your mouth and practically toss him inside. Joe and Cody's yells fall silent as they watch their friend being consumed. You can feel him panicking, but a few quick sloshes of the tongue disorientate him enough to stop him flailing around. His raw flavour really is delicious. It would have been nice to have him cooked, but you enjoy his taste all the same. You make a big show of swallowing him, gulping audibly. You feel Zac slide down your throat, while Cody and Joe get to watch it. They see a great lump form in your throat, travel downwards and then disappear. There goes the thoroughly tasty Zac Efron.

You look down at the dumbfounded boys.

"So, are you two going to drink the juice I have so generously given you?"
1341111221.title: Eat Zac.

13411112211.content:
"Y-yes! Anything you say!" gasps Joe as he falls to his knees and takes a generous gulp from the little bowl. Cody follows suit, sloshing the juice down his front in his haste and nervousness. It doesn't take long for the juice to take effect, and the two are practically out for the count.

It's with great satisfaction that you start stripping them, though at the same time you can't help but think that two boys to make into meatballs doesn't seem enough. You could choose another to replace Zac, though if you do you'll have to dunk them straight into the drugged juice. They'd never drink it willingly after seeing what happened to Joe and Cody (who, by the way, are now both splendidly naked).

So, do you choose another boy or stick with these two?
13411112211.title: They drink.

134111122111.content:
Even after eating both Tom Felton and Zac Efron, the prospect of Joe Jonas and Cody Linley still doesn't sound like it'll fill you up. You decide to find a replacement for Zac. You'll force them to drink the orange juice, strip them naked and then the defenceless little morsel will be in the same situation as Joe and Cody.

The question is, who to choose?
134111122111.title: Another boy.

1341111221111.content: So, it's one of the Sprouse twins that's destined for the oven ...or is both? Why not pack the two of them together into one meatball. Just think of how filling they'll be!
1341111221111.title: One of the Sprouse twins.

13411112211111.content:
Perhaps you're not feeling quite so ravenous after all. You decide to just have the one twin, and leave the other for another time. Peering down into the box, you manage to locate them both, cowering in opposite corners.

Which one do you grab?
13411112211111.title: Just the one twin.

13411112211112.content: You've decide to have them both, and your initial idea sounds very interesting. Pack the two of them into one meatball. It would have to be slightly bigger than the other meatballs, but it would be worth it. Then again, you could always take the easier route and make each twin into an individual meatball.
13411112211112.title: Both together.

134111122111122.content:
You've already waited long enough. It's probably best just to make them both into individual meatballs. You've still got Joe and Cody to do, after all. Wasting no more time, you fish Cole and Dylan out of the box. Holding one in each hand, you dunk them head first into the orange juice. First Cole, then Dylan. You're pretty sure they've taken a few good mouthfuls when you remove them.

"Hey! What's the big idea?" splutters Cole, doing his best to remove his orange juice soaked hair from his eyes.

"What did you do that for?" asks Dylan.

"Oh, for the effect it's about to have on you both," you reply quite casually.

"Wha ...what effect? It's not having a ...woah," says Dylan slowly. A glazed look comes over his face. You look at Cole and find that he's already under, grinning as though he doesn't have a care in the world. You strip Cole first, laying Dylan down next to Joe and Cody. Once Cole is done, you place him next to his fellow naked morsels and proceed to strip Dylan.

"My, my ...you're certainly plumper than your brother, Dylan."

"Thanks," he mutters. "I like to eat things."

"So do I, Dylan. So do I." Now that all four boys are ready, you retrieve the raw meat and start kneeding it like dough. You then pick up Joe with one hand and carefully arrange him so that he's in a sitting position, his legs tucked up to his chest. You then start packing the meat around him, covering every bit of him except his head. You pat and roll the meat until it forms a ball, perfectly rounded except for Joe's head sticking out of the top. Joe just continues to smile. You place him on a greased oven tray and repeat the whole procedure with Cody, Dylan and Cole.

You now have four meatballs, each with a delicious centre of naked shrunken teenage boy. The drugs haven't worn off just yet, so they're still completely unaware of their impending fate. You figure that they'll be back to normal by the time they're ready to come out of the oven, that is, if they've survived the process. The meat is packed around them very tightly, so they won't be able to escape. You pre-heat the oven, then slide the tray in with the four boys sitting helplessly in their balls of meat.

Naturally, you'll want a sauce and some spaghetti to go with this particular dish, so you go about the business of preparing these. The pasta and the sauce is soon on the boil, but it's the boys you want to keep an eye on. The meat that's packed around them will be nicely brown when they're ready to come out.

You ponder what to do in the meantime. Do you fish another shrunken boy out, purely for company? Or do you concentrate on the task at hand, no distraction?
134111122111122.title: It's cooking time!

1341111221111221.content: You realise that you don't have forever to choose someone, as it won't take all that long for the boys to finish being cooked. Looking into the box, you quickly narrow your choice of dinner companion down to two boys. David Henrie or Lucas Grabeel.
1341111221111221.title: Choose someone to talk to.

choices: He gets angry and ends up annoying you.
13411112211112211.content:
You decide that you'd rather like a chat with David Henrie while your meatballs cook. You fish him out of the box and deposit him onto the kitchen counter, not too far from the oven. He's wearing a plain yet expensive white shirt and black trousers.

"You're not going to hurt me, are you?" he asks. You give him a friendly smile.

"Not unless you give me good reason to. I've brought you out of the box for a little chat."

"A ...a chat? Really?"

"Really."

"That's a relief. The other boys in there," he gestures back towards the box. "Are all under the impression that you're going to eat us one by one ...wait a second, where's Zac ...and Cody ...and Joe ...and the Sprouse twins for that matter?"

You sigh. He was bound to ask about them sooner or later. You rub your belly casually.

"Well, Zac was used as an example of what happens to those who defy me. A very tasty example."

"And ...the others? Cole and Dylan ...Joe and Cody?" You nod towards the oven.

"They'll be a little longer yet, so you and I still have a few minutes to chat."

The look on David's face is quite unreadable. He looks fearful enough to want to do whatever he can to avoid sharing their fate, but at the same time he looks like he could explode with fury.
13411112211112211.title: David Henrie

choices: Make him an ingredient in the pasta sauce.
134111122111122112.content:
"You can't do this! It's not right!" he suddenly bellows. His unidentifiable expression has become one of hardened indignation. In layman's terms, he's peeved off.

"Temper, temper, David. Getting so angry about it certainly won't help."

"So you expect me to just stand here and chat to you while you're cooking four people alive? Well, you can forget it! You're a monster!"

"You're beginning to upset me, David."

"I don't care!" he screams. "I'm not going to play along with your sick games. Someone's going to find out what you're doing, and when they do I hope they put you away for life you freak!"

Your arm moves in a sweeping motion, scooping David up in your hand. He struggles, of course, and continues to curse and shout. It falls on deaf ears though. You'd brought him out of the box for some light conversation, not out and out abuse. He'll have to be punished for this.
134111122111122112.title: He gets angry and ends up annoying you.

1341111221111221122.content:
Continuing to ignore David's foul comments, you strip him of his clothes. Naked and thrashing away in your grip, you wonder if you should give him one last chance at pleasing you and avoiding becoming part of the sauce. If he refuses, then you can throw him in anyway.

The question is, should you even make the offer?
1341111221111221122.title: Make him an ingredient in the pasta sauce.

13411112211112211221.content:
You bring David up to eye level, and fix him with a sincere gaze.

"Now then, you have one last chance. You can apologise for your remarks and we can carry on with our nice little chat, or you can be foolish enough to continue your bad behaviour. In this case, you will find yourself being added to the pasta sauce ...which at this point is extremely hot."

David stops thrashing for a moment and returns your stare. He seems so calm, yet so hard to read. He could go either way.

What is his response?
13411112211112211221.title: Give him one last chance.

13411112211112211222.content:
You decide that he's unlikely to change his tune, and therefore being an extra ingredient is all he's good for. You hold him over the pot of boiling sauce. You give him a second to realise what's about to happen, then drop him in before he can really react.

He hits the sauce, landing on his back. He lets out a loud scream as he slowly sinks further into the sauce. He thrashes around, but that only serves to get more burning hot sauce all over him. Now he's in it up to his neck, and still screaming.

You pick up a wooden spoon and start stirring him into the sauce. You smile when he tries to grab hold of the spoon and hoist himself out, but the sauce has made his hands slippery and he can't maintain a proper grip on the handle. He sinks back into the sauce, and finally his screams stop. After a few more stirs, you leave him to be slowly absorbed into the sauce. His flavour should enhance it greatly.

After a few more minutes, you realise that the boys in the oven are done. Popping on the oven gloves, you turn the heat off and carefully remove them. After placing them on the counter, you look more closely at them.

Have they survived the cooking process?
13411112211112211222.title: Throw him in the sauce.

134111122111122112222.content:
They're slowly stirring, blinking and coughing as they come out of their sedative-induced stupor. They didn't actually feel being cooked, although they are aware of how hot they feel. The meat has cooked around them to form a casing that they cannot break out of. Only your teeth will get them out of there.

"Wha ...what happened?" asks Cole.

"We've been cooked! That's what happened!" exclaims Cody.

"I can't move!" shouts Dylan. You let them scream and shout to their heart's content while you sort out the rest of your meal. You drain the spaghetti and tip it out onto your plate. You then pour the David Henrie sauce over the plate. After some gentle mixing, it looks almost perfect. It's only missing one thing, the meatballs.

You're not picky about who goes on first, or where they go. You carefully pick up the oven tray and roll the four boys onto the plate. They scream as they roll down the tray, and let out a low 'Oomph' as they land on the soft spaghetti and sauce. Cole and Joe have landed sitting upwards, while Dylan and Cody are on their sides. It doesn't matter what position they're in really. None of them can break free, and they're all ultimately headed for the same place.

Retrieving your knife and fork, you sit down to begin your meal. You start by twirling your fork around some spaghetti very close to Joe, just to give him a bit of a fright. You eat a little more pasta before deciding to start on the meatballs. The four of them look up at you in terror, wondering who will be first.
134111122111122112222.title: Time for spaghetti and boy balls.

1341111221111221122221.content: You've decided to have one of the young twins first, but which one? Dylan is the plumper, so should he be eaten first or should you save the best for last? Cole's probably just as tasty, there's just less to him.
1341111221111221122221.title: One of the twins.

1341111221111221122222.content: Cody and Joe have been the most defiant throughout the whole thing, though they did change their tune once they saw Zac being eaten alive. Now it's their turn. Which one gets to join Zac first?
1341111221111221122222.title: Cody or Joe

13411112211112211222222.content:
You carefully insert your fork into the sauce and pasta just below Cody, and then with equal care you scoop him up. Joe, Dylan and Cole all fall silent as they watch this little preview of what's in store for them. Cody's lower lip trembles, as you're sure the rest of his body is inside that meatball. You grin before opening wide and inserting the entire forkload into your mouth. No last words from Cody, no verbal torture from you, just plain consumption.

Though of course, Cody's taste is anything but plain. As soon as your fork is clear of food, you begin to chew. Cody lets out the shortest of yelps before falling silent forever. Your teeth break open the meatball, but Cody is in no position to enjoy being able to move freely again. He is utterly delicious. His cooked body alone makes him a better snack than Zac was, but his flavour combined with the pasta and the David Henrie sauce makes for an altogether brilliant taste. You chew and swallow regularly, until every last bit of Cody has begun its journey down into your digestive system. You eat a little more pasta, all the while pondering who to eat next. You can tell that the boys are thinking the same thing, but not as eagerly as you.
13411112211112211222222.title: Cody

134111122111122112222221.content:
Joe notices you eyeing him up and screams in terror. You mix him up a bit in the spaghetti first, covering him in sauce as he pleads and begs with you. You get sick of his whining so spin him round and prod the fork into his backside as a warning. It doesn't matter - in less than a minute there will be nothing left of him anyway.

You scoop him up and put him in your mouth before rolling the meatball around for a short while, just to prolong Joe's hellish ordeal. Then finally, you place him under your teeth and with one final scream, he's chopped in half by your sharp teeth and then pulverised as you chew on the meatball which is bursting with flavour - the Jonas brother makes an excellent dish. Finally he's swallowed down and you let out a satisfying belch - this is the best meal you've had in ages!

Now it's just Cole and Dylan to go. You look down and...
134111122111122112222221.title: Joe is next!

1341111221112.content: Mitchell Musso looks rather tasty ...but then there's always his co-star, Jason Earles. There's plenty of good, prime meat on him.
1341111221112.title: Somone else.

13411112211121.content: So, which is it to be? Mitchell or Jason? Both look like they'd make great meat balls.
13411112211121.title: Mitchell or Jason

13411112211122.content: Perhaps the succulent David Henrie is what you need for your meatballs. He'd make a fine meaty centre. Then again, there's Ricky Ullman. The wait is getting to be too much, you decide that it's definitely going to be one of these two delicious boys!
13411112211122.title: Someone else

134111122112.content:
After deciding just to have these two tasty treats for dinner, you get to thinking. If it's not really worth making these two into meatballs, then maybe you can pack the meat around them in some other way? Make them into burgers? Pack them together and make a meatloaf? Sausages? Or just stick with the meatball idea.

Sometimes having so many options for such tasty boys is a real pain in the backside.
134111122112.title: Just these two.

choices: Meatloaf is the way to go!
1341111221121.content: So, having abandoned the meatballs idea, you're now considering either making them into individual burgers or packing the meat around them both together. Joe and Cody look up at you with dozy expressions on their faces. They've obviously forgotten that they're about to be eaten.
1341111221121.title: Burgers or meatloaf?

13411112211212.content:
Leaving the two doped up boys to their stupor, you set about preparing the meatloaf. Before very long you have what you basically need, the raw meat fills the container and you've worked the seasoning into the meat itself. It's still soft and malleable, so all you need to do now is insert these two boys into the loaf itself. Once they're stuck inside you'll place the whole thing in the oven, and the meatloaf will rise as it cooks, trapping them inside. That way even if the drugs wear off, it'll be too late and they'll be unable to escape.

They're both singing softly to themselves as you pick their limp forms up. Now you face a decision. Should you place them inside the meatloaf standing up so that their heads stick out or should you lie them down and work them right into the meatloaf, so that they're completely surrounded by it? This would mean that they'd suffocate, of course, but you are about to eat them after all.
13411112211212.title: Meatloaf!

choices: Get a boy to talk to
134111122112122.content: You pick up Joe and Cody,they are still under the effects of the drugs and smiling happily,and you carry them to the raw meatloaf.You decide to lie them down in the meatloaf,you won't have the pleasure of hearing them scream as you eat them,but they will taste great.First you place Joe's back into the meatloaf,you begin to rub and work him into the meat,until there is nothing left,you do the same to Cody.With your treats safely in their meaty tomb you can put them in the oven,you turn it up high and put the meatloaf in.You go and sit down,do you wait for them to cook alone or do you get a boy to talk to?
134111122112122.title: Lie them down.

1341111221122.content: So, there's the original plan, which is to make them scrunch themselves up and then pack the meat around them. A new option is to lie them straight and pack the meat around them that way. Hmm, Joe and Cody sausages!
1341111221122.title: Sauages or meatballs?

choices: You accidentally try to swallow them!
13411112212.content:
It takes them a few seconds to recover from the shock, but they slowly shake their heads. You're quite surprised by this.

"Really? Even after seeing Zac get eaten alive, you're still refusing to have a drink of orange juice?"

"Y-Yes," says Joe.

"We won't play your games. D-do your worst," adds Cody in what he probably thought was a defiant tone. You let out a deep sigh.

"Suit yourselves." You casually reach into the bowl and grab the first boy you can, which just happens to be Joe. You take a quick sniff of him before you begin to strip him, and you detect a somewhat exotic aroma coming from him. Within a matter of seconds he's naked, and he soon finds himself back in the bowl. At exactly the same time as you put Joe back, you pick Cody up. He has a faint smell of peaches about him (the shampoo he uses, probably). He's more toned than Joe, who has just a hint of plumpness about him. Keeping the naked form of Cody trapped in one hand, you scoop Joe out of the bowl with the other.

It's only now that you're holding them both that you realise how well their distinctive smells mix together. You bring them both closer to your face to be sure, ignoring their flinches. You breath in deeply. Oh yes, combined they have a most scintillating smell. Perhaps it's time to see if the same can be said of their taste.

It's going to be quite a squeeze, but you manage to open your mouth wide enough to fit them both in at the same time. When they realise what's about to happen, they both let out a terrified scream. Going for it, you plunge them both into your mouth, cutting off their screams as you manage to close your lips behind them. You realise now that they make quite a mouthful, so swallowing them both at the same time wouldn't be a very good idea.

At first they kick and struggle most vigorously, which is actually proving to be very uncomfortable for you. It turns out to be more so for them, as they're only really kicking and hitting each other. They soon stop and instead manage to curl up together, clutching onto each other for dear life. They're still too big to swallow, curled up in a big boy ball like that, but this provides you with the perfect opportunity to taste them properly. Your tongue dances around the two boys, rolling them over and over in your mouth. You were very right, their flavours mingle together like their scents to make an overall fantastic experience. You salivate greatly at their flavour ...
13411112212.title: In they go together!

134111122122.content:
Suddenly, you find yourself choking. You generated so much saliva and were so distracted by their fantastic taste that you accidentally swallowed them both at the same time! Now the two of them are lodged in your throat, cutting off your air supply!

You try everything you can think of to save yourself, hitting every part of your back and torso you can reach in an effort to cough them up. You can't tell, but your face is beginning to change colour. You can feel yourself losing strength as you try one more time ...
134111122122.title: You're choking!

1341111221222.content:
It's no good. The two tangled up boys are impossible have been stuck in your throat for too long. You slowly sink to the ground, utter one last indistinguishable sound and die. Simple as that.

You're there for at least a couple of hours before a friend pops over. While he's horrified to discover your body, he's also somewhat intrigued by the box of shrunken boys he discovers in the room. He makes sure to pinch that before calling the police.

So, while your friend enjoys his new box of diminuitive delicacies, you end up on the table at the morgue. Your death is ruled as accidental, though the forensic expert can't quite explain what she found lodged in your throat ...
1341111221222.title: You choke.

1341111222.content: You've decided to eat one of the rebels, but which one? They both look fairly delicious, and eating either of them would be sure to ensure that your point is made.
1341111222.title: Eat Joe or Cody.

choices: They agree, get naked and get busy!
They disagree, tell you to get stuffed, they get cooked.
1341112.content:
Having just eaten Tom Felton, you decide that you're in the mood for a big Harry Potter themed feast. You want to save Daniel Radcliffe for later, so instead you scan your box for a selection of hot and delicious actors from the film series. The box is so full of terrified shrunken celebs that at first it's hard to spot them, but finally you pull three of them out. Rupert, Devon and Robert. You hold Robert in one hand, Rupert and Devon in the other and carry them over to the oven.

"Hey! Put us down! We're getting squashed together!" shouts Rupert.

"Move your shoulder out of my face!" says Devon, his voice a little muffled.

"Be quiet, the pair of you!" barks Robert. Their argument amuses you to no end, but now it's down to business. "And what have you done with Tom?" asks Daniel.

"I have done to Tom exactly what I'm about to do to you, and it'll all go a lot smoother if you could all keep quiet."

"But what are you going to do with us?" demands Robert.

"I'll show you," you say as you hold the three boys above the marinating dish. The three of them stare in amazement at their friend, tied up, naked and lying in sauce.

"Uh ...hi guys ..." says Tom uneasily.

"Tom, just what are you doing in there?" asks Daniel.

"Marinating ...you know, gathering flavour. We're all going to be barbequed." Tom is trying his utmost to communicate his plan to the others without alerting you (as if you hadn't known about it all along). He smiles broadly. "It's actually rather fun, lying here, and we'll be marinating for quite a while so we'll have plenty of time to catch up ..." He placed a great deal of emphasis on 'quite a while' and 'plenty of time', hoping that the boys would cotton on to his plan.
1341222111.title: Trying to get the plan across.

13412221111.content:
The three boys are quiet for a second, then they slowly seem to relax. Your intuition tells you that Robert caught on first, followed shortly by Daniel and Matthew. Those two seemed to relax simultaneously.

"Oh yeah, I've got loads to tell you, Tom. I mean, we probably haven't seen each other since we wrapped on the last film, right?" says Daniel.

"And I'm really going to enjoy marinating in such a spendid sauce," says Matthew in a transparently sycophantic tone. "I'm sure it will make us all extra tasty."

It's taking a great deal of effort to not burst out laughing. You take a moment to make sure you've got your composure, then you speak.

"Well, I can see you're all eager to be eaten. Why don't I just skip the preparation and eat all three of you right now?"

"No, no!" the three of them exclaim together. There's definite panic in their voices, something they try to suppress when they next speak.

"W-Why pass up an opportunity to improve our flavour?" says Matthew a little shakily.

"Yeah, stick us in there with Tom and just wait and see how good we'll all taste," adds Daniel.

Still trying to contain your laughter, you set the three boys down on the counter, placing your arms on either side of them in order to prevent escape. They look up at you, uncertainty and trepidation in their faces.

"If you're really so willing to become my meal, then save me the trouble of stripping you myself. Start getting naked, all three of you."
13412221111.title: They figure it out.

134122211111.content:
"Of course," says Robert as he starts to unbuckle his belt. "We'd be only too happy to."

Daniel starts by yanking his shirt over his head, while Matthew drops to the floor to start taking off his shoes. Robert is the first to finish getting unchanged, with Daniel at a close second. Finally, Matthew removes his own shirt to reveal a belly that's slightly plumper than the other two boy's. The three of them stand there, buck naked and still maintaing a sense of serenity and compliance. It's time to see how far that goes.

"Hmm, very nice ...all of you. Now, to business. I'm going to tie one of you up myself, and while I'm doing that, one of the remaining two is going to tie the other up for me. Then I'll see to whoever is left myself."

"But ...why do you need to tie us up at all?" asks Daniel. "We're willing to be your meals."

"Personally, I think Robert here is going to be tastiest out of all of us," says Matthew conversationally. Robert throws him a dangerous look, expressing his view that such a comment was taking things a little far. There's faking a willingness to be eaten, and there's just being stupid.

"We're being tied up to stop us moving about," comes Tom's voice from inside the marinating dish. "We absorb more flavour that way."

"There you go," you say. "Now, is anyone going to volunteer to be tied up by me or do I have to choose someone?"

The three boys shuffle their feet nervously. Whoever volunteers or gets chosen will have pretty much no chance to make an escape. The two who are left might just make it, if they're daft enough to attempt it.
134122211111.title: They strip.

1341222111111.content: Out off all three future snacks, Matthew seems to be the most nervous. He's definitely not going to volunteer to be tied up by you and have all possibility of escape snatched away. Daniel and Robert both look braced to step forward and volunteer, but which one will make the first move?
1341222111111.title: Someone volunteers.

13412221111111.content:
It turns out to be Daniel that takes the plunge and steps forward.

"You can tie me up. I volunteer."

"Excellent!" you say as you scoop Daniel up and fish out some lengths of string. Still holding the passive (and naked) Daniel in one hand, you toss a few bits of string to Matthew and Robert.

"Now, while I'm tying up Daniel, Robert can tie up Matthew for me. Then once they're both done, I'll tie up Robert. Make sure you use some decent knots, Robert."

"Of course ..." says Robert quietly as he picks up the string and turns to Matthew, a guilty look on his face. "Okay Matt, stand still ..." You don't have to concentrate too much on tying yp Daniel, as he isn't struggling. You're able to keep an eye on the other two, in case they try anything foolish. Plus, the sight of one boy tying up another in preparation for marinating is somewhat erotic in it's own way. You've just finished tying Daniel's legs together. You see that Robert is kneeling in front of Matthew, about to do the same to him.
13412221111111.title: Daniel volunteers.

choices: He's made a run for it!
134122211111111.content:
Sure enough, Robert wraps the string around Matthew's legs a few times, then ties a good firm knot. Matthew just looks straight ahead, trying not to think of the fate that awaits him.

You proceed to wrap a piece of string round Daniel's waist, pinning his hands to his sides in the process. Copying you, Robert does the same to Matthew. Now with his back to you, you get a good look at Robert's rear.

"Hmm, you have a very nice ass, Robert."

"Thank you," says Robert, in the middle of tying the knot round Matthew's waist.

"Chewing on it will be extremely satisfying," you add. Robert stops mid-knot, gulps slightly and then carries on. You've finished tying up Daniel, while Robert is only just starting on the final knot around Matthew's chest. You deposit Daniel into the dish, just a few inches away from Tom (who smiles up at you inanely). You now watch as Robert finishes the third and final knot.

"There," he says as he steps back to admire his work. "Will that do?"

"Very nicely." You pick up Matthew. He's still staying fairly still and calm, so you decide to give his belly a few experimental licks. You're pretty sure you hear a faint murmur of fear coming from him. "You're just that little bit plumper than the others, Matthew. I think I'll have to have you in a burger bun."

"Great," says Matthew in a wooden manner. You lower him into the dish and then pick up some more string.

"Right, it's your turn now, Robert."
134122211111111.title: Robert ties Matthew up.

choices: Tie him up and put him in.
1341222111111112.content:
As you expected, Robert is not where you left him standing. He is, as a matter of fact, two feet away, running across the kitchen counter in an ill-conceived and selfish escape attempt. Sighing deeply, you don't even get up. You just pick up a nearby dish cloth and throw it towards him. He screams as it lands on top of him, plunging him into darkness and confusion. He struggles desperately to find his way out of the tent-like cloth, but before he can do so you've scooped the whole lot up and carried him back over to the marinating dish.

You drop him out of the folds of the dish cloth and into your waiting palm. He lands roughly and seems rather angry that his escape attempt has failed.

"Well, I'd say you didn't really think that one through, did you?"

"Wait a minute, did Robert try to escape?" asks Daniel, who naturally would have seen none of what happened, seeing as he's tied up and lying in a dish of sauce.

"He did indeed. He tied Matthew up and then tried to run away."

"I was going to go for help!" yells Robert. He peers down over your palm at the three other boys. "I whispered what I was going to do to Matthew while I was tying him up!"

"He did. I tried to talk him out of it, but he'd finished tying me up before I could convince him not to," says Matthew.

"Why would you try and talk him out of it?" exclaims Daniel. "He was going to go get help!"

"And just who would he have got?" retorted Matthew. "He can't be more than a few inches tall. He'd never have got far."

"Too true, too true," you mutter as you begin turning Robert over and over in your hands. You tip him into one palm, raise him up and then tip him back into the other, repeating this process while you think. He did try and escape, and escape attempts should be punished. You always had it in mind that the punishment should be instant and raw consumption. However, maybe in this case you should just tie him up and pop him into the dish as planned. He probably tastes fantastic, but can you prolong his punishment long enough for the sake of improving his flavour a little?
1341222111111112.title: He's made a run for it!

choices: It suddenly starts pouring with rain.
13412221111111121.content:
You decide to stick with the original plan. Marinate him along with the others, preparing them all for the barbeque. Keeping Robert gripped in one hand, you pick up the last of the string and tie him up, making the knots extra tight so that he can't struggle or escape again. Just before placing him into the dish, you bring him close to your lips. He flinches, so very sure that you're going to eat him.

"Know this," you whisper. "Once you're all done marinating, you'll be the first on the grill." You place him alongside his fellow morsels, face up. You then pick up a basting brush and begin brushing the sauce all over all four of your soon-to-be meals. Dan, Robert and Matthew all splutter and complain, but Tom is as calm as he's been throughout this whole thing. He even manages to smile as the brush's bristles sweep across his face. After a few more minutes of this, you decide to go get the barbeque ready. Once you've seen to that, these boys should have absorbed enough flavour to be ready to go straight on the grill.

"Now, don't go anywhere guys. I'm just going to get the grill ready."

"We'll wait here," say Tom cheerfully.

"Shut the hell up, Tom!" yells Dan. Chuckling to yourself, you head for the back door that leads to the garden,
13412221111111121.title: Tie him up and put him in.

choices: Pop the marinating dish in the oven.
134122211111111212.content:
Your fingertips have barely brushed the door handle when you hear a crack of thunder, followed by the steady, heavy drizzle of rain. You look out the window to see what you already know. You can see the barbeque is already soaked. Well, that puts an end to that plan. You toddle back over to the boys.

"Does this mean that you're not going to eat us?" asks Matthew. All the boys, even Tom, seem to be hoping against hope that you'll now spare them.

"Don't be ridiculous. Just because I can't have a barbeque doesn't mean I'll spare you. I just have to ...rethink my options."

With this last thread of hope severed, even Tom has dropped all pretense of wanting to be eaten. He looks just as anxious as the other three.
134122211111111212.title: It suddenly starts pouring with rain.

choices: Get Rupert Grint from the box.
1341222111111112121.content:
"I did have my heart set on a cooked meal, so that only leaves us with the one option, doesn't it?" you say rather casually as you turn the oven on. All four boys have started struggling against their restraints, which provides you with some mild amusement while you wait for the oven to heat up. You decide to cook them in the dish itself, this way they'll be cooked in the marinating sauce and it'll enhance their flavour that extra little bit.

It's not long before the oven is ready. After opening the door, you pick up the dish and kneel down, ready to insert it. All four boys are yelling at you. You're pretty sure that Dan and Matthew are pleading for their lives, Robert seems mad as hell, and Tom has just completely lost it. You can't make out what each of them is saying and, quite franky, you're not interested. You slide the dish into the oven and close the door, silencing their cries. Doing this by the book, you set a timer for thirty minutes. They should be nicely done by then.

That does, of course, leave you with thirty minutes of free time. Well, you've got four of the Harry Potter cast cooking at the moment, why not pick another one out and see if they provide you with some pre-dinner entertainment?
1341222111111112121.title: Pop the marinating dish in the oven.

1341222111112.content: They're taking a little too long for your liking, so you'll have to choose someone. Whichever one you choose, the other two will have an opportunity to attempt an escape while your hands are busy tying up their friend. You're going to have to choose carefully.
1341222111112.title: You choose someone.

13412221111122.content: You've narrowed the choice of who to tie up personally to Matthew or Daniel. You look at them closely, trying to decide who can be trusted the least. Then again, both of them would make an escape if the opportunity presented itself. Maybe it's best to choose one at random.
13412221111122.title: Daniel or Matthew

choices: Sit, watch and chat with your meals.
Do a sudoko or two while they marinate.
13412221112.content:
"Tom's lost his mind!" gasps Matthew.

"That's going to be us if we don't get out of here!" yells Daniel. All three of them start to flail and struggle against your grip, their shoulders twisting and turning, their legs kicking away. You take a moment to look at Tom's crestfallen expression. You shrug your shoulders at him sympathetically, and set about preparing the additions to your dish.

Obviously you can't strip them all at once, so you pop Daniel and Matthew into a nearby tupperware tub while you see to Robert. Despite being the eldest, he's panicking just as much as the others, perhaps even more so. You've become quite skilled at undressing your minature meals, so it isn't long before he's as naked as Tom. Tying him up proves to be just that little bit more difficult, as he just won't keep still. You therefore decide to tie him to a lollipop stick, tying the string around his feet, waist and chest. Now even more unable to move than Tom, you place him to the side for a moment while you see to the others.

Upon undressing Daniel and Matthew, you discover that they're more hairy than Robert, which does come as something of an unexpected surprise. You also have to tie Daniel and Matthew to lollipop sticks as well, as they still haven't stopped struggling. Finally all three of them are naked, restrained, and ready to marinate.

"With all the fuss you three have put up, you better turn out to be very worthwhile meals."

"Oh, I'm sure they will. I'm sure I will, for that matter," says Tom from within the dish. "Just leave us in here for a couple of hours and we'll be so delicious that ..."

"Oh, shut up, Tom!" cries Robert. You let out a sigh as you place the three naked boys face up in the dish. You have to hand it to Tom, he really is trying his best under very difficult circumstances.
13412221112.title: Panic! Panic!

choices: They're ready, take them out and light up the BBQ.
Keep them in longer and chat about how tasty they'll be.
134122211121.content:
Amid renewed screams and protests, you fish out a brush from a nearby drawer and begin coating the boys fronts in the sauce. They all become angrier by this, except for Tom, who's staying remarkably calm. The shouting was funny at first, but now it has become tiresome.

"The shouting will stop or the eating will commence!" you say in a raised and harsh tone. The three protestors belt up instantly. "Thank you. You were on the verge of giving me a headache, and I find that a nice fresh boy works better for a headache than any tablet."

You retrieve a tall stool and sit in front of the bowl, gazing down at your captive cuisine. Dan, Matthew and Robert seem to be sulking, refusing to make eye contact. Tom, on the other hand, is the personification of sociability.

"Have you been eating boys for long?" he asks.

"A while now, but it's only recently that I've branched out into celebrities. You all have such wonderful flavours. Buying the box was a bit more expensive than a box of average Joes, but I'm sure you'll be worth every penny."

"But how do you know that?" asks Robert, finally deigning to speak to you. "How do you know we'll taste so good?"

"It's a well known fact that young male celebrities taste excellent, Robert. I'll prove it." You reach in and run your index finger up and down Robert's naked body. He remains perfectly still (not that he has a great deal of choice). You then pop your finger into your mouth.

"Hmm, I can taste the sauce ...but your own personal flavour is coming through very strong." Robert merely falls silent again.

"Feel free to taste me, if you like," says Tom helpfully.

"What is with you, Tom? Do you want to be eaten?" asks Matthew incredulously. Tom turns his head as best as he can so that he can just about see the others. Once again he's trying to convey his plan to them. Not that it will do them any good, because you don't plan on leaving them alone for a second.

"Why not? We've been told we're tasty often enough by our fans. All we have here is a fan who wants to take that to the next level. That's the way I see it."

"Barking mad," Dan mutters. You check your watch to see how long they've been marinating.
134122211121.title: Sit, watch and chat with your meals.

choices: They're ready anyway, take them out.
1341222111212.content:
"Oh, there's still ages to go yet. I want you to soak up as much flavour as you can."

"You'll never get away with this!" yells Daniel.

"That's right, what are you going to do when people find out we're missing?" asks Robert. You stare at the boys, a look of serious contemplation on your face. You should have been an actor.

"You're right ...why didn't I think of that? You're celebrities ...word will get out that you're missing ...and what if the police track you down and come here?"

The three unwilling meals perk up at this, believing there to be some hope of release. The one boy who is pretending to be a willing meal, however, sees the major flaw. You continue.

"If the police came, I'd have to hide the evidence ...but where?" You slowly smile. "Oh that's right, I'll hide the evidence in my stomach, because that's where you'll be if the police ever do come here!" Tom saw this coming a mile off, but the faces of the other three fall as one. Grinning from ear to ear, you pick up the brush again and give them another coating.

"Is there nothing we can do to persuade you not to eat us?" asks Matthew quietly.

"Hmm? No, sorry. I've come too far in the preparation process now not to eat you. Any further pleas or arguments really would be a waste of time." There's silence for a few minutes. You pass the time by gazing at their naked bodies. Finally Tom pipes up.

"Are we ready yet? I expect we're as tasty as we'll ever be now, and I'm sure you must be looking forward to having us for dinner. I know I'm looking forward to being your dinner."

Another transparent attempt to influence the culinary process. He must be convinced that he can escape in between being taken out of the bowl and being put on the barbeque. Foolish little morsel.
1341222111212.title: Culinary chat.

choices: That's what the brush was made for.
134122211122.content: Also, their fronts won't marinate themselves. Do you use a marinating brush, or a finger to soak the flavor in?
134122211122.title: Do a sudoko or two while they marinate.

choices: Daniel is nowhere to be seen!
1341222111221.content:
Just after setting the last boy down in the dish, it suddenly hits you. Their fronts! They'd be left completely unmarinated, and you can't turn them or they'll drown. As everyone knows, all the tastiest parts of a man are at the front. We can't leave them lacking in flavour.

Tutting at your own absent mindedness, you wander over to a drawer and take out a brush, stopping to also pick up that new sudoku book you bought the other day. You need something to do while the boys are marinating. Setting up a kitchen stool by the counter, you dip the brush in the sauce and start spreading it all over the boy's fronts, ignoring their splutters and cries of protest. Once they're all done, you settle back and lose yourself in your sudoku. After filling in a few numbers, you pick up the brush again to give them another coating.

But what's this?
1341222111221.title: That's what the brush was made for.

choices: Frankie Muniz, Mitch Hewer, Zac Efron & Joe Jonas
Drake Bell, Cole Sprouse, Cody Linley & Elijah Wood
134122212.content:
You decide on a fairly big barbeque, given that all of Tom's procrastination and talk of how best to prepare him has made you hungry. You therefore decide to add four more boys to the dish, and eventually the barbeque.

But who?
134122212.title: Choose some random actors.

1341222122.content:
Leaving Tom,tied up and marinating you go to the box of boys,you open it and put out Drake Bell,Cole Sprouse,Cody Linley and Elijah Wood.Grabbing these boys you walk over to the table,where Tom is lying,you drop them on the table.

"Hey whats the big idea". Cody Linley shouts at you.
"More important question,whats gonna happen to us"? Cole Sprouse says in his know it all attitude.

Ignoring their pleas and questions you grab Drake first and start to undress him,you place him down and do the same for the others.

"Whats gonna happen to us"? Cole asks again,he was starting to piss you off,so you grab him and tie up his legs and his arms and waist,giving him no movement.You do the same to the rest of them.With all of them tied up you place them in the dish.


"Say hello to Tom guys".
"Hi guys,we are all going to be going on the barbie together".
They...........
1341222122.title: Drake Bell, Cole Sprouse, Cody Linley & Elijah ...

choices: Dylan and Cole Sprouse,Zac and Dylan Efron and Jake T Austin
13412222.content:
You decide that they are flavored enough and you did like the idea of having them in a hamburger.
You grab Tom and reach for some string.,to tie him up.
"What are you doing?"
"I'm tying you up some you can't escape when I'm getting your company".
After tying him up you reach into the box,but who do you pull out?
13412222.title: Their flavored enough.  I like buns.

134122221.content:
Reaching into the box you pull out,the best possible meal in history.The Efron's,the Sprouse's and Jake T Austin.
They are all wriggling around in your hands,so you put them down on the table.
You decide to undress Dylan Efron first,you take off his shoes and sniff them,next his pants and so on.
You repeat the process to all the other boys,before Jake speaks.
"Whats gonna happen to us?"
You point down to the plate where Tom is lying,all tied up and ready to go.
Before they can say anything you pick them all up and throw them on the plate and head out to the barbie.
You light her up and wait for it to heat up enough that they will scream and beg.
Once it reaches the right heat you start with...........
134122221.title: Dylan and Cole Sprouse,Zac and Dylan Efron and ...

1342.content:
"Hmm, sounds like a good idea," you mutter mostly to yourself. The thought of there being just that little bit more of Tom to eat is just too tempting. It means waiting a little longer of course, but it should be worth it. Keeping Tom in one hand, you retrieve a large plastic bowl. The base is too steady for Tom to be able to tip it over, and the curved sides are too smooth for him to climb up. You haven't forgotten that there's every chance he might try to escape. You gently set Tom down in the middle of the bowl.

"I thought you were going to fatten me up?" he asks, sounding confused and just a little nervous.
"I am," you reply as you retrieve a bag of chocolate chip chunks from a nearby cupboard and start pouring them into the bowl with Tom. Pretty soon he's up to his knees in them. "Right, you get started on those. They should fatten you up very nicely and more importantly, quickly."

"Of course," sighs Tom. "No sense in waiting." Knowing that he'll be eaten anyway if he refuses, Tom starts to chow down on the chocolate chips, taking one in each hand and chomping away. It takes a while, but fairly soon he's down to the last few chunks of chocolate. You notice his belly starting to bulge a little under his shirt, and order him to remove it so that you can see his progress better.
1342.title: Stuffed with chocolate.

choices: Tom's too tired and full to resist.
He snaps and begs for his life.
13422.content:
Tom removes his shirt, not wanting to anger you. His belly is looking a little plumper, but not plump enough for your liking.

"Nah, we can make you fatter than that. Here ...have some more," you say as you pour more chocolate chips into the bowl with Tom. He still seems determined to please you, no doubt part of his overall plan to escape. He starts chowing down again, shovelling the chocolate into his mouth.

"You really are going to have the most delicious chocolate centre, and that plump little tummy of yours is going to tingle my taste buds. I'm going to enjoy every last little bit of you." While your own words excite more than just your appetite for food, Tom seems fairly casual about the whole thing, continuing to feed himself.

"I'm sure you will. Plenty of girls have told me I'm delicious, though I don't suppose they meant in this way." Tom eats a few more chocolate chips and then slowly sinks to sit on the bottom of the bowl. He rubs his considerably bigger tummy and groans lightly. "I couldn't eat another bite ..."

"I, on the other hand, could!" you say as you pluck Tom out of the bowl.
13422.title: More chocolate!

134221.content:
Tom looks up at you, the smile slowly fading from his chocolate stained face. He's realised why you choose to feed him chocolate chips. Not only did it fatten him up nice and quick, but it's also left him feeling sluggish and tired. He doesn't have the energy to resist you. He lets out a sigh of resignation.

"Go on then, there's obviously nothing I can do to stop you." You smile most wickedly.

"Are you asking me to ...?"

"Yes, yes!" he says impatiently. "Just eat me already." You use your thumb and forefinger to properly feel Tom's tummy. He's much plumper now without being overly fat. You sat and watched him stuff himself for what felt like hours. Now you finally get to eat him.

After removing the rest of his clothes, you take a moment to taste him, licking him lightly around the face and belly. You lap up some of the chocolate that he managed to get on his face, but you can also sense a deeper chocolate sensation waiting within him. Taking hold of his legs, you raise him up above your head. He stares down at your mouth, his plump tummy swaying and jiggling slightly as you dangle him. You slowly lower him in, taking him in with your tongue so as to avoid him going straight down your throat. You want to taste him properly.

Your prediction turns out to be wonderfully true, his belly tingles and tantalises your tongue. His natural meaty flavour coupled with all the chocolate he ate makes for a remarkable combination. You chew him ever so lightly, just so you can release a little more of that chocolately goodness. When you finally do swallow him, you take particular pleasure in feeling his plump gut slide down your throat. It's with a satisfying 'plop' that he lands in your stomach.

"Hmmm, so tasty," you mutter to yourself. You wonder what to do next. Another snack, perhaps? Or maybe you should find someone to play with.
134221.title: Just get on with it.

1342211.content: You're still hungry. Tom was plump after eating all that chocolate, but still not all that filling. The question is, what do you fancy? One of Tom's co-stars in the Harry Potter series? A random celebrity teen?
1342211.title: Another snack!

choices: The little bugger bites your hand!
13422111.content:
You decide not to be so methodical in your choice. In a way, you're kind of excited at the thought of selecting someone completely at random. Your hand hovers over the box, and as you close your eyes you can hear the collective intake of breath from the boys below. You continue to move your hand slowly over the open box, and now you can hear the sound of several dozen pairs of tiny feet scuttling around in the box, trying to avoid you.

You then lower your hand slowly into the box and begin gently groping around inside. You don't want to knock your potential snack out by trying to grab them too quickly. You can suddenly feel someone and you close your fingers round his body. There are cries for help, but you can't particularly recognise the voice, not when its owner is in such a frenzied state.

You slowly raise him out of the box, ready to open your eyes and see who you've selected.
13422111.title: Someone random.

choices: He was right. He tastes awful.
134221111.content:
You open your eyes quickly, and find none other than Lucas Grabeel clutched in your fist. You smile broadly, and for a split second he returns the smile nervously.

"Well, well! Look who we have here. You're cute in your own way ..."

"Um, thanks ...I think ..." says Lucas slowly.

"But how do you taste? That's what I want to know." The smile drops from Lucas' face, quickly replaced with one of horror.

"How ...how do I taste? Oh no ...no, no, no. You don't want to eat me. I'd taste terrible. I ...I can sing for you, if you like. You wouldn't enjoy eating me ..."

"And you think I'd enjoy being sung to more, is that right? Well, there's only one way to find out how you taste." Ignoring Lucas' garbled protests, you strip him completely. He certainly looks tastier without his clothes on. There's a charming amount of fat on him, just enough to hopefully give his flavour that extra bit of zest. However, like you said, there's only one way to find out.

Keeping a firm hold on Lucas' legs, you lower your head and close your mouth around his upper body. You begin to suck and lick, getting a proper taste of him.
134221111.title: It's Lucas on the menu!

1342211111.content:
It's amazing! He's even tastier than Tom was when he was stuffed with chocolate! He's just plain delicious! He has a strong, meaty flavour that's incredibly sweet. The closest comparison you can think of is a nicely seasoned bit of pork.

You're so overwhelmed by his amazing flavour that you almost don't notice how much further into your mouth he's now found himself. You're just about holding on to his legs, and he must be paralysed with fear because he's not moving in there.

Do you resist the urge to have him now and take him out of your mouth, or do you simply want to swallow his meaty goodness right now?
1342211111.title: Liar, liar.

13422111112.content:
As tasty as he is now, with some preparation he can probably be made to taste even better. For this reason you remove him from your mouth, licking your lips while he spluttters and gasps for air.

"You lied to me, you know," you say once he's recovered. "You told me you tasted terrible."

"Of course I'd say that!" he yells. "I don't particularly want to be eaten!"

"That's a shame, because that's exactly what I'm going to do to you. Now ...whether to have you cooked or raw, that's what we need to decide."

"We? You mean I get a choice in the matter?"

"Not really. That was just a figure of speech. If you had any choice, you'd probably choose not to be eaten at all, wouldn't you?"

"You bet I would!"

"Now, kindly keep quiet while I decide on how best to have you. You'd make an excellent hot dog ...or maybe I should have you raw ...as part of a fruit salad ..."
13422111112.title: How best to eat him?

134221111122.content:
"Yes ...I think you'll taste even better with some fresh fruit. Stay here a second, won't you?" You drop Lucas into a nearby bowl, too deep for him to climb out of. Secure in the knowledge that he can't escape, you fetch various types of fruit from your pantry. You wash them thoroughly, then set yourself up with a knife and a chopping board. You set all this up next to Lucas, so that you can continue to talk to him and gaze occasionally at his pale, plump flesh.

"You don't really want to eat me," says Lucas slowly.

"Oh believe me, I do. Trying to pretend you taste bad just isn't going to work," you say casually as you start plucking the leafy bits off some strawberries. "I tasted you, remember? You're delicious."

"That's not what I mean ...w-what I mean is, you don't want to eat me yet ...I could be so much plumper than this!" You chortle and merely shake your head.

"Just because I fattened Tom up doesn't mean I'm automatically going to do the same with you. You already have a lovely amount of puppy fat on you, and I'm going to enjoy every last bite of it."

This certainly puts an end to Lucas' attempts to divert your purpose. He merely sinks to his knees in the bowl, utterly despondent. You start arranging the fruit you've already cut around him, which only serves to depress him further.

"You are going to taste so sweet!" you say as you place a few slices of pear directly around Lucas. "I suppose I could let you have a nibble or two of some of the fruit. It will be your last meal, after all." You're not surprised when Lucas doesn't take you up on this offer. He seems to have completely shut down. Not that it matters. He'll taste just as good depressed as he would happy.

You finish arranging the fruit around Lucas. After eating a chocolate filled Tom, you've now got the much healthier option of a Lucas Salad. Time to tuck in!
134221111122.title: Making him a fruit salad.

1342211112.content:
Your taste buds are met with a rather unpleasant sensation. You can't quite put your finger on it, but Lucas just doesn't taste quite right. In fact, he tastes terrible. You remove him from your mouth then rush over to the fridge to get a drink of cold mineral water. You take a few good swigs to get the taste out of your mouth. Lucas is still clutched in your fist, and has finally managed to compose himself after his experience.

"It seems you weren't lying. You tasted downright awful," you tell him.

"R-Really?" asks Lucas. He can't believe it. A smile slowly creeps onto his face. "Does that mean you're going to let me go?"

"Don't be ridiculous. I'll just have to find some other use for you."

Ignoring Lucas' crestfallen expression, you start to ponder what to do with the disappointing little morsel. It's been a while since you came across someone whose raw flavour was so disagreeable. Maybe that's it. You need to prepare him, cook him even to get a better taste out of him. Then again, maybe it's not worth the time and effort, especially if he turns out to taste as bad cooked as he did raw. Maybe you should just use him to entertain you.
1342211112.title: He was right. He tastes awful.

choices: Trap him by putting a bowl over him.
134221112.content:
Your eyes are only open a fraction when you feel a sharp pain in your hand. You let out a cry of pain and instantly release the boy you're holding.

"Aaah! Son of a ..." Holding your wounded hand, you look down for the culprit. Sure enough, you see Corbin Bleu on the floor. He landed on the rug and doesn't seem all that harmed by the fall. He picks himself up and darts off across the floor. He may be fast, but there's no way he can out run you.
134221112.title: Who bit you?

13422112.content:
You wander over to your box of boys. Every single one of them cowers at the sight of you looming over them. They're all terrified that they'll share Tom's fate, and their fears are well founded. Those who weren't in the Harry Potter films have nothing to fear ...for now.

Who to choose?
13422112.title: A co-star.

134221121.content:
You rub your chin thoughtfully. You know that Devon is rather short in stature, and therefore there's less of him to eat. However, they do say that good things come in small packages.

Rupert, on the other hand, is not only taller but probably more muscular as well. You've spotted them both within the box, but who to make a meal out of?
134221121.title: Devon Murray or Rupert Grint?

1342211211.content:
Your hand hovers over the open box for a few moments, watched by every potential meal inside. You make a sudden movement, and practically every boy in the box flinches, though they all relax once they realise that they haven't been chosen. All except for Devon Murray, that is.

You stride over to a nearby table and place Devon on it. His legs are shaking too much to run, and stop him before he can even attempt it by sitting at the table, arms spread out across the surface. Devon's shaking so bad that you fear he may actually break down.

"You know full well that you have no hope of escape. I've decided that you should join Tom in my stomach. Given the choice, I'm sure you'd like to make the process as quick and painless for yourself as possible, correct?"

Devon merely nods his head, unable to speak.

"Then now is the time to make that choice. You can either be extensively and painfully prepared or you can do as I wish and be eaten quickly without much fuss."

"W-What is it y-you want me to d-do?" Devon asks, finally speaking. You smile as you give your answer.
1342211211.title: Devon

choices: He makes a run for it.
13422112111.content:
Devon starts shaking for a moment, shocked by what he has just heard. “Come again?” His eyebrows arch and his rosy cheeks grow even redder.

“It’s quite simple really,” you smile down at the tiny lad, even tinier than most of your usual prey. “You want to be eaten quickly and painlessly, right?”

His shakes begin anew. For a moment he thought there would be no eating involved. “Well... if I have to be eaten then I guess I’d prefer-“

“So then what I want you to do is take off those unnecessary wrapping,” you say with a lick of your lips, your padded giant finger caressing each contour of his body, treating his clothes like wrappers on the candy that is his meaty form. “Then you can step into my hand and give me a cute little happy dance.”

“But I’m not happy!”

“True. But I am! Beam up at me and dance around like you’re having the time of your life. Or-“. Devon grimaces, afraid you’re about to give him the ultimatum. Instead you have an alternative. “It might make more sense if you give me the most seductive dance you can muster. Rub your hands along your delicious young nude body, play with your hairy chest, shake your bubbly cheeks... make yourself look irresistibly sexy- so delicious that I can’t help but gobble you up quickly without any chewing or cooking. I’ll definitely still have to lick and nibble and suck, but you’ll be gobbled up in minutes instead of being tortured for hours... assuming you can make yourself look tasty enough.”
13422112111.title: "Dance naked for me."

134221121113.content: Devon looked up into the giant's face and gulped. He skipped away from the probing fingers and screamed in abject terror "YOU CRAZY PERVERTED FAG MONSTER! FIRST YOU WANNA MOLEST ME! THEN YOU WANNA EAT ME! I'm outta this bloody insane asylum!" And the freckle-faced boy ran for his little life.
134221121113.title: No Way

13422112112.content:
"W-What?"

"I want you to feed yourself to me. Basically, I'll lower my head to rest on the table with my mouth open. You, after stripping naked, will then climb in yourself. After that point, I'll take care of things myself."

"But why would you want me to do that?" he asks.

"First of all, I find it an intriguing notion ...a shrunken boy feeding himself to me rather than being picked up and forced in. I want to watch you as you approach, feel you climb in slowly. It'll certainly be something new. So, what do you say? Feed yourself to me and this will all be over quickly. Defy me, and the process will be slow, drawn out ...and painful."
13422112112.title: "Feed yourself to me."

choices: He tries to make a run for it.
134221121121.content:
Devon stands there for a moment. Eventually he comes to a decision, and doesn't seem quite so afraid anymore. He stops trembling and begins to undress, his hands steady. He unties his shoes and kicks them off, followed by the pulling off of his socks. You watch hungrily as he undoes his belt buckle. Just as he's about to pull his trousers down, he pauses.

"You're not going to ...chew me, are you?" he asks.

"I don't see why. I'm normally able to swallow you boys whole, and what with you being so small, you should be easy enough to swallow without biting into you." Devon resumes undressing, kicking off his trousers and laying them on the side. "Your shirt next, please ...and take it off slowly."

Devon does so, slowly pulling the hem of his shirt up. You watch as every delicious little detail is revealed to you. His belly button, his toned tummy, his tufty haired chest, until finally he has taken it off entirely and he stands in his underpants.

"I have no wish to eat your boxers, Devon. They'd taste awful." He trembles just a little once again as he removes his boxers, dropping them on top of the rest of his clothes. "Now ...stand up straight. Let me look at you ..." Devon stands almost to attention as you scrutinise his body. He may be short, but his body looks like it packs a great deal of flavour in one so small. Satisfied, you lower your head onto the table so that your chin rests on the surface.

"Y-You want me t-to do it now?" he asks.

"Oh yes, walk towards me slowly ...take your time. Stretch a little, run your hands all over chest and tummy ...I want you to be nice and limber, not to mention tender as you climb in." You open your mouth wide, keeping your eyes on your incoming meal. "Now, make your approach."
134221121121.title: He starts to strip.

1342211211211.content:
Devon takes a tentative first step, his head hung and his hands covering his shame (or his pride, depends how you look at it).

"Stop!" you order. Devon stops right in his tracks. "That's no good. Stand up straight when you walk, show some dignity!"

"Y-Yes," stutters Devon. "Whatever you say."

"And uh, dignity isn't all that I'd like you to show. Arms by your sides, thank you." Devon takes a moment to gather himself, then with his head held high and his arms by his sides, he resumes his slow walk towards his certain demise. Remembering what you said, he stops every few steps to stretch and massage his body. He's keeping remarkably calm under the circumstances. Finally he's at your open mouth. He gingerly places both his hands on your lower lip, getting ready to climb in.

"You did promise not to chew me, remember?" he says quietly. You give a gargled response that sounds a great deal like 'Yes, I remember'. Ventriloquism is not one of your skills. Pulling up with those mucular arms of his while pushing off with his legs, Devon hoists himself up and past your lips. He takes particular care to clamber over your teeth, ducking to avoid hitting his head on your upper teeth. Keeping his balance for a moment, he manages to sit cross legged on your tongue. The feel of his ass on your tongue drives you wild, a burst of flavour that is made all the more satisfying by the mere fact that this delicious boy has actually fed himself to you.

Keeping your mouth slightly open, you raise your head up from the table. The question is, do you hold to your promise and merely taste Devon thoroughly, followed by a simple swallow? Or do you chew him up? He's in no position to stop you.
1342211211211.title: Feeding time!

13422112112111.content:
You're true to your word and refrain from chewing him. He's soon knocked from his sitting position though as your tongue begins rolling around underneath him. You can feel him staying relatively calm, but more importantly you can feel his wonderful flavour. He taste reminds you of prime pork, very sweet. Even in one so small, his flavour is very strong, just as you hoped it would be.

Having tasted him enough, you now want to feel him slide down your throat. You flatten your tongue to the bottom of your mouth, and can now feel him lying on top of it, his arms spread but his legs together. A perfect position for his trip down to your stomach. You tilt your head back and feel him slide backwards. You don't feel him entering your stomach as much as you did with Tom, but you have an inkling that feeling Devon being digested is going to be just as satisfying, perhaps more.

You've now had both Tom and Devon, both of them delicious in their own way. Rather than have another snack, you decide that the time has come to have a little fun with your shrunken captives.
13422112112111.title: Taste and swallow him.

134221122.content: How about Daniel Radcliffe, the main guy? He must have an exquisite taste. Then again, there's something to be said for the Weasley twins, James and Oliver. If a fattened up Tom didn't fill you up, maybe a pair of slender young twins will.
134221122.title: Someone else.

choices: He does as his brother tells him.
1342211222.content:
You decide to fish out the Phelps twins. You find one and pluck him out of the box, then after some searching you manage to locate the other one. Holding one in each hand, you raise them up to eye level.

"Okay, so which one of you is James and who's Oliver?" you ask incredibly politely.

"I-I'm James," says the twin in your right hand.

"And I'm Oliver," says the twin in your left hand. He seems to be handling the situation better than his brother.

"Ah, so it's James," you nod your head at the twin trapped in your right hand. "And Oliver," you indicate the other, much calmer twin. "It's not as if I really needed to know, but I think it's the height of good manners nowadays to at least know the names of the boys you're about to eat."

"Is that what you did to Tom?" asks James.

"Well, I fattened him up first."

"Are you planning to do that with us?" asks Oliver. Like Tom, he probably sees the potential for escape that comes with taking the time to fatten up a potential snack.

"Hmm, nah. There was only one of Tom, and he really needed that extra bit of fat. There's two of you, so I don't think I really need to fatten you up."

"Sure you do!" exclaims Oliver. He yanks his top up over his head and drops it, sending it floating down to the floor. "You thought Tom was skinny? Look at us! We could really do with fattening up! James, show us how skinny you are, go on!"

James looks at you, then at his shirtless brother, then back at you. He's obviously finding this all a little hard to bear.
1342211222.title: A pair of tasty twins.

13422112222.content:
An entirely unreadable look on his face, James slowly takes off his own t-shirt. You can see Oliver's point, they are fairly skinny. Your original point stands though, there are two of them. No matter how skinny they are, and no matter whether you decide to eat them both together or one at a time, they're going to be very filling. Besides, since when was plumpness indicative of great flavour?

"See?" says Oliver with great eagerness. He's obviously trying to pick up where Tom left off, but his fate will ultimately be the same. "See how skinny we both are? Sure there's two of us, but just think of how much more filling we'd be for you if we were fattened up!"

"Yeah ..." says James with less enthusiasm. He slowly rubs his own tummy. "Yum, yum."

"Gentlemen, you've put forward a very good case for making you fatter, but I've decided to eat you as you are. The more interesting question as far as I'm concerned, is whether to eat you both together or one at a time." The look on Jame's face goes from anxious to gut-droppingly terrified. Oliver, on the other hand, looks thoughtful. He knows, deep down, that if you choose to eat them one at a time, then there's a 50% chance of him not going first.
