Therefore he'd be able to attempt an escape. However, that would mean he'd be leaving his brother to be devoured by you, and the guilt of that is already gnawing at him.

Funnily enough, all you can think about is how to start gnawing at them ...literally.
13422112222.title: Together or one at a time?

134221122221.content:
"Tell you what, why don't we be fair about this?" you ask with impeccable politeness.

"You're going to let us go?" asks James, a flicker of hope coming to his eyes.

"Don't be silly. I'm going to eat you both at the same time. That way neither of you has to watch your brother being eaten before you."

"Brilliant," mutters Oliver. "Very considerate of you." You place the two boys inside a nearby bowl while you consider how best to have them. Raw? Perhaps, but your instinct is telling you that a meal like these two merits proper preparation.

"You two look so tasty ...how do you think I should cook you?" you ask perfectly casually, as if you were asking their opinion on a dish that wasn't going to include them ...as an ingredient.

"You're ...you're going to ...cook us?" exclaims James.

"I believe that's what I said, yes. Then again, I could always bake you. Place you inside the dough and let it cook around you ...that would certainly be interesting ..."

Suddenly your mobile rings. You check and it turns out to be your friend Sam calling. You know that Sam finds the prospect of shrunken boys as appetising as you do.
134221122221.title: An unexpected interruption.

1342211222211.content:
You decide to answer it. You'll figure out what to do once you start talking.

Now, is this your friend Sam as in Samuel, or Sam as in Samantha? Basically, is your friend a boy or a girl?
1342211222211.title: Answer it.

13422112222112.content:
You check that James and Oliver can't escape, then you answer the phone.

"Hey Sam!"

"Hey there, you!" comes Sam's distinctly girly voice. "Haven't seen you in ages, what are you up to?"

"Well," you say slowly as you reach down and run a finger over James' torso. "I'm just about to fix myself a snack, as it happens." James' knees are shaking so badly that he nearly collapses.

"Ooh! What kind of snack?"

You have to do some quick thinking here. Do you tell her the truth, which will ultimately lead to inviting her over to share in your boy snacks or do you make something up and keep her away?
13422112222112.title: "Oooh! What kind of snack?"

choices: Cook them both the same way.
1342211222212.content:
You switch your phone off very quickly. You're not in the mood for sharing these two boys right now. They're yours to eat and that's exactly what you're going to do.

"Who was that?" asks Oliver.

"No one you need concern yourself with. What we should all concern ourselves with, on the other hand, is how I'm going to prepare you both."

James has a look on his face that registers something between total shock and incredible disbelief. Oliver is still maintaining a sense of calm.

"Are you going to eat us raw?" he asks.

"I could do ...but then I've just had Tom raw."

"So you're going to cook us?"

"I'm leaning towards that, yes. Trouble is, there's so many different ways of cooking you. I've got half a mind to use one method on one of you, and another method on the other."

"That sounds like a good idea," says James very simply. He must be thinking that if they're about to be cooked seperately, then you can only focus on one of them at a time. Such an arrangement would present ample opportunities for escape. So, do you risk it and try different cooking methods for each twin or do you play it safe and cook them together?
1342211222212.title: Ignore it.

134221122222.content: So, which one of them gets the pleasure of being first into your stomach? The trembling James or the cunning Oliver?
134221122222.title: One at a time

choices: Oliver's hiding somewhere on the shelf.
He's still standing there, which means you can grab him.
1342211222221.content:
You decide you're going to be ...moderately merciful by eating James first. He's so rigid with fright that the kind thing to do would be to put him out of his misery. You decide to put Oliver up on a shelf rather than trap him in something. He can't get down, but he will have a bird's eye view of what will soon be happening to him.

"What are you doing?" asks James, still shirtlessly trapped in your fist.

"Just what I was about to ask," says Oliver, peering over the edge of the shelf for just a moment. It's a long way down to the counter when you're as small as he is.

"I've put you up on the shelf, Oliver, so that you can have the best view possible," you answer.

"The best view of what? The kitchen?" You let out a little snigger, then casually start removing James' trousers and boxers.

"No, the best view of this." You take hold of James' legs and tilt your head back. You can see Oliver standing on the shelf, paralysed with fear and helplessness. There's nothing he can do to save his brother, who is naturally begging for his life.

"Please! D-don't do it! I'll do anything ...have m-mercy!" A wide grin spreads across your face. You open your mouth and poke out your tongue. You bring James a little closer, so that he eventually finds himself with his face, shoulders and arms resting on the middle of your wet tongue. You give said tongue a little flicker, which causes him to jiggle in your grip. He tastes delicious. You raise him up again so that you can speak.

"Hmm, so very tasty. I just hope that you have a similar, if not better taste, Oliver. It's your turn next." You now turn your attention to the upside down James. "Goodbye."

You lower him slowly into your open jaws, which does mean you have to put up with his screams for longer, but it also means that Oliver is getting a very clear and agonising idea of what's in store for him. Finally only James' legs remain, and after you gently let go of those, his whole body flops straight onto your tongue. Your mouth closes and plunges him into darkness. Speaking of a plunge, that's exactly what happens next. His unusual landing on your tongue, coupled with his flailing means that he slides almost instanteously down your throat, barely savoured and not even remotely chewed. Still, it's very satisfying to feel him slide down alive. You can even almost feel him inside your stomach, alive and kicking. You give your belly a rub to soothe both him and yourself.

"Delicious ...absolutely delicious. Now, let's see how you match up to your brother, Oliver ..."
1342211222221.title: James

13422112222211.content: "Oliver? Oh, great," you mutter as you realise that Oliver has decided to hide somewhere on the shelf. There's quite a few storage jars up there, so it's a fair bet that he's hiding behind one of those. You begin moving the jars one by one, making your way along the shelf. You reach the middle one and look behind it.
13422112222211.title: Oliver's hiding somewhere on the shelf.

134221122222111.content:
Pulling the jar away with one hand, your other is poised ready to make a grab. Sure enough, there's Oliver. He's barely taken a step away when your fingers wrap around him. It's a good thing you have such quick reflexes. You take him down from the shelf and hold him at eye level.

"What are you going to do with me?" he asks. You take a moment to stare at his slender, naked torso. You didn't get much of a chance to taste James, seeing as he slid down your throat fairly quickly. You figure you'd like to savour Oliver more, really take your time to taste every last bit of him. Then again, you could just eat him like you did his brother.

"I'm having a hard time deciding. Part of me wants to taste you thoroughly and lick you all over. Another part of me just wants to eat you, right here and now."

"Is there a part of you that wants to let me go?" he ventures hopefully. You smile.

"Sorry, no. It's a long, slow, drawn out tasting session or a hastily gobbled up snack. Decisions, decisions ..."
134221122222111.title: Found him!

1342211222221112.content:
"Screw it, I'm hungry," you declare as you practically rip off Oliver's remaining clothes.

"Wouldn't you rather have a chicken leg? Or someone a lot plumper than I am? Or how about ..."

"Oh, do shut up," you say as you raise Oliver towards your open mouth. Strangely enough, he obeys out of fear and is silent as he enters your maw. With half his body inside, you gently clamp down on him with your lips. His legs stick out of your mouth, hanging limp across your lower lip. You swirl your tongue around his face and torso for a little while before using it to pull him in all the way. His long, slender legs are sucked in like tendrils of spaghetti. Now that he's fully in, you push him upwards with your tongue and pin him against the roof of your mouth. You bring him back down again, only to send him right back up again. You repeat this a few times, and you find yourself experiencing his taste in ways you didn't expect.

Finally the time has come to re-unite him with his brother ...in your stomach. You tilt your head back and swallow, and sure enough, Oliver slides down your throat to join James and Tom in your digestive system.

You sigh as you feel him go down. Sure, he was delicious, as were the other two, but you can't help but wonder what they'd taste like if there was more of them to eat. You're not just thinking of a fattening process like you did with Tom, you wonder what it would be like to eat someone who's still shrunken, just not too shrunken.

It's only then that you notice the flyer that came with the box of boys. It must have fallen to the floor when you first opened the box and fished out Tom. In your excitement you must have not noticed it. You bend down and pick it up.
1342211222221112.title: Eat him.

13422112222211122.content:
Turning the flyer over in your hands, you see what it says;

'Want to get MORE out of your shrunken snacks? Fancy making a proper meal with just one boy?'

Spot on! Exactly what you were thinking of! As you read on, you discover that the same people who provided you with your box of boys also produce a device that can enlarge them to a maximum height of 20 inches. That's just enough to make a proper roast out of one of them! Just imagine Zac Efron ...stuffed, basted and roasted ...served with a ripe apple stuck in his mouth. You'd never be able to do that with any of them at their current height, and there are just so many different things you could do ...if only the boys were a little bigger!

You take another look at the flyer and find the price of the device. Ouch.
13422112222211122.title: It's advertising a machine.

134221122222111221.content:
It's only money! This machine is going to enhance your dining experience so much that it's worth the cost. After making sure that your boy snacks are securely in their box, you rush over to your computer and find the website that goes with the flyer.

You're surprised to find that they can ensure next day delivery, so at least you won't have long to wait. You fill out all the necessary payment and delivery details, and hit 'Confirm Order'. Feeling a sense of tingling satisfaction, you return to your box of boys. It is getting rather late, so maybe you should think about going to bed. One way of looking at it is that the sooner you go to sleep, the sooner your parcel will arrive.

On the other hand, you could stay up just a little bit longer ...and have some supper ...
134221122222111221.title: Order it anyway.

choices: It's one of the snacks you ate today.
It's someone you haven't eaten yet.
1342211222221112211.content:
You decide you're not hungry right now. Besides, the more boys you leave alive, the more you'll have to use in the machine tomorrow. Patience is a virtue, after all. Grabbing the box with both hands, you trundle up the stairs and into your room, ignoring the shouts coming from within the box. It seems they're getting jostled around a bit in there.

You go through your regular routine for bed, but with one minor change. Before climbing under the sheets, you open up the lid of the box and peer in at all the terrified boys.

"Goodnight, my magnificent little mouthfuls. Just you wait until you see what I've got planned for you tomorrow." Before anyone can say anything, you close the lid and place the box on a high shelf, so as to prevent their escape. You clamber into bed, and after a few moments drift off to sleep.

It's then that the dream starts. You're standing in a wide open space, the floor steeped in a thick mist. You've only had a chance to look around you once when you notice someone coming towards you.
1342211222221112211.title: Dream time!

13422112222211122111.content: Who is it? Tom, who you fattened up with chocolate and then used to help fatten yourself or the Phelps twins, who (last time you checked) are currently mingling together in your digestive system?
13422112222211122111.title: It's one of the snacks you ate today.

choices: He wants you to eat him.
134221122222111221111.content:
The mist clears, and you find yourself standing face to face with a fully grown Tom Felton. His face is entirely unreadable. He just stares at you with those piercing eyes. What feels like an eternity passes, until you finally say something.

"What do you want? Why are you here?"

Tom continues to stare for a few more moments, then he breathes in deeply before replying.
134221122222111221111.title: It's Tom!

choices: Have your way with him first.
1342211222221112211111.content:
"I want you to eat me again!" The unreadable expression on his face suddenly becomes a lot more legible. He's grinning like someone about to recieve a big treat, and his eyes aren't staring anymore, but are positvely lit up.

"You want me to what?"

"Eat me!" His smile falls for a moment. "What's the matter? Didn't I taste good the last time?"

"Well ...yes, you tasted wonderful." Tom's smile returns once again and he starts to remove his clothes. "But ...why would you want me to eat you again?"

"Because it was fun!" exclaims Tom as he drop his trousers. "I enjoyed it and I want to be eaten again!" Well, this is your dream, after all. Anything can happen, even this.

"Then I would be more than happy to oblige," you say courteously as you take a gentle hold of Tom's shirt and pull it up over his head. His torso looks even more delicious fully sized than it did when it was bite size. Swallowing him is going to take some work, but you have a feeling that it will be possible. Tom removes the last of his garments and stands ready for consumption. His flawless skin looks too good to resist, and sure enough, you allow yourself a few licks of his shoulder, followed by the rest of his arm.

"Do I taste as good as you remember?"

"Better!" You finish tasting his fingers and wonder if you should get straight down to eating him, or maybe you should draw this out a little first. Tease him, taste him, maybe even have sex with him.

After all, this is your dream ...
1342211222221112211111.title: Eat me, please!

13422112222211122111111.content:
You decide that you're far, far too hungry for messing about. It's time to make a meal out of Tom ...again.

"I'm ready to eat you now, Tom. I'd like you to lie down over there."

"Of course! I'd do anything to get back in that wonderful belly of yours." He rests his hand on your stomach for a moment, and you do the same to his, caressing his tender meat. The urge to have sex with him rises up again, but your hunger is stronger. Tom then steps back a few paces and sits down on the floor. He then slowly lies back. As he lies there, he runs his hands all over his chest and stomach.

"I'm so delicious ...I wish there was someone who'd come along and eat me up." He rubs his belly slowly. "Tasty, tasty, tasty."

There's no denying it, this is a very hot dream. You walk over to where Tom is lying, waiting for you to ingest his entire body. The only problem is, where to start?
13422112222211122111111.title: Gobble him up.

134221122222111221111111.content:
You decide to start with his head and work your way down. You therefore position yourself by his head and kneel down, taking a gentle but firm grip on his shoulders. He smiles up at you.

"I hope you enjoy eating me as much as I'll enjoy being eaten!" Tom now takes a deep breath to calm himself (he seems so excited by all this), then gives you a look that ultimately says 'I'm ready, eat me.'

Wasting no more time, you open your mouth as wide as you can and pick Tom up gently by the shoulders. He then guides his own head into your wide open mouth, but it is you that has control over how quickly the rest of him enters. You shift his body round so that your tongue can get a good taste of his chest, stomach and parts beyond when the time comes. You then slowly push him further into your jaws, his head beginning to go down your throat. Your mouth stays where it is while he is moved further and furhter into your waiting stomach. Your lips and tongue are now caressing his chest, and you know that you're getting closer and closer to real flavour country. He was delicious when he was shrunken, but now that he's normal sized you can appreciate every little nuance of flavour in him. Your tongue is now sliding across his belly, causing him to laugh a little inside you, which feels fantastic. Reluctantly you finish eating his torso, but now there's even tastier parts to devour ahead ...
134221122222111221111111.title: Head first

1342211222221112211112.content:
"You ate me." His blank, unreadable expression has very quickly turned into a cold, furious glare. Perhaps it's your imagination, but either Tom is getting bigger or you're getting smaller all of a sudden.

"Now, I can explain that, Tom ..."

"Can you? Can you justify what you did to me?" he snarls. There's no doubt it, you're a foot shorter now than you were a couple of seconds ago.

"But ...but you were so tasty!" Tom lets out a terrible roar, a quite inhuman sound, and you seem to shrink by an extra few feet as a result.

"So that's a good reason for eating someone alive? Well, let's see if you feel the same way when you're the one on the menu!"

Now you find yourself the same height that Tom was when you picked him out of the box, fattened him up and then ate you. You try to run but it's no good. Tom wraps his hand around you and picks you up. Still fuming, he begins to strip you very roughly. No prizes for guessing what he plans to do with you.

It's at a point like this where you really wish you would wake up!
1342211222221112211112.title: Tom's revenge!

choices: One of the best dreams of your life.
134221122222111221112.content:
At first you think it's only James walking towards you, but as he gets closer you see that Oliver is actually walking directly behind him. Once they're just a few feet away, Oliver steps to James' right. They both stand there, staring at you with identical grins on their faces.

"You're here!" says James.

"Now we can begin!" adds Oliver.

"Begin ...begin what?"
134221122222111221112.title: It's James and Oliver!

1342211222221112211121.content: "To have the time of your life," says Oliver enthusiastically as he points to something behind you. You spin round to find ...
1342211222221112211121.title: One of the best dreams of your life.

13422112222211122111212.content:
There it sits ...the largest cooking pot you've ever seen. It sits above a traditional log fire, propped up where necessary. The pot itself is definitely big enough to fit a human being inside very comfortably ...possibly even two! You turn back to the twins, and your grin equals theirs when you see that they are slowly stripping off.

"You mean ...you're going to let me cook you?" you ask.

"Of course," says James as he pulls off his shirt. "I'm just sorry we made such a fuss of things the last time."

"You were the one making most of the fuss," interjects Oliver, dropping his trousers onto the ground.

"Well ...yes, but this time we're ready to do things properly." James has managed to get undressed first, and he slowly advances on you, buck naked. "If you thought I tasted good raw ...just wait until I've been nicely cooked." He speaks in a soft, seductive tone and you find you can't help yourself. You caress his body, and he simply stands there and allows you to do so. He even gives you a little guidance, taking your hands in his and directing them slowly towards his groin. His penis stands erect and seems to tremble at your touch. You wrap your fingers around it and move up and down, slowly at first.

"What about me?" asks Oliver. Well, you do have two hands after all. You give Oliver the same treatment as James, and it's not long before they're moaning and gasping together. Faster and faster you go, happy to give them this one last favour before you cook them. Within minutes they have both climaxed. The excitement has left them out of breath and drenched in sweat. You ask them if they'd like to lie down for a second, but they both shake their heads.

"We'll get straight into the pot. We're ready now!" gasps James. Sure enough, a stepladder has suddenly appeared out of nowhere. You help them both up it one at a time. The two naked twins are now both inside the large pot, up to their chests in water. They relax as though they're merely taking a bath.

"Now that we're both inside, it's time to light the fire," instructs Oliver. "We won't cook all that well in cold water." After removing the stepladder, you suddenly find that you have a box of matches in your hand. This dream is providing you with your every need! You go about the task of lighting the logs underneath the pot in several places until the fire spreads.

"This fire looks like it could take a while," you say.

"All the better for you. We'll taste so much better if we're slow cooked," explains Oliver. You stand up after lighting the fire, and find that the pot is just the right height for you to be able to watch these delicious boys cook, as well talk to them properly. They look over at you with their identical smiles, clearly loving the whole experience.
13422112222211122111212.title: An extra large cooking pot.

choices: Just the two of you will be fine, thanks.
134221122222111221112122.content:
You run your finger over James' bare shoulder and then stick it in your mouth. He has an amazing natural flavour, and together they'll taste fantastic when they're cooked. However, this whole set up of cooking them in a large pot just seems rather ...incomplete. Then you figure out what they need, other ingredients in the pot!

Visions of a delicious Phelps stew dancing in your head, you joyfully begin cutting up the various vegetables that have appeared out of nowhere. Every few minutes you tip the prepared veggies into the pot, which has now begun to bubble very nicely. Surprisingly, the twins seem to be enjoying it even more now that they're really cooking. There's a look of genuine relaxation on their faces that you just can't fake.

"Which part are you most looking forward to?" Oliver asks his brother.

"It's gotta be that moment when you're just about to enter the mouth, when you know that it's coming. You?"

"For me it's being inside the stomach itself. Curled up all nice and tight ...and it's even better when you're in the belly with someone else."

"Hey, there's an idea!" exclaims James.

"What?"

"We should be able to fit at least one more person in here!" James turns to you. "What do you say? Fancy adding one more item of meat to your stew? You'll thank us when you've got all three of us in your tummy!"
134221122222111221112122.title: Add some more ingredients.

1342211222221112211121221.content:
"I sure would! But who to have with you guys ..."

"We realise this is a pretty big decision," says James sympathetically as he leans out over the rim of the pot for a second and gestures for a group of people (who have only just appeared) to come forward. "The way we see it, if you've only got a few to choose from, the decision will be much easier. Ah, here they are."

Four naked boys come marching along, one behind the other. You recognise them immediately. Leading this little procession is Cody Linley, followed closely by Rupert Grint. Behind him is Mitchell Musso and bringing up the rear is Devon Murray. They stop just in front of the pot and turn to face you, standing at attention.

"Ready for inspection!" barks Cody. You take a moment to really look at the four of them standing together before you begin a more detailed examination. They all look so tasty, but there's only room in the pot for one of them. You take your time caressing the chest, shoulders, belly and ass of each boy. You even taste them a little, and of course they're all delicious. None of this is making your decision any easier.

"So? Who's it going to be? Who is going to join us here in the pot, and then ultimately in your stomach?" asks Oliver.
1342211222221112211121221.title: The more the merrier!

13422112222211122111212211.content:
The thought of Rupert joining his fellow Weasley actors is a very tempting one. On the other hand, Cody shouldn't be dismissed simply because he's never worked with James or Oliver. He has a flavour that would probably compliment them very well.

So, who's going to join them in the cooking pot?
13422112222211122111212211.title: Cody or Rupert

134221122222111221112122111.content:
"I think I'm going to have to go for Rupert," you say finally. James and Oliver let out a loud whoop of joy. Rupert's so excited he can't wait. In the space of a moment he's at the side of the pot, being helped in by James, Oliver and the other boys. The twins take hold of his arms while the other boys boost him up, enabling him to climb over the edge of the pot and slide gently into the water. While he finds himself a good cooking position, Mitchell, Cody and Devon begin to walk away, looking dejected.

"Cheer up, guys," you say. "I'm sure I'll be hungry later."

"You may wake up before too long," Mitchell points out.

Ignoring this, you send them away, giving each boy a pat on the butt as they pass. You then turn your attention to your three soon-to-be meals, slowly cooking together. You notice that Rupert is much more bulky and muscular than James or Oliver. You're torn between the choice of whether to have him first or save him until last. That's getting a bit ahead of yourself though, they're not done cooking yet. All three simply lie back inside the pot, the bubbles bursting against their skin, which is beginning to get red. Even Rupert, who hasn't been in there long, is looking distinctly lobster like.

"Won't be long now," says Oliver as he winks at you.
134221122222111221112122111.title: Rupert it is!

13422112222211122111212212.content:
Devon would certainly fit in both the pot and your belly better, considering that he'll be joined at all times with two very tasty twins. Mitchell's not that much bigger, and he is delicious. There's no denying that.

You've narrowed it down to these two. Now comes the final choice.
13422112222211122111212212.title: Mitchell or Devon

1342211222221112211121222.content:
"As tempting as that is ...I think I'll just stick with the two of you, but thank you."

"Hey, that's perfectly okay!" says James.

"You are the diner, we are merely dinner," says Oliver as he lies back and relaxs in the increasingly hot water. You finish off your preparations by adding a few more vegetables. From them on you watch as James and Oliver's skin slowly turns redder and redder, yet they seem to be feeling no pain. In fact, they're enjoying every minute of it.

"You both seem to be coming along very nicely."

"Yep, it won't be long now. We're going to taste so good ..."

"Have you given much thought as to which of us you're going to eat first?" asks Oliver.

"I expect I'll decide when the time comes ..."

"Well, you better start deciding ...because I think we're done," says James.

"You sure?"

"Oh yes, any longer and we'll be overdone." The two twins climb out of the pot, their skin a nice, healthy well-cooked tone. They stand before you, ready to be eaten. "Since James got eaten first last time, I really think I should go first, in all fairness," says Oliver.

"I have to agree," you say. "But don't worry, James. I'll get to you soon enough." You run your fingers across Oliver's bare torso. His skin texture feels the same, yet somehow you know that the cooking process will have done wonders for his flavour. You find yourself fingering his belly button, lost in your musings on how good he's going to taste.

"Didn't anyone ever tell you not to play with your food?" asks Oliver jokingly. "Eat me!"
1342211222221112211121222.title: All done.

13422112222211122111212221.content:
How can you ignore such a direct order? Your hands quickly make their way from the middle of his slender torso to the sides of it, so that you can get a good grip on him. As you then lift him up off the ground slightly, Oliver does his bit to help by leaning in towards you, making his entry into your mouth much easier for the both of you. Your jaws open wide enough for him to get in, then close down gently so as to maintain your hold on him.

Supporting the rest of his body with your arms, you start enjoying what's already inside you, while working on getting the rest in there as well. It's upon reaching his shoulders that you begin to appreciate how fantastic he tastes after being cooked in that pot. His skin is still wonderfully soft, and yet he has a flavour that closely reminds you of properly done bacon. His body is now entirely horizontal as you continue eating him. His chest, arms and belly are all equally delicious. You get a very good taste of the erection this entire process has given him before you lean back, sending his legs pointing up into the air. They're so long and slender that you can't help but take your time over them, nibbling and swallowing slowly until only his feet remain. These are eaten with one final gulp.

James has been watching this whole thing, getting just as excited as his brother. He comes over and strokes your greatly enlarged belly, provoking a pleasurable squirm from the tall, tasty boy curled up inside it.

"Time for seconds!" says James, standing ready.
13422112222211122111212221.title: Do as he says.

1342211222221112211122.content:
"We can begin ..." says James.

"Yes ...but begin what?" you ask.

"We can begin," repeats Oliver.

"What? What is going to happen here?"

"We can begin," the twins say in perfect unison. You notice now that their voices have become lower, more sinister. They're looking at you with dark intent in their eyes. You slowly back away, but jump when you hear the same words spoken right behind you.

"We can begin ..." You turn to find another set of Phelps twins, who look at you in the same manner as the first set. You turn to check that the first set are still there, and they are ...as well as another set of twins. You look to your left, to see three pairs of Phelps twins advancing on you. Just as many to the right as well. All chanting ...

"We can begin ...we can begin ...we can begin ..."
1342211222221112211122.title: Your worst nightmare.

choices: They feed you to a giant ...
13422112222211122111221.content:
Well, this may be a nightmare, but you're not about to give in to fear. You stand ready to smack anyone and anything that comes near you. One set of twins come at you from the left, their hands out ready to grab you. You duck underneath their outstretched arms and manage to punch them in the stomach, one jab after the other. This knocks them back a little, but they keep coming forwards, as do their counterparts. More and more have emerged from nowhere, and you find yourself being grabbed from behind.

You kick out behind you and make contact with the shin of one of the twins holding you, but his grip does not waver. You wrench at the hands on your shoulder, but their grip is too tight. You're grabbed by many more hands as they close in around you. Before you can do anything, those hands have lifted you off the ground. You're being held up by your arms, legs and head. Their grip is too strong for you to struggle against. You're forced to listen to their continued chant.

"We can begin ...we can begin ...we can begin ...we can begin ..."

"What are you going to do with me?" you scream, trying to make yourself heard over the noise.
13422112222211122111221.title: Stand and fight.

13422112222211122112.content:
As the figure approaches, the mist rises up suddenly around him, obscuring your vision. You can hear his footsteps ...he's still walking towards you!

But who is it?
13422112222211122112.title: It's someone you haven't eaten yet.

134221122222111221121.content: The mist is beginning to clear ...but who is it that's walking towards you? The slender William or the stocky Jamie?
134221122222111221121.title: William Moseley or Jamie Bell?

1342211222221112211211.content:
The mist thins to the point that you can actually see who it is. Of all the people it could be, it actually turns out to be William Moseley, dressed in his King Peter armour ...and carrying the weapons that go with it.

It's then that the mist completely evaporates, and you find yourself standing on a huge battlefield. Behind William you see an army of dwarves, centaurs, minotaurs, animals ...Narnians, basically. You glance over your shoulder and see your own army, armed to the teeth and waiting for your command. They're too far back to defend you from William, but you soon realise that you're holding your own sword and shield. You must be getting ready to fight him in single combat.

"We settle this here," says William, obviously in character. "If I defeat you, you let your prisoners go free." By this you assume he means the boys trapped up on your shelf. Maybe this is your subconscious trying to convince you to let them go ...like that's ever going to happen.

"And what if I win, sire?"

"If you win ...you get me." You can't help but notice the tiniest of smiles on William's face. Perhaps he wants you to win. Not that you're about to take any chances. If you want William, you're going to have to fight!

William lowers the visor on his helmet, and you quickly do the same. He stands ready to attack, while you assume a stance that you guess is good and strong. You begin to circle each other, edging closer all the time.
1342211222221112211211.title: William

choices: He knocks your sword away with his own.
13422112222211122112111.content:
William swings his sword from right to left, but you're ready with your shield. You take the brunt of the blow and then use your shield to direct his attack to your right, hoping to throw him off balance. With some quick footwork, however, William regains his composure and is ready to attack again. You remain on the defensive and let him come to you, wearing him out so that you can make your successful counter attack.

All of a sudden, William launches an expert yet brutal series of quick attacks, one coming immediately after the other. You have to think fast in order to protect yourself. Finally you see an opening in his defence and decide you can put it off no longer. You force his sword out of the way with your shield and raise your leg up to kick him. He's winded and knocked backwards, staggering a few steps and then falling to the ground. You can hear the cries of the Narnians behind you, and the cheers of your own army. You stride over to the fallen High King, stand on his shield and put your sword point to his chest.

"Surrender."
13422112222211122112111.title: The fight begins!

choices: You instantly find yourself in a tent ...with William.
134221122222111221121111.content:
Just when you think you've won, William brings his own sword up and knocks yours away. He then tugs his shield arm out from under your foot and takes advantage of your distraction to trip you up with his shield. You're glad this is a dream and you can't feel actual pain, because you get the feeling that were it not a dream, this would hurt like a bitch. William quickly scrambles to his feet.

"You won't win that easily," he says with a smile as he renews his attack. Getting to your feet, you decide to go on the offensive. Your swords strike each other and your shields in quick succession, both looking for an opportunity to deliver a good strike. William finds it first.

His sword comes down and across, slicing into your thigh. Although you can't feel the pain, you definitely feel your leg giving way beneath you. You sink down onto one knee and see William about to strike again.

"Respite!" you exclaim. William looks tired as well, and so after some consideration, he lowers his sword.

"Five minutes?"

"Three!" Why you insisted on three minutes rather than five is lost on you. It just felt like the right thing to say. William returns to his side of the battlefield, where his 'brother' is waiting to tend his wounds. You return to your side with the help of your generals. Your knee is bandaged, and the time to return to the fight soon comes. William is barely in the middle of the arena before you launch your attack. It seems you've been holding back up until now, and even you are surprised by your skill. Locking your sword with his, you manage to dislodge it from his grip. Now he only has his shield to defend himself with. Your attacks are powerful and focused, continually hitting his shield until he can hold it no longer. It falls from his hands and he stands before you, defenceless. You bring your sword point back to his chest once again.

"You have lost, your majesty." Far from looking defeated, William smiles at you.

"Then you have won me. Shall we go to my tent?"
134221122222111221121111.title: A respite.

choices: The wine is fine, now let's get busy!
1342211222221112211211111.content:
In the blink of an eye, you find yourself inside a luxurious tent. A tent fit for a king. There are large cushions dotted around the floor, a table covered with fine things to eat (covered except for the large space in the middle, you notice), and a large, silk sheeted bed. You get the feeling you're going to like it here.

William is standing before you, no longer in his armour but wearing a simple tunic and trousers instead. They're both of the best quality, of course, but you get the feeling that one way or another, he won't be wearing them long. You notice that you are wearing similar clothes. Smiling at you suggestively, William pours two large goblets of wine and hands one to you. You take it.

"To your victory," says William, who then takes a drink. You know there's every chance that he's poisoned yours somehow, but there's also a chance that he really willing to let you have your way with him. You therefore take a chance and take a decent gulp from your goblet.
1342211222221112211211111.title: In William's tent.

13422112222211122112111111.content:
The wine tastes excellent, and you don't suddenly feel faint or just plain dead, so it's a fair assumption that William hasn't tried to poison you.

"Hmm, delicious," you mutter.

"Thank you," says William. "But you haven't tasted me yet." Putting down his own goblet, he moves closer to you, lifting up the hem of his tunic to reveal the wonderful flesh that is yours by right of conquest. He teases you at first, then slowly takes the tunic off completely. He's thin, but very sexy.

"What do you want to do with me?" he asks.
13422112222211122112111111.title: The wine is fine, now let's get busy!

choices: Get him to start stuffing himself.
You can't wait. Eat him now!
134221122222111221121111111.content:
You smile and place your hand on William's bare shoulder, squeezing it gently.

"Well, I am rather hungry ..."

"Then I shall fill you up," says William as he removes his trousers. He then slowly walks backwards towards the table, gesturing for you to come closer. He stops at the edge of the table where the large space is and perches himself on the table. You stand right in front of him, running your fingers down his arms and taking in every inch of his naked body with your hungry gaze.

"You look so tasty ..." you sigh.

"And yet I could be tastier," whispers William. He motions towards all the fine food around him. "If you like, I could eat as much of this as you want me to. It'll make me plumper and tastier. Just think, all this wonderful food inside me ...then me inside you ..."
134221122222111221121111111.title: Fatten him up first?

1342211222221112211211111111.content:
"I'd say that thought is rather ...exciting," you say, mirroring William's grin.

"In that case, I'd better make a start, hadn't I?" William leans back slightly and reaches out to the side to pick up some nearby food. As he stretches, you become very aware of how lean and toned he is. You can't resist running your hand down his torso, coming to a stop at his groin. William sits back up again with a bunch of grapes in his hand, smiling broadly.

"It's a bad habit, playing with your food." He hands you the grapes. "Here, you feed these to me while I make a start on this." He gestures at a nearby plate piled high with lamb chops. He picks one up and starts eating ravenously, stopping in between swallows to be fed a few grapes by you. Once he's had enough of the lamb, he moves on to some mutton. This is certainly the kind of spread you'd expect to see set out for a king.

Not wanting him to fill up too much on meat, you pick up a plate of small cakes and hold them directly in front of him. Picking up on the hint, he begins to wolf them down, moving on to the bigger cakes once he's done with those. You're beginning to notice a little bulge in his belly, and you're almost constantly checking up on it by feeling it all over, exciting him to no end.

Finally you feel that you can wait no longer. You stop him from scoffing another cake and instead hand him a small handkerchief so that he can clean his face up a little.

"It's time. You should taste even more delicious now."

"As you wish," says William. He finishes cleaning himself up. A king should look as respectable as possible when he's being made into a meal.
1342211222221112211211111111.title: Get him to start stuffing himself.

choices: He wants to be eaten too!
13422112222211122112111111112.content:
You're about to start snacking on William, when you see a flicker of movement out of the corner of your eye. Skandar Keynes has just walked in, dressed in the tunic he wears in the Narnia movies. He looks at you, then at William, then back to you again. You can't help but notice the sword attached to his belt. Right now you're unarmed and would have no way of defending yourself if he decided to attack you. You try to maintain a fixed stare at Skandar, constantly trying to read his expression.

Skandar shakes his head and tuts.

"This won't do at all ..." he says.
13422112222211122112111111112.title: Skandar enters the tent.

1342211222221112211212.content:
The mist clears and you find yourself dazzled by a bright light.

"May I help you?" says a voice with a distinct English accent. It takes a little while for you to get used to the light. Blinking rapidly, you can now see who's speaking to you. It's Jamie Bell, dressed in a waiter's uniform. The bright light was the chandelier above his head. You look around you to find yourself in a very posh restraunt. You look down and see that you yourself are dressed for the occasion. You look at Jamie, who's still waiting for an answer.

"Uh, yes, table for one, please."

"Excellent. Follow me, please." Jamie leads you through the dining area filled with strangers chatting away and eating. You may not recognise any of the customers, but you certainly recognise who they're eating. You even recognise some of the waiters as well, passing Cole Sprouse carrying his brother on a plate, curled up like a roast. You watch as Cole serves Dylan to a nearby couple, who instantly start tucking in to the plump boy.

"Your table," says Jamie, pulling a chair out for you. You sit down gracefully and take a moment to admire the marvellous establishment.

"I hope you won't think me silly, but what is this place?" you ask Jamie, who's currently arranging your cutlery. He smiles.

"Very droll. You are, of course, a regular and highly valued customer here."

"Yes, but say for a moment that I've completely forgotten what this place is ..."

"This is Chez Garçon, where we serve the most exquisite young men in a variety of forms. Would you care to see the menu, or would you like to see today's special?"
1342211222221112211212.title: Ooh ...swanky!

13422112222211122112121.content:
"I'd like to see the menu, please." Jamie hands you a menu and you begin to peruse it. You decide on a very simple starter, but it is, of course, the main course that merits your full attention. Several dishes catch your eye.

Roast Robert -Robert Pattinson served as a traditional roast dinner with stuffing, potatoes, your choice of veg and gravy.

Frankie Filet -A steak made from a cut of Frankie Muniz's tenderloin.

Bell Burger -A burger made from Drake Bell, served with cheese, bacon, tomato and lettuce.

Lucas Lasagne -A portion of lasagne made from Lucas Grabeel.

All of these look fantastic, but in the end you'll have to make a final choice. What's it to be?
13422112222211122112121.title: See the menu.

134221122222111221121211.content:
You've narrowed your choice down to two. You can see that Jamie is still waiting for your order. You must have a reputation for making your choices quickly around here, most waiters usually give you a few minutes to decide. Then you remember that this is a dream. It doesn't rely on things making ultimate sense.

Going back to your choice of meal, which are you going to have?
134221122222111221121211.title: Roast Robert or Frankie Filet

134221122222111221121212.content: You're getting closer to a decision. The question is, what are you in the mood for? A nice, juicy burger made from the delicious Drake Bell or a hot, spicy lasagne made from the meaty Lucas Grabeel?
134221122222111221121212.title: Bell Burger or Lucas Lasagne

choices: See the special first, then decide.
Let's have the Waiter Deal now.
13422112222211122112122.content:
"I think I'll see the special, thank you," you say as elegantly as possible. Jamie gives a curt nod, then straightens up and clicks his fingers, getting the attention of one of the other waiters nearer the kitchen. He makes a gesture which obviously means 'bring the special', because the waiter nods in understanding and disappears into the kitchen. Jamie then returns his attention to you.

"I should like to remind you that as it is Tuesday, the 'Waiter Deal' is available." You could pretend to know what this means, but it wouldn't do you any good.

"And what exactly is that?" Jamie smiles again.

"Highly amusing. The 'Waiter Deal' allows a customer to choose to have his or her waiter as the main course. It is an offer that is limited only to Tuesday evenings."

"I see ...and would you recommend the offer today?"

"I can assure you that I am at the peak of flavour today." Jamie turns his head to see the kitchen door opening again. "There is, of course, still the special if you care to choose between us."
13422112222211122112122.title: See the special.

134221122222111221121221.content:
"I'm sure you're absolutely delicious, Jamie, but I think I'd like to see the special before I decide."

"Of course." Jamie turns on the spot and motions for two waiters to bring the special forward. They're carrying someone tied to a spit by his hands and feet so that the rest of him dangles down. Apart from a makeshift thong fashioned from bacon strips, he is completely naked. It's only as they bring the special closer that you recognise who it is. It's Matthew Lewis.

"Good evening," says Matthew as he's brought level with your table. "I'm today's special. As you can see I've been fattening myself up for quite some time. Would you care to have a feel?"

"Don't mind if I do," you say as you gleefully begin feeling, prodding and rubbing his fattened belly. "Oh yes, it feels like very good meat."

"I'm being roasted on the spit and I come with your choice of basting sauce as well as a side of fries or garlic bread. Personally I recommend the cherry sauce for basting me."

A tough decision. Do you have the special or do you take advantage of the fact that it's Tuesday and have your waiter for lunch?
134221122222111221121221.title: See the special first, then decide.

1342211222221112211212211.content:
"I think I'll have the special please, Jamie." You see the look of glee on Matthew's face. The boys here must be really eager to be eaten.

"An excellent choice. Would you care for fries or garlic bread with that?" asks Jamie, taking out a little notebook.

"Fries," you answer.

"And the basting sauce?"

"I think I'll go with the cherry sauce Matthew recommended." If the look on Matthew's face was gleeful when he heard he was about to be eaten, it's nothing compared with how happy he looks now. Jamie makes a note of your choice, then motions for the waiters to take Matthew away.

"See you soon!" calls Matthew as he's carted away on the spit, headed for a good roasting. As he disappears back into the kitchen, Jamie turns to you.

"Would you care for a starter while your main course is being prepared?"

You wonder if you'll have room for a whole Matthew Lewis if you have a starter. You check the menu to see what they have on offer.
1342211222221112211212211.title: Have the special.

choices: Skip the starter and wait for the special.
13422112222211122112122111.content:
You open up the menu and your eyes dart to the Starter section. There's not as much to choose from as there is in the main course section, but that's to be expected. You notice that the starters mostly consist of boys who are a little shorter in stature than the main courses.

There's a Pinkston Cocktail, served in the style of a Prawn Cocktail, but with Ryan Pinkston.

A Moises Arias salad.

A Jake T. Austin club sandwich.

And Erik Per Sullivan served in a baked potato.

Hmm ...they're all fine choices, but the real question is, do you really fancy chowing down on one of these boys when you know you've got a fully sized Matthew Lewis coming?
13422112222211122112122111.title: Check the menu.

134221122222111221121221111.content: You decide that you've got room for a starter. The real question is, what to have? So many choices ...
134221122222111221121221111.title: Order a starter.

1342211222221112211212211111.content: So, do you want the Pinkston Cocktail, or the Moises Arias salad?
1342211222221112211212211111.title: Ryan or Moises

1342211222221112211212211112.content: Hmm, the Jake club sandwich, or Erik in a baked potato? Decisions, decisions, decisions ...
1342211222221112211212211112.title: Jake or Erik

choices: Use a knife and fork and eat him a little at a time.
134221122222111221121221112.content:
"Um ...they all look tempting ...but I think I'll pass. Save room for Matthew."

"Very good," says Jamie as he takes the menu from you. "The special will be ready in approximately twenty five minutes." With that, Jamie goes off to serve other customers, possibly even to be eaten by one of them. You, however, are more than looking forward to a nice juicy serving of Matthew Lewis.

Time being what it is in a dream, it's not long at all before the kitchen door opens and you see two waiters come out carrying Matthew on a large plate. He's sitting cross legged on it, with the fries you ordered piled up around him (a fair few are even covering his privates). His skin certainly looks like it's been roasted, and as he approaches you can detect a faint aroma of cherries coming from him. He's smiling broadly as he's placed in front of you. The two waiters give a curt little bow and then walk away.

"Well," says Matthew as he pats his belly. "Do tuck in. Would you like to eat me all at once, or a little bit at a time?"
134221122222111221121221112.title: Here's Matthew!

1342211222221112211212212.content:
"You're very tempting, Matthew ...but it is Tuesday ...so I think I'll have the Waiter Deal."

"As you wish," sighs Matthew as he's lead back into the kitchen. Jamie now turns to you and starts to undo his shirt buttons. There is an air of professionalism about him, though you're pretty sure you detect some flickers of excitement in his eyes.

"An excellent choice. How do you wish me served? Cooked or as I am?"

While he continues to undress, you ponder this decision. If he gets cooked, he'll have to go into the kitchen ...whereas if you have him now, you'll get fed a whole lot quicker.
1342211222221112211212212.title: Have your waiter.

13422112222211122112122122.content:
"I think I'll have you as you are. I mean, why wait?"

"Indeed," says Jamie as he removes his shirt and begins to undo his belt. Nobody else throughout the whole restaurant seems to be taking the slightest notice of what's going on. They must all be used to seeing the waiters suddenly strip off and allow themselves to be eaten. You suddenly notice a woman at the table across from you lowering a naked Cole Sprouse into her mouth. Naked, whole and alive, in fact. You remember seeing him serving up his brother earlier, and now it seems that under the terms of the 'Waiter Deal', it's his turn to be eaten.

You hear a polite cough coming from your left, and you turn to see that Jamie is now fully naked. He's standing almost to attention, emphasising his chest and broad shoulders. He's slim, though very well built.

"Would you care to taste me before you consume me?" asks Jamie, as casually as if he were asking if you'd like to sample the wine before ordering. You take a look around at all the other diners.

"Can I do that? I mean, just start licking you?"

"Of course. It is your right as the customer to decide if I merit full consumption. You may, as you put it, 'lick me' to your heart's content."

"Well, then ...I'd certainly like a taste. Come here, please." Jamie obediently takes a step closer. In your current sitting position, you find your face right by his flat, toned tummy. After taking another nervous glance around the room, you lean in and begin tentatively licking him around the belly button. If you were to look up, you'd see the ill disguised look of contentment on his face. You don't look up, however, as you're too busy burying your head in Jamie's delicious flesh. You widen your licking to other areas of his belly, but soon decide that enough is enough or you'll never get round to eating him.

"You taste excellent. I'm ready to eat you now."

"Very good. One last question, would you care to eat me lengthways or curled?"

"I beg your pardon?"

"'Lengthways' involves starting with the head or feet and working along the body, much like how a snake devours it's prey. 'Curled' involves the meal embracing a curled position, tucking the legs up against the torso and holding them in place with the arms. It means opening one's mouth wider, but I have it on good authority that it is a good position for intensifying the flavour of the meal."
13422112222211122112122122.title: Eat him now.

choices: Luckily you wake up before you have to pay.
You're still dreaming, and you can't pay.
134221122222111221121221222.content:
"I think I'll try you curled up, if you don't mind."

"I don't mind at all," says Jamie as he casually climbs up onto your table. Just like when he stripped off, nobody else seems to think this strange. Standing now on your plate, he deftly crouches down, bending his legs and holding them right up against his chest with his arms. He looks at you one last time. "It has been a pleasure serving you. Start whenever you wish, and I do hope you enjoy your meal." He then tucks his head down onto his knees, making himself as compact as possible.

You reach round him and take hold of his waist with both hands. He's either surprisingly light, or you're surprisingly strong. Either way, it takes practically no effort to lift him up off the plate, still in his crouched position. You find that no matter how you handle him, no matter which way you turn him, he remains in that position. Now this is service!

From watching the other diners, it becomes obvious that you have the ability to open your mouth wider than normal while you're here. Unable to wait any longer, you do this with the greatest of haste. You decide to insert Jamie directly into your mouth rather than lower him in. You send him in head first, and you're greeted by the strong aroma of mint sauce. The waiters must rub various condiments onto themselves on Tuesdays on the off chance that they get eaten. You find that Jamie's choice of mint compliments his overall flavour perfectly. With Jamie's head and shoulders firmly lodged in your mouth, you begin slowly pushing him further in, while swallowing at a steady pace at the same time. Very soon he's halfway in, and while you may not be able to taste individual parts of him, the sensation of packing his entire body into your mouth at once is incredible! His flavour is so intense!

It's not long before his folded legs are inside you, and the last thing anyone who might happen to be watching would see of Jamie is a glimpse of the bottom of his feet as they disappear into you. With one great gulp, Jamie lands in your stomach, which bulges outwards to accomodate him. If the feeling of having him in your mouth was good, it's nothing compared to having him in your stomach. His position won't have changed a bit. He's just a giant meatball as far as you're concerned.

You push back from the table a little to give your belly some breathing space. You pat it, greatly satisfied by your meal. You see another waiter approaching your table. It is, in fact, Justin Berfield.

"Did you enjoy my co-worker?" he asks in the impeccable manner that you've come to expect from the staff here. You grin as you give your belly another pat and an extra little rub.

"Very much, thank you. He was delicious."

"Would you care to see the dessert cart?" asks Justin.

"Oooh ...no, thank you. I couldn't eat another bite."

"Very well. Your bill," says Justin, producing a slip of paper from his pocket. You take it, and your eyes feel like they've bulged outwards as much as your stomach when you see the price.

"What?" you exclaim. "You've got to be joking!"
134221122222111221121221222.title: Hmm ...tasty!

1342211222221112211212212222.content:
"May I assume that you are unable to pay your bill?" asks Justin.

"When it's this price, yes!"

"The Waiter Deal does come with a hefty cost. Staff are difficult to replace, after all."

"That may be, but it doesn't change the fact that I can't pay for Jamie!"

"Very well. Please wait here." Giving a little bow, Justin turns on his heel and marches off towards a door marked 'Office'. He must be going to get the manager. You decide that perhaps it's time to get the hell out of here. This is easier said then done, however, as your belly is weighing you down. It's ironic, really. When you picked Jamie up and ate him, he weighed practically nothing. Now that he's sitting in your belly, slowly digesting, it feels like you're carrying a 180 pound baby in your abdomen. You can't even hoist yourself out of the chair, let alone make a run for it.

Justin soon returns, with the manager at his side. The manager being Elijah Wood, of course. Elijah takes a seat at your table, sitting directly in front of you. He puts his hands together on the table and stares at you for a few seconds.

"I understand that you took advantage of our Tuesday Waiter Deal? In more ways than one?"

"Well ...yes, I suppose you could put it like that ..."

"You're a greatly valued costumer here, but I'm afraid rules are rules."

"Um ...what rules would you be referring to ...exactly?"
1342211222221112211212212222.title: You can't pay ...so you pay.

choices: You run downstairs to answer the door.
13422112222211122112122122221.content:
Elijah shakes his head, then gestures to Justin and two other waiters (Nick Jonas and Jason Earles), who work together to help you to your feet. Once you're up, Elijah stands too and speaks to you as quietly as he can.

"Like I said, you're a valued customer, so I don't wish to create any more embarassment for you than is necessary."

"What are you going to do?" you ask, getting just a little nervous now.

"You really have left me with no other alternative."

"Can't we discuss this?"

"Report to the kitchen ..."

"Oh crap! You're going to serve me as a meal, aren't you?"

"For washing up duty."

"For ...for what?" The three waiters take hold of you once again and steer you towards the kitchen before you get given any further explanation. They escort you right through the 'In' door, and you're met with a hot, steamy kitchen brimming with activity. You're quickly dragged over to a large sink, given an apron and gloves and told, quite bluntly, to start washing. The apron, suprisingly, fits over your Jamie Bell filled belly, so you don't really have any excuse not to start. Considering what you thought was going to happen, this will be a doddle ...even if you do have to wash a mountain of plates before you've earned enough to pay the bill.

As you wash, you steal glances around the kitchen. There are plenty of chefs you don't recognise ...it's the young celebrities in various states of undress that you're interested in. Over in one corner you can see Taylor Lautner being cooked in a large pot of boiling water. A bit further on there's Cody Linley lying naked on a counter while one of the chefs bastes him with cooking oil. On the same counter, you see Skandar Keynes sitting cross legged on a large plate. He's arguing with the chef about the best way to prepare him. Away from the actual cooking area, you see what looks like a lounge. There are several couches, and they all have naked boys sitting on them. They must be waiting their turn to be cooked. Devon Murray and Jesse McCartney are just the first two that you recognise when a loud knocking distracts you. Where's it coming from?

You're woken very suddenly by the second knock that's coming from somewhere in your house. Your eyes instantly dart downwards to see if your stomach is as big as you think it might be, but you can see that it's the same as it was when you went to sleep. There's a third knock, which is rare when you consider that your postman isn't nearly so patient ...the postman!
13422112222211122112122122221.title: You wash dishes.

134221122222111221121221222211.content:
You throw off the bed covers and make for the stairs. You're desperate to get to the front door before the postman gives up. Leaping the last few steps, you dash across the corridor and grab the door handle. You open it to find the postman about half way down the garden path. He hears the door opening and turns.

"Ah. Sorry, I didn't think there was anyone in."

"That's OK ...you have ...something for me?" you ask breathlessly. The postman smiles as he hands you one of those electronic things they use to register reciept of deliveries.

"Just sign there and I'll fetch it from the van." You do so, then watch as he returns with a fairly large parcel tucked under his arm. After checking that you've signed, he hands the parcel over. "Enjoy," he says rather simply. You're sure you catch a knowing look and a cheeky smile on his face as he turns to go. You check the label on the box and it says 'Body Enlargement Device'. You kind of get the feeling that the postman thinks it means something other than it's true purpose.

Closing the door behind you, you first go back upstairs to fetch your box of boys. You carry them back downstairs and place the box gingerly onto the dining room table. You then turn your attention to the parcel and begin carefully removing the device. You take out the instruction manual that's tucked in at the side, then sift through the rest of the packaging until you find what you're really looking for ...

The overall machine stands at just over 25 inches tall. You remember what the flyer said about it enlarging shrunken snacks to a maximum height of 20 inches, which looks to be the rough height of the chamber built into it. It's cylindrical in shape, and the chamber is accessed by a see-through door at the front. That must be so you can watch your boy snacks grow.

You're immensely eager to start making big meals out of big boys, but there's a little voice in your head that's telling you to read the manual first. Something could go wrong if you don't know exactly what you're doing.

What do you do? Listen to the voice in your head or the rumble in your stomach?
134221122222111221121221222211.title: You run downstairs to answer the door.

1342211222221112211212212222112.content:
On second thought, this is a very complex piece of machinery. Perhaps it would be best to know how to work it properly. You therefore pick up the manual and begin reading. There's the usual safety stuff like not putting it in water, not dropping it, not messing about with the wiring. Then there's the more specific rules.

1. Once a boy has been enlarged once, he cannot be shrunk again or made any bigger. The change is permanent.

2. Only one boy in the machine at a time.

3. Make sure all clothes are removed from the boy before placing him in the machine.

This all seems fair enough. You then move on to reading about exactly what the machine can do. You can set it to enlarge a boy to any setting below 20 inches, and you can control it down to the last quarter of an inch. There's even a seperate function that can increase the size of ...other body parts. Such a function was installed in case the consumer has a particular fondness for any one part of the anatomy.

Having read the manual, you're ready to use the machine itself. As you plug it in and turn it on, your head swims at the very notion of trying to decide who to use it on first. It's breakfast time, and with this wonderful device you could have a big meal made of just one boy.

The question is, who?
1342211222221112211212212222112.title: Read the manual carefully.

13422112222211122112122122221121.content: So, who is first into your new plaything? Robert or Jason?
13422112222211122112122122221121.title: Robert Pattinson or Jason Earles

134221122222111221121221222211212.content:
You decide that it would be better to make Jason bigger, as he's already plumper than Robert. He'll make a hearty meal once he's been enlarged. You fish him out of the box, holding on to his shirt carefully as he kicks and screams. You'll have to be careful that he doesn't try to escape once you've enlarged him, seeing as he's the panicking sort. Remembering the instructions in the manual, you start by stripping him of his clothes.

"Hey! Leave me alone! What's the big deal?"

"Funny that you should say that, Jason," you say lightly as you finish removing his clothes. "Because fairly soon, you'll be the big deal. I'm going to enlarge you." Jason stops struggling and looks up at you with hope in his eyes. It will be fun to watch that hope fade and die.

"You mean ...you mean you're going to make me normal sized again?"

"Hmm, not quite. The biggest you'll ever be from this point on is about 20 inches, that's if I decide to make you that big." Holding his legs in your fist, you poke his plump belly, jiggling it about. "Having more of you to eat is going to be fantastic!"

There goes the hope in his eyes. It's gone, definitely gone. He resumes yelling as you place him inside the machine, closing the door on him and trapping him. You can see through the door, so you see every futile gesture he makes, banging on the door, kicking it, running back and forth. Once he starts crying you decide that enough is enough.

You turn to the controls on top of the device. You can either make Jason's whole body bigger, or you can expand one part of his body. It strikes you that if you were to do so, you'd make his belly bigger. Keep him the overall height that he is, but make him even plumper. It's certainly tempting.
134221122222111221121221222211212.title: Jason

1342211222221112211212212222112122.content:
You decide to focus the device on his stomach and make it much bigger. The rest of his body will stay the same, but the meatiest part of him will expand, becoming even more succulent and doughy. You programme the device, then step back and watch.

It takes a few seconds for anything to happen, then the machine starts to hum. Jason probably notices it first, as his hands suddenly grip his sides in surprise. Slowly but ever so surely, his belly begins to expand outwards like a balloon. There's a maximum expansion for this procedure to prevent any real harm comin to the boy inside the machine. As far as Jason is concerned, he just got inexplicably fatter. The humming stops and a little green light comes on at the top of the machine. You open the door and let Jason stagger out under the weight of his newly enlarged belly. He seems to be having trouble keeping his balance. Not that it'll matter where he's going.

"What have you done to me?" he gasps.

"I've made you just that little bit plumper."

"A little bit plumper? I'm huge! For what possible reason would you want to do this?"

"Well, it'll make eating you much more enjoyable, that's for sure." Before he can protest, you scoop him up in your hand and bring him up to your mouth. With your hand gripping his legs, his belly sticks out across your index finger. You give it a little poke and are delighted to find out that it's wonderfully soft. You then bring him closer and stick out your tongue, giving his belly a few experimental licks.

"Mmm, delicious!" you exclaim.

"H-h-hey! I've got an idea ...why don't you just keep me as I am and lick me now and then ...I mean, you don't actually want to ....eat me, do you?"

"With a plump belly like that? Just watch me!"
1342211222221112211212212222112122.title: Make him plumper.

choices: They serve you to a customer.
Elijah wants to eat you himself.
13422112222211122112122122222.content:
"The ultimate rule," says Elijah mysteriously. He nods at Justin, who in turn motions for two other waiters to come and help him. Mitch Hewer and Jeremy Sumpter soon come to join him in lifting you out of your seat. This is no easy task, and it takes the combined strength of all three boys to get you up. They keep a firm grip on you.

"The kitchen?" asks Jeremy.

"No, my office," says Elijah. "We'll do the assessment in there." You're not entirely sure what this means, but you hope it has something to do with assessing how much you owe them and drawing up some kind of tab. Maybe you already have a tab with this place. That's a point, actually, if you're such a regular customer, shouldn't you have a tab? You're just about to bring this point up when you find yourself in Elijah's office. You're practically dropped down into a chair in front of his desk. Once again, you're incapable of getting up. Elijah closes the door behind him while the three waiters stand around you, looking rather grim. Elijah gives another nod and the three of them instantly start removing your clothes. You're too bulky to stop them, and you're not even sure if you want to. Being stripped by Jeremy Sumpter, Justin Berfield and Mitch Hewer is something you thought would only happen in your dreams! Oh ...wait a second ...

"It's good quality meat, sir," says Justin all of a sudden. You suddenly realise that they're talking about you. Alarm bells ring.

"Yes," says Elijah slowly. "The questions is, what to do with it?"
13422112222211122112122122222.title: You replace Jamie ...as a meal.

134221122222111221121221222221.content:
Elijah stands there in deep thought for a few moments, rubbing his chin as he looks your body over. Your throat becomes dry from nerves.

"Take it to the kitchen. We'll serve it to a customer. A paying customer." You get the feeling that that last remark was intended as a slight on you. You've got bigger problems though, as Justin, Jeremy and Mitch hoist you roughly out of your seat and drag you through a side door, down a dimly lit corridor and finally into the hot, steamy kitchen. Once your eyes adjust to the bright light and the steam, you see the many wonderful boys being prepared.

There's a large oven, and inside it, sitting curled up on an oven tray is Sam Clark. Across from him is Corbin Bleu sitting naked on a plate while a chef places dollops of whipped cream in strategic places on his body. He must be being served as a dessert. There are so many boys in different stages of preparation, that at first you don't notice the few that are sitting in a lounge area at the other end of the kitchen. This is where you're dragged to, and as you get closer you notice four naked boys relaxing on armchairs and sofas. You recognise them as Robert Pattinson, Jason Dolley, Jake McDorman and Dominic Cooper. You don't get to sit in a nice, comfortable armchair though. You get placed inside a cage that's only just big enough to accomodate you and your enlarged belly. Justin then locks the door of the cage and the three waiters walk away, presumably to carry on their duties. Your cage is right by the lounge area, though the four boys don't seem to have taken much notice of you. They're too busy talking amongst themselves.
134221122222111221121221222221.title: They serve you to a customer.

choices: One of the boys has been ordered.
1342211222221112211212212222211.content:
"Hey! Hey, over here!" The four of them seem to be deliberately ignoring you now, but you're not about to give up. "Hey! I know you can hear me!"

It's Jason who finally caves and acknowledges that you're even there.

"What do you want?"

"For starters ..."

"Starters? No, we're all a main course," says Jake, rubbing his belly.

"What? No, what I mean is for a start, I'd like to know what we're all doing here!"

"Well, we know what we're doing here," says Robert rather stiffly. "We're waiting our turn to be cooked and served. I imagine you're here for the same reason."

"With one major difference," adds Dominic.

"What would that be?" you ask anxiously.

"You probably don't want to be eaten."

"Not that you've got anyone but yourself to blame," says Jason. "If you don't pay for your meal, you become a meal. That's always been the rule for customers."

"Hang on a second ...if the major difference between you guys and me is that I don't want to be eaten ...doesn't that mean that you all do want to?"

"Of course!" exclaims Jake. "Look at us, we're delicious!"

"Then again, looking is all you'll be able to do, isn't it?" says Robert rather haughtily. "Perhaps if you were able to pay, you'd find yourself chowing down on one of us right now, rather than waiting to be chowed down on."

"Who have you got in there, anyway?" asks Dominic.

"What?" You realise that he's talking about your nicely rounded belly. "Oh ...that's Jamie Bell. He was my waiter." The four boys merely nod, clearly understanding something that you do not. Before you can ask them anything else, another waiter approaches your little group. It's Mitch Hewer again.
1342211222221112211212212222211.title: Ask them what's going on.

choices: Robert declares that he's going to eat you.
13422112222211122112122122222111.content:
"Jake, you're up!" says Mitch, gesturing to the kitchen area behind him. Jake McDorman grins and rises from his seat. Despite your dire situation, you can't help but notice how wonderfully delicious he looks. Jake waves goodbye to his fellow meals (yourself included) and follows Mitch over to the kitchen, where it looks like he's going to be grilled before being served to a very lucky customer. You quickly turn your attention back to the matter at hand.

"Look, I didn't mean to avoid paying for my meal ...I just didn't know the Waiter Deal was that expensive!" you insist.

"That's a lie if I ever heard one," says Robert rather bluntly. "You're a regular here. You know as well as anyone how much one of our waiters costs." Having decided that Robert is definitely not going to help you, you try and win the sympathy of the other two.

"Jason ...Dominic ...help me out here! I can pay for Jamie ..." You rub your bloated belly. "I just don't have the money on me! Help me get out of here, then I'll come back with the money. You have my word as a loyal and regular customer!"

Jason and Dominic look at each other uncertainly, whereas Robert is looking intently at you. You can't read their intentions exactly, which in Robert's case is proving to be quite unnerving.
13422112222211122112122122222111.title: Off goes Jake.

choices: All three of you get caught.
134221122222111221121221222221111.content:
Jake and Dominic take one last look at each before simultaneously rising from their seats and crossing over to your cage. Jason stands guard, trying to shield what Dominic is trying to do from the view of those in the kitchen. Dominic is, of course, kneeling in front of the cage door and doing his best to get you out. You can't see what Robert's doing, and this makes you all the more nervous. Finally the cage door is flung open, Dominic having successfully unlocked it. Jason joins him in helping you out of the cage. You're still quite hefty so they support you as you stand. Now that you're out, you can see very clearly what Robert is doing. He's still sat down, but he's wearing the most smug expression you've ever seen. He takes a deep breath, then bellows as loud as he can.

"The cheapskate is escaping!" There's a clatter of dropped utensils as the kitchen staff look over in horror at what's going on. Looking to your left, you see a door marked 'exit'. It's the only hope you have of escaping your fate as an appetiser.

"Run!" you shout to James and Dominic, who don't have to be told twice. Seeing as they're considerably slimmer than you are at the moment, they dash forward and reach the exit in no time. They push the door open and then wait for you, shouting their encouragement to you. You can hear the kitchen staff behind you. You try to run faster but your enormous belly is slowing you down. There's still a slim chance that you might make it. The exit is getting closer!
134221122222111221121221222221111.title: Jake and Dominic release you.

choices: He gets to eat all three of you.
You're forced to eat Dominic and Jason, then served to a customer.
1342211222221112211212212222211112.content:
From out of nowhere, two waiters have grabbed Dominic and Jason, while a third slams the door shut, cutting off your escape. Two more waiters grab you from behind, pulling your arms behind your back and holding you in place. You're in no condition to resist, what with that bulging belly and being so exhausted from trying to run. You therefore submit as you're dragged back towards the lounge area along with Jake and Dominic. Robert's now standing, looking as smug as ever, but now he's got company. Elijah Wood, the manager, is standing with his arms folded and wearing a look on his face that could kill at fifty paces.

"I can see that you can't be left alone for a second," growls Elijah. "Trying to get out of paying the bill is one thing, but you've corrupted two of my best boys! I'm ashamed of all of you, and frankly I really don't know what to do with you. This has never happened before."

Robert steps forward as he obviously has a suggestion. He would, wouldn't he?
1342211222221112211212212222211112.title: All three of you get caught.

13422112222211122112122122222111121.content:
"Why not let me eat all three of them?" he suggests perfectly casually. Elijah's head spins round to look at him.

"Go on ..." he says slowly.

"Let me have them all, and once I'm finished with them I'll be amazingly plump. Some of the customers out there would pay thousands to eat me in that condition. Besides, no customer is going to want to eat a boy that keeps trying to escape.
