Feed them to me and the only place they'll be going is into the stomach of the highest bidding customer, along with me."

Elijah considers this for a moment, then gives the plan his consent. He then leaves for the main dining area, probably to announce that a thoroughly fattened Robert Pattinson will soon be available and that he's now taking bids. Still being held in place by the waiters, Robert licks his lips as he looks your body up and down. He then looks Dominic and Jason over. Obviously he's deciding who to start with.
13422112222211122112122122222111121.title: He gets to eat all three of you.

13422112222211122112122122222112.content:
Mitch walks straight past the boys and stops at your cage. He then picks it up by a handle at the top. Just like Jamie when you ate him, you're now pretty much weightless. It doesn't make sense, but that's the nature of dreams. You start to get a little anxious when you see the boys exchanging smug and knowing looks with each other.

"Where are you taking me?" you demand. Mitch starts carrying you over to one of the kitchen counters. You're jostled about a bit with the movement of the cage.

"You've been ordered," says Mitch very simply.

"Ordered?" you repeat weakly.

"Yep. Once the manager announced that a customer had become available on the menu, people started offering a great deal of money for the chance to eat you."

"Who bought me?" you ask as Mitch lifts up your cage and then places it on the counter.

"I'm afraid I don't know, but you'll soon find out." Mitch then turns and heads back out of the kitchen, returning to his duties. You suddenly hear the cage being opened and feel someone dragging you out. You find yourself being held by Tom Felton, dressed as a chef. You feel the need to resist, but your body is feeling too sluggish to do anything.

"Remember me?" asks Tom. You merely nod meekly. "I shall be preparing you this evening. I plan to make a very tasty dish out of you." Unable to stop him, you watch as Tom caresses your fattened belly, obviously contemplating what he's going to do with you.
13422112222211122112122122222112.title: You've been ordered!

choices: He wants to prepare you first.
134221122222111221121221222222.content:
There's a knock on the door. Elijah calls for whoever it is to come in, and the door is opened to reveal Devon Werkheiser.

"Excuse me, sir, but one of Jeremy's customers has decided to have the Waiter Deal and ...unlike some ...he can afford to pay." You ignore that little dig at you, because right now you're busy concentrating on what they're going to do with you.

"Thank you, Devon. Off you go then, Jeremy. Be as ...sumptuous ...as you can."

Jeremy Sumpter groans as he heads for the door. "You've been waiting a long time to use that joke, haven't you, Elijah?" Shaking his head, Jeremy follows Devon out the door.

"You two can go as well. There are ...paying customers to serve. I'll handle this myself." Justin and Mitch silently head out the door, leaving you alone with Elijah. He slowly walks round the table until he's standing right at your side. He looks down at your enormous belly. He reaches down and begins stroking it. You're not entirely sure how you feel about this.

"Um ...excuse me?"

"Hmm? Oh, I do beg your pardon. Here ..." Elijah takes off his jacket and lifts up his shirt to reveal his own, much smaller belly. "Care to have a feel? I've felt yours, after all."

Confused beyond belief but not about to pass up an opportunity to grope such an attractive tummy, you do as he suggests. He's got that little bit of belly fat on him, and you're enjoying massaging it with your fingers.

"You like it?" he asks.

"Oh yes," you breathe.

"Good, because you're going to be inside it fairly soon. I've decided not to waste you on a customer. I'm going to eat you myself."
134221122222111221121221222222.title: Elijah wants to eat you himself.

1342211222221112211212212222221.content:
You're too stunned to say anything as Elijah reaches down and strokes your belly again.

"I'd say you're plump enough as you are." He then bends over and gives your tummy a few licks. You're still too shocked to object or do anything about it. "And you taste delicious, so no need to fatten you up any further or waste time preparing you. You'll be excellent raw."

He then takes a step back and removes his own shirt, followed by his trousers. He doesn't wish to have them ruined when he swallows you whole, seeing as you're so fat at the moment. Flexing and stretching a little, he prepares to pick you up.

"But ...but you can't do this!" you exclaim, finally finding your voice.

"You'll find I can. Any customer who fails to pay for goods and services provided may be processed as a meal subject to the discretion of the manager, the manager being me, the customer and meal being ...you." He's standing right in front of you now, in his boxers and caressing your flesh once again. Under any other circumstances, you'd be very excited. His hands find their way to your waist, and he slowly hoists you up out of the chair. Just like Jamie, you suddenly find that you're weightless. Hardly fair, as you were very heavy a little while ago when you tried to escape, but now that Elijah's going to eat you all up, you're light as a feather. This has the potential to turn into a nightmare!
1342211222221112211212212222221.title: He eats you whole now.

13422112222211122112122122222212.content:
Elijah has now lifted you above his head and turned you over so that you're facing downwards. It looks like he's going to eat you head first. Your Jamie-filled belly jiggles slightly as he positions you right above his mouth. You look down in horror as he licks his lips.

"Any last requests?" he asks.

"Well, now that you mention it ..."

"Apart from 'don't eat me'," interrupts Elijah.

"Oh ...in that case ...no, not really ...no. Just get on with it." You're resigned to the fact that you're Elijah's meal, but that doesn't mean you relish it. His mouth opens wide beneath your head, and you flinch as he lowers you inside. You're surrounded by darkness as his lips close on your neck, his tongue caressing your face. You then feel him begin to swallow. You can literally feel his throat muscles contract, pulling you further in. It's not long before your shoulders and chest are in, and Elijah begins devouring your magnificently plump belly. This is where you're convinced Elijah will fail in his attempt to eat you. There's no way he can fit your tummy into his mouth. Right now your head is just about to enter his stomach, but it's not too late for him to cough you up, which he should do any second now.

Alas, the nightmare continues as Elijah's jaw stretches to accomodate your belly. It seems there's no stopping him. He is going to eat you. You can hear his groans of pleasure as he tastes that soft and round flesh. Once your belly has been eaten, he slurps your legs down in one go, propelling your entire body towards his stomach at a speed you hadn't anticipated. You're forced to curl up, your arms hugging your enormous belly. One of the first thoughts that hits you is the irony of having Jamie Bell curled up in your stomach, while you in turn are curled up inside Elijah Wood's stomach. You strain to hear Elijah's voice as he starts to talk.

"Aaaahh ...delicious. It's a shame that we don't get more customers that are unable to pay."

"You have plenty of staff that you can eat whenever you want. Myself included," says a voice that you recognise as being Devon Werkheiser's. He must have been in the office, watching you being eaten. "In fact ...I was ...sort of ..."

"Sort of what?" asks Elijah as he strokes his enlarged belly. You can feel him doing so.

"Sort of hoping you'd eat me tonight," finished Devon. Elijah chuckles, making his whole belly shake.

"Maybe some day, Devon. Tell you what, if none of the customers decide to eat you next Tuesday, you'll find yourself in my stomach very soon after closing time."

Their voices fade away, replaced by the sound of stomach acids beginning to pool around you. It looks as if the most nutritious parts of you are going to be with Elijah forever. What's left ...well, what's left gets flushed. You close your eyes and try not to think of it as you black out ...
13422112222211122112122122222212.title: Elijah eats you.

choices: You want to release the boys.
134221122222111221121221222222121.content:
You wake up in a cold sweat, and find that you're curled up under the covers, just like the positon Elijah forced you into in the dream. After some considerable struggle, you find your way out of the covers and manage to tumble out of bed.

The dream is still fresh in your mind ...the sight of Elijah's open mouth beneath you, being lowered inside slowly, the cramped wet confines of his stomach. You shudder to recall it. Who knows when you'll be able to sleep again?

It does get you wondering; is it right for you to subject others to what you just experienced? You hated being eaten, but at least you got to wake up afterwards and find yourself whole and undigested. Those boys in your box won't be so lucky. You're overcome with feelings of sympathy for them.

Or are you? After giving it some more thought, you start to feel angry. Irrationally angry, such as most anger is. You're angry with Elijah for eating you. How dare he! So what if it was a dream, it felt real enough! Maybe you should scoop Elijah out of that box and take your revenge!

Two conflicting emotions ...such ambivalence! What do you want to do?
134221122222111221121221222222121.title: And wake up!

1342211222221112211212212222221211.content:
Being eaten in that dream affected you more than you thought. Before you know it, you're dressed and out the door, carrying the boy box in your arms. After a lengthy walk into town, you come to the local police station. You secure the lid and leave it outside the main door, walking briskly away before anyone notices you.

It's only a day later when the police knock on your door. It seems they caught you on camera leaving the box at their front door, and once they found out what was inside, the boys described you to them. Once you're at the station, your finger prints are found all over the box. You insist that you got sent the box by accident and that you took it to the police as soon as you found out what was in there. When the police ask where Tom Felton and the Phelp's twins are, you lawyer up.

The trial ...well, it doesn't go well for you. Several of the boys from the box appear as witnesses (special microphones are set up so that their tiny little voices can be heard). Your lawyer ...he sucks at his job. The prosecution tears you to pieces on the stand, and you're charged with kidnapping and manslaughter. The only reason you didn't get murder was because they had difficulty proving that swallowing someone whole technically counts as murder ...they had a hard enough time proving it was possible.

All in all, deciding to free the boys didn't turn out all that great. Oh well, you'll have several years inside to think about it. At least it's not inside anyone's stomach ...
1342211222221112211212212222221211.title: Do the right thing and get screwed for it.

134221122222111221122.content: His footsteps seem to going on forever! You're not even sure if he's friend or foe. You just hope you carry on dreaming long enough to find out who it is!
134221122222111221122.title: No, it's someone else ...

1342211222221112211221.content: The mist is clearing, you begin to make out who the figure is. Whoever it is, you can see that they're fully sized and naked. Finally, you can see a face ...
1342211222221112211221.title: Zac Efron or Daniel Radcliffe?

13422112222211122112211.content:
And that face is the wonderfully handsome Zac Efron, though it's hardly his face that's catching your eye. He stands before you, buck naked and looking particularly spry for some reason. He tilts his head at you and smiles flirtatiously.

"Do you know where you are?" he asks. You take a look around you and see that you're in a vast, open field. There's not a tree, a bush or a fence in sight. Just beautiful green grass as far as the eye can see. Above you, a clear blue sky. The view really is awe inspiring, but you only have eyes for Zac and his scrumptious body.

"Would you like to eat me?" asks Zac.

"Very much, thank you," you reply, licking your lips.

"Then I'll let you ...but first, you have to catch me!" He turns on his heel and begins running across the grass. It takes a few seconds for you to take in what he said. Suddenly, a large butterfly net appears in your hands. It looks big enough to trap him in, if you can get close enough to use it.

You begin chasing after him, which is proving to be harder than expected as he not only had a good head start, he is also in very good shape. Such fitness would make him a fantastic meal, but you've got to catch him first.

He zigs and zags as he runs, but no matter how far the two of you run, you can't see any landmarks. Just the huge field that seems to go on forever. Finally you begin to gain on Zac. Closing in on him, you bring the large butterfly net up above your head and then down ...
13422112222211122112211.title: It's Zac.

choices: Drop the net and try to tackle him.
134221122222111221122112.content:
Ad you miss. Completely and utterly. Zac is quick, you'll give him that. You lift the net back up again and carry on the chase. Zac is laughing his head off at your failed attempt to catch him.

You chase after him for what feels like miles. The oversized net feels heavier and heavier with each step you take, and Zac seems to be getting further and further away. All that tasty, toned meat ...and it's running away.
134221122222111221122112.title: You missed!

1342211222221112211221121.content:
You're not about to give up. You have too much to lose, namely the chance to munch down on a naked, fully sized Zac Efron. You carry on running, getting faster and faster, closing the distance between you and Zac. Finally he's a few mere feet away. You bring the net up, keep running so as not to lose that closeness ...and you bring the net down ...right onto Zac.

Surprised by the fact that you've caught him, Zac stops right in his tracks, his arms pinned to his sides by the net. You catch your breath for a moment, holding on to the handle of the net so that he doesn't escape. Once you're feeling better, you manhandle Zac so that he's facing you, still trapped in the net.

"Well done! You caught me!" he exclaims.

"So now ...I get to eat you?"

"Of course! I'm yours to devour as you please! I was hoping you'd catch me sooner rather than later. Well, what are you waiting for? Eat me!"

You slowly remove the net, convinced that he won't run away again. He's too eager to be eaten now that he's been caught. The question is, do you eat him straight away or ...have some fun with him first? Dreams like this don't come along every night.
1342211222221112211221121.title: Keep going.

choices: You wake up before you see who it is.
13422112222211122112212.content:
Daniel Radcliffe now stands before you in his birthday suit. The mist has cleared, and you can see the surrounding area more clearly. You're standing in a vast, light blue void ...in the distance you can hear what sounds like exotic bird calls. Not that these things matter to you right now. You're having a dream where Daniel Radcliffe shows up naked. That's the one detail that matters.

Despite the fact that he's fully sized and therefore impossible to swallow, you find yourself licking your lips as you take in his naked form.

"So, what brings you here?" you ask him.

"I'm here to be eaten," he replies, smiling pleasantly.

"Sounds good to me. Is it possible for me to eat you like you are? What with this being a dream and everything ..."

"I'm not here to be eaten by you!" laughs Daniel. I'm here to be eaten by him." He nods towards someone standing behind you, causing you to turn sharply to find out who it is.
13422112222211122112212.title: Daniel in your dreams.

134221122222111221122121.content:
You turn to find Rupert Grint standing behind you, in a state of undress similar to Daniel ...only that Rupert still has his boxers on. He gives you a friendly smile.

"Excuse me, you're standing between me and my snack."

"Oh, of course. Sorry." You stand aside to let Rupert past, who walks straight up to Daniel. The two of them seem deliriously happy to see one another. Daniel takes his eyes off of Rupert for a second to address you.

"To answer your question, yes it is possible for me to be eaten as I am. No shrinking involved, just good tasty me and plenty to go around," says Daniel, who quickly returns his eager gaze back to Rupert.

"Not that I'm about to share," says Rupert. "He's all mine, but you can have me when I'm done."

"What ...what do you mean?" you ask. Neither of them are listening anymore, as Daniel has suddenly decided to lie down on the floor with his legs in the air. Rupert is kneeling down just in front of Daniel.

"Time for lunch!" says Daniel. With that, Rupert takes hold of Daniel's feet and crams them into his mouth. They fit in perfectly, and you watch in amazement as Rupert starts swallowing, pulling Daniel further and further into him. His legs quickly disappear, then when Rupert is up to Daniel's hips, he suddenly stands up, lifting what's left of Daniel high into the air. Gravity does most of the work now as Daniel continues to slide down into Rupert's waiting stomach. He gives you a cheery little wave before putting his arms by his sides in order to be eaten with greater ease. He's still smiling as Rupert's lips caress his belly and chest, and even when it's only his head that remains, he still has a great big grin on his face. That grin is the last thing of Daniel you see as Rupert makes one final swallow and closes his mouth.

You were so pre-occupied with watching Daniel being eaten that you failed to notice the effect it was having on Rupert. He stands there, still naked apart from his boxers, except now his belly is bulging outwards. For a few seconds you could have sworn you saw that enormous belly squirm, but it soon stops again. Rupert smiles and rubs his tummy lovingly.

"He's just getting comfortable. He deserves to, of course, seeing as he was so delicious. Now then, you'd better hurry up and eat me before I digest him."

"But ...but ...your stomach ...it's so big ...I'll never ..."

"You'll be able to swallow me as easily as I swallowed Daniel." He gives his tummy another rub as he walks towards you. "Now kindly eat me while I'm still so very, very plump."
134221122222111221122121.title: It's Rupert ... and he's hungry.

1342211222221112211221211.content:
You soon find yourself with a bulgingly plump Rupert Grint standing right in front of you. You stroke his large belly with both hands and feel Daniel wriggle inside. Rupert smiles.

"He likes that, but we'd both prefer to be inside you. Eat me. Eat us. We're so tasty ..."

Caught up in a sudden rush of excitement, you grab hold of Rupert's waist. Surprisingly, you're able to pick him up easily. You've already managed to lift him a couple of feet off the floor. It's as if he's weightless! Yet, that wonderfully fat belly of his tells you that he can't be!

"Are you going to eat me, or do I have to jump down your throat?" aks Rupert, getting a little impatient.

"No ...no, of course I'm going to eat you."

"Then hurry up. I want to be inside you!"

If the fact that you are holding this hefty boy up as though he weighed nothing wasn't enough to convince you this is a dream, the things he's been saying certainly are. No boy you've ever enslaved in the real world would talk in this ...rather exciting fashion. Wasting no more time, you raise Rupert up above your head. Looking up you can see his massive, Daniel Radcliffe-filled belly, and the thought that you're soon going to eat it is overwhelming. With some help from Rupert, you lower his feet into your mouth, which is now stretching to fit round his feet. Your throat is also expanding to accomodate the passage of his feet and legs down said throat and into your stomach.

"Ooohh yes ...I hope you're enjoying me!" says Rupert. You're in no position to answer, what with your mouth being so full, but the part you're going to enjoy most is coming up now. With his legs fully consumed, you're now at the very base of Rupert's belly. Your mouth expands even further to accomodate it, and you ever so slowly begin working your way up. The plumpness of the meat would make it special enough, but as his tummy finds it's way deeper into you, you can feel Daniel squirming with excitement inside. The subsequnt effect to your taste buds is amazing. After a few more good gulps, you've eaten his belly and are making your way up his chest. Now that's he's full sized, you can really appreciate the individual taste of those perky nipples of his. After eating his belly, his broad shoulders certainly aren't a problem. Finally only his head remains. Out of the bottom of your eye, you're able to see him smiling broadly.

"Did you enjoy me?" he asks. You gurgle a response that is as close to a 'Yes' as you can manage.

"Then it was all worth it. Bon appetit!" calls Rupert as he disappears into your jaws and down into your stomach, curling up like Daniel must have done inside Rupert. You look down at your own stomach and are delighted to see a decent bulge. The best thing about it all is that you now have Rupert in your belly, who in turn has Daniel in his. You stroke your enlarged tummy and shiver with delight as you feel them both wriggle in response.

Rupert really was delicious. If only you could swallow him like that in real life ...or at least fatten him up by feeding him another boy. Your subconscious leaves you with one parting thought ...the machine!
1342211222221112211221211.title: Eat him!

13422112222211122112212111.content:
You wake up and sit bolt upright, sweaty and bleary eyed. Your grogginess soon wears off, and you're left with partial recollections of the dream you had. More details come back to you as you try to concentrate. Popping on a dressing gown, you retrieve the box from the shelf and open it. You find that the boys managed to get some sleep in what must be very close quarters. Some are still sleeping right on top of each other, as a matter of fact.

"Where are Daniel Radcliffe and Rupert Grint?" you demand as forcefully as you can at this early hour. Everyone who was sleeping in the box soon wake up and scramble to get out of the way. In all the confusion, Daniel and Rupert find themselves standing together in the middle of the box and in plain sight. They tremble as they look up into your tired, unreadable face.

"What do you want with us?" asks Rupert.

"I think that's obvious! We're breakfast!" exclaims Daniel, his voice dripping with despair.

"I may decide that that's the case. It depends ..." All you really wanted to do was check if they're still in the box. As dreams do, it made you temporarily believe that you may possibly have actually eaten them. Leaving them with your mysterious words, you close the lid and start carrying the box downstairs.
13422112222211122112212111.title: Time to start thinking about breakfast ...

134221122222111221122121112.content:
You put the box down in it's usual place and begin making preparations for breakfast. You're not entirely sure what you're in the mood for yet, though naturally it will involve one or more of the scrumptious inmates held prisoner in your box. Perhaps some inspiration will strike once you've decided who to have.

You could make good on your threat to have Daniel and Rupert for breakfast. Those two have been on your mind ever since you woke up, so perhaps you'd prefer them in your stomach. The details of the dream are coming back to you clearer than before now, including the idea of the machine you ordered, which should be delivered any minute. It might be worth saving Rupert and Daniel for later. A rumbling in your tummy tells you that you need to hurry this decision up a little.

So, what's it to be? Daniel and Rupert or some other unlucky pair?
134221122222111221122121112.title: You start making breakfast.

1342211222221112211221211121.content:
Despite the feeling that you should save Dan and Rupert for when the machine arrives, you've got the idea of their great taste stuck in your head. The only way to get them out of your head is to get them into your stomach. You quickly fish them out of the box and begin stripping them. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day, so important that you don't want to waste any more time getting it ready.

"I knew it!" yells Daniel as you pull his trousers and boxers off. "You're going to eat us for breakfast! I just knew it!"

"Indeed I am. Now kindly button it," you order as you finish stripping Daniel and move on to Rupert. "I am very hungry and would prefer a nice, quiet breakast."

Rupert merely gulps nervously as you remove the last items of clothing from his muscular form. Now that they're both naked, it's time to consider how exactly you're going to have them.

There's always toast, that is toast a slice of bread and have the boys on the toast. You'd have to put plenty of jam/jelly on it to stop them getting away. There's the quicker option of cereal. Simply pour some in a bowl, add milk and two scrumptious boys and you're ready to go.
1342211222221112211221211121.title: Daniel and Rupert.

13422112222211122112212111211.content: Then again, why do you even need toast? Make Dan and Rupert the toast and just spread the butter, jam, or syrup straight onto them!
13422112222211122112212111211.title: Toast

1342211222221112211221211122.content:
You decide that you're not in the mood for Dan or Rupert, and besides you may have some plans for them later. You still figure that two boys together will make a decent breakfast, so it's time to start thinking about who to have.

Rather than choose them both at the same time, you decide to pick one first and then choose another. So, who is going to be the first on your breakfast plate ...or bowl ...you haven't quite decided what to have with them yet.
1342211222221112211221211122.title: Two other boys.

1342211222221112211222.content: Suddenly the mist begins to swirl like a minature tornado around you, and the sound of the approaching footsteps fades away. The thick mist swirls faster and faster. You're sure that you're going to be swept away by it, but it soon dies down. As it settles down, you can see a figure standing right in front of you.
1342211222221112211222.title: Nope, it's definitely not them.

13422112222211122112222.content: Who is it standing in front of you? The future incarnation of the Doctor, Matt Smith ...or everyone's favourite know it all, Frankie Muniz?
13422112222211122112222.title: Matt Smith or Frankie Muniz

134221122222111221122221.content:
The mist finally dissipates and you find yourself face to face with Matt Smith. For some reason that you cannot fathom you expected to see him wearing a suit and a brown trenchcoat. Instead he's dressed as a butler and has the austere facial expression to match.

"There you are, your honour. Would you care to come with me and select the meat for tonight's banquet?" he asks, his accent flawless.

It takes a few moments for you to realise that he's talking to you. You soon figure out why you're being addressed with such reverence. You're wearing the finest clothes imaginable and you're standing in the grandest corridor you've ever stood in. You hazard a guess that you're some kind of aristocrat, that this is your house, and that Matt is your man servant.

"Tonight's banquet? Um ...yes ...yes, why not? Lead the way." Matt inclines his head slightly then turns smartly on his heel, walking down the corridor at an elegant pace. You follow closely behind, taking the opportunity to look at your surroundings. The corridor you're walking along has many fine paintings on the walls ...all of them of naked young men involved in various stages of being prepared or cooked.

"Um ...Smith, isn't it?" you ask.

"Indeed, your honour," says Matt flatly, still walking.

"Indulge me for a moment ...who are the boys in these portraits?"

"Very well, your honour. They are all portraits of your previous butlers." He indicates the nearest one as you approach it. "That, for example, was Rupert Grint. You had him roasted on a spit seven months ago. After him came William Moseley." He indicates the next portrait of William, curled up on a large plate. "You saw fit to have him for Christmas dinner. He was followed by Tom Felton and Dominic Cooper. You had them both raw."

As you approach a double doorway at the end of the corridor, you notice a rather large and empty space on the wall. You ask Matt what goes there.

"That is where my portrait will hang when you ultimately decide to eat me, your honour. If I could bring your attention back to the present, however, there is an important banquet tonight and you usually insist on selecting the meat courses personally." He opens both the double doors and then stands aside, waiting for you to go in. It's fairly dark inside, which causes you to hesitate for a moment. This being a dream, there could be just about anything in there. You decide to risk it and briskly step through the doors.
134221122222111221122221.title: Matt

1342211222221112211222211.content:
It seems your trepidation was unfounded. You find yourself standing before two long lines of cages. Every occupant has three things in common with his fellow inmates, namely being male, famous and naked. You figure this is your equivalent of a larder, where you store teen celebrities until you're ready to eat them. They don't seem to be living too badly either. Each cage has a comfortable bed, a sink and toilet, a television, various computer games. You may be an aristocrat of Vore, but it seems that you treat your meals well. Some of them even seem happy to see you as you slowly walk down the middle of the cages. Several of them call out to you and indicate their stomachs, telling you how much fatter they've gotten. Your head is still swimming from it all when you hear Matt cough just behind you.

"Ideally, your honour, you should select two boys for tonight's banquet," he whispers. The boys closest to you hear him, however, and double their efforts to get themselves noticed.

"Pick me! I've been eating almost non stop! Look at how plump I am!" exclaims Lucas Grabeel from the cage to your left.

"Forget him, what you want is flavour! Come and taste me!" yells Chris Pine, indicating his impressive torso. Your head is beginning to hurt from all the shouting. You could select Lucas and Chris, the nearest boys and get out of here quickly, or you could put up with it and have a proper look around.
1342211222221112211222211.title: Boys everywhere!

134221122222111221122222.content:
The mist finally clears and you find yourself face to face with Frankie Muniz, who at this particular moment is splendidly naked. You go to reach out your hand to do whatever comes to mind first, but you soon discover that you don't have a hand. No arms either. Come to think of it, you can't feel your legs. You look down at your body and are very surprised at what you find.

When that mist swirled around you earlier, it transformed you into a large snake. You feel your face with the end of your tail and find that you still have a human head and features, but your appetitie and your mentality is extremely snake like.

"Hmmm," you mutter to yourself. "A delicioussss man cub!" Frankie is looking at you very warily.

"What did you just say?" he asks.

"Hm? Oh, nothing. I wasss just mumbling to myself. I don't get much company, and it can get so lonely, not having anyone to talk to ...would you stay and chat with me ...over dinner, perhapsss?"
134221122222111221122222.title: Frankie

1342211222221112211222221.content:
"Sure, I can stay for a while." Frankie sits cross legged on the floor, and you lower your body so that you can talk to him, as well as gaze at his naked and highly edible body. If you can get him to look into your eyes then he's done for. You plan to chat with him a little while, gain his trust, then render him helpess.

"So, what do you want to talk about?" he asks.

"Well, man cub ..."

"My name's Frankie."

"Of course. How sssilly of me. I thought we'd talk first about this meal that we'll soon be sharing." You try to position your head right in front of his so that he'll look into your eyes long enough for you to hypnotise him. At the same time, your tail has begun making its way around behind him. "What are some of your favourite things to eat?"

"I like a good, old fashioned burger now and then."

"Me too, me too! Of course, they have a tendency to go right to your hipssss ..." you hiss as your tail begins winding around Frankie's waist. Frankie looks down at this for a second, not entirely sure of what's going on.

"Hang on a second, you don't have hips ..."

"Kindly look at me when I'm ssspeaking to you, man cub!" His head snaps back up, and you begin the process of hypnotising him. He needs to maintain eye contact for quite a while for it to work though. "What else do you love to eat?"

"Chocolate ...chocolate is good ..." says Frankie, his speech becoming slower as his whole being starts to relax. Pretty soon he won't have the slightest inclination to fight back.

"Oh yessss ...and I bet that goes right to your belly ..." Your coils are now wrapping themselves around his tummy. You can feel his young, plumpish flesh beneath your skin.

"You ...you bet it does ..." Frankie mumbles. He's now almost completely under your influence.

"And would you like to know what I truly enjoy eating?" you ask. Frankie simply makes a noise that generally indicates an affirmative. "You, man cub. I'm going to eat you now."

"Okay ..." he mutters. He's now fully under your spell and he's wrapped up in your coils up to his neck. His eyes are closed and he has a big grin across his face. He is now truly yours, to do with as you please.
1342211222221112211222221.title: He stays.

choices: You wake up from the dream.
13422112222211122112222211.content:
Your snake's stomach growls loudly. You feel the need to feed. It's time to swallow Frankie whole. You shift your coils and little and push him upwards slightly, so that his shoulders and chest are no longer enveloped in your grip. This will allow you to get a better grip on him with another part of your body. You smack your lips again and open your mouth wide. Very wide. You then lower your whole head down onto the top of Frankie's own head.

It is with surprising ease that you fit his entire head in your mouth. It's when you get to his shoulders that you have to do a little more work. You use your coils to push Frankie further upwards, while gently pushing downwards with your head. The flavour of his flesh tingles every inch of your insides as he gets further and further into you. Very soon his chest, arms and belly are all inside you. You spasm with delight as you swallow his groin, followed by his legs. It's with one final swallow that his feet join the rest of him inside your body, and his entire form slowly but surely makes it's way to your middle. Just think, that bulge in you was once sitting right in front of you, whereas now he's lying inside you, awaiting a slow and pleasurable (for you, anyway) digestion. You stroke the bulge with the tip of your tail and curl up a bit to fully enjoy your meal. He moves only slightly now and then, but ultimately by the time the effects of the hypnosis wear off, he'll be in no state to struggle.

"Oh yessss," you hiss to yourself. "A most delicioussss meal." You take a moment to actually look at your surroundings. Perhaps you were too distracted by the walking meat that was Frankie to notice it before, but now you can see that you're in a very exotic location. It's hot and you're surrounded by large trees and strange plants. Forgetting the sights for a moment, you suddenly hear the sound of voices coming from nearby. Male voices.

"Aha! More man cubsss ...which means more ssssnacks!"
13422112222211122112222211.title: Swallow him.

134221122222111221122222111.content:
Following the sound of the voices, you slither off into the undergrowth, eager to find yourself some more food. On and on you go, travelling for so long that Frankie is almost fully digested before you finally stop. You find yourself facing a sudden choice, as it turns out that there are voices coming from two areas. You can hear them coming from the left and the right. Going either way could lead you to another meal, or it could lead to some unknown danger.

Which way do you go?
134221122222111221122222111.title: Go hunting.

1342211222221112211222221111.content:
You decide to go right. You get the feeling that this means going deeper into the heart of the forest, jungle or whatever it is you're in. You therefore keep as quiet as possible as you slither through the undergrowth. You've been travelling for a few minutes when you come across a large clearing. You tentatively poke your head out of a large clump of grass in order to see better.

You find yourself looking at a camp. There are makeshift shelters made from wood and matted leaves, a few hammocks strung up between some of the trees, a few camp fires here and there. Sitting by the closest camp fire, you see two naked boys. Christian Cooke and Sam Clark, no less. Sam is cutting up some strange looking plants and dropping them in a nearby bowl while Christian is trying to get the fire going again. You lie low and listen in on what they're saying.

"Shouldn't Frankie be back by now?" asks Sam in that wonderful Austrailian accent.

"He better be," says Christian irritably. "I don't want this thing going out once I've gotten it going again. I hope he doesn't bring any damp wood like he did last time."

"You don't suppose he'd have gone off to the beach and joined the others?"

"If he has ...damn," mutters Christian as he continues to fail in getting the fire lit again. "If he has, I swear I'm going to cook him over this fire instead of that boar we found."

"You'll find that rather hard," you think to yourself as you remember how delicious Frankie was. They must have sent him to gather firewood, and instead he found you.

"You don't think ...it ...got him, do you?" asks Sam. Christian sighs, puts down the sticks he was using and looks Sam right in the eye.

"Sam, mate, there's no monster out there. It's all in your head. Granted, there are a lot of wild animals on the island, but if there was anything dangerous we would have run into it by now." Considering the matter closed, Christian goes back to lighting the fire.

So, you're on an island. That's good, because it means that these delicious boys have no way of escaping you. Plus, you've learned that there are more out there. Exactly how many more, you'll find out later. Right now, you need to concentrate on making these boys your next meal. You don't feel confident enough to take them both on at once. No doubt they've made themselves some weapons. Your only choice is to wait patiently until one of them leaves the camp, then you'll eat whoever gets left alone. You therefore press your slender body down to the ground and wait.
1342211222221112211222221111.title: You've found the camp!

choices: He refuse to betray his friends.
13422112222211122112222211111.content:
You're not waiting all that long before Christian orders Sam to go find more firewood, and Frankie while he's at it. Luckily for you, Sam heads off towards the opposite side of the camp and disappears into the forest. Now your lean, muscular snack is left all alone. However, rather than go after him, you decide to get him to come to you. You plan to use the fact that you still have your own head to your advantage. You position yourself so that only your head sticks out of the long grass, while making sure your body is ready to pounce and wrap around Christian once he's close enough. You adopt a pained, anguished expression and call out weakly to Christian.

"Help ...help ...help me!" Christian hears you, though it takes him a few seconds to find where your voice is coming from. All he sees is a fellow human, presumably crawling through the grass, in desperate need of help. In desperate need of a snack is more like it. Sure enough, he comes running to your aid. Once he's standing right in front of you, you dart out of the grass and propel your coils round and round him, moving so fast that by the time he even realises what's happened, you've pinned his arms to his sides and his legs together. He's not going anywhere except into your belly.

"Foolisssh man cub! Sssee where your kindnessss got you? On a one way trip into my tummy!" You open your mouth up wide, then pause for a moment. A thought has just struck you. "Are you the leader of thisss band of morsels?" you ask.

"I ...I ...well, I guess so," says Christian. "Please don't eat me!"

"Sssilence, man cub!" you order. "I may have a way that you can avoid being my dinner ...agree to bring me one boy a day for me to eat and I will ssspare you. You have influence, you can get them to come to my cave ...what do you say?"
13422112222211122112222211111.title: Sam leaves.

134221122222111221122222111111.content:
Christian is silent for a while, then he lets out a sigh.

"Okay ...I'll do it ..."

"Sssplendid!" you exclaim. "However, you must think me a fool if you believe I'll trust you entirely ..." You start hypnotising Christian, just enough to implant a powerful suggestion in his mind. He'll be able to function normally, none of the other boys will notice anything strange about him ...until it's too late for them. You order Christian to bring one boy a day to the cave on the other side of the forest. He is to make up some excuse and bring them there himself. Other than that, he will go about his business.

You slowly release him and slink down to the ground, allowing him to return to the campfire. You head back into the forest, making the journey across the island until you come to a large cave. The perfect shelter to wait for your meals to come to you. Perhaps this is a little lazy on your part, but no one's here to argue with how you get your prey. There's no chance that Christian will be able to resist your hypnotic command, seeing as he was already willing to do it in the first place.

Once inside the cave, you find a spot to curl up in while you await Christian to make his first 'delivery'. It will take them a while to get across the island, but you know that he'll start making these little trips today.

So all you have to do is sit and wait ...
134221122222111221122222111111.title: He agrees.

choices: You hear dozens of boys approaching. Not good ...
1342211222221112211222221111111.content:
You haven't waited long at all before Christian returns with today's meal (this is still a dream, and time passes in an entirely different manner). You can hear Christian's voice, and the voice of the boy he's brought to be unwittingly eaten, but you can't quite make out who it is yet. You slink back further into the cave, and hide in the shadows. You keep your eyes on the mouth of the cave, and sure enough, Christian soon appears there, standing just behind Devon Werkeiser.

"This is the one," says Christian. "We'll find them in here."

"And you're sure you're edible?" asks Devon, peering into the darkness of the cave. Obviously Christian has lured Devon here under the pretence of collecting mushrooms or some other edible fungi. Unfortunately for Devon, the only thing around here that's edible is him.

"I'm positive. Let's go." Devon strides into the cave, while Christian only takes a few steps, making sure that he doesn't get too far into the cave. A wise precaution, as you instantly spring from your hiding place and seize Devon while's he still at the mouth of the cave. This way it's not too dark for you to get a good look at your meal, and it's not too dark for him to see what's happening to him. Within seconds you've wrapped your coils around him. It wouldn't have taken that long anyway, seeing as he's so short. As he looks at you in terror, you merely smile.

"I congratulate you on your first choice of ssssacrifice, Christian. Sssmall, but very chunky. Make sssure tomorrow's meal is just as good."

"Of course," says Christian flatly, as he turns on his heel and walks steadily back towards the camp. You're now left alone with Devon.

"What's going on here? Where's Christian going?" asks Devon, his voice small and a little wheezy.

"Your beloved leader has brought you here ssso that I may eat you."

"N-no! He wouldn't do that!"

"He just did. He's ssstrolling back to your camp now, and tomorrow he'll bring sssome other boy to be my meal."

"But ...but why?"

"To save his own ssskin, of course. Oh, I had to do a little hypnotising to make absolutely sure he'd do it, but the deal is that if he brings me one boy a day ...I won't eat him. Now, ssspeaking of hypnotising ..."

You soon have Devon under your spell, and his face adopts the same grin that you saw on Frankie.

"Ssso tell me, man cub ...how do you feel about your current sssituation?"

"Oh ...it's okay ...I'm ...small but ...chunky ..." says Devon. These, of course, are his last words as you open your mouth wide and slowly insert Devon into it. He packs a great deal of flavour for one so small, and his smooth skin feels wonderful as it passes through your lips and into your innards. He is delicious, though of course it doesn't take long to swallow him. You make sure his progress down to your middle is slow, so that you can enjoy him for longer. Eating him was great, but digesting him is going to be even better.

You've now got little to do but wait until Christian brings you your next meal. Once again, you do not notice or experience the passage of time like you would in the waking world. You decide to take a little nap while you digest Devon ...so you're dreaming that you're going to sleep for an hour or two. Complicated stuff.

You soon wake up though, and find that your last meal has been properly digested, and your next meal is due.
1342211222221112211222221111111.title: You hear voices, he's coming!

13422112222211122112222211111111.content:
You can hear two distinct voices. One, of course, is your faithful servant Christian, as for the other ...well, you can't quite recognise the voice yet. Whoever it is, they're here for one purpose and one purpose alone; to be devoured by you.

This time you decide to hide towards the mouth of the cave, just to the left in the shadows. This way you'll be able to surprise your prey much more quickly. It will require superb timing and and precise reactions on your part, but you think you're more than up to the task. The two voices are getting closer and closer. You lick your lips in anticipation. Upon seeing the shadow of your victim appear, you get ready to pounce. After just a couple more steps, the poor boy is close enough. It's time!

You slither out from your hiding place and launch yourself around his body, going round and round, further and further up his naked form. Now that's he well and truly trapped, you finally get a good look at who your next meal is.
13422112222211122112222211111111.title: You hear two boys approaching.

choices: See who your next meal is.
134221122222111221122222111111111.content:
You've got your coils wrapped round the slender and toned Taylor Lautner! Another fine choice on Christian's part. Not wishing to waste any time chatting to your slave, you merely gesture for him to leave with the tip of your tail. His face devoid of expression, he turns and heads back towards the camp.

Taylor was caught off guard, but now he's struggling very violently in an effort to get free. He's fairly strong, so you have to tighten your grip to stop him. He gasps as his whole body is squeezed, constricting his airways and sapping him of his strength.

"I'm far ssstronger than you are, my tasssty friend. Your sssstruggles are uselesss!" you hiss directly into his ear. You give him one last squeeze, just to make sure he's in no condition to fight back, then you open your mouth wide, ready to devour him. You feel joy when you see the terrified look in his eyes as he's brought closer and closer to your gaping jaw. His last words barely even constitute a wheeze as his head is consumed. You expertly retract your coils just enough to support his body while you continue to swallow him. Despite being roughed up a bit, every inch of his body tastes delicious. You take a moment to run your tongue along his behind, savouring those curved, toned cheeks. It feels intensely satisfying to finish him off, closing your mouth over those feet as they join the rest of him inside your body.

First Frankie, then Devon, and now Taylor! This is turning out to be an amazing dream!
134221122222111221122222111111111.title: Taylor Lautner!

choices: Send Christian to smooth things over.
Eat Christian and hide in the forest.
134221122222111221122222111111112.content:
Your next meal ...is the person who was supposed to be bringing you a meal in the first place! In your haste you pounced on and trapped your servant. Looking behind Christian, you see Taylor Lautner ...or rather the back of him as he runs away, yelling at the top of his lungs. He's going too fast for you to catch him, especially as you're currently wrapped around Christian. Before long he'll have got back to the camp and warned them all about you. Your brilliant arrangement has been spoiled by one mistake.

"Don't you want to eat Taylor, master?" asks Christian.

"Ssshut up!" you hiss. "Let me think ..." You could send Christian back, get him to convince the others that he escaped and killed you, leaving you free to prey on them. That's assuming they believe him. If they're smart they'll demand to see your dead body as proof. As a plan, it comes with plenty of opportunities to go badly wrong. Then again, it may be your only opportunity to fix things.

Of course, you could just go into hiding in the forest. Stay out of their way until you feel hungry, then you can pick them off one at a time. Such a course of action would mean that you don't need Christian anymore ...so maybe you can put him to one final use. A little snack before you go on the run ...
134221122222111221122222111111112.title: Oops ...you attacked Christian by mistake!

1342211222221112211222221111111122.content:
You decide to make a run for it, but such a course of action will require a great deal of exertion on your part. A quick snack is definitely called for.

"Hold still, Christian," you order.

"Why?" asks Christian. He's still in a semi-hypnotised state. He's aware of what's going on, but his reactions are being heavily influenced by what you did to him earlier.

"Taylor will have alerted the other boys to the danger. So, before I go into hiding, I require a quick meal."

"Am I that meal?" asks Christian, looking somewhat blank. You merely lick your lips in reponse and shift your hold on Christian so that you can eat him with greater ease. "I just hope I'm tasty enough for you," says Christian just before you engulf his head. He has an acceptable taste, but the important thing is that he's muscular and athletic enough to provide you with the energy and strength you'll need to evade the other boys. Before long you've swallowed his entire torso. He doesn't struggle one little bit. Aware of how quickly you need to get out of here, you make fast work of his long, tender legs. Now that you have a full stomach, you make your way into the jungle, dragging your body along the floor with great ease, despite the hefty bulge in you that was Christian Cooke.

You find yourself on the far side of the island, a fair distance from both the cave and the camp. If the boys do find you here, it won't be for a while. You can feel Christian being slowly digested, releasing more energy into your body. Looking back at what happened, you can't help but curse your own carelessness. If you'd only waited a few more seconds, you'd have pounced on Taylor instead, devoured him, and then be free to sit back and wait for your next meal to be brought to you. Instead, you're now being hunted by every boy on the island.

Your thoughts are interrupted by the sound of voices coming from afar. You must have been sat here mulling things over longer than you thought. There's at least two seperate voices coming your way. You have only a few seconds to decide what to do. A real fight or flight situation. You can ambush these tender young morsels, or you can make a run for it. Maybe try and find a boy hunting alone.

They're getting closer!
1342211222221112211222221111111122.title: Eat Christian and hide in the forest.

13422112222211122112222211111112.content:
That certainly doesn't sound like Christian approaching with just one succulent guy in tow ...that sounds distinctly like an angry mob!

You poke your head out of the cave and are generally not surprised to see exactly what you expected to see. An angry mob. An angry mob weilding flaming torches, spears, sharp pointy stones for throwing. Christian must have somehow broken your hypnosis and told them about you, now they're coming to do unspeakably violent things to you!

You've got two choices. Stay and hope that you wake up from this wonderful dream turned nightmare in time, or run for it!
13422112222211122112222211111112.title: That looks very much like an angry mob ...

13422112222211122112222211112.content:
You're waiting a good half an hour before either of them so much as gets up. It's Christian who finally throws down his sticks and gets up.

"There! The damn thing's finally going. You do what you can with it while I go get some more firewood. While I'm out there I'll even think about finding out where that twit Muniz went." As Christian strides off towards the jungle, Sam puts down his work and begins fanning the fire and blowing it gently. Christian is soon out of earshot, and Sam is knelt down at the fire, with his back to you. Such an opportunity! Wasting no time, you slither out of the bushes and make your way across the camp to where your meal is waiting, completely unaware of his impending doom. You slide right up behind him, ready to throw your coils round him. Once you've done that, you'll silence any shouts by shoving him head first into your mouth.

His back and backside both look so tasty. You wish you had more time to play with your meal, but you have to eat him quickly before the others come back. You position yourself, ready to strike ...
13422112222211122112222211112.title: Sneak up on Sam.

choices: Hide in one of the shelters.
134221122222111221122222111122.content:
You launch yourself forward, catapulting your coils round and round Sam's crouched form. He lets out a cry of shock, but it is quickly silenced when you begin squeezing him. His cry is replaced with a series of stranged gasps, as you now have his entire body in your grip. The way he was crouched means that his arms and legs are pinned up against him in a way that is causing him a great deal of discomfort. Of course, it'll all be over soon.

"Why hello there Ssssam," you hiss right into his ear. "It is I, the monster that you sssso rightly fear. Not to worry ...now you need never fear anything ever again. Goodbye, Ssssam!"

You give Sam one last squeeze, just to make sure all the fight is gone from him. Then, wasting no more time lest Christian should return, you open your mouth wide and quickly bring it down on Sam's head. As you pull him in, you loosen your coils and find that he's too winded to fight back. He's still alive, of course. You prefer your prey that way.

You're now down to his muscular chest. He has a gamey flavour, but he tastes good none the less. You soon swallow the rest of his torso, including that delicious belly button of his. Raising yourself up, you make short work of the rest of him, his legs and feet quickly disappearing inside you. To the outside world he's now nothing but a bulky shape inside your lengthy body. He tasted wonderful, but you have no time to sit around and enjoy his digestion at your lesiure. Christian could be back at any moment, not to mention these other boys they were talking about. Right now you're sat in the middle of their camp in plain view. You need to find somewhere to hide for the moment so that you can plan your next move.
134221122222111221122222111122.title: Sam Clark the snack!

1342211222221112211222221111221.content:
You decide to head back into the forest. It will provide more cover and give you time to digest your latest meal, as well as keep an eye out for your next one. As you slither off back into the dense undergrowth, you consider how amazing this dream has been so far. You've swallowed two fully grown boys whole and you're still thinking about who to eat next. Plus, you've got a whole island full of sexy, meaty, naked boys to choose from. Sure, you've got to work a little harder for each meal than you would have to in the waking world, but when was the last time you were able to swallow a full grown boy in the 'real world'?

Your thoughts are interrupted by the sudden appearance of Christian Cooke up ahead. You keep low to the ground, fairly certain that he hasn't seen you yet. He's picking up wood for the fire, coming closer and closer to you. If you move, he'll see you for sure. You've got two options, wait until he gets close enough and then attack him, or make your presence known to him, try and win his trust, then eat every delicious little bit of him. Sam was fairly helpless when you ate him, but you think of how good it felt to have such power over Frankie just before you swallowed him. Perhaps you can do the same with Christian.

He's getting closer. Time to make a decision!
1342211222221112211222221111221.title: Return to the forest.

13422112222211122112222211112212.content:
Christian is now but a few feet away. You decide to speak to him and lure him into a false sense of security.

"Why, hello there!" you say as softly and gently as you can. You see come to a stop, looking all around him for the source of the voice. You slowly rise up from the undergrowth, until your head is almost level with his. He drops his sticks in surprise and staggers back a little. "Oh please, don't be alarmed. I mean you no harm ..."

"Who are you?" he demands.

"I am ...the protector of thisss island." Lying is coming so easily to you. "I've been watching you and your friendsss for a while. I'm sssorry to say that you're all in great danger."

"From what?" His tendency to speak in such short and sharp sentences irks you, but you put up with it for now. You want to gain his trust, after all.

"From the creatures that roam so freely on this island. See thisss?" You indicate the bulge in your body with the tip of your tail. "I just caught one leaving your camp. It may have got your friend. I am the only thing they fear ...to them, you and your friends are merely meat." You're almost convincing yourself, but the question is this; is Christian buying all this?
13422112222211122112222211112212.title: Trick him.

choices: Someone comes in during the day.
It's not until later that evening that your next snack comes in.
1342211222221112211222221111222.content:
Deciding not to go too far from your new found source of food, you decide to slither into one of the larger shelters. It's a fairly well built hut, which means you shouldn't be seen unless someone actually enters it. You find you're in luck once you get into the hut. It's dark and very roomy, which will mean you can hide easily until someone comes in ...at which point you'll be able to make a nice meal out of the poor unlucky guy.

You curl up in a corner of the hut to reflect on your most recent snack. As the time passes by, you hear many voices outside, some of them familiar. You stay perfectly still, waiting for someone to walk through that door.
1342211222221112211222221111222.title: Hide in one of the shelters.

choices: Go for one of the sunbathers.
Go for those playing or those in the water.
1342211222221112211222221112.content:
You slither off to the left, and continue to slither for a few more minutes until you find yourself emerging from the undergrowth onto a long, golden beach. A bit further down the beach you see your prey. Dozens of famous boys, all as naked as Frankie was. They're doing various things that you'd normally expect boys to do on a beach. Some of them are splashing about in the sea, while some are playing with a frisbee on the beach itself. There are also several boys who are simply sunbathing, lying back and relaxing. They are, of course, completely unaware of how easily they could be eaten.

The boys playing on the beach and in the sea would certainly be harder to catch. If you were spotted, you'd either scare your prey off or they'd turn on you. In this new snake form you might be able to take out one or two of them, but not this many at once. You remain perfectly still, hiding your face in the bushes. Hunger drives you on, but to which group of boys does it drive you?
1342211222221112211222221112.title: Boys on the beach!

13422112222211122112222211121.content:
Your hunger must be satisfied with the least risk to yourself, this means going for the much easier meal. The sunbathers are all lying a good 30 yards from those playing frisbee, and even from here it looks like many of them may have dozed off.

You slither silently across the hot sand, making your way to where all these delcious boys are lying on their towels in various positions. You stop just behind them, and slowly make your way round to their left. No one has noticed you yet, and you fully hope that by the time one of them does notice you, you'll have one of their friends halfway inside you. Keeping to the left of the group, you look at the first two boys you come across.

The very first boy lying there, ready for consumption is Zac Efron. He's lying on his back, so you can get an eyeful of his chest, stomach and parts below. He's also lying with his head facing you, so if you decide to eat him you should be able to get his head in your mouth before he can alert the others. Barely a foot away from him is Mitch Hewer, lying on his front. He's certainly more slender than Zac, so eating him might cause less fuss and therefore draw less attention. Trouble is, he's lying with his feet facing you, so once you start eating him it's likely that he'll start shouting and all that usual stuff.
13422112222211122112222211121.title: Go for one of the sunbathers.

134221122222111221122222111211.content:
You decide to go for the more muscular and overall safer option of eating Zac Efron. After positioning your mouth right by the top of his head, you take one last look at his naked body, fairly certain that it will taste as good as it looks. You open your mouth wide and launch it at Zac's head, giving him a very rude and sudden awakening. You've quickly got his whole head in your mouth though, so his cries are muffled. Instead, he's putting his energy into flailing his arms and legs, and you're aware of how easily he could end up waking Mitch Hewer.

You therefore need to make quick work of Zac, no matter how much you want to savour him. You therefore shift your throat muscles into overload and begin swallowing him a lot faster than you swallowed Frankie. You're already past his chest, and with one more gulp his toned belly disappears. His struggles cease for a while when you reach his groin. Maybe he likes the sudden feeling, maybe he's quickly running out of air. Either way, you're able to quickly finish him off, pushing yourself along the rest of his body and swallowing his legs. It only takes the smallest of gulps to eat his feet. You may have had to eat him quickly, but he was still delicious. Plus, the feeling of having him inside you is amazing. His taste lingers on.

You now, however, have a problem. Zac's initial flailings managed to kick up quite a bit of sand, and now Mitch seems to be stirring. You remain perfectly still, waiting to see if he'll wake up before you decide what to do.
134221122222111221122222111211.title: Eat Zac.

1342211222221112211222221112111.content:
Mitch shifts a little, and for a second it looks like he's going to wake up, but he just rolls over onto his other side. Amazingly he slept through Zac's consumption. You wonder if he's such a heavy sleeper that he can sleep through his own?

Then again, you have just eaten. Maybe you should wait a while before you have another boy. However, Mitch is very slim. He'd probably fit in with Zac very nicely. On the other hand, the bigger and heavier you make yourself, the more likely it is that you'll be seen.

The sensible option would be to slink away, digest Zac properly and then hunt for more ...but it pains you to let a thin, tasty boy like Mitch go to waste!
1342211222221112211222221112111.title: He's still asleep!

choices: Three boys grabbing your tail from behind.
Five boys coming at you with a net.
13422112222211122112222211121111.content:
Best play it safe for now. Besides, at least this way you'll get a chance to enjoy digesting Zac, and it's not as if Mitch is going anywhere in the long run ...apart from your stomach. Every boy here will find himself inside you at some point or another, if you get your way. Keeping this in mind, you quietly slither back across the sand and into the dense forest. You decide to wait there for a moment until they discover that Zac is missing. It's not long before the boys who were playing in the sea come back over to the sunbathers and find that their friend is gone. They suspect nothing sinister, of course. They just look around to see where he might have gone and call out his name a few times.

Naturally Zac is in no state to answer their calls. He's too busy being slowly digested. You decide that you're safe enough where you are for the moment, so you sink into the floor and relax, allowing yourself to enjoy the wonderful feeling that comes with having a full stomach. Unfortunately for you, you're a little too relaxed. So relaxed, in fact, that you don't see ...
13422112222211122112222211121111.title: Slither away ...for now.

choices: Return to the woods to digest then continue your hunt.
Upon retreating to the woods 3 curious boys spot you and run over to investigate
13422112222211122112222211121112.content:
The temptation of Mitch just laying there unaware of his tasty friend, Zac’s delicious demise was too much to bear besides Mitch was smaller and would take just a moment to consume and would likely not even wake up through the encounter.

Mitch’s naked body tossed again in his sleep, turning his chest toward the hot sun while twirling his legs wider apart exposing his slightly stiff, yet surely tasty parts to me.

Unable to control myself any longer I wasting no time quickly but carefully maneuvered both of Mitch's feet into my gaping mouth, easily gulping them down to his upper thigh. Before continuing, I took a moment to look at my newest victim, admiring his toned muscular body which tasted so good of what little I had already consumed. Eager to continue, my jaws closed over Mitch’s plump curved rear as well as his now very erect groin. As Mitch’s groin neared the back of my throat, I could feel its stiff tip move atop the roof of my mouth, causing it to pulse. Then all at once Mitch’s erect groin climaxed showering the roof of my mouth and that of Mitch’s own defined abs with a thick sticky substance that despite its appearance tasted so amazing. I almost regretted having to continue consuming Mitch, though I know I had to and preferably fast sense I was all but in the open. Mitch was now waist deep in my mouth his large round butt and erect groin seemed to be somewhat challenging to swallow, more so then I had first suspected but all the while worth it. Sensing the need to hurry I contracted my throat muscles faster, gulping down Mitch’s chest. Then right before Mitch vanished from sight within me, I looked at his face one last time. Still asleep he expressed a relaxed smile as if he was or had recently experiencing the most intense orgasm of his life, and with that I gulped down his chest, leaving only his head in my mouth along with his arms which stretched out limp to either side of my jaws. With one last large gulp Mitch’s head slipped down my throat followed quickly by his limp arms leaving only his hands exposed which soon also followed suit sending Mitch, now merely a bulge along my body, moving ever deeper down my cylindrical form where in the end his tasty little body would rest for digestion among his two unlucky comrades Zac and Frankie.

With the last of the two sunbathing boys consumed I decided it would be best to retreat back into the woods in order to digest my rather large meal properly. But one thing is for sure, Mitch opened my eyes to a whole new spectrum of taste one I hope to surely indulge in come the future boys I plan to consume here on this island. If all these boys could produce such a flavor from that certain place, then it would be well worth my effort to exploit that flavor what ever way possible.

Perhaps my hypnosis abilities could ease the process of obstructing that delicious fluid from my future meals.
13422112222211122112222211121112.title: Eat Mitch.

choices: Go for the boys playing frisbee.
Grab a snack from the water.
13422112222211122112222211122.content:
So, you like a challenge, do you? Well, you certainly picked a right one here. You can either try and pick one of them off without the others seeing, or you can directly attack one and hope that drives the others away in panic. However, you'll cross that bridge when you come to it. First you need to decide which group to go for. You could slink across the beach and enter the water, allowing you to go for one of the boys playing there, or you could risk going for one of the boys playing frisbee.

Who said a challenge was a good thing?
13422112222211122112222211122.title: Going for the more challenging prey.

134221122222111221122222112.content:
You're about to slither off into the forest in search of more delicious boys ...when you wake up. You find that your sheets have been thrown off, and your whole body is curved, almost as if you've been slithering in your sleep. The details of the dream are already beginning to fade, as is sometimes the case even with the best of dreams, but you can remember one vital detail. You ate Frankie Muniz and he was delicious. For breakfast, you'll see if this is in fact the case.

Taking the box downstairs with you, you scoop Frankie out and begin stripping him, ignoring his protests. You can't be bothered to prepare him, and you're too hungry to play with him. Besides, it's too early in the morning to think of things to do with him. You just plan to eat him whole and alive. He's soon naked, and you smile groggily as you bring him up to your mouth, dangling him by his legs.

You're about to eat him ...when the doorbell rings. Remembering that your machine is due this morning, you toss Frankie back in the box for now and go to answer the door as quickly as you can. You soon wish you hadn't done so when you see who's really there.

It turns out the police planted that flyer to lure and entrap those who buy shrunken people, especially famous people. You're accosted by two rather big officers, read your rights and dragged away, still wearing whatever you wore to bed. The box of boys are recovered, and they make for ...unique witnesses at your trial. As well as kidnapping, you're easily found guilty of the murder of Tom Felton and James and Oliver Phelps. They even get you for the attempted murder of Frankie Muniz, just to really stick it to you.

You cut a deal, however. You give the police the name of the person you bought the box from, and you get to spend the rest of your life in a cell.

Life sucks sometimes.
134221122222111221122222112.title: You wake up from the dream ...

1342211222221112211222222.content:
Frankie's not stupid. He knows exactly what you mean by 'dinner' ...him. He spins on the spot and runs off at an alarmingly fast pace. You lower your belly to the ground, grinning from ear to ear.

"Oh no you don't, my little ssssnack!" You began crawling after him, easily going as fast as he is. Your body propels itself across the ground the way only a snake can. His little legs don't stand a chance of outrunning you. For the moment you hold back. You enjoy the chase. You hiss louder and louder, convincing him that you're getting closer and closer. He panics, causing him to stumble and cry out. He hasn't been on the ground for more than a second before you're all over him. He tries to stand up, but that only makes it easier to wrap yourself around him, your coils starting at his legs and moving rapidly around and up his naked body. You stop just short of his chest, pinning his arms to his sides. You then raise your head level with his, revelling in his struggles and his anxious expression. You smack and lick your lips. The chase was exciting, but it's made you hungry.
1342211222221112211222222.title: He tries to run.

1342211222221112212.content:
You decide to have some supper,you go to the box of boys on the table and open it.
You see so many yummy young boys,and you decide you will have........
1342211222221112212.title: Have some supper.

134221122222111222.content:
The price is too steep for you. You spent a great deal of money on the box of boys, so you really can't afford to go making any other big purchases. You're a little disappointed, but there are certainly things you can do to cheer yourself up. It is getting late, after all. Time for supper!

You wander back over to the box and peer inside. Dozens of terrified faces stare up at you. They may be small, but they're all delicious ...each and every one of them. You're still fairly hungry, and you don't wish to spend too long deciding on who to have for supper, so you quickly narrow the selection down to two boys. David Henrie or Christian Cooke. Which is it to be?
134221122222111222.title: Too expensive ...but now it's time for supper!

choices: He agrees to feed himself to you.
134221122222112.content:
He's not there. You put the jar back and keep going. You've only looked behind a few more jars when you hear a voice calling to you.

"Hey, you! Over here!" You turn your head to see Oliver at the other end of the shelf. He's standing right at the edge, and he looks like he's ready to jump. "Now listen, you're going to let me go free ...or I'll jump!" You let out a chortle, which quickly escalates into a guffaw. Oliver shouts above the noise of your laughter.

"Laugh all you want, but it's my guess that you won't want to eat me after I've splatted myself all over the floor. So let me go free, or you'll lose out on another snack."

"Shouldn't that be 'let me go free and you'll lose out on another snack'? Oliver, you're really not thinking straight."

"Seeing your brother get eaten probably has that effect!" shouts Oliver angrily.

"If I let you go, I'll definitely lose another snack. If you jump, chances are I'll catch you before you hit the floor. Be sensible about this. If you're going to meet your end, wouldn't you rather meet it the same way as your brother?"

"What, being tortured, licked, tasted and then swallowed? No thanks! At least this way it'll be quick."

"But my dear little friend, I can make it quick if you like. Tell you what, why don't I stand right below the counter, and you can step right off and into my mouth. Then I'll swallow you right down, I promise. That way you'll be with your brother ...and besides, it sounds like fun."

"You ...you want me to feed myself to you? To just ...just jump right into your mouth?"

"Consider the alternative. If you try to jump, I will catch you. Then, once I've got hold of you, I'll make sure the process of consuming you is a very long and agonsing one. So, the choice is yours. What are you going to do?"

Still perched on the edge of the shelf, Oliver looks like he could go either way. He obviously hasn't thought this through all that well. He's really not in a postion to name terms. However, here he has a chance to finish this whole thing quickly. Pass that chance up, and he risks his end being a very painful one.
134221122222112.title: Oliver names the terms of his release.

choices: He makes a run for it across the shelf.
1342211222221122.content:
"Ok ...I'll do it. Just make it quick." A resigned look on his face, Oliver steps back from the edge just a little. You, on the other hand, are practically grinning from ear to ear as you place a stool on the floor, just in front of Oliver. Once you step onto the stool, you find your head at just the right height for Oliver to step off the shelf and into your waiting jaws. There will be a slight drop for him, of course, but he'll be sure to have a soft landing in your mouth.

"Now, all you'll have to do is just step off the edge of the shelf. No need to jump, or you might overshoot and land on my nose."

"Wouldn't want that, would we?" mumbles Oliver.

"Just let gravity do the work and I promise to make a very quick job of you. I'd just like you to know how much I appreciate this, Oliver. It's not every day that such a delicious young man agrees to feed himself to me. The very concept itself is very exciting."

Not saying another word, Oliver proceeds to undo his belt and remove his trousers, shortly followed by his socks and boxers. You lick your lips at the sight of his naked body and nod your head appreciatively.

"Good boy, you took the rest of your clothes off without having to be asked." Still silent, Oliver moves to stand ready at the edge of the shelf. Directly below him is your open mouth, ready to recieve him.
1342211222221122.title: He agrees to feed himself to you.

13422112222211221.content:
Taking a deep breath, Oliver steps forward off the shelf. He falls straight into your mouth, and you quickly close your lips to trap him. You tilt your head forward to prevent him from sliding straight down your throat like his brother did. You want to taste this one properly.

Lying on his back, Oliver does his best to roll over on your tongue, giving you a very intimate taste of his entire body, front and back. You encourage his rolling around by flipping him back and forth with your tongue. He is utterly delicious. Maybe it's the fact that you're getting more of a chance to savour him, but he's definitely tastier than his brother. After a few more sloshes round your mouth, you finally swallow him so that he can join his brother and await digestion in your stomach. Another fine snack, and this one actually fed himself to you. Watching him there on the shelf, naked and preparing to step right into your mouth was very exciting. You start to wonder if you can find someone else who can be tricked into feeding themselves to you. Then again, it might be easier just to eat them forcefully.

That is, if you're still hungry. You've just had Tom Felton as well as both of the Phelps twins. Maybe it's time to have some fun with a shrunken boy or two.
13422112222211221.title: In he goes!

134221122222112211.content:
Tom and the twins have not curbed your great hunger. You want more! More than that, you've discovered a liking for the feeling you get when someone actually feeds themselves to you. There's an excitement and a sense of power, even more than when you eat them forcibly.
