It's not that you're lazy and want them to do all the work, it's just that the very notion of someone semi-willingly climbing into your mouth, knowing they will soon find themselves in your stomach ...it's intoxicating!

This gets you thinking. Getting someone to feed himself to you is not easy. Oliver only did it because you explained how painful you'd make the eating process if he didn't agree. Maybe it's time to see if this approach works on others. Wandering over to the box, you consider your options. You can either choose someone and try this little method, or you can explain it to the whole box, threaten them all with painful processes of preparation and see if anyone is smart enough to volunteer themselves for the easier route.
134221122222112211.title: You're still hungry.

choices: One boy puts his hand up.
1342211222221122112.content:
You sit on the table beside the box, fold your arms and slowly lean over to gaze inside. You have the most serious expression on your face that you can muster. You give them a few moments to get over the initial panic of seeing you again. In their defence, every time you've appeared you've picked one of them to be eaten. What they don't know yet is that this time you're going to try and get one of them to volunteer to be a meal. Clearing your throat, you begin.

"Now listen here, all of you. You already know what you're all here for. One way or another, sooner or later, you'll all end up in my stomach. However, I am now offering you the chance to make things a lot easier for yourselves. I can manhandle you and force you into my mouth, but I find it a lot more exciting to have someone feed himself to me. I'm looking for any among you who might be sensible enough to see the benefits of this arrangement. The only alternative is a long, stressful and painful preparation process. So ...any volunteers?"
1342211222221122112.title: Explain it to them all.

choices: Well, perhaps we'll fatten you up just a little.
13422112222211221122.content:
To your surprise, one boy slowly puts his hand up. That boy is none other than Jeremy Sumpter. You gingerly fish him out of the box. He puts up no struggle. You carry him over to the table and gently set him down.

"I admire your bravery, Jeremy. You were the only boy in that entire box who volunteered."

"Well, the way I see it ...you're going to eat us all eventually. It might as well be as painless as possible," he says quietly. "Should I take my clothes off?"

"If you wouldn't mind." You watch as Jeremy steadily reveals more and more of his smooth, muscular body. He's down to his underpants when he suddenly stops.

"Just one thing though ..."

"Yes?"

"Make a joke about my last name before you eat me and I call the whole thing off."

"What ...oh, I see. Deal." As you watch him pull off his underpants, you consider how strange it was for him to be concerned about such a thing when he's about to feed himself to a giant. You're not about to make an issue of it. You're too busy salivating over the delicious snack that will soon be making it's way towards your mouth. Jeremy stands before you, buck naked. He holds out his arms, as if presenting himself.

"Will I do?" he asks.
13422112222211221122.title: One boy puts his hand up.

choices: He feeds himself to you as planned.
He makes a run for it. Foolish boy.
134221122222112211221.content:
"Oh yes, you'll do very nicely! You look extremely delicious!"

"Thank you ...I guess ..." says Jeremy.

"Now, this is what we're going to do. I'll rest my head on the table with my mouth open and my tongue out. I'd like you to lie on my tongue, maybe jiggle about a bit ...then just lean back and I'll scoop you up right into my mouth. I want to really enjoy the sensation of you letting me taste you. How does this sound?"

"Like a plan," sighs Jeremy as he starts walking towards you slowly. You make your own preparations by resting your chin on the table and extending your tongue as far as it will go. Jeremy is getting closer, still looking remarkably calm. You're pretty sure that he will actually go through with feeding himself to you. He seems to realise that it will be a much less stressful process than you eating him by force. However, he could still be planning a last minute get away. Best to keep an eye on him.
134221122222112211221.title: Oh yes!

1342211222221122112211.content:
It seems that your doubts were unfounded. Jeremy does his part to the very best of his ability. He stands with his back to you, then simply lets himself fall back onto your soft tongue. You get an explosion of flavour striking your taste buds as you experience the quick application of his back, ass and legs. Showing that he was listening to you, he starts to wiggle around a little. He even rolls over onto his front so that you can get a decent taste of the rest of him.

As wonderful as this all is, it's not long befor your tongue starts to feel a little dry. Sensing an opportune moment, you gently bring your tongue upwards, lifting Jeremy up with it. He's on his belly, and finds himself craning to look directly into your open mouth. This is the last thing he sees as you then rapidly bring your tongue in, bringing it's delicious load along too. Your mouth closes behind him and you sit back properly to really enjoy your snack. Even now he's managing to stay fairly calm. You keep him in there a little, allowing the saliva to build up and relieve you of that dry feeling. This also makes it a lot easier to swallow him whole, which you do with great relish.

You feel just as satisified as you did after swallowing Oliver. You've found yourself a little nugget of joy when it comes to dining, and it's getting your food to do most of the work for you!

That's four boys you've had now ...Tom, James, Oliver and now Jeremy. Are you still feeling hungry, or would you like to pursue some other delights with your shrunken friends?
1342211222221122112211.title: He feeds himself to you as planned.

choices: Scoop out Rupert Grint and Matthew Lewis.
Choose Daniel Radcliffe and Devon Murray.
1342212.content: You're sufficiently full ...for now. It's time to have a little fun with someone. You decide that it might be fun to mess with the minds of some of Tom's co stars ...make them think they're about to share his fate and see what they'll do in order to avoid it. How far will they go to save their lives?
1342212.title: It's play time!

choices: Make them sing a duet of your choosing.
13422121.content:
As you feel your stomach churn and digest Tom, you reach into the box and, after some searching, pick out Rupert Grint and Matthew Lewis. You carry the two of them over to a nearby table and set them down. You then sit on the chair and place your arms on either side of them, creating a kind of barrier. If either of them try to escape, it would be laughably easy to grab them. You grin at the pair.

"How are you two gentlemen today?" you ask rather pleasantly. They look at each other, clearly confused, then slowly turn to face you again.

"Um, fine ...thanks," says Rupert.

"Where's Tom?" asks Matthew. Your grin widens as you lift reach to the hem of your shirt and pull it up just enough to reveal your belly.

"He's in there. Maybe if you shout loud enough, he may be able to hear you before he's fully digested." Matthew and Rupert's mouths drop in shock and horror.

"You mean ...he's still alive in there?" asks Rupert.

"Well, he certainly felt alive just before I swallowed him. Oh, he was so tasty you wouldn't believe it. Very delicious." You pause for a second. Now it's time to start messing with their minds. "Would you two care to join him?"

"No way!" the two exclaim together. Rupert tries to back away, but you quickly drop the hem of your shirt and put your arm back to it's original position. Rupert takes this as a warning not to move.

"You sure? I'm sure the two of you would be very comfortable in there. Of course, if you really don't want to become meals, like Tom, then I suppose we can think of some ways for you to entertain me."

The two boys seem to relax a little, though naturally they have no idea of what awaits them.
13422121.title: Head games are fun.

134221211.content:
"I say we have a little sing-song. How does that sound, boys?"

Matthew and Rupert look at each other. Matthew smiles nervously and Rupert almost laughs.

"But we're not singers ...we're actors," states Matthew.

"Tom can sing, we know that much," offers Rupert.

"Yes, but have you forgotten where Tom is?" You rub your tummy, recalling Tom's great taste. "It's not too late for you to join him, you know."

"No, no!" insists Rupert. "We'll sing."

"I mean, it can't be that hard ...can it?" says Matthew.

You search your memory for a suitable duet. Something to really humiliate them. You even have costumes in mind.
134221211.title: Sing, sing, sing!

1342212111.content:
You suddenly scoop the two boys up into one hand so that they don't escape. You then carry them over to a box. Not the Boy Box, but an entirely different box. This box is full of doll and action figure clothes, relics of toys (real ones) that you've had over the years. After some fishing around, you find what you're looking for. Some old Disney doll clothes.

You don't let Matthew and Rupert see what you've got until you're sitting back down at the table. You place them back on the flat surface. Grinning from ear to ear, you show them what you've picked out for them to wear.

"Those look like ..." starts Matthew.

"Yep, Jasmine and Aladdin costumes. I want you to sing 'A Whole New World'. Do you know the words?"

The two boys stand dumbfounded at what they're expected to wear. It's Rupert who snaps out of it first.

"Well ...yeah, we know the words ...but you don't seriously expect us to wear those, do you?"

"If you want to please me and stay out of my belly, then yes." The boys are silent for a few more seconds, then finally speak.

"Okay, we'll wear them. Which one of us do you want to be Jasmine?"
1342212111.title: Choosing the princess.

choices: He remembers and carries on singing.
13422121111.content:
You drop the Jasmine doll costume at Matthew's feet. Rupert looks ever so slightly relieved.

"You can be Jasmine, Matthew. A Princess with Rupert's muscle structure would just look silly."

"Isn't that the whole point of this?" asks Matthew as he starts unchanging. You place the Alladin costume in front of Rupert and smile pleasantly.

"Very shrewd, Matthew. Now do hurry up. Stay undressed too long and the sigh of your bare bodies may persuade me to eat you anyway." This makes the boys change in record time. Rupert is soon wearing the baggy, patched trousers, the purple vest and the fez. The vest means that his arms as well as most of his chest and stomach are exposed, and he is rather conscious of this. He reckons you were serious about deciding to eat them anyway, and he is right to think so.

Matthew takes just a little longer to dress, but now he stands next to Rupert, wearing the blue trousers and top, his pleasantly hairy midriff exposed. He seems unsure of what to be more anxious over, the fact that he could be eaten any second now, or the sheer embarassment of wearing a princess dress. You hold back a chortle.

"Okay, you two. You can start ...and don't forget, this is to be a real performance. I want to see you singing to each other like real lovers, looking into each other's eyes, all that stuff." Rupert and Matthew turn to each other reluctantly. Matthew then slowly raises his hands, indicating that Rupert should take hold of them. It takes several seconds for Rupert to do so. After taking a deep breath, he begins.

"I can show you the world, shining, shimering, splendid. Tell me, princess, now when did you last let your heart decide?"

Matthew's doing a fairly good job of not letting on how creeped out he is by the whole thing, and Rupert's singing voice turns out to be fairly good. He continues;

"I can open your eyes ..."
13422121111.title: Matthew is Rupert's princess.

134221211112.content:
"Take you wonder by wonder ...over, sideways and under on a magic carpet ride! A whole new world! A new fantastic point of view, no one to tell us no, or where to go, or say we're only dreaming ..."

This is where Matthew should take over, and sure enough, he starts singing ...as best he can.

"A whole new world! A dazzling place I never knew, but when I'm way up here, it's crystal clear, that now I'm in a whole new world with you!"

"Now I'm in a whole new world with you!" echoes Rupert. You have to give them credit for doing it properly. They're only just about half way through the song now.
134221211112.title: He remembers and carries on singing.

1342212112.content: You decide to go for something more classical. How about 'Three Little Maids From School' from 'The Mikado'? You'd have to choose another boy, of course, but it should make for a thoroughly amusing sight.
1342212112.title: Something else.

13422121121.content:
Now, you know you've got some miniature Japanese ladies' dresses somewhere, complete with tiny fans. The problem is, you only have two boys. The title of the song is 'Three Little Maids from School', which seems to suggest that you need another boy.

Do you go with one of Matthew and Rupert's co-stars (not Tom, obviously) or choose some other actor?
13422121121.title: Three Little Maids.

134221211211.content: So, which of their fellow Harry Potter actors gets to don a dress and declare that they are 'filled to the brim with girlish glee'?
134221211211.title: One of their co-stars

choices: Matthew and Rupert agree, Devon refuses.
1342212112112.content:

choices: Toss him back and carry on stripping.
13422121221121122222.content:
"Right, let's start with the eldest, shall we?" You reach in and grab Chris, who's managing to keep fairly calm about all this. Picking up on this, you stop for a moment to make eye contact with him, raising him up to your face. You stare at him intently, and surprisingly, he returns the stare without faltering for a second. His nerves are tough, that much you can admit.

After deciding that a staring contest isn't going to achieve much, you proceed to strip him of his clothes, shifting your grip on him as you go so that you can get them off properly, as Chris is being very unhelpful by being as stiff as he can. You're finally down to his boxers when he pipes up.

"What are you going to do?" he asks in a cold, steely tone.

"My goodness, it speaks!" you declare in mock surprise.

"What are you going to do?" he asks again with equal determination.

"But it seems it only knows the one sentence."

"What are you going to do?" he demands with much greater force. You manage to remove his boxers, and you give yourself a moment to take in his thin but crispy looking body before deciding how best to respond to his repeated request. Do you show him the pizza slowly cooking in the oven and explain to him that it is his fate to become a topping on it or do you toss him back in the bowl and carry on stripping the other boys. He is food, after all, you're under no obligation to answer his questions.
13422121221121122222.title: Chris Rankin

134221212211211222222.content:
Not even dignifying his questions with further response, you casually drop the naked Chris Rankin back into the bowl to join the equally naked Rupert Grint. Of course, they're still the only ones out of all their co-stars, so this must be remedied. You pick up Alfie Enoch next and begin stripping instantly. A quick glance at the oven tells you that the pizza is close to being ready, so you need to finish this quickly.

Alfie is very slim, though not quite as thin overall as Chris. You move on to James and Oliver, who probably somewhere in between Alfie and Chris in terms of slenderness. Robert Pattinson is suprisingly thin. It must have been all that weight he was trying to lose recently. Devon is just ...well, small. Apart from Rupert, Dan seems to be the only one with any trace of fat on him. Never mind, the thinner they are, the easier it will be to fit them on one slice of pizza each.

You look down on your captives, all naked to a man. They each seem to be trying to maintain a sense of personal space, nobody wanting to be too close to anyone. The reality of the situation has sunk in, even for Chris. They're all shaking. You're a little tempted to offer them one last way of escaping their fate, namely to have a massive orgy within the bowl. It'd be interesting enough just to see if they'd agree or if they'd rather be served on a pizza and eaten.

You decide to make the offer.

"Now pay attention, potential toppings. You have one last chance to escape being my dinner."

"We'll do anything!" yells Oliver.

"Just tell us what it is," adds Daniel.

"Very well. If you all agree to start having sex right there in the bowl, a massive orgy, then your clothes will ...eventually ...be returned and you'll be spared. What do you say?"
134221212211211222222.title: Toss him back and carry on stripping.

1342212122112112222222.content:
A silence falls over the group of naked morsels. No one seems particularly inclined to speak up, except for Chris.

"How do we know you'll honour your side of the bargain?"

"You don't. I guess you'll just have to trust me."

"Trust you? That's a laugh," scoffs Robert.

"Am I to understand that you are turning down your last chance at salvation?" you ask, wishing to cut off any further retorts from the others. No one actually says anything, but every one of them seems to look away.

"Very well," you sigh. "You all would have tasted so much better once you were all sweaty, but I can see that it's not to be."

"So you were going to eat us anyway!" exclaims Rupert.

"Of course I was. Who wouldn't? Ah!" You open the oven door, put on some oven gloves and remove the hot, steaming pizza. "It seems your bed is ready. Now you have to lie in it."

A few of the boys start panicking a little, running back and forth inside the bowl and bumping into each other, falling over and ending up in all sorts of tangles. After slicing the pizza into eight seperate slices, you're ready to start adding the boys. You start with Chris, seeing as he's shown himself to be the ringleader of their resistance, removing him first will help to show the rest of them who's in charge. You pluck him right out of the bowl, take a good grip on him and force him into a rigid, upright position. You then select a slice and carefully place him on it, applying just enough force to stick him to the pizza without crushing him. He tries to move, but the melted cheese is too gooey for him to move. He can't even move his head enough to try and eat his way out. The other boys see what's in store for them and fall into a state of shock.

You go for the twins next, giving each of them their own slice to lie down on. You don't have to force them as much as you did with Chris, as they're in a much more receptive state. Robert feels positively limp as you pick him up and place him on a slice. Devon and Alfie go next, followed by Dan. You save Rupert for last, so that he could watch all his friends being added to the pizza, before it's finally his turn. As soon as you pick him up, he goes rigid, his arms snapping to his sides. He's offering no resistance whatsoever, he's even helping you a little.

Finally it's ready. Your Potter Pizza. Eight delicious little actors, all lying on a slice, their arms stuck to their sides, and their entire bodies stuck to the pizza itself. It's a beautiful sight, but it wasn't made for looking at. It's time to eat ...but who to start with?
1342212122112112222222.title: They refuse.

13422121221121122222221.content: Daniel and Rupert are lying on seperate slices, right next to each other. You slowly reach down towards them, and in their minds you could be going for either of them. Which one are you going to eat first?
13422121221121122222221.title: Daniel or Rupert

13422121221121122222222.content:
Robert and Chris are lying directly opposite one another, so you make it very obvious that you're looking firstly at one with a hungry look, then the other. Then you return your gaze to Robert, then back to Chris. Pretty soon neither of them can be sure if they're going to be the first ones into your stomach.

Which one are you going to choose?
13422121221121122222222.title: Chris or Robert

13422121221122.content:
Rubbing your tummy with one hand, you grab Rupert with the other. You raise him up to eye level.

"Now then, Rupert, what shall we do now that Matthew's left us all alone?"

"You ...you really did eat him!" he gasps.

"Did you think I was bluffing?"

"But ...but ...but ...are you going to eat me now?" he asks, positively terrified.

"I suppose I could," you saw slowly. Rupert throws his hands over his head and cringes. "But I don't think I will ...not just yet." Rupert peaks out from underneath his arms.

"So what are you going to do?"

"I thought we might play some games. Doesn't that sound like fun?" Rupert seems at a loss as to how best to answer. He just smiles nervously.

The question is, do you play with Rupert alone, or get some more boys out of the box? An idea strikes. If you got a few more boys out, and stuck their feet in cookie dough to prevent them from running away, you could play a boardgame, using them as the game pieces. Whoever loses gets eaten, or if you happen to get bored of the game, they all get eaten.
13422121221122.title: Play with him.

134221212211221.content:
You decide to focus your attention on Rupert and Rupert alone. A one on one game is called for. You could come up with something complicated ...or how about something simple?

A nice little game of 'Simon Says'. If Rupert gets caught out, he gets eaten. You can make it even more interesting for yourself by telling him to get undressed, all kinds of exciting things that he may not want to do. Plus, the more nervous he is, the more likely he is to get caught out ...and then it's snack time!
134221212211221.title: Just play with Rupert.

1342212122112211.content:
You set Rupert down gently onto the table, and sit right in front of him.

"Tell me, Rupert ...do you know how to play 'Simon Says'?" Rupert lets out a short, nervous laugh. Of all the things you could ask him, he certainly didn't expect that.

"Well ...yes, of course. Who doesn't?"

"Indeed. I'd like to play with you, if that's alright."

"Uh ...yeah ...I suppose so ..." he replies slowly.

"Of course, if I catch you out ...I think you know what the forefeit will be."

"I can guess," he mumbles.

"Go on then."

"What?"

"Guess, guess!" you insist.

"Well, you'll eat me ...I expect."

"I certainly will. Now then, let's start with something simple, shall we? Simon says ...touch your toes." Rupert bends down and does so immediately. "Simon says ...hop on the spot." Standing up again, Rupert starts hopping up and down. "Stop!" you exclaim. Rupert continues to hop. You didn't catch him out that time, but then again, you didn't expect to. Not this early into this charming little game.

"Very good. Simon says stop hopping." Rupert obeys and watches you warily, as though dreading what you might ask him to do now that the 'simple' stuff is probably over.

"Simon says ..."
1342212122112211.title: Simon Says ...

choices: He doesn't move. You didn't say 'Simon Says'.
He takes them off. He loses.
13422121221122111.content:
Not wanting to forefeit, Rupert does as he is told and quickly undoes his belt, followed by a rapid descending of trousers. He stands there for a moment, looking a little embarassed, but ultimately grateful that he hasn't been made into a snack yet.

"Simon says take your shirt off."

Again, Rupert readily obeys. You're glad to see that he's better toned than Matthew, while still maintaining a certain plumpness. He's going to get caught out sooner or later, so it's only natural that your mind should dwell on how delicious he's going to be.

"Take your underpants off as well."
13422121221122111.title: Pulling down the trousers.

choices: He falls flat on his face! Lunch time!
134221212211221111.content:
Rupert stands as still as he can, seeing as he's fairly convinced that even the slightest movement of his hands towards his underpants will cost him his life.

"Oho! Well done!" you exclaim. "You were listening. Now then, let's carry on playing. Simon says ...skip in a circle."

Glad that nobody else can see him, Rupert starts skipping around in a neat little circle. Round and round he goes. You quickly grow bored, so you move on.

"Simon says run on the spot." Rupert instantly stops where he is and begins to run on the spot. Sweat is pouring off him. Well, he might call it sweat. You call it 'extra seasoning'. He's beginning to get short of breath when you tell him that Simon says that he can stop now.

"Simon says ...do a cartwheel." Rupert looks up at you for a second. He still hasn't got his breath back. He'll try to do a cartwheel, you know he will because he won't risk forefeiting. If he doesn't manage to do it successfully, however, you have every intention of declaring him the loser ...a very tasty loser. Rupert lifts his hands up in the air and propels himself forward while you watch with bated breath.
134221212211221111.title: Doing a cartwheel.

1342212122112211112.content:
He doesn't have enough momentum to complete the cartwheel. He gets his legs half way up into the air, then the strength in his arms fail, and he crumples to the floor.

"Ooh! Bad luck!" you exclaim as you pick him up. He lies panting in your palm. "Now I'm going to have to eat you!"

"But ...but ...but I did what you said!"

"No you didn't. You tried, but you didn't actually do it. You never completed the cartwheel."

"That's not how the game is played!" he shouts, starting to regain some of his strength.

"It is when I play it. Now, kindly stop stalling and hold still." You remove Rupert's underpants, leaving him in his birthday suit. You then hold him by the legs and dangle him upside down over your open mouth. "Simon says ...be extremely tasty!" Rupert's arms start to flail as he's lowered into your mouth, but his struggles are useless. You let go of his legs and he slides fully into your mouth. All that exercise he did has made him sweaty, which ultimately adds to his amazing flavour. He is continuing to struggle though, so you give him a good sloshing with your tongue to show him who's boss here. Dazed by this sudden and vigorous action, he soon stops fighting. He comes to just in time to realise that he's now being swallowed, and will soon find himself in the company of whatever's left of Tom and Matthew.

You lick your lips, relishing those little traces of Rupert's flavour left over. You're still hungry, naturally, but you're also contemplating other ways you could play with your food, other ways to make these boys earn their survival. You decide to scoop out another boy, and continue the fun and games!
1342212122112211112.title: He falls flat on his face! Lunch time!

134221212211222.content:
You decide to play a board game. You figure you should choose which game to use first, then you'll know how many 'players' to fish out.

How about 'Mouse Trap'? That way, whoever ends up in the cage at the end of the game gets eaten and the boy who set the trap off goes back in the box. Sound like a good game?
134221212211222.title: Let's play a game ...

choices: I see your Rupert Grint and raise you...
1342212122112222.content: Why don't you play against Rupert in Poker, using boys as the chips? You can bet them and Rupert can bet them. The boys he wins will beg him to just stop playing so they can go free, but Rupert, being the nice lil snack he is, will probably insist on winning everyone before he quits. Unfortunately for him, you're a pretty unbelievable player, so he'll end up costing all the boys their lives anyway, including his own. Plus it'll be hysterical seeing him trying to move the cookie dough encrusted 'poker chips' since their the same size as him. Maybe they'll get mad at him for betting them, trying to get him to bet someone else. This could be good... Real good.
1342212122112222.title: Poker Chips

13422121221122222.content: You could always add some funny hats onto their heads and play chess. It'll be just like in the first Harry Potter. PLus, hearing them argue over who moves where will be pretty funny, wheras your 'pieces' won't have a say in the matter.
13422121221122222.title: Chess.

134221212211222221.content: Now the only question is who to use as the pieces. I'll randomly assign one set to play with, and leave an author's choice as the second option.
134221212211222221.title: I love boy chess!

choices: They are.  An argument over movement ensues.
1342212122112222211.content:
You stick your hand in and randomly pick out a bunch of lads. One shoe and sock are taken off of each of them, before they are plunged into their respective wads of sticky cookie dough. Taking out a large cookie tray and chessboard you announce your plans. "Attention, tasty treats, we are going to play a little game of chess. Every piece that is taken will be placed into the tray to my right and put into the oven at the end of the game." There is a series of groans and pleas, but you ignore them all. "Don't worry, it won't be enough to kill you; it'll just brown you a little, and harden the gooey dough on your feet into real cookies. My stomach acid, however, will most definitely kill you. Let's play." Unbeknownst to them, you intend on eating the remaining pieces as well, just not baking them into cookies. Raw cookie dough will be delicious enough when licked off the feet of these little morsals. Hey, you never said you wouldn't eat them, just not cook them! You split them into two sides and put your specially made 'hats' on the pieces.

Your side-
Pawns (hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream): Ricky Ullman, Frankie Muniz, Freddie Highmore, Nick Jonas, Andrew Seely, Nathan Kress, Daniel Radcliffe, and Joe Jonas.
Rooks (Hat consists of a small pretzel ring): Mike Cera and Cody Linley.
Bishops (Hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream with a chocolate chip): Ryan Sheckler and Patrick Fugit.
Knights (Hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream with a cherry): Dean Collins and Matthew Underwood.
Queen (Hat consists of a gummy ring): Kevin Jonas
King (Hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream with caramel and hit fudge): Zac Efron

Opposing Side-
Pawns (hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream): Jeremy Sumpter, Edward Speelers, David Henrie, Jesses McCartney, Corbin Bleu, Devon Murray, Jason Dolley, and Chris Trousdale.
Rooks (Hat consists of a small pretzel ring): Aaron Carter and Drake Bell.
Bishops (Hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream with a chocolate chip): Devon Werkheiser and Chris Brown.
Knights (Hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream with a cherry): Phelps twins and Sprouse twins standing back to back as single pieces.
Queen (Hat consists of a gummy ring): Danny Jones
King (Hat consists of a dallop of whipped cream with caramel and hit fudge): Rupert Grint

Question is, who goes first?
1342212122112222211.title: Random

134221212211222222.content: How about a nice calm game of checkers. You could lay the boys flat on the cookie dough, spread out their appendages so just their little heads hands and feet are over the edge, and bake 'em. Then for the other side's pieces you could make gingerbread boys the same way and give them frosting buttons!
134221212211222222.title: Next game

choices: Rupert requests that he be eaten instead.
134221212212.content:
You assume an air of authority, which generally entails sitting up straight and putting on a mock pompous voice.

"Matthew, kindly step forward and put forth your case. Why should I not gobble you up right here and now?"

Matthew steps forward rather timidly. He obviously hadn't expected to go first. He gulps, takes a deep breath and starts to speak.

"Well, I think I deserve to be spared because ...because ...I'm a good person. Both of us are, in fact ...and I'm sure that, deep down inside, you're a good person too. I don't think you really want to eat us ...and even if you really do want to ...then I suggest you eat me. I cannot stand here and try to persuade you to eat my friend instead of me ...it's not right. So eat me, and spare Rupert."

This sudden change of tact comes as a surprise, though it's fairly obvious what's going on. Matthew seems to think that he'll either sway you with this noble gesture, or that Rupert will make a similar speech and then you'll be utterly overwhelmed by their collective selflessness. Well, let's see if Rupert has cottoned on to this strategy.
134221212212.title: Matthew speaks.

1342212122121.content:
Matthew is staring at Rupert intently, and it doesn't take Rupert long to figure out what the general plan is. A look of realisation spreads across his face, but he does his best to suppress it as he steps forward.

"No! Don't listen to Matthew, it's me you should eat! If you promise to let him go, then I'll co-operate with you every step of the way. I figure it's not often you get a boy who's willing to do that, so leave Matthew be and have me as your snack!"

"Rupert, I can't let you do this!" exclaims Matthew. He rushes forward and grabs hold of Rupert's arm. "You have so much to live for!"

"Just as much as you, Matt. Now stay out of this, for your own good!" says Rupert dramatically, pulling his arm out of Matthew's grip. Matthew now faces you.

"I offer myself to you! Let Rupert go and you can eat me!" Rupert goes one step further in this little drama by yanking off his t-shirt and pushing Matthew out of the way. He stands with his arms open, emphasising his chest and tummy.

"See this? I know and you know how much you'd like to eat me, so do it! Eat me!"

It's taking every fibre of effort in your body to keep yourself from laughing. The idea of them both trying to be noble in order to save each other was a good one, but this is kind of over the top. You decide that their little plan should backfire on them, but how? Choose one of them to eat and let the other know that they caused it? Or should you just eat them both at once?
1342212122121.title: They act out their plan.

13422121221211.content:
You sit there and stare at the two boys. Matthew, standing upright with a determined look on his face and Rupert, shirtless and practically offering himself to you on a silver platter.

Which one do you gobble up?
13422121221211.title: Eat one of them.

134221212212111.content:
Well, there's no contest, is there? Rupert's certainly making the greater impression, so it's him that gets eaten. You continue to look thoughtful, even though you've already made your decision. Matthew begins to look a little anxious, as though he's beginning to think that this plan may have backfired. It has, of course, but not on him.

"Very well, Rupert. I'll spare Matthew ...for now ...and eat you. Sound reasonable enough?" Rupert looks confused, as does Matthew.

"But ...but Matthew insisted that you eat him instead of me!"

"And you insisted even more forcefully that I should eat you. You were very passionate in the defence of your friend. It was a very hard choice to make, but I've made my decision. I spare Matthew, and you, Rupert, become my 'willing snack'. That was what you said, wasn't it?"

Matthew moves to go stand by Rupert, probably to try and communicate some new plan to him. You scoop him up before he can take more than a few steps, grabbing the shirtless Rupert in your other hand to keep him from escaping.

"You really are quite lucky to have a friend like Rupert, you know," you say to Matthew. "He willingly becomes a snack for me, and as a result you get to live ...a little longer. Remember that." Before Matthew can respond, you drop him back in the boy box and shut the lid. Your attention is now entirely focused on Rupert. Not bothering to ask permission (it's not as if you need it), you have a few licks of Rupert's bare torso. You also get a chance to smell him. As well as being incredibly tasty, he has that strong manly smell. He must have worked himself up during that dramatic plea to be consumed in Matthew's place.

"Hey, hey! What are you ..."

"Now, now, Rupert. I was under the impression that you were a willing snack."

"Yeah, but ..."

"I sure would love a willing snack," you interrupt quite casually. "A boy that did exactly as he was told would find being eaten a fairly quick and painless experience. He might even the events that take place beforehand quite ...pleasurable."

Rupert looks thoughtful at these words. He's pondering what you might mean by this.

"I'm so tired of boys that make things harder for me," you go on. "It gets rather tiresome, drawing out the preparation process, making it as painful as possible. It would be nice to have a co-operative snack for once ...what do you think, Rupert?"
134221212212111.title: Rupert

choices: He tries to make a run for it.
1342212122121112.content:
"If ...if I co-operate ...will it be over quickly?" he asks rather quietly.

"Of course. I reward good behaviour from my snacks." Rupert considers this for a moment, then lets out a great sigh.

"What do you want me to do?"

"Well, you can start by taking the rest of your clothes off," you say as you gently put Rupert down on the table top. You stay close, of course, in case he tries to run. He obediently undoes his belt and pulls down his jeans, followed by his socks and finally his boxers. His hands instinctively move to cover his groin, but on reflection decides that it's pointless to do so.

"Now then, I'd like you to prepare yourself for consumption. I've decided to make a sausage roll out of you."

"Swell," he mutters. "What exactly do I have to do?" Without even taking your eyes off him, you reach over to the nearby fridge and take out a tub of butter. You remove the lid and place the tub on it's side next to Rupert. You've placed it on it's side so that Rupert can reach the butter.

"I'm going to deal with the pastry myself, but I don't want you to stick to it too much, so I want you to rub butter all over yourself." Rupert hesitates for a moment.

"Now wait a second ...a sausage roll ...I thought you said you were going to make this quick! You're planning to cook me!"

"Well, bake you is probably the more accurate term. Besides, this is quick ...compared to what else I had in mind." Your lips become thin as they spread into an evil smirk. "You won't be baked for long. It'll just be enough heat to cook the pastry and maybe warm the meaty centre up a little."

"The meaty centre being me!" exclaims Rupert.

"That goes without saying. Now, are you going to do as you're told, or do I have to resort to ...plan B?"

"What's plan B?"

"You really don't want to know."

Rupert gulps and makes a hasty decision.
1342212122121112.title: It will be quick ...er.

13422121221211121.content:
Rupert edges over to the upturned tub of butter and reaches in, scooping out a fair helping with his tiny hand. He then proceeds to rub this over his arms, starting at the shoulder and working his way down. You smile as you begin the task of preparing the dough. Luckily you're experienced enough to be able to make it quickly and without taking your eye off Rupert for too long. A good thing too, as the sight of him massaging butter on himself is proving to be very erotic.

"Oh yes, that's the way. Do feel free to chat to me while you're doing that, Rupert."

"What about?" asks Rupert as he scoops out another handful.

"Well, if you really want to cement the deal and get this experience over with, you could talk about how tasty you'll be."

"What?"

"It'll put me in the mood to eat you quicker," you say as you start slicing out just the right amount of pastry you'll need to envelop Rupert.

"Very well," says Rupert as he begins rubbing the butter onto his chest. "I'm sure I'll be ...very tasty?" A singular eyebrow raised, you give Rupert 'that look'.

"Come on, you can do better than that."

"Okay ...I'm going to be delicious ...especially after being lightly cooked ...you did say 'lightly', didn't you?" You merely nod impassively. You're more interested in watching and listening to him as he continues his massage. He's just finished his legs and now he's rubbing it onto his belly ...that succulent, plumpish belly.

"I'm actually rather looking forward to it," says Rupert, purely because he knows it's what you want to hear. "I expect I'll be tastier than Tom was. I'm much more meaty and much less stringy. I just know you're going to enjoy me."

"That I certainly will," you say as you make to pick him up. It's then that you are hit by a brainwave. Here he is, all covered in butter. He'd probably taste absolutely brilliant if you licked it off him. Of course, it goes against your agreement to make the whole process quick, but at the end of the day you can do whatever you like with him.

So, do you take advantage of his buttery state and taste him to your hearts content or do you stick to the plan of making him into a sausage roll?
13422121221211121.title: He starts buttering himself up.

choices: Get yourself a drink to have with your Rupert Roll.
134221212212111212.content:
Best to stick to the plan, really. You'd like a taste of Rupert, but you want to be able to actually eat him. Not wasting any more time, you take the pastry you've been preparing and drop it on top of the buttered-up Rupert. You then take hold of both the pasty and Rupert with both hands and pick them up. Ignoring his muffled cries of protest, you begin working and rolling the pastry round Rupert's body. You smooth the two ends together behind him, so that he is sealed in. After a little more tucking and rolling, you've made a tightly packed Rupert Roll with his head and feet sticking out of each end.

"Okay, you've made me into a sausage roll. Now hurry up and eat me already," says Rupert grumpily. It seems he didn't like being turned, twisted and generally man-handled like that. You shake your head.

"You're forgetting something, Rupert."

"Like what?"

"I still need to bake the pastry round you, otherwise it'll be raw. You might taste delicious uncooked, but the pastry won't."

"You ...you mean you'd have been just as content to eat me raw and you made me go through all that? Rubbing butter all over myself, getting wrapped in pastry ...and now ..."

"And now you're going to be lightly cooked. Not to worry, it won't take long for the pastry to bake, and I fully expect you to come out alive."

"How can you be sure?" asks Rupert a little hysterically as he watches you open the oven door.

"I never said I was sure. I just said I expect it." You place Rupert on a greased baking tray, and then shove him straight into the oven before he can say another word. After shutting the door you kneel down to watch. Though you can't hear it, you can see that Rupert is shouting wildly in panic.

It's not going to take long at all for him to be ready, so you've only got a few minutes to spare.
134221212212111212.title: Into the oven he goes.

1342212122121112122.content:
Deciding that no decent snack is complete without a beverage, you leave the oven and fix yourself a soft drink. You're not sure why, but you decide that cherryade would go best with Rupert. Maybe it's just the colour. Whatever the reason, you pour yourself a nice tall glass, add some ice and take it back over to the oven to check on Rupert.

The pasty around him has started to brown very nicely, and you can see that Rupert is still very much alive. Rather than risk this changing all of a sudden, you turn the oven off, slip on an oven glove and take the tray out. Rupert is gasping for breath.

"You ...you could have ...killed me!" he wheezes.

"Don't be so dramatic. I was never going to let you be burned in there. Your end is going to come much more quickly when I bite you in half."

"You never ...you never mentioned that!" exclaims Rupert as you pick up the roll he's so inescapably wrapped up in.

"I promised you it would be over quickly, didn't I? Swallowing you whole would mean that you'd still be alive in my stomach ...for a while. Besides, I don't think I could fit a whole Rupert Roll in my mouth at once."

Before he can protest any further, you've raised him up to your mouth. You turn him one way, and then the other, trying to decide which end to bite into first. Do you go for his legs, or that meaty torso of his?
1342212122121112122.title: Got my drink, got Rupert ...good times!

13422121221211121221.content:
You go for head so that the last thing Rupert sees the sloppy, terrifying sight of your mouth before you devour him. He screams wildly as you slowly move him towards your mouth and ready your teeth. Then -

CHOMP!

Rupert screams no more as you shop him clean in half, mashing up the first half of the Rupert Roll to a pulp before swallowing it so what's left of him can be digested. Just his legs and feet remain now but you finish them off too, chomping them to bits and swallowing them before loudly burping. That was a very tasty dish indeed!

So tasty, that I think I'll have another. But who to go for?
13422121221211121221.title: Head first

13422121221212.content:
"You've both been very noble, I can see that. You're both willing to sacrifice your own lives in order to save your friend, and I respect that. Therefore, I don't see how I could possibly eat one of you and spare the other. It is an impossible decision to make, and it just wouldn't be right."

Matthew and Rupert visibly relax. They smile at each other, and Rupert even makes to collect his shirt.

"I shall therefore have to eat you both." Rupert drops his shirt once again, while Matthew begins trembling uncontrollably.

"You ...you said you respected what we did ..." says Rupert slowly.

"Oh and I do. I couldn't possibly choose just one of you when you both made such passionate pleas for each other's lives. The logical step is to eat you both at the same time."

"B-but that's not fair!" exclaims Matthew. You shrug your shoulders.

"Life rarely is. I suggest the two of you accept this decision, because you really did bring it on yourselves. You'd probably have had a better chance of survival if you had tried to convince me to eat your friend. Now, we can make this process easy ...or very, very hard. Which is it going to be?"
13422121221212.title: Eat them both!

choices: Trying to climb up out of the bowl.
134221212212122.content:
It takes the boys all of a split second to decide. They don't even look at each other, they just both rush off, running in opposite directions. If they were bigger, this would have been the perfect method of escape. There would be no way you could catch them both if they were their usual size. However, seeing as they're both small enough to fit in your hand, you have no trouble whatsoever in stopping them. Your hands dart after them and snatch them up. They kick with all their might, but find themselves merely kicking air as they're lifted off the table. They struggle desperately against your grip, but all they're going to do is tire themselves out.

"You've both made a very foolish decision. We could have made this a very straightforward and civil process, but it seems I have to make you into a meal by force."

"Oh yeah?" snarls Rupert. "And just how do you plan on keeping us from escaping again? Huh? You can't watch us forever!"

"I don't need to," you say as you casually drop them into a nearby bowl. You drop them from just the right height, so that their landing winds them a little. Seeing as Rupert is already shirtless, you start with him, picking him up again and removing the rest of his clothes. He's in no state to shout or struggle, as he's still recovering from the rough landing. Very soon he's in his birthday suit, and you decide to take advantage of his weakened state and caress his body. You pay particular attention to his strong, broad thighs. They're bound to be packed with flavour. Dangling him upside down, you drop him back in the bowl with Matthew.

Speaking of whom, Matthew is ...
134221212212122.title: The hard way ...?

1342212122121221.content:
You're somewhat amazed by the fact that Matthew is undressing himself, as is Rupert. While Rupert is too confused and shocked to speak, you put forward the obvious question.

"Matthew, it's not that I don't appreciate it, but why are you taking your own clothes off?"

"It's obvious we can't escape you," says Matthew, a dire and grim look on his face. "At least this way I spare myself the indignity of being stripped by a giant."

"Fair point," you say as Matthew removes his last article of clothing. The two boys are now standing in the bowl, both wonderfully naked. Rupert is still too shocked to speak, so it's Matthew who pipes up next.

"So, what are you going to do with us?"

"A good question, my sumptuous little snack ..."
1342212122121221.title: What to do, what to do?

1342212122121222.content:
You take a moment to watch Matthew try to clamber up out of the bowl. At first he actually manages to make a good go of it. By getting a run up he can just about get half way up the curve of the bowl before he looses momentum and staggers back. He tries scrambling at the smooth surface, crawling and scrabbling towards the rim, but it's no use. While Rupert merely watches in astonishment, the only thing Matthew manages to achieve is total exhaustion.

You pick him up from the bottom of the bowl and strip him, chuckling to yourself. Once he's as naked as Rupert, you deposit him back into the bowl, making sure to drop him right on top of Rupert, just so you can watch the two of them struggle to disentangle themselves from each other's naked bodies.

Secure in the knowledge that they can't escape, you take out a large saucepan and fill it with water. You then place this on one of the gas rings of the oven. You plan to boil these two boys and make a proper meal of them, and they seem to have cottoned on to their fate. Now they're both trying to clamber out of the bowl, and now that they're working together there's a danger that they just might manage it. You therefore pick up the bowl and carry it over to the oven. You swirl it round with your hands first, to disorient them. You then slowly begin to tilt the bowl, watching with glee as Matthew and Rupert slowly slide toward the rim, the saucepan of water waiting below them.
1342212122121222.title: Trying to climb up out of the bowl.

choices: Take them out, they're cooked enough.
Let them drown, they're not done yet.
13422121221212221.content:
Matthew tries to turn onto his front and scrabble up away from the rim, while Rupert favours using both his feet and hands to try and apply enough pressure onto the surface of the bowl to hold him in place a little longer. Rupert's approach proves to be more successful, as Matthew finds himself slipping off the rim of the bowl and after making an unsuccessful grab at the edge, falls into the saucepan.

He stays under for a moment or two, then emerges, gasping for air and treading the water. You haven't turned the gas on yet, so the water is still rather cold. You suddenly tilt the bowl forward sharply, and Rupert lands with a great splash right on top of Matthew. After emerging from under the surface once again, they begin trying to find a way out. Neither are able to touch the bottom of the saucepan with their feet, so they are forced to tread the water furiously just to stay afloat.

"H-How come the w-water is so c-cold?" asks Rupert.

"You never drop ingredients into a pot of boiling water because of the splash it makes. Especially taking how much you two have been struggling into consideration. Now that you're in, we can turn up the heat. Just think of it as an extra large jacuzzi!"

Before either of the boys can say anything, you hit the gas button and turn the switch, activating the flame beneath their saucepan. After a couple of seconds the water starts to warm up, and you can tell this by the looks on the boy's faces. Their thankful for the warmth, but at the same time they're very much aware of how quickly that 'warmth' will become a scolding heat.

The first few bubbles can be seen now as the boys start to get more agitated. The bubbles start forming faster and in greater numbers as the water gets hotter and hotter.

"That's hot, that's hot ...that's very, very hot! Hot!" screams Rupert. Matthew can't seem to articulate his discomfort quite so eloquently, as he just lets out a long, low moan of pain. Eventually they stop making any sound at all as they lose the ability to tread the water and start sinking beneath the frothy surface. If left like this, they'll drown.
13422121221212221.title: Matthew falls in first.

choices: Add the Phelps to the Potter-casted pot!
13422121221212222.content:
You watch with glee as the two naked boy stars tumble over each other and begin sliding towards the rim of the bowl. They struggle to their hands and knees and begin scrambling, clawing at each other to prolong their resistence to their inevitable fate. Tilting the bowl a bit more, Rupert sinks below Matthew and is kicked by the latter in the face inadvertantly during the struggles, knocking him down to the bubbling death below.

You watch his tumbling in slow motion, savoring the sight of the plump little teen plummeting into the boiling pot. With a splash he lands. The pale young lad turns instantly pink in the hot water and screams out in pain. "Don't worry Rupert, I'll massage your damaged skin soon enough... with my tongue. Just remember though, this will be nothing compared to my stomach acid!"

He can't even see you through the tears that have enveloped his line oif sight. Not wanting to waste any more time, you grip Matthew firmly in one hand and toss him into the bubbling pot with Rupert. He too yelps as his skin reddens. Not wanting to kill them you quickly turn the flames to the lowest setting, allowing the boys to simmer. "Now let's get the broth ready," you say like a seasoned chef on a cooking show to the two whimpering boys.

Taking out a long wooden spoon you slowly stir the lads in the pot. They cry out even louder, as the touch of the spoon and the mingling of their tender bodies must obviously cause them a great deal more pain. Soon the brew smells like the heavenly aroma of boiling boys. But, it is an awfly big pot. Why not add the Phelps twins to the stew? Or would you rather skip that and just get straight on to adding vegetables and spices?
13422121221212222.title: Rupert falls in first.

choices: Randomly take out a boy to play with/torture.
134221212212122222.content:
Humming to yourself you stops swirling and lick your lips as you watch the boys spin a few more times before settling down. The boys are sitting on the floor of the pot with the broth up to their armpits. Every time it looks like their faces have dried you dunk them under again with the tip of your finger. You'd think the boys would be used to the temperature by now, but their raw skin scraping against the smooth hot bottom of the saucepan keeps causing them to scream in pain anew.

Rupert's shaggy red hair is dripping wet, with water streaming onto his shoulders and face, burning every patch of skin they touch. Matthew's hairy face and chest however, seem to have made his suffering less extreme. You marvel at this, chuckling, and fetch the other ingredients from a nearby table. First you throw in a handful of baby carrots, one at a time. Each one lands on an alternating boy, causing more pain onto their already damaged bodies. Then you perform the same feat with some slices of potato. The lads try dodging out of the way, but end up only diving into another piece, knocking them back underwater. Next come the beans and onions.

By now, their heads are spinning from having so many foodstuffs dropped onto them. Lastly you add a sprinkling of salt and pepper, not wanting to overpower the boys' flavors. You intentionally add a larger supply to the spots where the teen idols are sitting. The pepper causes them to sneeze uncontrolably for a minute or two. The sound is adorable and hilarious, like a sneezing mouse.

Finally done you give the pot another long stirring before putting the lid on, and allowing it to simmer for another hour, by which time it should be ready.
What do you do in the meantime?
134221212212122222.title: Soups on!

choices: Honour Matthew's request and eat him.
Eat Rupert for betraying his friend.
1342212122122.content:
"Well, Rupert ...what have you to say?" Rupert steps forward and is silent for all of two seconds.

"Sounds fair enough to me. Eat Matthew." Matthew's jaw drops. He tries to respond but he's too stunned at this betrayal. You rub your chin thoughtfully.
1342212122122.title: Rupert turns on Matthew.

13422121221221.content:
"I agree. Matthew has offered to be a willing snack, and an offer like that doesn't come along every day." Matthew is too stunned to say anything as you pick up Rupert and casually drop him back into the box. It's only as you start to strip Matthew that he finds his voice again.

"But ...but this isn't how it was supposed to happen!" You shrug as you pull his trousers off.

"Hey, what can I say. Things rarely turn out the way you'd like them to. You figured Rupert was going to stick by you, and he goes and stabs you in the back. Life sucks."

"But ...but ...but ..."

"Now kindly stop your jibbering," you say politely now that you've finished stripping him. "It's distracting me from deciding how best to eat you."

Matthew has the potential to be quite plump, and there's not exactly much muscle tone on him. You're tempted to fatten him up a little like you did with Tom, though perhaps you'll take it a step further this time. On the other hand, you could just prepare him as he is.
13422121221221.title: You asked for it.

134221212212211.content:
"You're in luck, Matthew. I've decided to postpone eating you ..."

"R-Really? Oh thank you! Thank you!"

"So that I can fatten you up properly."

"You ...I ...I beg your pardon?"

"I'm going to feed you a whole variety of things over a long period of time. You've already got a nice bit of puppy fat ..." You poke his belly with the tip of your finger as you say this.

"Isn't it enough?" asks Matthew, doing his best to ignore the way you're touching him.

"I'm afraid not. I want you nice and fat when I eat you ...and sweet as well. Once you're plump enough I'm going to sweeten you with all kinds of toppings and treatments." Matthew merely gulps. "You may not be aware of this, but eating shrunken boys is actually very good for you. Lot's of protein."

"Really?"

"Oh yes. You, however, are going to be my sweet, sugary treat. My little indulgence after I've scoffed a few other boys. So, the more you're willing to eat, the longer you live ...and the tastier you'll be for me."

While Matthew takes all this in, you produce a small cage that had once belonged to your hamster. Matthew looks at it incredulously.

"Don't worry, it's been properly cleaned out. It's your new home until that glorious day when you're fat enough to be eaten. As you can see, your first few snacks are already there. Enjoy!"

You carefully place Matthew inside the cage, then close and lock the door on top of the cage. He can't get out by squeezing through the bars, and you're pretty sure that he'll soon be too fat to climb up them and open the door at the top. The food already provided includes a large slice of cake with vanilla icing, half a pork pie, several chocolate buttons and a slab of butter. Everything Matthew needs to transform himself into a plump, sweet snack.

"But ...but what am I supposed to sleep on when I'm not eating?" he asks.

"See the butter? When you're not licking it up, you can sleep on that. You'll taste even better after a few nights lying on it. Well, what are you waiting for? Start eating!"
134221212212211.title: Fatten him up as a long term snack.

choices: Eat him now. It'll shut him up.
Endure his whining and prepare him first.
134222.content:
Trapped within your fist and rapidly becoming more naked as you remove his remaining clothes, Tom's casual smile and helpful manner soon melt away. His lip begins to tremble, tears well up in his eyes, and his whole plump little frame generally starts to shake.

"Please ...I was bluffing before, trying to buy time ...but now I'm being serious! Please, please don't eat me!"

"Now Tom," you say in a mock-stern voice. "You knew full well that I was going to eat you one way or another. You've been treated to some chocolate as well as the extra time to prepare for your fate. Crying about it now is frankly undignified."

"But I don't want to be eaten! I have so much to live for! I'm begging you, don't do it!"
134222.title: He snaps and begs for his life.

1342221.content:
The tears really start to flow now. Tom is utterly distraught, and frankly the sight of him is beginning to ruin your appetite ...so it's best to eat him now before he puts you off completely.

You put him in head first, so that you don't have to listen to his pleas and wails anymore. You close your lips over his trembling shoulders and keep a firm grip on his feet. This way you can slowly suck him into your mouth like a string of spaghetti. You suck very gently, and Tom is pulled in up to his chest. A slightly stronger suck pulls in that plump tummy of his. The flavour that's packed into there!

Another suck and your lips are clamped over Tom's waist and groin area. He's been sobbing and trembling all the time while being sucked into your mouth, but for a moment or two there you think you feel his whole body stiffen. You can't stop now though. After letting go of his legs, you suck them in until only his feet remain protuding from your mouth. As for poor Tom, he is now staring straight down your throat, being kept there by the grip your lips have on his lower legs. Suck his feet in and he'll probably slide straight down into your stomach, if you let him. You could use your tongue to keep him in your mouth and taste him for a while.

Continued tasting sounds good, but then again there's something quite appealing about the thought of swallowing him alive, whole and straightaway. You'd be like a human anaconda, and that notion sounds bizarrely exotic to you.
1342221.title: Eat him now. It'll shut him up.

choices: Please sir, may I have s'more?
1342222.content: While he's stuffed with chocolate, let's make a s'more!
1342222.title: Endure his whining and prepare him first.

choices: I see where this is going, stuff him into a 'mellow!
13422221.content: Now the question remains, is he pale enough to be his own marshmellow, or should you stuff him into one anyway?
13422221.title: Please sir, may I have s'more?

choices: It takes nine.  Plus, you know after Tom you would still want S'more.
134222212.content:
You carefully insert the struggling platinum blonde headfirst into a giant marshmallow. You giggle as you see his kicking legs and struggling feet. Soon, he has to be pushed the rest of the way, until the marshmallow takes up the space under his armpits and down to his knees. While his arms, legs, and head are free, he can barely stand up on his own, under the weight of the large white obstructrion, without falling over. There's no way he'd be able to run. You stick the Tomallow on the edge of a long stick, behind the struggling teen, and prepare to roast him over an open flame; just enough to melt the marshmallow, and brown Tom a small fraction. Suddenly, an idea strikes you. There are eight other incredibly pale Harry Potter actors. Why not do the same to them? You can eat them up one at a time, and they'll be melted into their graham crackers, so they would just have to sit there, as you enjoyed tasting them all. So how about it, give Tom the satisfaction of a prolonged existence while you prepare Rupert Grint, Devon Murray, Oliver Phelps, James Phelps, Matthew Lewis, Robert Pattinson, Bronson Webb, and Daniel Radcliffe? Edit: You can add all the HP actors including those playing side characters like Zacharia and Dean Thomas and Colin Creevey.

Nine delicious pale actors? It's almost like the casting director expected this outcome!
134222212.title: I see where this is going, stuff him into a ...

1342222121.content: Do you tell Tom about your plan, or do you let him struggle? You can toy with him while he is under the impression that he only has a few moments before he is placed over an open flame and a few more minutes before... supper time.
1342222121.title: Tomellow

choices: His succulent feet and plump little toesies.
13422221212.content:
Without saying a word you begin fiddling with the marshmellow sitting on your counter as if there wasn't an adorable shunken celebrity stuck in the middle of it. You ignore his whimperings and start to gently nudge Tom's fluffy prison with your pointer finger, causing it to roll slowly from one end of the counter's surface to the other. You hold back a smile as he turns over from his stomach to back continuously. Everytime he comes up again his expression shifts. Sometimes he looks petrified, sometimes nauseous. Your favorite is when he looks at you with a hatred, similar to the look of loathing he gives Harry in the movies. His eyebrows arch and he wears a scowl. It's deliciously cute.

After a few minutes of this you use a tad more force, rolling the young boy from one side to the other, more quickly now. Soon you grow tired of this, much to the delight of Tom. His happiness is shortlived however as you pick up the stick at the other end of the marshmellow. You bring him over to the box of boys sitting on the kitchen table and stick him over the box so that he is facing his shrunken brethren, your delicious young snacks.

Keeping your face out of sight you speak for the Tomellow, using him like a puppet to entertain the other morsals. In a high falsetto voice you mock, "hello, my name is Thomas Felton and you are all going to be eaten. There is no escape. Ha ha ha. I'm lucky enough to be first, and I can't wait!"

There are some screams for you to stop. They must be petrified watching their shrunken friend stuck in a marshmellow and used as a puppet. You continue anyway. "I'm so excited to be a tasty little snack for our owner. And you should all be flattered too. After all, what a great compliment for him to judge us so delicious!"

You bring the Tomellow back to your face, holding him by the stick, and lay it back down on the table, chuckling at the look of contempt he has given you. Lying on his stomach, Tom faces the edge of the counter and only has a view of your feet. So you squat down to get a better look at your captive audience of one, (soon to be nine). "Tom, you seem to have some marshmellow on your face... Allow me to get that for you!"

Indeed there is quite a deal of white gook covering his face and drenching his blond hair. His face scrunches up in fear as you extend your tongue. In his attempt to pull back into the marshmellow like a turtle, you have ample time to savor the moment, slowly pushing your waiting tonuge forward. His eyes open at the last second, staring down at his own chin where the red muscle first meets his skin. It is deliciously smooth, completely dimpleless and free from acne.

You lap up the taste of sweat and marchmellow before licking upward to his full cheeks, button nose, and glistening forehead. By now you can even taste the succulent nectar of his tears, flowing freely. Soon you can't take it any longer and take in his entire head. You can hear muffled screams but easily pay them no mind as your mouth is filled with the sugary taste of heaven. He is even more exquisite than you could have imagined as your taste buds press against each of his features. His eyebrows taste of powder and his silky hair like honey. Its such a salty-sweet clean taste. You suck again and again letting his face rest on your powerful tongue.

Eventually you have to let him out to breathe and he gasps for breath, all traces of marshmellow lost from his head. He is glistening all over now, and he stares at you with a look of absolute terror. You stand up. While Tom is still catching his breath you turn him over so that he is again facing you and begin pressing down heavily on his front. His chocolate-filled belly aches with pain as you do this, and he soon feels almost like he is pregnant. Tom coughs and screams, flailing and writhing in pain. Soon you remove your index finger and turn him around again to curse you quietly. Where would you like to taste now, since only two more places are outside the gooey white prison?
13422221212.title: Tease Tom.

choices: Time for those hands and rippling arms!
Enough playing, bring out the other boys.
134222212122.content:
You turn Tom around so that he can't see what your up to. Looking down, he only sees his marshmellow tomb. Now staring at his feet you breathe in, smelling the stingingly strong scent of his foot odor adn dried sweat. As white as the boy's body is as a whole, his feet are several shades lighter. They almost match the color of the marshmellow.

Your tongue snakes out and catches him on the sole of his right foot. The toes curl reflexively and he gasps in surprise. As soon as the well-manicured plump little digits unclench again, you move closer, sticking the whole row in your mouth, sucking repeatedly and audibly. The taste is exquisite and you can't stop the audible 'mmm-ing' sounds even if you tried.

Tom attempts to kick you with the other foot and shake his leg free of your mouth. You feel nothing, and your strong hold doesn't loosen at all. The flavour is absolutely delectible, probably the greatest thing you ever had in your life and you pull his large foot in further. Savoring the semi-sweet and sour taste. "I hope all the boys taste this good Tom. You have no idea what a treat this is... I wish you could try some of this," you say with your mouth full, smacking your lips togetehr for emphasis.

He does not respond, playing machismo once again, but you can tell from the way he is twitching that he is crying on the other side of the marshmellow. You get past the ankle and reach the calf, your tongue lathering the entire foot with saliva, licking in between sucks. It isn't enough, so you envelope his other foot too, tickling him out of his tears, although he is still far from laughing. Your tongue works its way between each toe, and over every ridge, satisfying your hungry lust and tasting every millimeter of young flesh. It's like the worlds best-tasting lolli-pop, except it never runs out of succulent flavor!
134222212122.title: His succulent feet and plump little toesies.

choices: Stuff them with chocolate like Tom
1342222121222.content:
“You know what Tom? As delicious as you are and as filling as I’m sure you will be... there’s a reason they call them ‘s’mores’! Time for some company!” Tom seems happy for the first time in awhile. The hardening gooey marshmallow and saliva encasing and encrusting his body appears to be ignored as he beams at his short respite. “Don’t get too excited though Tom! You’re still first over the flames and into my roiling gut!” The terror and frown return as you reach into the box.

“How about a reunion?”inside the box is complete pandemonium as your shadow reappears. Preteens huddle together, teens run around colliding with each other, and young men push ea h lther ouf of the way as your hand pushes everyone around, scooping up boy after boy. Each one is deposited in a steep glass, where they are soon pressing against one another, uncomfortably tight, barely able to breathe. As the boys in the box realize you’re only going for Harry Potter actors the chaos dies down and boys begin pushing forward every Harry Potter star they see. Liam Ferrari dances around a Phelps brother who is trying to hide behind one A gaggle of vine stars, while his brother is held out for you to grab by the Dolan twins.

Soon the glass is completely full of writhing pale flesh. They are so close together that they have to take turns breathing.

Smiling down you see your acquisitions:
Daniel Radcliffe
Rupee Grint
Devon Murray
Chris rankin
James Phelps
Oliver Phelps
Freddie Stroma
Matthew Lewis
Alfred Enoch
Luke Youngblood
Sean Biggerstaff
Will Theakston
Derek Hough
Hugh Mitchell
Jamie Yeates
Edward Randall
Louis Doyle
Christian coulson
Bronson Webb
Robert Pattinson
Nick shirm
Robbie Jarvis
James Walters
James utechin
Nathan Clarke
Ryan Nielsen
Jack read
Kevin lee yi
Edward Randall
Henry Lloyd Hughes
Louis Cordice
Arthur Bowen
Will Dunn
Bertie Gilbert
Ryan Turner
1342222121222.title: Enough playing, bring out the other boys.

choices: Decide how you will serve him.
1343.content:
One second you're staring down at the tiny pale teen, the next he's jumping out of your hand and running across your bed. He knew he wasn't fooling you at all. In a single motion you quickly lean across the bed and scoop up the platinum blonde morsal. His face no longer looks calm and collected, it must have taken his best acting to keep it on as long as he did.

Tom falls onto his butt in the palm of you hand and looks up at you with fear in his eyes. Tears are streaming down his smooth colorless cheeks as his sobs shake his entire frail body. "Please, I'm just a n actor! I never thought I'd be shrunk and sold on the black market as a... as a toy!"

You smile back at him, salivating incessently, "You mean a chew toy."

Tom shivers again and you move your hand closer to your face to inspect him. You sniff the quivering boy and your nostrils are immediately filled with the frrsh smell of soap and mint shampoo. His medium-length platinum blonde hair blows towards you as you continue to inhale deeply, his struggling whetting your apetite even more. You look down again at the curled up form in your hand.

He wears baggy pants over his surprisingly muscular legs and white Van shoes with brown laces. He has a short white t-shirt on, and a small beaded necklace. His perfeclty chiseled chin sits below pearly white teeth, now hidden behind his whimpering lips and dimpled cheeks.

What shall you two play first?
1343.title: You took too long deciding! He's escaping!

135.content: You keep looking, who else is there to choose from?
135.title: Other

choices: Put him in your mouth for a while.
1351.content:
You'd like to say that it's Daniel's distinctively fashionable clothes that attract your attention, but you can't say that because he isn't wearing any. You figure he must have been captured and shrunk just as he was finishing a showing of 'Equus'. Practically smiling from ear to ear, you reach down and scoop him up. You can feel him shivering in your hand. You slowly open your fist.

"Aw, I hope I didn't scare you."
"No, no, nothing like that," says Daniel. "It's just that ...well, it is rather cold." That's why the poor guy is shivering. He's stark naked, after all. "I don't suppose you've got something I could wear?"

"Sure, you'd be nice and warm between two slices of bread, and some hot mustard should do the trick." Daniel stops shivering for a moment and looks up at you with those deep eyes.

"I ...I beg your pardon?"

"Or there's the oven, you certainly wouldn't be cold in there." Daniel now stands on your palm, petrified. The little tufts of hair on his torso are practically standing on end.

"You mean ...you mean you're going to cook me?" You try to keep a straight face and look deadly serious, but eventually you start to titter. As your laughter builds, Dan nervously joins in. He obviously thinks you were kidding. You finally bring yourself to stop.

"Nah, I'm not going to cook you. That was a joke. You'd be much more fun to eat raw." Daniel's laughter stops abruptly. He can see that you really aren't kidding this time. Your fist closes around him to stop him escaping. The feel of his skin is really quite nice, and the more he squirms, the better it feels just to hold him.

The question is, how to warm him up?
1351.title: Daniel Radcliffe

13511.content:
Well, the human mouth is naturally warm. Probably not as warm as the lining of the stomach, but Dan will feel yours sooner or later. For now, all you want to do is warm him, and perhaps torment him a little, so before he can react, you bring him up and in, all in one swift movement.

It's taking all your self control not to chew or swallow him. His flavour is erupting all over your tongue, and naturally you can taste every part of him. Every ...single ...part ...of him. You can feel him panicking, tossing to and fro in your mouth. The poor lad must be convinced he's about to be eaten. Well, ultimately he's right, but not right now. You taste him for another minute or so, then leaning forward towards the table, you carefully spit him out.

Taking deep breaths, he sits there in a pool of your saliva, slipping slightly when he tries to stand.

"You ...you tried to eat me! I could feel your tongue ...everywhere! Look at me! I'm covered in ...in ...urrgh!"

"But you're not cold anymore, are you?" you say with a wicked smile. Daniel understandably fails to see the funny side. Seeing him all wet and slippery like this gives you an idea for some entertainment. You pick out another boy, get him just as naked and slippery, and make him wrestle with Daniel. It would make quite a sight, and naturally you'd get to eat the loser. You throw a tea towel on top of Daniel so that he can dry off (you'll find something else for the two of them to wrestle in later). You look into your box and size up Daniel's potential opponents.
13511.title: In and out.

135111.content: You've narrowed your choice down to Zac or Drake. Who would you most like to see wrestle with Daniel?
135111.title: Zac Efron or Drake Bell?

1351111.content:
You fish Zac out of the box, and despite his protests, you proceed to strip him of his clothes. Just to make a point, you actually toss his clothes back into the box with the other boys, just to un-nerve them a little. Keeping a gentle grip on the naked, wriggling form of Zac Efron, you return to where Daniel has just managed to untangle himself from the tea towel, now sufficiently free of your saliva. With your free hand you grab Daniel and carry them over to a large, rectangle shaped casserole dish. You figure it's just the right size for their fight, it'll keep them from escaping, and you can always cook them in it if they try and give you any trouble.

You deposit the two naked boys into the dish, taking a moment to admire their toned splendour.

"What do you want from us?" asks Zac.

"Hmm? Oh yes," you say, finally taking your eyes off his body. "Quite simple really, I want you two to wrestle each other."

"Naked?" asks Daniel. "Isn't that a little ...you know ..."

"Hey, you're actors. Just pretend you're filming an epic movie set in Ancient Greece. They used to wrestle naked all the time. The only difference is, none of them were fighting for their lives."

"You mean ..." Zac begins.

"Yep. The loser gets eaten. The winner is spared. You could refuse, of course, but then you'd both get eaten. Doesn't seem like a sensible option to me. So, what's it going to be?"
1351111.title: The gauntlet is thrown down.

13511111.content:
Zac never saw it coming, and by 'it' I mean the heavy tackle to his toned midriff from Daniel Radcliffe. Apparently Daniel is prepared to fight for his right to not be eaten. Zac is knocked to the floor, but he shows surprising resilience and quickly rolls out of the way of Daniel's next attack. Daniel changes direction but all too late, because Zac is up and going for his waist. Zac wraps his arms around Daniel's belly and tries to get him off balance. Daniel struggles valiantly, his sweaty back rubbing against Zac's abs.
