Finally through sheer hard work, Daniel manages to loosen Zac's grip and is now facing him, though still partly locked in Zac's arms.

Needless to say, this is turning you on to no end. Anyone who didn't know they were fighting for their lives might think they're having a particularly passionate make out session. You suddenly remember what made you want to see two boys fight in the first place. The sight of Daniel covered in saliva. You look around for something to pour on the boys.
13511111.title: Let the fight begin!

135111111.content: As the two talented teens wrestle with each other, you hold two squeezy bottles in your hand. Chocolate sauce and pancake syrup. Which one should you coat the two boys in? It'll make the fight more interesting and your meal tastier when you eat the loser.
135111111.title: Chocolate sauce or pancake syrup?

1351111111.content:
You put down the pancake syrup and take the chocolate sauce bottle in both hands, holding it above the two wrestlers. You squeeze gently and a long drip of chocolate sauce falls straight onto the boys. They're so busy fighting each other that at first they don't notice, but they certainly do once they both slip and fall to the bottom of the dish. The chocolate sauce pools around them, making standing up again pretty much impossible.

Zac manages to get himself on top of Daniel and resume the match. The two begin rolling around, each trying to pin the other down long enough for a win to be declared. With each roll they become more and more covered in chocolate.
1351111111.title: Messy, messy, messy!

13511111112.content:
Something about the fight is suddenly different. You have to tilt your head closer to see what's going on, but once you do so it's very obvious what they're doing.

They're kissing!

Not just kissing, but fondling as well. They've got their hands all over each other. With Daniel currently on top, he's running his fingers rapidly up and down Zac's chocolatey torso, while Zac is gripping Daniel's shoulder with one hand and running his fingers through Daniel's hair with the other. As well as all this, their lips are locked together, kissing with such passion that it's as though each were trying to eat the other. Zac locks his legs around Daniel's, pulling him in closer.

Goodness only knows what's prompted this. Perhaps the intensity of the fight has unlocked some deeply buried feelings within the two boys. Whatever the explanation, the sight is turning you on like a light switch. You can hear little moans of pleasure coming from them both. Daniel has started kissing and licking Zac's chocolate-covered chest, while Zac himself lies back in absolute bliss. Daniel continues to move down Zac's torso ...
13511111112.title: Get it on!

135111112.content: Perhaps these two merit a thick coating of honey, or should you go for something a little more traditional and make them wrestle in pudding? Both would make the loser taste so very, very sweet.
135111112.title: Honey or pudding?

choices: You get to ten. Daniel is lunch!
13511112.content:
"Now just a minute!" exclaims Daniel. "You can't just ..." Daniel is interrupted by the fact that Zac has decided to tackle him. The two fall to the bottom of the dish, Zac just about on top of Daniel.

"So it's like that, is it?" asks Daniel, a little winded.

"Hey, I'm not about to let myself be eaten if I can help it!" cries Zac. Daniel immediately begins to fight back, trying to flip Zac off of him. Instead he manages to push Zac to the side, which then allows him to bring his leg over Zac's bare waist in an attempt to pin him down. It takes one great push, but Zac manages to send Daniel flying backwards, giving him the time he needs to stand up properly. Daniel recovers quickly from his fall and stands up as well. The two begin to circle each other, sweat glistening on their bodies. You watch with undisguised glee. This fight is possibly the most erotic thing you've ever seen.

Daniel and Zac run at each other simultaneously and grapple with each other, their arms and bodies locked together. They grunt and gasp with the effort. Finally, when it seems that their arms are deadlocked, Zac sweeps Daniel's leg with his own and knocks him to the floor. Not wasting a second, Zac pounces on Daniel and holds both his arms down while sitting on his groin. You begin the count.

"1 ...2...3....4....5 ..."
13511112.title: Fight, fight, fight!

135111121.content:
"6 ...7 ...8 ...9 ...10!"

"No!" screams Daniel as Zac slowly climbs off him.

"Oh yes!" you exclaim as you scoop up the exhausted naked form of Daniel Radcliffe. "Zac won fair and square, and now you're going to be eaten. Pretty straightforward, really." Daniel looks up at you from your clenched fist. He's dripping in sweat, nature's own seasoning. You get the feeling that he's about to start begging, but you can't concentrate on anything except how good he's going to taste and how best to prepare him.

"There's got to be something I can do ...please, I'll do anything! Just don't eat me!"
135111121.title: Lunch time.

1351111211.content:
You decide that he's going to taste too good to wait any longer. You want him glistening with sweat and, more importantly, you want him now. He can see the determination and intent in your eyes, and it causes him to panic even more.

"You ...you can't do this!"

"Oh, but I can. You're a snack, I'm the snacker. Get ready." Daniel's protests become mere whimpers as you begin raising him towards your mouth. Suddenly, you notice Zac trying to sneak away. Chuckling to yourself, you reach out with your other hand and gently push him over. He falls onto his back, and you place your forefinger on his torso, applying just enough pressure to hold him in place.

"Let me go! I won the fight!"

"That doesn't mean you get to go free. For now, you can lie there and watch Daniel being eaten, the fate that you sent him to." Taking just a moment to revel in the looks of horror on both their faces, you resume bringing Daniel closer to his doom.

You have a quick lick of his chest and belly first. His panic is producing all kinds of chemicals in his body which make him even more delicious. You force him into your mouth in one go. Head, arms, chest, belly, legs, feet, all of it. Free of your grip, he squirms and fights to get free of your mouth, but it's no good. After savouring his flavour for about a minute, you swallow him. You feel a great satisfaction as he travels down your throat and into your belly.

Seeing as Daniel was such a wonderful snack, you decide that he deserves some company in your stomach. You look down at Zac, pinned underneath your finger. He did try to escape, after all. He should be punished.
1351111211.title: Eat him raw.

13511112111.content:
You lift up your finger so that Zac can sit up. Before he can even try to stand up and run away again, you scoop him up with both hands and bring him closer to your face. As you open up your hands, he sits there on your palm, staring at you in horror.

"You tried to escape," you state very simply.

"I know ...and in retrospect I probably shouldn't have done that ...but if you could just see your way to ..."

"Letting you go?" He nods rapidly in response. "Sure, I'll let you go. Straight into my mouth!"

Zac tries to back away, but soon finds himself at the very edge of your palm, facing a rather long drop. You can still feel Daniel inside you, alive. Should you eat Zac straight away and feel them in there together, or make a proper snack of Zac by preparing him?
13511112111.title: Eat Zac too.

135111121111.content:
You don't even bother to say goodbye. You want him inside you quickly so that you can feel the sensation of having both him and Daniel in your belly. You therefore keep your hand exactly where it is, and bring your mouth to Zac. Huddled up on your palm, he lets out a short cry as you bring your open jaws down, gobbling him up in one go. You slosh that delectable body around a little to disorientate him, then quickly proceed to swallow him.

It take a little while, but you're sure that you can feel them both in there, alive and angry with each other. They must be carrying on their fight, because they're moving about in there quite ferociously. You rub your belly with immense satisfaction. They'll pass out soon enough and start to digest, their two bodies mingling together before ultimately becoming a part of yours.
135111121111.title: Eat him now!

1351111212.content:
"I'm afraid there's only one thing you can do, Daniel."

"What? What is it? I'll do anything!" he screams.

"Help me decide, should I bake you or grill you?" Daniel gives only a horrified stare and a few stuttered noises as a response. It's then that you notice that Zac is still there, as naked as Daniel, of course. Since Daniel isn't being very helpful, you might as well get Zac's opinion.

"What do you think, Zac? Should I bake him or grill him?" Daniel turns as much as he can in your grip. He looks at Zac pleadingly, hoping that Zac will think of something to get him out of this. Zac can't quite seem to look Daniel in the eye. He gives his reply.
1351111212.title: Bake or grill him.

13511112122.content:
"G-Grilling him sounds like a good idea," says Zac slowly. Daniel's look changes to one of fury. For a moment it looks like he's about to explode, then quite suddenly, he calms down. More than that, he becomes downright pleasant. He looks up at you with that charming smile on his face.

"It really does sound good. So good, in fact, that why should you stop at just grilling me? If you want a proper meal, why not throw Zac on there too?"

Zac goes from hanging his head in shame to looking up at you and Daniel so fast that he almost gets a crick in his neck. He hadn't seen this coming.

"But ...but I won ...you said the winner would ...be spared ..." he says, getting a little anxious.

"Yeah, but why should you let that stop you? You're a giant, we're only a few inches tall. No one's going to stop you eating both of us if you want to, are they?"

You look from Daniel's expression of cold smugness to Zac's look of pure panic. You have to hand it to Daniel, he knows how to get his own back. The question is, do you listen to him?
13511112122.title: Grill him.

135111121222.content:
"A nice try, Daniel ...but Zac won fair and square. He earned the right to be spared ...for now at least." You keep a firm grip on Daniel with one hand while picking Zac up with the other. You then carry him over to the box.

"Well, I hope you enjoy Daniel," Zac says as you lower him back in. "I expect he'll be delicious."

"Thank you, Zac. I'm sure you will be too, when your time comes." That last comment of yours served to wipe the smile off Zac's face. It's now hit him that although he managed to escape being eaten now, he'll have to face it again later. Now you're left alone with Daniel. He goes strangely limp in your hand as you turn on the grill.

"You're really going to do it, aren't you?" he asks. You give a simple nod as you adjust the temperature of the grill. You don't want him to cook too quickly.

"Couldn't you ...I don't know, give me some kind of sedative? I don't want to be conscious when I'm ...*gulp* ...on the grill."

You consider this for a moment. It's likely that any mild sedative would be out of his system by the time he's properly done, but then again it's not certain. You could end up feasting on him and feeling drowsy yourself. On the other hand, does he really deserve it? He did try and get Zac cooked as well. Maybe you should just drop him on there as he is, cook him and eat him. Simple as that.
135111121222.title: Just grill Daniel.

choices: Just keep Daniel on for now
1351111212222.content:
'Sorry Daniel,' you say. 'No pain, no gain!'

His face turns to one of terror as he realises what this means and you throw him on the grill. You allow Zac to watch like some bizarre spectator sport. Daniel is writhing and screaming. Zac begins to laugh and you don't like that. Should Zac go on there too?
1351111212222.title: Just throw him on there.

1351112.content:
You decide to pit Daniel against Drake. Your gut tells you that Drake will win, which will ultimately mean that Daniel will end up in your gut. However, he could surprise you.

After fishing Drake out of the box and stripping him naked, you place him gently by Daniel.

"What are you going to do to us?" asks Drake, trying his best to cover his shame.

"We're probably going to get cooked together!" exclaims Daniel. "Two of us means more meat!"

"I'm not going to do anything to the both of you. I'll only do something to one of you," you say very calmly. "The two of you will fight, and whoever gets pinned down for a count of ten will be eaten. The winner gets put back in the box."

"You can't make us!" shouts Drake.

"True, I can't literally make you fight each other ...but I can point out how foolish it would be for you to not fight each other. Refuse to fight, and I will eat you both. At least if you fight you've got a 50% chance of surviving."

The two boys think about this for a moment, then ...
1351112.title: Drake

135112.content: Hmm, Mitchell or Cody? Who would make a better opponent for Daniel in a few rounds of messy, stark naked wrestling?
135112.title: Mitchell Musso or Cody Linley?

13512.content:
You decide you're in the mood for a sandwich, and Daniel will make the perfect filling. Striding into the kitchen, you place Dan inside a water glass to keep him from escaping and so that he can have a perfect view of what awaits him. You retrieve two slices of bread and give them a light coating of butter. You go about preparing a sandwich the way you always do, with whatever fillings you particularly like. The one difference this time, naturally, is the addition of one completely naked young actor. Finally the sandwich is prepared and all it requires is Daniel ...

Then you start thinking. Maybe you should pick out another boy toy to add to your sandwich as well as Daniel. The other additives are in danger of overpowering his flavour. You may need another boy to really make this a great sandwich.
13512.title: Preparing the sandwich.

135121.content:
Secure in the knowledge that Daniel isn't going anywhere except into a sandwich, you wander back over to the box. You gaze into the vast selection of tasty young men.

"Okay guys, who wants to join Daniel in a sandwich?" There's a mad scrabble within the box. Everyone's trying to get to the side of the box in the hope that this somehow means they won't get picked. In the stampede, two boys are knocked over and are sat in the middle of the box, dazed and confused.

Which one are you going to have?
135121.title: Choose another boy.

choices: Draw it out, torment them verbally.
1351211.content:
You decide to add Frankie to your little snack. You quickly grab him before he can come to his senses and lift him out of the box.

"Wha ...where ...where am I? What are you going to do?" he asks, still a little dazed.

"Do you want the long answer or the short answer?" you ask as you carry him over to the counter where your open sandwich lies waiting, along with Daniel still trapped in the glass.

"Uh ...the long answer ..." mutters Frankie.

"Well, I'm going to strip you naked, garnish you a little, then lie you down next to an equally naked Daniel Radcliffe on a slice of bread, add some extra fillings as well as another slice of bread, then I'm going to bring you both up to my mouth and enjoy my snack."

"So ...what's the short answer?" asks Frankie as you carefully start to remove his clothes.

"I'm going to eat you."

"Brilliant," mutters Frankie. It's not long before Frankie is in the same state of undress as Daniel. You choose your favourite sauce and give them both a light coating in it. They're both fairly skinny, though Daniel is slightly plumper. However, together you know that they'll make a fantastic snack. Taking hold of them both, you carefully lie them down on the bread, their scrumptiously naked bodies rigid with terror.

"Hi, I'm Daniel Radcliffe," says Daniel, almost without thinking.

"Frankie Muniz. Great work on the Harry Potter films, by the way."

"Thanks. 'Malcolm in the Middle' is one of my favourite shows."

"It's a shame we're both about to be eaten, we could have worked together on something."

"OK, enough chatter you two," you order as you add the next slice of bread and take hold of the sandwich on both sides, holding the two of them firmly in place. "It's not polite for you to talk while I'm eating."
1351211.title: Two's company.

13512112.content:
You bring the sandwich up to your mouth, turning it so that the boys are lying on their stomachs and facing you. That way they can see exactly where they are headed. You take great delight in slowly bringing the sandwich forward, watching Daniel and Frankie squirm in vain. Just when they think they're about to be bitten in half, you stop.

"Do you guys have any idea of how great you're going to taste?" This question throws them, but not as much as the fact that you haven't eaten them yet. They turn their heads to look at each other, sharing in their mutual confusion, then they turn to look back at you.

"What kind of question is that?" asks Frankie.

"It's a very good question. You both have unique flavours, everyone does. The two of you combined, however, will make a truly one of a kind and delicious snack. Isn't that wonderful?"

Neither of them are sure of how to respond. You weren't planning on waiting for one anyway.

"Oh yes, you're both going to be very tasty. I can't wait to taste your butt in particular, Dan. It's so firm that it must have a very strong flavour. As for you, Frankie, well you've put on that nice bit of puppy fat recently, so I'll be sure to savour that. Your naked bodies will compliment the fillings surrounding you very nicely. I only hope that you ..."

"Oh for crying out loud!" screams Frankie. It seems he can't take any more. "Just eat us!" His panic over, Frankie's jaw drop with shock at what he just said.

"Thanks a bunch, Frankie," snarls Daniel. Chuckling away, you resume bringing the sandwich closer to your mouth.
13512112.title: Verbal torture.

135121122.content:
"Wait, wait! We'll give you money!" screams Frankie. This causes you to pause, simply for the purposes of further lunchtime entertainment. You turn the sandwich over in your hands so that the boys are now upright and facing you.

"Money, you say?"

"Yes, yes!" says Daniel, cottoning on. "Do you have any idea how much I make doing the Harry Potter films? Between the two of us we could pay you millions in exchange for ...well ..."

"Not eating you?"

The two boys nod vigorously. You pretend to consider this. You know full well that if you released them, they'd scarper at the first opportunity. Finally you decide it's too cruel to carry on letting them think they've actually got a chance.

"Sorry guys, but I'm not interested."

"Not interested, not interested?" cries Frankie. "How can you not be interested?"

"Think about, if I wanted to get rich, I could ransom both you two and every other boy in that box. You're all famous and make tons of money. If I wanted money then that's what I would have done already. All I'm interested in is having fun with you all, and then eventually eating you. Simple as that really. Now do be quiet while I have my snack."

You turn the sandwich back over and bring it up to your mouth. Their heads are pretty much in your mouth when you hear another panic-stricken cry.

"I have an idea! The most fun you could ever have! I have an idea!"
135121122.title: No deal, Noel.

choices: "We'll have a threesome with any other boy you care to name."
1351211221.content:
You sigh, and the two boys are so close to your mouth that their hair is ruffled by it. You turn them over once more so that you can speak to them.

"Okay, what's your idea?" you ask Frankie, as it was him that started screaming about 'the most fun you could ever have'. Frankie takes a deep breath to compose himself.

"When you say ...'have fun with us', I assume you mean making us do stuff for your entertainment, humiliating things, I'll bet."

"Where are you going with this?" asks Daniel out of the corner of his mouth. Frankie ignores him.

"Let us out of here, and we'll put on a show like you've never seen before. The most exciting ...and erotic thing you'll ever see right before your very eyes ..."

"Oh, now I see where you're going with this," mutters Daniel. He seems at a loss as to which is worse, being eaten alive or ...whatever it is Frankie is about to say.
1351211221.title: Hear them out.

choices: They'd like to get cleaned up.
13512112211.content:
"We will?" asks Dan incredulously.

"Yes, we will," says Frankie firmly. "If it keeps us from being eaten. Swear not to eat us, and Dan and I will ...get down and dirty ..."

Dan cringes, probably more at the fact that Frankie actually said 'down and dirty' than anything else. You stop to consider this, it might actually make for good watching ...and you can always eat them afterwards anyway. Even better, why not get them to do it under direct threat of being eaten?

"I admit, I find the thought ...interesting. However, if I agree to release you from the sandwich, there will be a condition. If at any point I think you two aren't being ...'convincing' enough in your efforts to pleasure each other ...then you'll both be eaten. So, make it good ...or I'll make you into lunch. Agreed?"

"That's fair enough. We promise to put on a good show ...but you have to promise to release us once we're done," says Frankie. He scrutinises every aspect of your expression, looking for any signs of deception. You give him none. You put the sandwich back down on the table and remove the top slice of bread and the fillings, letting Dan and Frankie get up. Their naked bodies are covered in crumbs and sandwich fillings.

"You have my word. Now, would you like to clean yourselves up first, or get straight to it?" Asking such a polite but entirely unnecessary question reinforces your facade of trustworthiness. You plan to eat them once they're done, but for the moment they have to think that you're friendly enough to be trusted.
13512112211.title: "Dan and I will have sex."

choices: Get Daniel or Frankie to choose.
13512112212.content:
"Ah, I see. Hoping to bring some other poor boy into your situation?" you say semi-accusingly.

"Well ...it's not like ...I guess you could say ..."

"Relax, Frankie. I think it's a great idea. The question is, who to choose?"

"Um, don't I get a say in this?" asks Daniel.

"You can either put on a good show for me or refuse and get eaten. That's how much of a say you get," you say sternly. You resume your ponderings, trying to think of who you'd like to see getting fresh and freaky with Frankie and Daniel. It's got to be someone you wouldn't mind eating either, because that's what's going to happen to all three boys at some point or another. Maybe you should make Frankie or Daniel choose. Forcing Daniel to choose might be rather amusing, seeing as he's the least enthusiastic about this whole idea.
13512112212.title: "We'll have a threesome with any other ...

135121122121.content:
Your head is swimming with all the hot, sexy and delicious boys in that box. It's going to be a tough decision, choosing one to have a threesome with Daniel and Frankie.

Your mind first wanders to the image of Tom Felton. Harry Potter making out with Draco Malfoy ...with Malcom helping out. You'd like to see that. Then again there's Frankie's co star Justin Berfield. You take your time with this decision. After all, the boys are still trapped in the sandwich. They're not going anywhere.
135121122121.title: Make your own choice.

1351211221211.content: Your gut instinct is telling you that it's got to be one of these two. Is it going to be Daniel's co star, or Frankie's?
1351211221211.title: Draco or Reese?

1351211221212.content: So neither Tom nor Justin tickle your fancy. What about Zac Efron? Just imagine him entangling his body round Daniel or Frankie. He's certainly athletic enough to make it a sight worth seeing. Then again, there's Jamie Bell. He's cute in his own way, and if things went badly you know that you'd have no hesitation about eating him.
1351211221212.title: Who else ...

13512112212122.content: If not those two, then how about Elijah Wood? He's what they call adorkable. Of course there's always his Lord of the Rings co-star, Dominic Monaghan. Very tasty. Will you choose one of these two to have a threesome with Daniel and Frankie?
13512112212122.title: Think, think, think.

135121122121221.content: So, you decide that some sweet Hobbit meat is required for this potential meal. That is, if their performance ultimately fails to please you. Who should you introduce to this little threesome? Elijah or Dominic?
135121122121221.title: Elijah or Dominic

135121122121222.content:
Endless possibilities swin through your head, and it's now that you realise that if you don't make a decision now, you never will. Then it hits you, Alfie Allen! Better known as Lily Allen's little brother! He took over Daniel's role in the touring production of 'Equus'! Seeing them together would be amazing! Plus, if he should decide to refuse, you have a feeling that the two of them together would make an excellent meal ...with Frankie on the side.

The question is this, is he actually in the box? Scooping up the naked forms of Daniel and Frankie, you stride back over to the box and look for him.
135121122121222.title: The final choice.

1351211221212222.content:
You scan the entire box, but he's not in there. No fault of his own, of course. Eventually he'll be caught, shrunken and sold to become a play thing and snack, but not this time round. Still, you can't help but feel disappointed. Clutched within your fist, Daniel pipes up.

"Um, anything the matter?"

"Hmm? Oh, I was hoping to find Alfie Allen in here for the threesome you proposed. Turns out he's not here. Pity ...I was really looking forward to seeing you all get into each other."

"Never mind," says Frankie. "You could always choose someone else."

"No," you say rather bluntly. This takes the boys by surprise.

"N-no?"

"No. I've gone off the idea. I had my heart set on using Alfie and he's not here. I'm just going to go back to the original plan, which is eating you both."

"But ...but ...but you can't!" exclaims Frankie. "We were going to show you the most excitement you've ever seen! It was going to be hot! We were going to ..."

"Knock it off, Frankie," grumbles Daniel. "It's not going to save us anymore."

You take the two tasty teens back over to the discarded sandwich. You could insert them back in, but it's already got kind of messed up with all their previous struggles. Then again, all this talk and delay has made you hungry. Why not just eat them both as they are?
1351211221212222.title: Alas!

13512112212122222.content:
"I can't be bothered to put you back in the sandwich. I'm just going to eat you both as you are."

You decide to have Daniel first, seeing as you picked him out of the box before Frankie. The look of grumpy determination on your face shows Daniel that there's absolutely no hope of persuading you not to eat him. Hopelessness sets in as he finds himself being raised up to your mouth. He doesn't utter a single noise, but winces visibly as he is very directly inserted into your mouth. You push him inside in one go, closing your lips behind him. You decide to savour him a little before swallowing, though of course ultimately you're hungry and want to start digesting him sooner rather than later. After a few sloshes around the mouth, you swallow the slender and tasty Daniel. Wasting no time, you lift up Frankie, still clutched in the other hand. He's been watching all this with a look of utmost horror on his face.

"Don't do this! Please, I'll do anything! Just don't eat ..." He doesn't get to finish his sentence as he quickly finds himself enveloped in the darkness of your closed mouth. He's plumper than Daniel, and tastes a great deal like pork. Your tongue sends him rolling round the inside of your mouth, letting you get a most intimate taste. Finally, just like Daniel, you take a great gulp and swallow him.

The disappointment of not having Alfie in your box is still quite strong. In short, you're down in the dumps and eating two boys alive didn't seem to help. Maybe you should eat to forget your disappointment? Perhaps a diversion might be more helpful ...a little bit of torture ...
13512112212122222.title: Eat them now.

135121122122.content: You've decide to make one of the boys choose their bed buddy. You intend to get a quick decision out of one of them, or they face being eaten instantly. So, who gets to decide?
135121122122.title: Get Daniel or Frankie to choose.

choices: The string across his chest breaks.
13513.content:
Keeping Daniel trapped in your fist, you wonder over to the oven and turn on one of the front burners.

"I thought you said you weren't going to cook me!" Daniel yells. You roll your eyes.

"Oh, calm down. I'm not going to hurt you, and believe me you'll still be alive when I eat you. I'm just going to warm you up a little, give you a light toasting, as it were."

"And just how do you plan to do that?!" he shouts. Having already thought of this, you retrieve a long wooden spoon from the side counter and some string. With surprising skill you manage to tie Daniel to the handle of the spoon, tying him across the legs and his chest. You tie his hands together behind him as well, so as to keep his arms pinned to his sides. Ignoring his pleas, you turn the gas on the hob so that it's an orange flame. No sense in burning your snack.

"I'm begging you, please don't do this!"

"Would you rather that I shut you in the oven, or jammed you into the toaster?" Daniel simply falls silent. "Yeah, I didn't think so. You'll barely feel a thing." Holding the top end of the spoon, you position Daniel so that he's a few inches above the flame. He's being warmed by it but is in no danger of being burnt. You turn him slowly every few seconds. You're reminded of toasting marshmallows around the campfire, though of course he'll be much tastier than a simple marshmallow.
13513.title: Toast him ever so lightly.

1352.content:
You're curious as to whether choosing an older, more mature boy will mean that he tastes better. You decide to endulge this theory by choosing Robert Pattinson from your box of boyish delights. He's got the kind of good looks that appeal to something quite ineffable within you. As hard as it is, you put aside any thoughts of actually consuming him for now. You want to conduct your little taste test first. Gripping his legs, you pull off his shirt.

"Just what do you think you're doing?" he demands. Taking your eyes off his gorgeously gulpable torso for a second, you look him directly in the eyes.

"Oh relax, I'm not going to hurt you. You're actually going to help me with a little test."

"What kind of test?" he asks warily.

"A taste test, if you must know." Robert starts struggling against the grip of your fist, twisting and turning in an effort to free himself. It's fairly obvious he's got at least some idea of what you mean by a 'taste test'. His efforts are futile, of course, so you ignore him for a second and focus on who to compare him with. You need a younger boy to see if Robert's age will make a difference to his taste.
1352.title: Robert Pattinson

13521.content: You've narrowed down your choice. Daniel or Rupert? Daniel's the younger out of the two so he might be the better choice in order for you to really test your theory.
13521.title: Harry or Ron?

choices: Daniel's flavour appeals to you more.
135211.content:
Still holding Robert in one hand, you fish Daniel out of the box. You transfer him to the same hand as Robert so that you've got one hand free to undress him.

"Hi Dan," mutters Robert.

"Hey Rob, what's going on here?" asks Daniel.

"Apparently, we're to take part in a 'taste test'."

"That's right," you say as you drop Daniel's shirt to the floor. "I want to see who tastes better out of the two of you. Will the fact that Robert is older make him taste better? That's what you two are going to help me find out."

Now that Daniel is sufficiently shirtless, you transfer him back to the other hand. He's shaking a little, while Robert is eerily calm. That usually means that he's thinking of a way to escape. Best keep an eye on him.

"You both look equally delicious, especially since you bulked up recently, Robert."

"Thanks for the compliment," says Robert casually. He's definitely planning something.

"However, the proof of the pudding ...is in the eating," you say as you raise Robert up to your mouth. Strangely he doesn't even flinch as you pop his upper half straight into your mouth. Usually in this situation your meal is struggling like crazy, but Robert isn't even moving. You've got to admire his nerves. Your tongue caresses him, paying particular attention to his head and belly. He has a distinctly meaty flavour to him, and you can't help but wonder how cooking him would enhance such a naturally strong flavour. You finally remove him, and take a few seconds to ponder his taste.

"How was I?" asks Robert, blinking through the saliva covering his face.

"Hmm, exquisite ...but now to see if my theory is true." Daniel lets out a strangled cry that is quickly cut off as his head enters your waiting maw. As your lips close gently on his waist, you can feel him struggling inside you. Now this is a more typical response. Obviously Dan doesn't have Robert's nerves of steel. That's not all that he doesn't have either. He tastes good, but it doesn't compare to Robert and his mature, meaty flavour.
135211.title: Who tastes better, Cedric or Harry?

1352111.content:
You remove Dan from your mouth. As he splutters and gags, you contemplate the different tastes of the two young men. There's no question, Robert is much tastier. You inform them of your decision, and while Dan sighs with relief, Robert still seems fairly casual. He's doing a very good job of keeping his cool considering what's about to happen to him. You deposit a grateful Dan back in the box and turn your full attention to Robert.

"So my theory is correct, slightly older boys do taste better. The next question is, how to eat you? What do you think, Robert?"

"Personally, I don't think your theory has been proven right or wrong yet." This answer throws you slightly. You narrow your eyes suspciously.

"What do you mean?"

"I mean you've only compared me to one other boy. Surely if you're going to conduct a proper test, you should compare me to at least three other boys, maybe even more. You've certainly got plenty of them in that box, why not choose a few of the younger ones and taste them too?"

You think about this for a second. It's most likely a ploy to buy some time and then escape. On the other hand, you're intrigued by the thought of tasting a few more boys.
1352111.title: Carry on the test?

13521111.content:
"Okay then, we'll carry on with the taste test, but don't think for a second that I don't know what you're up to, Robert." You reach out with your free index finger and gently stroke Robert's naked torso. "You're far too tasty for me to put off eating you indefinitely. Even if I do find someone else who tastes better than you, you will become a snack sooner or later."

"I'll keep that in mind," says Robert slowly.

You take Robert over to the open box and peer inside. There's such a wide range of good looking young celebrities in there that it's hard to choose. An idea pops into your head. Why not make Robert choose the next boy? Give him the responsibility of deciding who faces the possibility of being eaten instead of him.
13521111.title: Back over to the box.

135211111.content: On second thought, it's easier just to choose someone yourself. You're still looking for someone younger than Robert, so who to choose?
135211111.title: You choose yourself.

135211112.content:
"Why don't you choose, Robert?" you ask quite casually.

"What?"

"You choose someone to take part in the taste test. Don't let the fact that you may be choosing someone to end up in my belly hinder you. After all, it's you or them." Still clutched in your fist, you hold Robert over the open box. He finds himself being watched by dozens of faces. Some look scared, some look angry. Robert isn't sure who they're angry at. Are they angry at him for even considering putting one of them in the same situation he's in? Guilt gnaws at him.

"What happens if I refuse to choose?"

"Then I'll eat you anyway, and I'll make sure to draw out the process of preparing you, plus I'll make sure you're still alive as you slide down my throat. You'll be able to feel yourself being digested. This is the only chance you have of putting off that process."

Robert looks back down into the box.
135211112.title: Making Robert choose.

choices: Rupert is the tastier of the two.
1352111121.content:
"I choose ...Rupert ...Rupert Grint," says Robert quietly, hanging his head in shame. He's unable to look Rupert in the eye as you remove him from the box and transfer him to the same hand as Robert, so that you have a hand free to start stripping him. A tiresome process at times, but necessary and ultimately rewarding.

"Why? Why me, Robert?"

"It ...it's nothing personal, Rupert ...I had to choose someone ...I was going to be eaten ...what would you have done?"

"I would have died!" yelled Rupert. "I would have died rather than betray my friends!" Rupert pauses for a second, a confused look on his face. "That sounded familiar ..."

"It's from the third film, Sirius Black I think ..." says Robert.

"Oh yeah ... that was a great scene to film."

"Uh, if you two are quite finished, I'm ready to start the test again." Rather than wait for their approval (as if you need it), you quickly bring Robert back up to your mouth. You want a little reminder of how he tastes. You lick his face, shoulders and back. It turns out to taste just as good as his front.

"Right, your turn, Rupert!" You bring Rupert up to your mouth, ignoring the way he flinches. You start by licking his face and hair, which yields up a suprisingly peppery taste. Not too strong, but just enough to give him that extra zest. You slowly place his upper body into your mouth and your tongue begins to explore. His muscular torso is proving to contain a great deal of meaty flavour, and his nipples in particular are tingling your taste buds. It's not often that you can distinguish parts of a boy so specifically, but Rupert's nipples are certainly proving to be the tastiest part of him ...so far.
1352111121.title: Robert chooses Rupert.

choices: Prepare him to be eaten raw.
13521111211.content:
You slowly remove Rupert from your mouth, getting one long taste of him as he exits. He looks flustered, which is understandable really. You look him in the eye.

"It looks like my theory was a little premature. You definitely taste better than Robert." You hear Robert sigh and laugh nervously, still clutched in your other hand. "Don't get too comfortable though, Robert. You're still going to end up inside me one of these days." You take him back over to the box. "Do have fun waiting for that inevitable day in a box full of boys who know you were prepared to risk their lives to save yours."

You casually drop him back into the box, taking a moment to listen to the curses and yells of the other boys in the box. Robert is not exactly man of the moment in there. Walking away from the box, you now place your full attention on your red haired snack.

"I ...I can't have tasted that good ..." says Rupert timidly.

"Oh, but you did. You're possibly one of the tastiest teens I've ever had. A meal like you calls for proper consideration. A flavour like yours deserves careful preparation."

"Or you could put me back in the box and save me for a special occasion?" suggests Rupert, smiling weakly. You smile wickedly.

"Nice try."
13521111211.title: Rupert is tasty, tasty, tasty!

135211112112.content:
"I don't think I'll cook you ..." you say almost to yourself as you finish undressing Rupert.

"That's good to hear ...hey! Those are my pants!"

"And very nice they are too, though not as nice as ...well." You indicate Rupert's naked body, devouring him with your eyes before you start making preparations to actually devour him.

"So what are you going to do with me?"

"Kindly don't rush me, Rupert. I'm deciding whether I should make you into a sweet or a savoury snack."

"Do you have to make me into a snack at all?" You raise an eyebrow in response.

"Ask a silly question ..."
135211112112.title: Prepare him.

1352111121121.content:
You decide that Rupert would be best served as a sweet dessert. With that in mind, you wonder if you should perhaps prepare a meal of teenage celebrities first and then eat Rupert afterwards. Well, one thing at a time. Rupert needs sorting out first.

"You're awfully sweet, Rupert."

"Um ...thank you ...I think," says Rupert slowly.

"So I've decided to make you my dessert. It'll mean preparing and leaving you for a while, but I'm sure you'll be worth it. Plus, I'm entirely sure that you won't do anything stupid like try to escape." You narrow your eyes, bring him closer to your face and speak in a dark tone. "Because such an action on your part would have dire consequences for you. When I'm through with you you'll beg me to eat you, simply because it will mean a quick end. Do we understand one another?"

Mere inches away from your face, Rupert nods rapidly. His whole body is tense, which emphasises his muscles. Keeping him trapped in your fist, you start contemplating what to do to him. You could always set him in some jelly (jello). That certainly sounds appetising. A plate of wobbling jelly with a delicious centre. On the other hand you could encase him in melted chocolate, then let it cool and harden around him. Turn him into a meaty, ginger centred chocolate bar. Both choices sound so wonderful, but which to go for?
1352111121121.title: Sweet!

13521111211211.content:
You decide to set Rupert in a bowl of jelly. It'll mean leaving him in the fridge while he sets, but you're sure you can think of a few things to do while you wait.

You pick out a suitably deep bowl and casually pop Rupert inside. After having one last glance at his spendid naked form, you open up the cupboard above the counter and look at the available jelly cubes. Which would go best with Rupert?
13521111211211.title: Jelly

135211112112111.content: What are you in the mood for? Strawberry or lime? Entirely up to you.
135211112112111.title: Strawberry or lime?

1352111121121111.content:
Maybe it's his red hair, but you get the feeling that Rupert will go very well with strawberry jelly. You therefore tip several cubes into the bowl with Rupert, who covers his head as they fall all around him. He's shivering with fear, but the hot water you're about to add to the jelly cubes should warm him up.

Not seeing fit to warn him, you begin slowly pouring the water in. You are, however, not entirely without mercy. You don't pour the hot water right on top of him. You pour it in at the side of the bowl so that it can slowly pool around him. He cries out at first and hops up and down in an attempt to get away from the rising water, but eventually his body gets used to it. You keep pouring until the water is up to his chest. Once the jelly sets he should be fairly well trapped inside it.

"Now, listen here, Rupert. You might be tempted to eat your way out of the jelly once it sets in some half-baked plan to escape. Keep in mind that the bowl is rather deep, and eating any of the jelly is only going to make you plumper and sweeter for me when I eat you. It really would be better for you to stay perfectly still and simply be eaten as part of the jelly. Got that?"

Before Rupert can answer, you open the fridge door and place the bowl inside, shutting the door behind you. It'll take a while for the jelly to set, so in the meantime you decide to fish out either Daniel or Robert once again. They thought they were safe, but now one of them will become your plaything while you wait for your strawberry snack to set.
1352111121121111.title: Strawberry

135211112112112.content: So which is it to be? Which will compliment Rupert's powerful flavour?
135211112112112.title: Blackcurrant or raspberry?

choices: Chocolate is sweet enough thank you.
13521111211212.content: One last option, would you like to eat him encased in a chocolate cocoon as is, or just drench him in the fudge and sit him atop a sundae?
13521111211212.title: Chocolate

135211112112121.content:
You decide you really fancy a boy centred chocolate bar, so you start heating up some chocolate. With the chocolate bubbling away, you start to fish around in one of the nearby cupboards for a mould. Finally you find it. It's your own design, tailor made for encasing teenage boys in delicious substances. The mould is rectangular, tall and thin, just wide enough for the boy to fit in but too tall for them to be able to climb out. All you have to do is place the boy inside, pour in the liquid until it reaches their shoulders, leave it to set and then open up the special hinges on the mould. Presto, one perfectly set chocolate bar, complete with a still live meaty centre.

Placing the mould upright on the counter, you alter your grip on Rupert so that you can lower him into it.

"What's that thing? What are you going to do with me?" Rupert asks anxiously.

"Snacks shouldn't ask so many questions. It get's them eaten before they're ready," you say as you lower Rupert's naked form into the mould. You instruct him to stand upright with his arms by his side, which he does for fear of angering you. You then retrieve the melted chocolate. You can feel that it's pleasantly warm, rather than overly hot.

"I suggest you stand very still, Rupert." Before he can ask why, you begin pouring the chocolate into the mould. It pools round Rupert's feet and slowly creeps up his body. You stop pouring just as it reaches his shoulders. His delicious head is pretty much all you can see in a pool of equally delicious chocolate.

"Now, don't think of doing anything stupid like drinking the chocolate before it sets. Spoil my snack for me and I shall be very upset. Do you know what I like to do when I'm upset, Rupert?"

He shakes his head, causing ripples in the chocolate.

"I take a shrunken teenage boy, and I make his life miserable. I make things so bad for him that he ends up begging me to finish it by eating him. I find the whole process just cheers me up."

"Then ...then I won't try anything stupid ..." says Rupert quietly.

"Good boy," you say as you carefully pick up the mould, open the fridge and place it inside. Closing the fridge door behind you, you start to think of what you can do while your snack hardens.
135211112112121.title: Chocolate Rupert bar!

choices: Eat Rupert first, then the sundae.
135211112112122.content:
When you think of how long a chocolate bar would take to set and harden, you decide on something else. A chocolate fudge sundae, with a lovely ginger coloured cherry on top. You place Rupert inside a nearby tupperware tub while you make the preparations.

You start by adding several scoops of vanilla ice cream to the sundae bowl. In between scoops you add a few squirts of chocolate sauce. When the bowl is half full, you then add just a smidge of hot fudge to go on the top layer of icecream. The rest of the fudge you then proceed to pour all over Rupert, who wasn't entirely expecting this. He splutters and curses as he tries to keep his balance in the tub, but the fudge causes him to slip and fall on his pert little backside. You carefully take hold of Rupert, keeping your other hand underneath him in case he slips from your grip. You fix him with a stare.

"Now, be a good boy and do exactly as you're told. When I put you down on the sundae, you're going to sit with your legs crossed. That should stop you from sinking straight into the ice cream. Got it?" Rupert moves his head in what you assume to be a nod. You place him on top of the sundae, and sure enough, he sits with his legs crossed. The cold ice cream in contrast with the hot fudge is causing him some discomfort, but then again he's not here to be comfortable. He's here to be eaten. Now that he's in position, you take a tube of whipped cream and start spraying it carefully onto the sundae around Rupert, until only his shoulders and head are poking out.

You pick up a spoon and grin. It's time to eat.
135211112112122.title: Sundae time!

1352111121121221.content:
You dip your spoon into the whipped cream, right under where Rupert is sitting. As you bring the spoon back up, the bottom of the spoon has picked up some of the fudge, while on top sits some delicious whipped cream ...and Rupert himself.

"Please don't do this ..." he whimpers.

Opening your mouth wide, you maneovour the spoon and its contents inside, closing your lips around it. You slowly pull the spoon out, taking off the layers of fudge. Rupert sits in your mouth, whole and covered in whipped cream and fudge. He's knocked from his sitting position by your tongue as you start to relish his strong meaty flavour. The sweetness of the fudge and cream compliments him very well. You can feel him trying to grip your tongue, but he's too slippery to maintain a proper grasp. You lash him around with your tongue for a few more moments until you can feel that most of the cream is gone. You then give one big gulp and swallow the sticky young man right down. He tasted so very sweet.

You proceed to eat the rest of the sundae. It all seems to taste even better than usual, Rupert's strong aftertaste enhancing the flavour of every spoonful. Finally you finish the last little bit and leave the spoon resting in the bowl. You rub your belly with satisfaction, wondering if Rupert is still alive in there. Doesn't matter. He'll soon be digested.

Having just finished a hearty dessert, you decide it's time for some fun. You wonder if you should take Robert Pattinson out again. It might be fun to torment him now that he thinks he's safe for the immediate future. Then again, maybe you should choose someone else to play with.
1352111121121221.title: Eat Rupert first, then the sundae.

choices: Tip him out of the bowl and into your mouth.
1352111121121222.content:
Rupert seems convinced that he'll be first into your mouth, so it comes as something of a surprise when you start by taking a scoop out of the cream surrounding him, then a second spoonful out of the ice cream he's sitting on. You carry on eating around him and all the time he doesn't move from his sitting position. As the sundae disappears around him, he sinks lower and lower into the bowl.

"Are you ..." he starts, but seems to nervous to finish.

"Yes?"

"Are you going to eat me soon? I ...I can't take much more of this." Chuckling to yourself, you just continue to eat the ice cream, until finally all that's left is a few traces of melted ice cream and fudge, too small to be properly scooped up. All that really remains is Rupert, who is positively dripping with everything you added to the sundae itself.

He is going to be so very, very sweet.
1352111121121222.title: Leave Rupert until last.

13521111211212222.content:
You pick the bowl up with both hands and raise it up to your mouth. You fix Rupert with a hungry look and lick your lips, the sight of which causes him to panic and attempt to escape. He's too covered in melted ice cream and sauce to get anywhere. He just slips and slides and stays pretty much in the centre of the bowl.

Putting the rim of the bowl to your lips, you open your mouth wide and slowly begin tipping the bowl up. Still scrambling uselessly, Rupert begins sliding towards your open mouth. He tries desperately to grab on to something, but he's too slippery himself to get a good grip on anything. He quickly slides off the rim of the bowl and straight into your mouth. You quickly seal your lips behind him and tilt your head forward to prevent him from sliding straight down your throat. You start to caress his body with your tongue, his meaty taste mingling ever so wonderfully with the richness of the ice cream he's coated in. He is delicious! Unfortunately, it's not long before your tongue completely clears him of his cream coating, and you're left with just Rupert. Not that this takes anything away from his magnificent flavour, but you decide that it's time to finish him. With one great gulp, Rupert slides head first down your throat to await digestion in your stomach. You wipe the remnants of ice cream and sauce from your mouth.

"Hmm ...very tasty ...but I'm still hungry ..."
13521111211212222.title: Tip him out of the bowl and into your mouth.

choices: He comes up with something good.
He comes up with a real stinker.
135211112112122221.content:
As the shouts of the other boys have really become alarmingly loud now, you decide that you should probably do Robert a favour and fish him out of the box. He's been pushed about quite a bit in there, but is relatively unharmed as you hoist him out. Still in the state of undress that you last saw him, he sits on your palm, panting heavily.

"I thought ...I'd never get out of there alive ..." he gasps.

"No, this is where you'll never get out of alive," you say as you rub your belly. He glances from your mouth to your belly nervously. He must be imagaining the journey that Rupert faced getting from one to the other, a journey that he may soon be taking himself.

"How ...how was Rupert?"

"Very delicious. Thank you for asking. However, I'm still feeling very peckish, and I know from experience how good you taste." You pull off what remains of his clothes while he stutters through the usual protests. You take hold of his leg with your thumb and forefinger and dangle his naked form over your mouth. You open wide. He flinches as he gets closer and closer ...he feels himself stop moving. Daring to open his eyes, he can see that your mouth is closed.

"I'm prepared to give you one last sporting chance. I won't eat you if you can come up with one very good reason why I shouldn't. Keep in mind that it has to convince me, so none of that 'I want to live' stuff. Try and think of something you can offer me."

"Well, would you mind putting me down first? It's hard to think when you're being held upside down over a giant mouth," asks Robert, unsure of whether to believe his luck or not.

"Of course," you say as you gently put him down on the nearby tabletop. Once he's got to his feet, you fold your arms and stare at him intently, waiting to hear what he has to say.
135211112112122221.title: Bring Robert back out.

choices: Oh no, it's time to eat.
13521111212.content:
"Hmm ...well, Rupert certainly has a powerful flavour ...but I think Robert is still the tastier."

"What?" exclaims Robert. "You just said Rupert's flavour was powerful! You never said that about me! How can I taste better?"

"Well, you have a more mature, seasoned taste for a start. Besides, Rupert's taste only lasts for one quick burst. You have a longer lasting aftertaste, Robert ...and it's just as good."

"Brilliant," mutters Robert. You casually drop Rupert back into the box, ignoring his statements of gratitude. He'll change his tune when you do eventually eat him.

"So, that's two boys you've proved to be tastier than. It certainly looks like you're on the fast track to the dinner plate, Robert."

"Third time's the charm?" says Robert hopefully.
13521111212.title: You still prefer Robert.

135211112121.content:
Robert is looking at you with those beautiful brown eyes and a big, helpless smile on his face. You cave.

"Oh, go on then. Just one more, mind ... and then whoever turns out to the tastier is definitely going to be eaten. Got that?" Robert nods, though of course you know that should he lose the next taste test, he will of course plead with you for one more. What potential meal wouldn't? You're on your way back to the box when he pipes up.

"I was just thinking, why not choose someone who's older than me? It seems sensible to me. If he turns out to taste better than I do, then that's one step closer to proving your theory."

"And if he turns out to not be as scrumptious as you are?" Robert merely gulps in response. He obviously doesn't want to think about that. He may have a point, come to think of it. Should you stick with your current method and choose someone younger than Robert, or find someone older to taste?
135211112121.title: Okay, one more taste test.

1352111121211.content: So, you've decided to choose someone older. There's only a few delicious older boys in your box to choose from, but selecting one of them may go a long way towards proving your theory.
1352111121211.title: Older

13521112.content:
After careful consideration, you decide against further taste testing. It was a nice idea, but now you're hungry. You want Robert, and you want him now. Without a word you start to undress the rest of him.

"Wait just a second! Think about this!" says Robert as yo pull his trousers off with one swift tug. "Think about all the boys in there you could compare me to! There's just got to be one that's tastier than me, there just has to be! Your theory hasn't been proven yet ..."

"Oh, do shut up, Robert." You remove the last of his clothes. Naked and trapped in your fist, Robert is entirely helpless. He realises that pleading with you won't help.

"I hope I give you indegestion!" he snarls. Ignoring this, you raise him up to your mouth and dunk him in, head first. His meaty flavour explodes over your taste buds as you slosh him round your mouth and savour him. You can feel him struggling, punching against the sides of your mouth. Well, if that's the way he wants to be. You bring your teeth down and begin chewing him up. The punching stops immediately as Robert is mushed up, ready for swallowing. He's not quite as crunchy as you'd expect, even his bones are easily snapped by your powerful jaws. You finally swallow and everything that was Robert Pattinson goes down your throat in one big gulp. You can feel part of him stuck in your teeth so you take out a toothpick and remove it.

"He was a sore loser," you say as you flick the toothpick away. "But he was exceedingly tasty."
13521112.title: Just eat Robert.

13522.content: Hmm, Zac or Corbin? Corbin's the younger, but who is your instinct telling you to choose?
13522.title: Troy or Chad?

13523.content: Okay, so Devon is younger than Tom. The choice is yours, and yours alone. Neither Tom nor Devon get much of a say in the matter.
13523.title: Seamus or Draco?

135231.content:
In the interests of science as well as your insatiable interest in tasty young men, you decide to go for the younger of the two and scoop Devon Murray out of the box. In the interests of fairness, you naturally need to make sure that Devon is in the same state of undress as Robert. Devon's shorter than Robert, but you find that the two are almost equal in muscle tone. Grasping the two shirtless actors, one in each hand, you raise them both up to eye level.

"Okay you two, who goes first?"

"But what exactly are you going to do?" asks Devon in that gorgeous accent of his.

"It's a 'taste test'," says Robert grumpily.

"A what?"

For a moment he places Phelps back in the box. Phelps listens helplessly as the toy maker works with the cardboard making a few holes. Soon the toy maker's massive face reappears above the box and the giant's hand returns to capture its prey.

The toymaker wastes no time. Phelps is helplessly forced against the piece of cardboard with a single thumb while his protesting arms and legs are bound with the tie downs. Phelp's little tummy gets butterflies when the toy maker finishes and lifts the cardboard up for inspection. Phelps is now quite securely fastened against the surface of the card board the only movement he can make is to make his feckless hands into tiny fists and ball up his athletic little feet.

Phelps screams out in continued protest, but is silenced as his tiny form is placed again into the box and the lid is closed. The toy maker now.
145122112211.title: The toy maker picks Phelps up.

1451221122111.content: You are one of the world's weathiest people. While attending the olympics, you encountered a special vendor that specializes in miniturizing starts for his clients play and consumption. Unfortunately Michael Phelps was the star attraction and ended up being your selection. Your butler intrurrupts your thoughts to inform you a package has been delivered. You ask for privacy as you enter your quarters and inspect the box.

14512211221111.content: You tear open the lid of the box and peer inside. Michael Phelps peers back. His muscular little body struggles against the plastic restraints that have kept him fixed to a cardboard base. You chuckle with joy as you commence to pull the base from the box and inspect your little purchase up close. He is wearing that cool swim suit and his hair is longer than it was when you agreed to make the purchase. Even at 2 inches his feet are relatively huge.

145122112211111.content:
"Hey! Hey!" Michael had spent hours with nothing but a few dim strands of light coming from the breathing holes in the side of his cardboard prison. Terrified as he was after a few hours he had managed to fall asleep. His restless sleep was disrupted with the sound of scratching cardboard and a burst of light.

A man's massive face looked down at him. Phelps tried to move but once again felt the ties pinning him down. Michael noticed the lips of the massive figure part as his tongue swept past.

1451222.content: How about we make it easier to select? We'll go by the kind of sport, starting with swimming hotties like Ryan Lochte, Eamon Sullivan, Grant Hackett.

14512221.content: Ryan Lochte, Eamon Sullivan, Grant Hackett, or Tom Daley?

1451222111.content:
Chase Kalisz just qualified to compete in the 2016 Olympics! He has returned home and is in his home preparing for the next set of training when he receives a knock at the door. There is no one there, but he finds a shoe box on the front step. On top of the box Chase find's a note:

Hey Kid!

Good job on beating out Ryan Lochte for the olympics. Enclosed you will find Lochte who has been shrunken to a mere three inches in height. Per tradition he is yours to play with but in the end you will have to swallow him whole. You have earned this!

Enjoy!

Shrunken Toys Incorporated
1451222111.title: Uh dude yeah totally!

14512221111.content:
Chase Kalisz looks at the letter in disbelief. With eyes wide the young swimmer slowly lifts the lid of the shoe box.

Ryan is in darkness, he remembers loosing his bid for the olympics and was on his way home when a drone came down out of nowhere. The last few hours he has shouted into the darkness and felt his way around the stale air filled dark room with no luck. Just as he was about to shout again for help the roof of the room began to make loud scratching sounds. Suddenly bright light flooded into the room forcing Ryan to shield his eyes... Slowly the room came into view. All brown particle board, no windows or doors. Ryan's eyes trailed upward to see a giant face peering back down upon him. "Uh hello! Hey man, like what is this"

Chase heard Ryan's squeaking request. "I don't really know Ryan, someone delivered you to my door and said I should eat you."

Ryan's face took on a dead behind the eyes look ... "Uh bro that is fucked up! So like you gotta get me to someone who can reverse this!"
14512221111.title: Open the box

145122211112.content:
Ryan's eyes go wide as Chase's massive hand sweeps over him. "Whoa! Like what are you doing man? Let me go! Hey!" Chase corners Ryan and plucks him up by the back of his grey sweatshirt, his green designer sneakers leaving the solid surface for what would be the last time. Kicking and squirming the beefy aging swimmer finds himself hurled upward in a blur. Chase's features now loom before Ryan as he hangs helplessly his lats tensened to hold im inside his hoodie.

"I suppose it would be best if I took off your clothes." Chase's voice sounding matter-of-fact as he reaches out with his left hand. Ryan tries to withdraw only to find a thumb and forefinger prying off his right shoe.

Chase lifts the dislodged sneaker up to his massive nostril and takes a sniff. "Hmmm smells good." his voice expressing surprise. Ryan watches his shoe as it is set down into the box and the hand swiftly approaches to pry free the second. "Dude this is crazy! You don't really want to eat me do you?" Ryan's normally chill voice wavers a bit as it squeaks out.

Chase ponders the tiny man's question for an instant. "I know this is nuts, but now that the opportunity has come up, I really do." Chase grasps Ryan's waist with his left hand and firmly pulls upward with the right. With a slight rip Ryan's sweatshirt sails above his head and floats into the box below.
145122211112.title: Chase cuts to the chase.

14512221112.content:
"Whoa! What is this?!" Ryan was out on a tour of the Brazilian rain forest when he suddenly felt dizzy. The other swimmers on the tour had their backs turned as Ryan quickly shrank to a few inches height. The now bite sized swimmer cried out to get the attention of his team mates but in his miniature state they could not hear.

The forest floor was covered in debris that now stood as a challenge as Ryan tried to keep up with his tour group in hopes of getting their attention. He rounded a tree branch when he came face to face with a giant lizard.
14512221112.title: Something else.

145122211122.content:
"Whoa! Dude what the fuck!" Ryan instantly ran as the large iguana followed behind. Ryan, now in terror, lost track of the tour group which was now leaving into the distance. The mere morsel of a swimmer leaped over a plant and ran though a spot where the thick mud managed to suck off one of his trademark green sneakers. He looked over his shoulder only to see the large reptile appear to wink and eject its long pink tongue.

Ryan climbed through the bark of a nearby rain forest tree hoping to loose the bug eyed scale covered lizard. He kicked off his remaining shoe to make the climb easier. Thankfully, his muscular upper body made him a great climber. The tiny athlete reached out for a leaf when he felt something warm and wet wrap around his ankle. He managed to shake the tongue free and continued to climb.

He reached out for a tiny limb but it turned out to be too weak. Ryan fell through the air a branch managing to snag and pull off his t-shirt. He continued to tumble only to land squarely on the extended tongue of his pursuer.

Ryan struggled as he was pulled torso first into the mouth of the terrifying creature. Ryan let out one last cry as the iguana opened its mouth to bring the meaty swimmer inside.

The end.
145122211122.title: Something. else.

1451222111221.content: I wonder where Ryan went? Gunner Benz listened to the tour guide briefly. At a brief moment when his team mates were not looking his way a strange sensation swept over the swimmer. "Whoa! What the ..... .." In an instant the world around Gunnar grew! The now tiny swimmer spun around to take in the strange new world. "Hey! Hey!!! Something has happened to me. Help!!!"
1451222111221.title: Another swimmer?

14512221112211.content:
Gunnar runs after the tour group like his team mate Ryan before. The soil feels strange beneath his sockless loafers. "Hey! Heeeey!" Gunnar shouts out at the rapidly departing members of the tour group. He climbs over a tree root only to land on something that flexes and moves. "Holy shit! What the... " Gunnar momentarily stares at the two green eyes and forked tongue of a massive snake.

The athletic young man lets out a yelp as he begins to run. The snake pursues its prey with calm. It knows prey and this will be a quick snack.

Gunnar runs frantically leaping and dodging objects on the forest floor. He crawls into the mouth of a giant coke can and hides panting as the snake eyes him and waits. After a while the giant serpent decides the meal is too difficult and moves on. Crying the now morsel of an athlete cautiously leaves the safety of the discarded beverage can to find help.

As he wanders, now lost, through the darkening forest he finds a disturbing sign. A green sneaker with "Lochte" on the sole is partially lodged in a bit of drying mud. "Hey Lochte! Buddy... you here?"

The call out to Ryan was a mistake. Gunnar looks up just in time to see two talons reach out for him. "Noooo!" Gunnar struggles as he is lifted from the ground. His stomach churns as the world around him blurs ever upward. Soon he is above the canopy of the forest a full moon lighting his way. The bird had managed not do dig its talons directly into the meaty little swimmer but the grip was firm. Below Gunnar could see the rest of his team boarding a bus, the tour was over for them. "I'm up here! Help!" his tiny cries could not be heard as the hawk carried away its tasty snack.
14512221112211.title: Gunnar explores his new world.

14512221121.content:
"Ah good morning Mr. Daley!" Tom walked across the room and shook the technician's hand. "Good morning! I am really excited about this! How does it work?"

"It is quite simple, you just step into the chamber, it scans you and makes you into a doll." The technician shows Tom some examples including a very realistic Ryan Lochte doll boxed up and ready for shipping. "This is so cool!" Tom can barely contain his excitement. Will I need to take my clothes off? He smiles a bit as if he would like the opportunity. "No need Tom, just step up and the machine will take care of the rest." The technician opens the clear door and ushers Tom into the machine. Tom bounds up onto the platform and lets the technician close the door.

Tom looks around the well lit chamber and rocks back and forth on his Neo sneakers. "How long will the process take? Do I need to do anything?"

The technician pretends not to hear Tom as he works at the consul and hits a final button. The door of the chamber locked closed and Tom looked a bit nervous at the sound. The machine made a crescendo as its mechanism energized. "Uh... is this how the machine is supposed to work? Isn't it supposed to scan me or something?" Tom's voice sounded a bit concerned. With a bright flash Tom disappeared. The technician looked to his right where a smaller chamber identical to the first flashed Tom back into being. Tom looked disoriented... then he saw the large technician standing over the chamber. "Uh... what just happened? Are you bigger?... wha....." The technician opened the door... "Uh Tom guy... we had a slight glitch... you feel ok?" The technician's feigned concern seemed to convince the shaken little diver. "This is totally terrifying! You've got to get me back to normal!" Tom stepped out of the chamber onto the desk surface his brown eyes wide as he scanned the giant world around him.

"Of course Tom, of course. I know this is a little awkward, but I need you to slip out of your clothes... they won't be able to join you on your return to full size... I am sorry for any inconvienence this may cause." The technician came down to Tom's level as he spoke delivering his lines with expert skill.. "This is completely unacceptable!" Tom's usual cheerful tone turned to snideness as he pryed off his sneakers removed his shirt and jeans. "I am sorry Tom, but you are going to need to loose the briefs and socks as well." Tom made a protesting grunt, but complied. "This had better be quick I have practice later today." "Yes, of course Tom we'll have this whole thing finished in time for lunch" The tech smiled and pointed to his sandwich on the desk nearby.

Tom stepped back into the chamber.. he didn't trust the tech, but he didn't have much choice at this point... they would certainly be hearing from his lawyer he thought to himself as he heard the chamber door clicked closed. The machine hummed to life once more Tom closed his eyes anticipating the flash. The first time Tom didn't notice a difference immediately after the transformation, but this time was different. He was laying down... and something covered his body that felt like leaves... "Wha... what is this... what happened!?" Tom wriggled under the mass of the green and red materials that pressed him down.

"See what did I tell you! All ready for lunch!" The tech looked down at his sandwich, now bedecked with a meaty little British diver!

"Oh my God... this is insane... I want to be put back to normal! You put me back at once!!!" Tom looked around and teared up a bit as he found himself unable to lift the heavy rye bread and giant vegetables that covered him. The tech lifted his Tom Daley sandwich upward slowly savering every moment. He gave Tom's twirling feet a sniff and a lick causing them to curl in protest.

"So tasty!" The tech's eyes rolled back as he dug into his lunch. Tom's protests became muffled as he disappeared between parted lips. Like a bit of undercooked stringy bacon Tom found himself pulled free of the remaining sandiwhich bread but lodged. waist deep in the tech's mouth!

Tom could see through the dim light of the technician's mouth... he cried out in horror and reached out desperately to reverse the repugnant trend his fingers slipping off the giant's molars! He cried out, covered in thick gooey saliva. The mouth opened slightly giving Tom a moment's hope only feel something pushing hard on the soles of his feet. He was completely inside now. He struggled in vain as the massive tongue pushed him around the warm hot cave. At one point he landed with his back on one of the molars.. his eyes went wide as the white teeth above began to close down on him. With a roll he avoided the teeth. He reached out in the dark.. and triggered the swallow reflex... "Ahhhh ahhhh.... *gulp*" Tom slid helplessly down the smooth slimy tube of the esophagus into the darkness below. He arrived head first into the stomach... "Ahhhhh *splash*!!!!" The air was hot and acrid burning his nostrils....looking around he could see the chamber of the stomach in a very dim light....
14512221121.title: LIps smacking!

145122211211.content: The tech belched loudly and stretched... "good nash! Well I had better get these packages to our customers" He picked up Ryan Lochte's box and winked at someone else's toy/meal. With a swipe of his hand the doll sized diver's clothes were in a side drawer. Ryan's eyes tracked his captor's motions as he disappeared into a mail bag.
145122211211.title: The end.

145122211212.content:
Your cupcake has arrived! The plate is set in front of you with a nice cup of coffee. You look down to see two handsome brown eyes looking back up at you with confusion. Tom Daley has been shrunken to about 3 inches in height and found himself buried neck deep in a tasty looking butter cream chocolate cupcake. Soon your tasty little diver/snack begins to speak.

"Hey! I don't know what happened here, but I appear to be in a bit of a fix. Could you get me out of here please!"

Without answering your tiny little toy you lift up the cupcake and begin to peel away the paper wrapping. Inspecting below the unwrapped snack you see Tom's soft meaty little feet twirling helplessly in the moist chocolate cake.

1451222112121.content: "This is like totally fucked up. I need you to stop at once!" Tom's protests were soundly ignored as you lean over for a first taste of your mouth watering chocolate cupcake with a Tom Daley center. The first bite is only of chocolate but your teeth graze the bumps of tiny Tom's lean little abs. As you withdraw to savor the first bite you see Tom still squirming helplessly. Most of his hot body is covered by the thick dense chocolate, but you can see his perfect little stomach just beyond the reach of the first bite.

Tom's big brown eyes go even wider as you turn the cupcake around and attack from the rear side. Biting a little lower you miss the core but chew a little bit on his round little bottom. His lean legs manage to brake free and you delight in the sight of him kicking helplessly, lodged in a chocolate treat!

"Please, I'll pay anything... I have money and friends and I......" Tom's pleas stop as the third approach pulls him by his waste free of the chocolate trap. You forget about the rest of the cake now that you have the prize center in your mouth. The taste is musky and sweet at the same time! You can feel Tom's powerful legs kicking and squirming against your tongue. The toes of his right foot manage to find a molar and attempt to push back. "No nooo!" With a push of your index finger the entire diver is forced between your lips. You can feel his entire body in your mouth now.
