145122211221.content:
"Uh what is going on?" Ryan Lochte looked around the bright white room, so bright the walls were barely visible. "I don't know man! I just remember opening an envelope from a fan and I was here!" Gunnar Betz folds his arms and looks around the strange room seemingly lacking in windows or doors. Jack Conger and Jimmy Feigen look at a strange 5th member of the room. "Dude! Aren't you that rape guy?" Brock Turner started to respond when a loud scratching from above caught all 5 men's' attention.

The ceiling of the strange room lifted away revealing darkness. The young swimmers gathered together in the center of the room staring upward waiting for a clue as to their situation. They gasped and stepped back as a massive face peered down at them from above.

"Hello boys! I hope you had a comfortable trip ha! of course you did you probably don't remember most of it!"

The young men looked at each other for some explanation.. finally Ryan Lochte was pushed forward by the group. "Uh, like who are you and what are we doing here?"

The face above smiled at the audacity of Ryan's demand. "Well, hottie... what do you boys have in common?"

The 5 young men stared slack jawed at each other when Brock Turner finally sighed and responded "We are all spoiled privilaged ass holes!"

The giant face appeared pleased at Brock's unusual self awareness. "Exactly! But I have great news! I love the taste of hot privileged frat guy jerks! I am going to torture and devour each one of you!"
145122211221.title: Absolutely

1451222112211.content:
"Dude! This is total bullshit! I want to go home right now!" Gunnar Bentz shook his fist up at the massive face.

The giant face smiled wide but remained silent. A moment later his giant hand slid past the top of the room. "Ah shit run!!!" Ryan and the others scattered. Ryan stumbled over Jack only to feel a tight grip on his right ankle... "Nooooo!" Ryan looked back at the others as he rose rapidly into the air slipping past the confines of the room. His stomach reeled at the fast motion and the world around him blurred. As the ride from hell came to a stop he was able to see the world beyond the strange room.

The room was a box that sat on a normal looking but giant kitchen table. The room was a kitchen well lit but less than inside the box. The 4 remaining boys scurred around the box looking for a way out. Jimmy Feigen glanced upward toward Ryan but then the giant moved Ryan across the room to a counter setting him down less than gently. "My Mom is gonna sue you! You had better get me back now!"

"Ryan, I am afraid you have cashed the last of your privilege. You are mine now." Ryan's brow furrowed as he processed the words and then he made a dash for it. "No no no my little hottie, escape is not an option!" The giant gently curled his fingers around Lochte's torso and lifted him upward.
1451222112211.title: Let the feast begin

choices: Time to play with and devour Gunnar!
14512221122111.content:
The giant lifted Ryan Lochte upward again for an inspection. The slightly aging olympic swimmer struggled in the giant's firm grip. With thumb and forefinger the massive man easily freed the tiny arrogant man of his sneakers and with a second tug removed Ryan's t-shirt. The giant held the removed clothing in one hand and the hot swimmer in other. With a casual toss the shoes and shirt landed back in the box in front of the other tiny jocks.

"Guy! Let ..... me .... go!" Ryan kicked on in protest.

"As you wish Mr. Lochte ... as you wish" the giant released his grip allowing gravity to have it's way with the tiny olympic beef cake. "Whoa!!!!!! *splash*" Ryan fell feet first into a large cocktail glass. Ryan's skills kicked in instantly as he surfaced and made a mad swim for the glass's edge. As he achieved his goal he shrieked in the realization he was being lifted towards the giant's lips. "Shit man! ..." he used his powerful body to make for the opposite side of the glass as it began to tilt the flavorful liquid now entering the mouth of the giant. Ryan wimpered as he swam against the powerful current. "No nooooooo!" Ryan's muscular form disappeared between the massive lips.

Ryan held his breath as he slid helplessly between the massive lips. Dim light allowed Ryan to see where he was. As the drink continued on its journey into the unthinkable Ryan found himself pinned between the giant's massive tongue and the roof of his mouth. Ryan pushed against the rough surface of the tongue trying to make progress towards the dim light making a silhouette of the giant's massive teeth. Ryan struggled in vain but just as he thought he was about to slide down the tongue into the darkness he found himself plucked out of the giant's mouth. "Oh god, oh god... please please" Ryan whimpered defeated as he found himself dangled before the giant's face, the familiar smelling breath baring down on him.

"Ryan you are very tasty! I just wanted to let you know before... well you know... " the giant smacked his lips and rubbed his stomach indicating Ryan's fate. "Ah fuck no no !" Ryan kept muttering and whimpering as he found himself flipped head over heels returning him to the giant's mouth. He struggled a bit more eventually finding himself holding desperately to the epiglottis. He reached out with is feet to find a secure path out of the mouth only to tickle the back of the giant's throat. "Oh god oh... " gulp! Ryan slid down the smooth pink tube into the acidic bath below.

The giant felt the powerful little swimmer in his stomach. "That was amazing!" The giant turned his focus back to the remaining little bad boys of swimming.

Gunner stood with one of Lochte's trademark green sneakers in his hand Jack held the other while Jimmy paced back and forth muttering to himself and Brock stood by a wall jumping up and down as if to get out.

"I am pleased to announce that the first of my tiny little captives has served his sentence and is resting most uncomfortably in the depths of my stomach!" The little men cowered and cried at the announcement.

"Lochte put us up to it!" Gunnar's eyes were wide with fear and feigned innocence. "He told us uh uh.... no!!!!!" Gunnar's attempt to free himself did not have the desired consequence as he found himself running from the approaching giant hand.
14512221122111.title: Keep going

145122211221111.content:
Gunnar Bentz cried out as he found himself lifted upward by the giant's massive hand. His buddy Jack leaped up to try and save his friend only to fall backwards holding one of Gunnar's brown loafers. Gunnar soared upward seeing Jack get rapidly smaller between his feet.

"Like this isn't fair! It was all Ryan I swear to you! What is this worth to you? I have money, I can get you anything you need! I like just won an olympic medal.... I will totally give it to you!"

Gunnar's upward ride came to a stop. He kicked wildly looking into the eyes of the giant who held Gunnar so closely his eyes crossed slightly. The giant held Gunnar there for what felt like an eternity when Gunnar regained his voice. "Uh does this mean I can g......" before he could finish his words he found himself kissed by two massive lips then tossed into the air high above the giant's head. He screamed out as he fell but went silent as he passed between the giant's lips.

Jack, Jimmy, and Brock watched in horror as Gunnar disappeared. The giant's closed mouth seemed to still be holding something. As the massive face returned to the opening of the room his closed lips formed an evil toothless smile and with a spitting sound a pair of slacks, a blue shirt and Gunnar's remaining loafer landed saliva soaked before them.

"You boy's are good eating!" the giant chuckled his booming voice vibrating the room that held the remaining Olympic boys and a rapist who had not served his time.

Jack Conger and Jimmy Feigen looked at each other and the clothing remains of their partners in crime from Rio... "Please don't eat us! Please don't eat us!" the two men cried out leaping over a cowering Brock to put themselves in a corner of the box. They sought shadow but, of course there was none in the well lit enclosure.

Jimmy watched Jack disappear into the darkness and as before Jack's white jeans, shirt and boat shoes plunked down without their owner. Jimmy's eyes teared up at the loss of his last friend and soon the giant's hand returned for him. The giant quickly plucked off Jimmy's suit and then set him down on a nearby shelf... next to Jack.

"Jack! Oh my God you're alive! Like maybe the others are too!" Jimmy's heart still raced but he felt a glimmer of hope that he and his buddies would be returned to their homes naked but alive the victims of a cruel prank. Jack did not respond right away but stared into the distance. "Jimmy what was that mojito like drink we had at the party... "

"Uh I think they called it a Caipirinha... why?" Jimmy didn't like the look in Jack's eyes. "Dude why do I smell that drink right..." Both men screamed out as the shelf beneath them retracted into the wall causing them to fall downward into a massive blender pitcher.

"Dude this is a Caipirinha!" Jimmy and Jack shivered as they tried to swim between the ice cubes towards the edge of the massive glass container. As they reached the edge they saw the giant moving his finger towards one of the buttons. "Ah shit dude no!!!!!" The roar of the motor was intense but the liquid moved only slightly. The two boys tread against the swirling current. "I think I can do this!" Jimmy held on to optimism for but one more instant before the giant triggered the next speed on the blender raising the pitch of the roaring machine. "Oh shit bro this is not good! Oh fuck..." Jack did his most powerful crawl occasionally drawing some of the potent drink into his mouth. The next button was activated and it was too much Jack watched in horror as Jimmy disappeared into the drink and he found himself swimming in a blended drink with one more ingredient. With the push of the blend button Jack finally lost the fight and cried out as the blender found his feet.

The giant allowed the blender to run a bit longer then finished off his Olympic treat.

He then turned his attention to Brock...

"What the hell did you do to me!?" Lonzo stepped back only to find himself pinned against the infinitely black surface of the chamber. The giant looked concerned about Lonzo's reaction. "I have observed that many of you get confused just after transport. You should not have felt any pain. Did you feel any pain?"

Lonzo took in what the giant asked... "Man, what the hell did you do to me!? I need to get back to training. Is this some sort of illusion or something?"

The giant smiled a wide grin. "Oh no Lonzo! I am afraid your training days are over. I used a drone and shrank you to a fraction of your original height. You and I are going to play for a while, then I am going to eat you!"

The giant watched the tiny basketball star leap off the stage of the chamber with delight and make his way across the counter. Lonzo darted back and forth defensively, it looked like part of his basketball training, then darted towards and edge. The hot little guy stopped to peer over the edge to the long drop below then reversed course finally diving behind a bowl of fruit placed against a wall.

"I a so glad that you are up for play!" The giant sounded excited at the game of cat and mouse. He lifted the bowl and winked at the cowering 3 inch tall jock. "Keep it up little man, maybe I won't eat you after all!"

Lonzo driven by instinct and fear darted down the counter along the wall until he spied a small hole. As he attempted to squeeze in he discovered to his terror that he couldn't get all the way in. The giant casually reached down and pulled off the tiny basketball player's purple sneaker and plucked away his tiny sock. Lonzo looked on in horror as the giant sniffed his footwear and set it aside. "I hope you taste as good as you smell Lonzo!"

The giant walked away and pretended to loose interest. After a while Lonzo decided to make another attempt at escape. He ran awkwardly with only one sneaker on across the counter towards a telephone cord that he hoped would deliver him to freedom. As he stepped over the edge of the counter and began to make his way down he saw the giant waiting below with a wide grin. "Oh no man oh no!" 145122222222222222222222222222222214.content:
(I apologize that this and the rest of the chapters in this stack are 1st person instead of second person)


I read it three times. Standing there at Barnes and Noble, staring at the periodical section, the word just popping out at me, I had to scratch my head. The dumbfounded response was so cartoony, but that’s what I did. God help me I was young, and foolish, and… suddenly very hungry. It just made no sense. Wouldn’t anyone who read it be a reader- simply by definition?

In retrospect I realize that it was not a cover article of a newspaper. It was not a command from the government, or a survey of numerous readers. It was merely a publication titled “Reader’s Digest Kids.” Funny how a simple mistake in punctuation or a sticker in the wrong spot on a magazine’s cover can lead to such travesty. For five youths it did at least... And who am I kidding, a handful more over the years. But don’t paint me as some kind of monster. Remember, I was young and inn- I almost said “Innocent”. Ha. Well I was young. I’m still young. I consider myself young at least. Maybe it wasn’t so long ago after all. Regardless it was far enough in the past that the publication is no longer called “Reader’s Digest Kids”. First they added “Edition” after the “Kids”, a stipulation of the lawsuit perhaps, not that this was any help to those youngsters or their friends and families. Then they added a colon between “Digest” and “Kids”. That was after the second incident I think. I don’t know. In those early days of being a giant I had so many lawsuits and blamed so many others (just to keep myself innocent in the eyes of the law) that I can’t keep them all straight. It wasn’t until later that I learned the art of never getting caught! Whatever the case, the magazine said “Readers Digest Kids” with no apostrophe, no colon, no “edition”, and no clarifications. I didn’t need to be told twice. I wasn’t looking for trouble, having ignored the command of the red-lettered title. I certainly didn’t want to be left out if so many others were digesting kids! If I have committed any crime it is that and that alone- being a follower of fads and wanting to stay ahead of the trends. The magazine said it, and news, or advice, or survey, or law… it didn’t matter! True, I could have thought they were referencing baby goats, but that’s besides the point.

But here was the problem: I had never been a fan of veal. (And I don’t mean the beef, although I have always avoided that as well. Those poor little calfs!!!) I found the prospect of eating anyone before they were in the prime of their life utterly unsporting, horrid, and in bad taste… or that’s what I originally thought. It was unsporting because they were too dumb to have any real fighting chance. After all, kidnappers, the lowest of the low, are able to abduct these guys! It would be like stealing candy from a- well I guess more like stealing a baby from- making a baby into candy…? They weren’t babies or anything though. It’s just a saying. It was horrid because they hadn’t even had the time to face the trials and tribulations of real life. And it was in bad taste because, let’s face it, the middle, end, and right after puberty is when guys are at their tastiest. I don’t know if it’s those juicy muscles, or the hormones, or the sudden growth which gives you so much more meat… sorry, I’m trying to stay focused. No more exposition. Whatever the case, despite my reservations I was willing to try. Hey, I just realized! They don’t even have an “Reader’s Digest: Kids Edition” anymore! I guess they finally learned their lesson and gave up!

What I thought would be the toughest part, ended up being the easiest. I had elected to find the morsels which appeared closest to their older counterparts. Searching the internet was like browsing a gold mine, not even for gold, but for a gold mine! It was all around! The inventions of instagram, steroids, and the ‘bro mentality’ was a vore-enthusiast’s wet dream! Everywhere guys were posting pictures of themselves, scantily clad, dripping with sweat, showing off their meaty bodies! It was like the entire internet was one giant menu for man meat! There were groups dedicated solely to those I was looking for! Teen boys with bodies of men ten years their senior littered my news feed. It took awhile to narrow my selection to the five I wanted to try, a shorter while to find them, an even shorter while to shrink, and no time at all to put them in my meal tank at the kitchen counter, barren of all former occupants for tonight’s dinner. Those who had been there were carefully put away elsewhere so as not to get jealous.

The best part about these tasty treats was their size. Yes, they were bulging with muscle, but they weren’t as long as my usual delicacies, a fact which proved favorable to all involved. I didn’t need to cut anyone, or chew, or bite. Preparation was much simpler than ever before, and I told them such. They still clung to each other, sobbing, pleading, screaming, but I think I calmed them with a few pets from my gigantic fingers and soothing words about their slow digestion in my roiling gut. I reminded them that they had obviously volunteered for this by increasing the progression of their bodies to such a degree and then posting those mouthwatering pictures for people to drool over. As they were too simple to understand I informed them they would not be tortured physically or sexually which somehow only increased their fear. Strange little creatures.

https://www.instagram.com/jakub_fabry/ Wasting no more time I reached in and pulled out my first morsel. Jakub was pale and blonde with a constant bitchy face, perhaps accentuated by his prominent eyebrows and snub nose. His tiny ears and beady eyes made me think of a buff chipmunk. Jakob was lithe, with bulging biceps, an obvious six pack, and an hourglass figure that girls would be jealous of. His chest was less pronounced than one would expect but his ropey muscled legs were nothing to gawk at. I think it was his strange haircut which stood out to me most. The sides were shaved but the top was fluffy and quaffed to one side. He screamed and cried and begged, as did the others, but I quickly grew accustomed to the usual sound of my meals paid his squeaks no more mind, deciding instead to enjoy my meal. A glass of merlot was poured and a candle lit in my intimate dinner for one… er six. Sampling his smooth flesh first with my nose, then my finger, and then my tongue, I slowly traced his entire outline, tasting the salty muskiness I had grown to love, but something altogether new to my palate. There was a distinct sweetness and a hint of fruitiness I had never experienced with my older morsels. Smacking my lips and humming to myself, his whole body shaking from the cold air and the vibrations of my “mmm”s, I decided to make my first dish a soup. To keep him warm I stuffed his entire body into my mouth so suddenly my closed soft lips didn’t even need to stifle the scream. It never left his little lungs. Sucking and slurping on my meal, my tongue dancing over his mouth watering toned body, I heated the broth, cut the vegetables, and danced around to the agony of my other morsels who watched with wide, fearful, doe eyes. My stale, humid breath danced around Jakub’s body, enveloping him in it’s dankness, and pushing down into his every orifice as he sputtered for breath, battling the tongue that continued to batter him around like a bull to it’s rider. Every once in awhile I pushed him to the back of my throat for a quick view at his ultimate fate, letting the spit accumulate there before swallowing it down as a preview of his own destiny. At once his eyes were blinded by the sudden light and fresh air, only to be dropped into the steaming broth below. He instantly turned as red as a lobster and began treading water rather than have to sit on the bottom where the fire made it hottest. Bubbled exploded in his face until I set it to simmer and reached in for the next treat.
145122222222222222222222222222222214.title: An assortment of young lifters.

Looking at the struggling young man between my thumb and forefinger my tongue lolled out against my command and saliva began leaking onto my shirt. Broad with tanned skin, sand-colored hair, veiny arms, and a chest and eight pack that was so contoured I could feel each ridge even with my gigantic padded fingers. Again I licked the taste off of his entire body before slowly sucking on both of his proportionally tiny by nonetheless meaty feet. My tongue tickled each sole and worked in between every perfect plump toe. Moving over to the counter I prepared for Carter’s dish. The work was slow at first, but that just gave me more time to taste Carter’s supple body and delicious flesh, my tongue snaking all over and under him. When I was ready I lay Carter down on the chopped meat concoction and began kneading him into it. He looked up fearfully, and completely helpless, probably for the first time in the stud’s life… and certain to be the last time. The tasty little Swedish meatball looked perfect. His head stuck out one end, his hands spread out on the sides, and those delectable feet twirled around below. Placing him on a tray I put it in the oven to get it golden brown, closing it behind him after an air kiss and wave goodbye,then set the timer. The heat was low enough to make him a fraction of a shade darker, but not enough to kill him.

https://www.instagram.com/maxdumenko/?hl... Max was taken out next, leaving the last two lads hugging one another in the tank. Clearly the youngest of the group, Max had a button nose, olive skin, and a baby face. His tight lips were pursed between two chipmunk cheeks and his dirty blonde hair was completely buzzed on one side, leaving a permanent quaffed bowl cut on the other. That’s where I started the tasting. The soft locks cushioned my fleshy and spongy taste buds while the prickly buzzed side tickled me to no end. I cannot recommend this haircut enough to those who like textured meals! Look for them in schools, malls, parks, and anywhere that attracts edgey delinquents! He inadvertently flexed his arms in his discomfort, causing me to stop licking his head and suck both muscley arms into my mouth like wet noodles, sucking so hard I was about to slurp them clean off his shoulders. His fingers tried in vain to grip something, merely grazing the tip of my tongue. This little lad avoided a fate worse than all the others combined. Nowadays I have a special spit to roast my delectable boys. Both ends detach so that I can rope the middle up the butt, through the intestines, into the stomach, up the throat, and out the mouth, almost like the cameras used in endoscopies and colonoscopies, except those don’t go nearly as far obviously. Reattaching each side to the stick allows you to have a kebab without killing the little treat. It is unbelievably uncomfortable and the lad can barely breathe, plus the stomach acid slowly trickles into the other organs as the valves are forced open by the stick, but by the time they begin digesting themself they’re already being digested by me as well. Back then I only had a regular skewer which would impale the tasty delicacies from the butt up through the mouth, piercing everything in its path and killing them much quicker. Luckily for Max, it was still in the wash from an entire soccer team I. I had pierced all of their chests, lining them up, and then slowly cooked them over a fire as they bled out. I liked blood more back then… And I didn’t like sex stuff as much. Strange how your tastes change when you get older. Instead, I found a large meat thermometer, which Max was convinced was about to go into either his flesh or another orifice as he screamed bloody murder. He was trussed up with some parsley and attached to the thermometer, some pepper, mushroom, onion, tomato, and pineapple pierced above and below him. The fruit and vegetables were large enough so that when I put him on the grill, no matter which way I turned him, he wouldn’t be burned. I hate charred meat. Getting out my marinade and brush I coated the terrified lad until he was glistening with the sweet syrupy stuff, instead of just sweat, saliva, and fear. Putting the whole mess on the automatically rotating grill, I returned to the tank to choose the penultimate squirming mass.

https://www.instagram.com/rost_17_/ Rostik, the second youngest was removed from the arms of Ryan, leaving the last little guy all alone. Despite his age, Rostik was the second biggest, with the manliest face. Fair skinned with an eight pack and chiseled chest that rivals Carter (makes sense since I found them working out together), Rostik’s brown hair, glistening areolas, and flexible meaty body made him an easy pick. After seeing his rippling back my tongue immediately starts there, lapping the salty sweetness again and again, slowly rubbing my wet spongy, powerful muscle up and down his arched back. He struggled so I use one finger to force both of his arms at his side, pushing him hard against my palm with my tongue. He was incapable of moving anything except his butt which he tries using to nudge my chin off of him to no avail. Again, this once powerful lad with the world at his large, meaty feet was no match for even my tongue or finger tip! The smell of him and the others was almost as hypnotically delicious as the taste! It was a sweaty young man smell with a hint of Axe Body spray and stale mustiness. Rostik was the easiest boy of the bunch to prepare. The jumbo shrimp having already been cooked I merely wrapped it around the struggling lad, placing them both atop a pile of zoodles. It was tight enough that he could struggle all he wanted and not budge an inch. Additionally, as an added precaution, the bottom of the shrimp covered his feet, making escape impossible. Ironic, after calling so many newbies at the gym “shrimps”, this swollen “do you even lift bro” young man, was now a quarter the size of one, and about to be eaten with it.

https://www.instagram.com/rch.aesthetics... Ryan, the last studly body-fatless ingredient, was crouched in the corner, rocking back and forth in the fetal position. It would have been adorable if it wasn’t so mouthwateringly scrumptious instead. He looked like he could have been Rostik’s younger brother, even though he was a year older. A slightly darker skin tone, caramel colored would be the closest comparison, with less build and more firm tone and a younger face, Ryan was a sight to behold. Wasting no time I popped the morsel in my mouth, forced him to lie on his stomach, and pushed his little feet with my tongue so that his head was sticking out between my two cushiony lips. Teasing him a bit in my mouth, unable to control myself, I set to preparing the desert. Most of it was already done so that I wouldn’t have had to wait for it to set, but there was still a fair amount of prep work, fetching supplies, cleaning, etc. He was forced to watch as I prepared the dish which was to become his tomb. Pressing my lips together harder, I stopped him from flailing around so much, concentrating on the desert. When it was all set up I spat Ryan directly into the center of the congealed chocolate mousse. Had he had a little more fat on him he may not have sunk so quickly, but thankfully for me for many reasons, he was the perfect specimen of fitness, and he was soon up to his chin the the chocolatey goodness. Just for fun I pulled him out, gripping only his head between two fingers, and slowly licked the gooey chocolate from his body, sucking the remainder off a moment later. After putting him back into place I put a dollop of whipped cream on top of his head, a cherry on top of that, and I was done. He looked like he was wearing the strangest hat in the world, and I couldn’t help but laugh at his ridiculousness, much to his anger. Amazingly he was the first to get angry, instead of just fear and sobbing of his brethren. A lick of my lips was all it took to turn that aggression back to catatonic horror.
1451222222222222222222222222222222141.title: Keep going.

14512222222222222222222222222222221411.content:
The ringing of several cooking timers, almost simultaneously, told me my dinner was ready. I set the table quickly, the drool building up at the corners of my mouth once more, put everything on platters, and tucked in. “I’d thank God for all he has given me, your young lives (and a scrumptious group of boys you are too) in the foreground… plus the thousands I’ve eaten before you in far more gruesome ways- actually maybe you should be thanking God! Or thanking me! Or maybe we’re the same thing. Hmmm… That’s a bit of a quandary for you. You guys praised him on every picture you posted- why do you young weightlifters do that by the way? Anyway, sorry to ramble on. I’m just very hungry so I figured I’d get the polite dinner banter over at the beginning. I don’t like talking with my mouth full anyway.” The boys looked back at me with hatred and unadulterated horror in their eyes: horror of what I had done in the past, horror at what I had to them, horror at what I was about to do to them, horror that I actually thought they tasted better than any other substance on Earth, and horror that they’d never again experience a happy moment, cool breeze, good workout, high five from a friend, good grade, kiss from their mother’s, etc. The looks merely whet my appetite more.

I suppose I liked tapas before the craze hit. The little meals, pun intended, made it possible to eat small portions of regular food in between the real meat of the dishes. I didn’t have to waste time digging through noodles before I found my prize snack, it was right there in front.

I started with the Jakub soup, and truth be told, it was a little bit too salty for my taste. The broth was watery rather than creamy, but the flavor was incredible. After a few slurps and what must have looked like half a ton of vegetables to the frightened youngster, I dipped my spoon directly under his butt, lifting him and some lukewarm broth up to my mouth. He was sitting with his ass flat on the concave base, feet spread eagle over the sides, but he quickly rolled out of the way before my mouth closed on him and the spoon, landing, with a splash back into my bowl. With only a few mouthfuls left anyway, I placed my spoon beside the bowl and the relieved meaty teen. This relief quickly gave way to renewed terror as he felt the entire bowl slowly lift off the table to my waiting supple lips. The broth washed into my mouth and down my throat in quick swallows while Jakub swam against the current with all the strength he could muster. Just when he got a foothold on the inside lip of the bowl, as most of the liquid was already gone, I flicked the back with my finger causing Jakub to lose balance and fall straight onto my tongue which immediately retracted into me mouth. I savored him for a moment, bashing him against my teeth and tongue and bulging in my cheeks, swishing the liquid and coating him in saliva, before tilting my head back and swallowing him whole. The other boys watched, terrified, as the large lump slowly traveled down my throat and splashed into the acidic goo beneath the surface. When I burped, the smell of him wafted over the other tiny guys along with the solitary quiet scream of their fellow prisoner.

Mopping my lips I pushed the bowl aside and turned my attention to the large, round studly Carter-filled swedish meatball amid a forkful of egg noodles. I poured the sauce directly onto Carters beautiful face, making him sputter and cough before soaking the rest of him and the meatball. Rather than pierce the meat immediately I played with him a little bit, turning the meatball this way and that, rolling it around the plate with my fork like the Oompa Loompas did to Violet. His face hit the hard plate as did his hands and feet, all desperately trying to get a grip so he could attempt to waddle away. As funny as that would have been to see a rumble from my stomach told me Jakub was ready for company. Carefully, I pierced the meatball, avoiding the delicious center, and heard the tines hit the ceramic on the other side. Quickly I twirled it around, making Carter visibly dizzy, as I got all of the noodles underneath him. Putting the whole forkful between my lips I closed my mouth and then retracted the fork, leaving Carter in complete darkness. I chewed softly, sure to only pinch Carter’s sides and break up the meat. The meatball had complimented Carter’s flavor impeccably well and I was in food heaven: utter bliss! Even my eyelids twitched in excitement. As I chewed some more, grounding the meat into a paste, the young man did his best to avoid my mashing teeth, scared nearly stiffless by their sheer power, capable of turning a morsel like him into mush in mere seconds. He was momentarily freed from the meat but found his body wrapped tightly around by a noodle. Smiling at this new development I casually spit out Carter, keeping the end of the noodle in my mouth. He dangled in the light of the kitchen from my mouth, held only by a long egg noodle which had intertwined itself around his leg. I swallowed the rest of the mouthful and grabbed the end of the noodle closest to my mouth, pulling it up over my head. Carter now dangled high above my mouth, slowly being lowered into the black abyss. My tongue darted out and licked at the soles of his feet before I lifted him up as high as I could. I began biting the air as hard as I could, making audible snapping sound every time I closed my jaw, once per second. Each time I opened my mouth I lower Carter a fraction of an inch lower. It was cruel, I know, but as I say, I was young. I still played with my food. Just as I was about to clamp down on Carter’s leg, severing it completely, I again switched tactics and put the end back in my mouth. Then I sucked. I slurped the noodle for a good half a minute, very tentatively pulling Carter in closer and closer. He looked down, or up in this case, past his feet at my pursed lips and saw the strand going in getting smaller and smaller. Finally he had reached my mouth and kicked feverishly. This only served to lodge his only free leg into my mouth which I slurped right up. Then his other leg followed suit. Soon after he was up to his armpit. When I close my lips on him one last time I tasted him all over, swirled him around, and gulped him down, noodle and all.

Still hungry, (after all who wouldn’t be with a meal like this), I put the small plate aside and pulled up a matching one. Max remained immobile, tied to the meat thermometer with his parsley binds, and trussed like a turkey. On either end were the fruit and vegetables, but this only served to accentuate that meaty middle, drawing the hungry eye like a magnet. His skin now tanned, not brown but certainly darker, looked a little flakey, only making him look all the more mouthwateringly scrumptious. The appetizing little cutie was so tired from the ordeal and the constant rotation that he didn’t even have the energy to scream as I lifted the entire meat thermometer. Starting with the bottom I ripped off some of the pineapple and tomatoes with my teeth, chewing intentionally audibly and gnawing ravenously. My vicious teeth gnashing had the desired effect on the three tiny piggies left outside of my roiling gut. As I chewed I began waving the skewer back and forth over the frightened other boys, stuck in their own dishes. The air whizzed past Max’s frightened face and he had a hard time catching his breath, but I was having too much fun, and had the tastiest meal in the world in front of me, so I didn’t care in the slightest. Lifting the thermometer and turning it 90 degrees, angling the point directly down my throat, I lowered it quickly, snatching off the closest vegetable. I did this again and again until only Max remained, and one or two onion pieces by his delicious pink little feet. Somehow they didn’t tan as much as the rest of him. Like a skilled sword swallower I pushed the skewer down again, deep throating the blade and feeling the top of Max’s head tickle my undulating uvula. I closed my lips just under his foot and pulled out the thermometer, sans the meat. Still trussed like a turkey with the parsley twine, the little lad wriggled like crazy, his taste positively dancing on my tongue. The marinade was the perfect accompaniment to his flavor and yet again the sensations were orgasmic. After sucking all of the marinade off and flicking Max around a few more times I felt his writhing die down, making it clear how exhausted he was. Bringing him to the back of my throat I let him see into the darkness below, listening to the gurgling of his friends being broken down to become a part of me. And then I swallowed.
14512222222222222222222222222222221411.title: More

145122222222222222222222222222222214111.content:
With only one morsel left before dessert, I reached for the jumbo shrimp, the dark shadow of my hand- the shadow of doom- cast down on the whimpering Rostik. But instead of grabbing his plate, my hand went right over his head and pulled over my rich and creamy dessert. Ryan couldn’t believe his misfortune. His one stroke of luck was being put into the dessert, giving him a few extra moments on Earth, or rather, on the outside of my stomach. “Sorry Ryan. I never could wait for dessert. In fairness I did have enough meat and vegetables for a sweet treat… and what a sweet treat you will make!” Noticing Rostik sigh with relief I felt obliged to tell him, “don’t get too excited. I’ll still have plenty more room for the final course!” Digging my spoon into the deep dark pudding I scooped up a healthy mouthful from right next to Ryan. In fact, with each dip I intentionally grazed him with the edge of the spoon, making him wonder if this is his bite… or rather my bite of him. As more and more of the exquisite chocolate deliciousness disappeared between my lips, and I saw more of the quivering muscular form, I realized that he was positively shivering from the cold. “Oh no. Was the mousse too chilly for you? Not to worry. I’ve got the perfect thing to warm you up!” Even though the mousse was still up to his armpits I scooped him right up and deposited him gently on my tongue, ignoring his loud incessant scream. With my lips closed I warmed him up, sucked the excess whipped cream and chocolate off of him, and then spat him back into my hand where he gagged and sputtered. The shaking was now obviously less from the cold and more from the unadulterated fear coursing through his veiny body. But that wasn’t as fun to taunt him about. “I guess my mouth wasn’t warm enough! Don’t worry! There’s a place I have in mind that’s much warmer. In fact it’s like a hot tub down there. The acid will churn you up so your whole body is covered in goop so hot it’ll take the chill out of those bones, and the bones out of your skin. I’d tell you to ask the others but… I don’t think they’ll be responsive when you go see them.” Before he can scream again, and I did see his mouth opening into the familiar ‘o’ shape of all my prey, I grabbed the cherry which had rolled off his head earlier, and jab his face into it. He looked like the Headless Horsemen and I just had to laugh at him and his flailing limbs. He tried desperately to take it off of him, but it was stuck on good, right up to his shoulders. I could tell he was choking on the cherry juice so I quickly snatched him back up and brought him to my mouth for his final performance. That’s when I noticed that there was only a drop of savory mousse left in the cup. Strange, it had reached up to his underarms before I pulled him out. Was the displacement that much? How dense was my delectable meaty little treat? Before putting him in my maw one last time I dunked his cute little feet back into the goop. Then he was in. I sucked the cherry off his head, letting him watch it sit on the edge of my throat before tilting it down. He was too dazed and still panting for breath, coughing up cherry juice to scream any longer. After slurping the last of the mousse from between his long toes, digging the tip of my tongue into every groove, I said my goodbyes and sent him to join the others.

One boy left, Rostik was sobbing uncontrollably. He was hysterical so I didn’t waste any more time. I lifted him and the jumbo shrimp up to my mouth and stuck both inside, biting hard at the end of the tail. The end came off easily and I was sure to get all of the meat out of it. The juices from the shrimp mingled with Rostik’s flavorful body in a way I hadn’t even imagined, pairing with the citrus of the sauce like a dream. I rolled my eyes in ecstasy yet again and continued sampling every inch of them both. Soon I was tired of the shrimp, so chewed it into mush and pushed it down my gullet, leaving only my last piece of veal. Using my powerful tongue I was able to sculpt the little gymnast and bodybuilder into any shape I wanted. And I did. It was fun for a time, but I eventually got tired of my game. It had been an incredible meal, one I would no doubt repeat with different recipes. But the fun had come to an end and it was time to torture some other shrunken young men. Tilting my head back for the last time that night, I swallowed. Less than an hour later the muffled screams and sobs stopped emanating from my belly and the thrashing died down. I was left alone… well alone with a few hundred shrunken toys and pets… and my thoughts. I couldn’t believe I had been so cruel as to try veal. I couldn’t believe I had snuffed out five young lives with so much potential. I couldn’t believe it had only taken a misread magazine to get me to question my morals. I could, however, believe that I was going to do it again… and soon!
145122222222222222222222222222222214111.title: More

1452.content:
How about one of these tasty little morsals. Toned bodies, tasty muscles; they were made to be eaten.

After all, what did they think they were modeling for? Why menus of course!!!
1452.title: Mmm... Models are made to be eaten.

14523211.content:
Philip Fusco looks up at you dazed and confused from within the confines of the box he was delivered in just a few minutes before. His eyes have not yet adjusted to the sudden burst of light and you marvel at beautiful form not yet aware of his situation.

He wears a pair of black laced canvas shoes. His muscular legs are wrapped tightly in a pair of trendy ripped jeans and his beautiful torso and upper body are, for the moment covered in a blue t-shirt. His squinting eyes, partially shielded by a cupped hand finally adjust to the bright light from above and your tiny toy stumbles backwards from the sight of you. "Hey, like what the fuck man?! What is this?!" His somewhat squeeky yet still masculine Jersey accent carries through quite strongly. Rather than answer your toy you decide to have some fun. Slowly you begin to tilt the box forcing him to struggle for balance at first intuitively moving against the downward slope until he finds himself slipping protesting as he does. so. Ever the athlete the hot young fellow manages to land on his feet. only to find the box continuing to turn. He manages to maintain balance as he slides but as the back of his right heel finds the ridge of the cardboard box he falls backwards dislodging the right sneaker and plopping him on his tight bottom on the surface of the counter. He quickly returns his attention to the giant face from above. You slowly reach into the box and withdraw the dislodged sneaker. Again without words you sniff his shoe... the scent is very appetizing! Philip's wide eyes follow his shoe as you gently set it on a nearby shelf next to a jar filled with what appears to be doll clothes.
14523211.title: Philip Fusco?

14523212.content: Levi Johnston, River Viiperi, Sebastian Sauve, luke worrall, Philip Fusco, Michael Lewis, RJ King, Jordan Nichols or Dean Sibrizzi?

145232121.content:
You reach into the box and pluck out your next model! RJ King squirms between your fingers protesting "Yo bro what is this? Let me go man!" Even in this frightening situation the little guy still manages to sound well chill.

"If arrogance pairs with flavor I am in for a real treat!" you eye your dangling little model toy morsel as he continues to struggle. You decide to admire him for a while and place him in a glass with a heavy bottom and high walls. The shrinking company must have caught up with RJ while he was in a photo shoot. He is wearing a skinny blue suit with cool shoes and sports a creative hair style. You admire is scrawny physique as he paces back and forth in his tiny glass prison.

"Yo dude! This isn't funny anymore! I need to get back to the shoot braw!" His usually soothing voice travels through the glass somewhat higher in pitch than when he was at his original height.

"Uh 'dude' I am afraid that is not in the cards." You flash an evil grin at your little captive. "We are going to play and then I am going to have a light snack!"

You reach into the glass with thumb and forefinger plucking RJ by the lapel of his jacked. "Dude! Get me back to my people now! You are totally NOT going to get away with this!" his protests stream as you gently pluck off his shoes one by one giving them a sniff and setting them aside. His cute little feet are covered in no show socks and his toes wiggle slightly as you remove them.
145232121.title: RJ King?

choices: What does the model taste like?
1452321211.content:
"Oh my God, like you need to stop bro!" your entitled little toy's protests still seem more laced with arrogance than fear. You admire the hot little feet curling in protest to their nakedness. With thumb and forefinger you gingerly grasp his right ankle inverting him. "Oh my God this isn't happening. Like guy, I'll make sure you get paid whatever you need. I am like very important."

You ignore the tiny man's attempt to buy his freedom. He struggles between your fingers as you gently tug at the bottom of his little blue suit jacket. He is skinny, but the suit coat is very well tailored! He tries to keep his little arms at his sides but with no luck. The You set the newly freed jacket down next to the stylish little shoes and socks. They will be wonderful mementos!
1452321211.title: Off with the jacket!

1452321221.content:
"Whoa I feel kind of odd man!" Trevor pushed against the walls of the clear plastic chamber. The technician smiled "Don't worry Mr Signorino, it is quite a normal part of the process." Quickly the man in a lab coat hit a button which locked the chamber and entered the final sequence of complex parameters. A blue light bathed the hot muscular young model.

"Uh, they said this was supposed to scan me to make a doll, what the fuck is this?" Trevor's handsome eyes went wide as he noticed the changes around him. The chamber seemed to be growing. "Man! What the...." Trevor shifted only to notice his clothes getting bigger. He tried to walk and stumbled over his now giant running shoes. He tried to stand but found himself caught up inside his now massive and heavy clothing. "Hey! Hey!!!!" Trevor struggled towards light, there was a musky oder, he came up only to discover that he was now inside one of his running shoes which was up to his arm pits.

"Ah Trevor, the process will certainly be disorienting but you should not have felt any pain." The booming voice drew Trevor's attention upward toward the man in the lab coat who was now larger than a building and whose voice seemed to be a bit deeper than before."

"Wha.... what is this! What the fuck man!" Trevor's masculine baritone was now slightly higher in range as he climbed out of his sock and sneaker and bound across his clothing towards the exit to the chamber.
1452321221.title: Let's eat Trevor!

14523212211.content:
"Let's get your new stats!" The eager sounding giant reached out effortlessly towards the miniaturized jock. "No! Let go!" Trevor cried out and winced at the odd sensation of the giant's rubber gloved hand grasping him around the lats and lifting him up quickly. Trevor's vision blurred as his stomach churned. The upward thrust felt like the craziest carnival ride in the world. When the motion came to a stop Trevor found himself deposited onto a cold metal table. His instinct was to run again, but within seconds he found himself taken again and fastened with massive hooked nails into a waxy black tray his ankles and wrists spread out with force he could not resist.

"I didn't sign up for this! What is this shit? Let me go man!" Trevor twirled his hands and feet helplessly trying to free himself from his bonds. His nude form felt cold and he felt more vulnerable than he had ever in his life.

Trevor's eyes tracked wide as they watched the giant reach for an instrument. "Wha... what are you doing? The tech ignored him as he reached down and placed one tip of a caliper against Trevor's scalp and the other against the sole of his right foot. "Stop it! Ow!" Trevor reacted to the sharp cold instrument against the sole of his foot curling his toes.

"Let's see... starting height 187cm.... reduction height 10.16cm ....5.4% of your original height!" The tech seemed to enjoy relaying the information to the bite sized athletic man.

Trevor continued to squirm as the technician proceeded to place cold gel on the sole of his left foot and a dab on his forehead. "Well, you will be happy to know your body mass indexes are proportionate to what you started out as!" Trevor could care less about this information as he continued to fight against the restraints.
14523212211.title: The tech catches him

145232122112.content: A new start for Trevor S?
145232122112.title: Something else.

1452321221121.content:
"Want to come up for a drink." the beautiful young woman watched Trevor's handsome brown eyes as the widened at the offer. "Yeah, sure." He walked up the stairs as she escorted him into the beautiful but very victorian looking house. "Whoa!" Trevor rocked back on his loafers as a black cat shot past his feet.

"Oh, don't mind him. He is just in search for a snack." She opened a cabinet and pulled out a bottle and two glasses. "Why don't you make yourself at home while I put on something more comfortable." Trevor sat down on the couch and his date poured him a glass of wine.

Trevor scanned the room anticipating the fun to come. He wanted to wait for her to get back and not look too eager or assumptive. Ah a sip of the wine won't hurt he thought to himself bringing his lips to the glass. It is so cool that we are both into bible study. The wine tasted a bit off, but the handsome jock certainly did not consider himself an expert.

Whoa... what the... Trevor's head spun and he rocked back a bit in his seat. A strange sinking sensation came over him, almost like the tingling someone feels going down on an elevator. He stood up and tried to walk towards the mirror on the other side of the room but the vertigo increased. He took a step and realized his loafers were loose on his feet. "Whoa! Whooooa!" The sense of sinking intensified rapidly. Trevor's shirt became baggy all around him and his trousers dropped to the floor. "Hey! Clarisa!" Trevor cried out as he tripped and plunged forward.

Where am I? What the hell just happened? Trevor found himself plunged into a strange darkness covered in some sort of thick cloth... He quickly worked his way up towards a region of light. "What the.... "

Trevor emerged to see a world he could not believe. He was standing inside his right sock which was inside his shoe which was now the size of a car! Trevor managed to climb out. The drafty old house made his naked skin shiver as he stepped out onto the toe of is shoe to survey his situation.

The house he just entered a short time before was all around him. The wine glass now sat high above him on the coffee table where he left it. Trevor hopped off his loafer and walked towards the leg of the sofa. "Clarisa! Clarisa!" Trevor cried out but it was unlikely she could hear him in his new shrunken state. The beefy young man glanced towards his massive trousers. Trevor had the strange sense he was being watched. He glanced behind him and his heart raced. "Oh shit oh shit!" Clarissa's black cat leapt from its stalking pose into a run as it pursued Trevor as prey. Trevor ran as fast as he could across the old wooden floor his mind racing. Her bedroom! He dashed to the door and there was just enough space for him to crawl under. He squirmed and felt the rough sensation of the cat's tongue as it managed to lick his left sole.
1452321221121.title: Trevor S again...

14523212211212.content:
"Ow! Help!!" Trevor screamed out as the cat managed to sink its teeth into his stray foot. Trevor tried to hold onto the door but the cat's strength quickly overpowered him. The cat flung it's new snack out into the living room. Trevor sprung to his feet and tried to run, but the cat was quickly upon him again batting him down playfully with its massive paw.

"Fuck you! fuck you!" Trevor screamed out at his assailant momentarily charging the large black feline. The cat screeched in response to the advanced and Trevor took the moment to speed past the cat towards his clothes still piled on the floor. Trevor climbed into his pocket and managed to find his cell phone, now the size of a table.

"911 What is your emergency?" The operator's calm voice gave the miniaturized model a sense of relief.

"Oh thank God! I'm not sure how but I am at my date's house and I've been shrunken! Oh shit the cat's back!"

"Sir, I must remind you that it is against the law to misuse the emergency system for anything but a real emergency... sir?"

The operator's voice trailed off as Trevor felt the cat's teeth holding his ankle firmly dragging him out of the pocket back into the light. Trevor struck out at the cat, but the feline appeared to be finished playing with its food. Two front paws claws extended landed on the young man's broad chest. The cat looked down at it's trapped prey and licked its lips. The cat licked Trevor in the face with it's rough tongue then opened its mouth wide to take a bite. Trevor punched out only to have his beefy arm sink into the beast's gaping maul. The cat chomped down removing the meaty appendage. The cat swallowed quickly and helped itself to the remaining plumpend bicep.
Shock overcame the tiny man as he stood on his two remaining appendages and tried a final run. The cat opened wide taking Trevor inside up to his waist. The inside of the cat's mouth smelled like fish and the tiny figure squirmed helplessly as he felt his feet leave the ground.

Clarisa smiled at her cat as two meaty feet kicked and disappeared between its gleaming white teeth.

"Ah Sebastian, you should have left some for me!"
14523212211212.title: Cat get's his foot!

1452321221121211.content:
The cat had stole her prize! The witch plucked up Trevor's abandoned loafers, trousers, and shirt and with a magical incantation, they were gone.

A few days later the witch returned to the dating scene this time dropping her number with the Survivor star Mike Yerger while pretending to look at a property. Her beauty and charm did the trick and soon they were out for a night of dinner and a ride in one of his cool cars.
1452321221121211.title: Yum!

14523212211212111.content:
"Your car is really impressive!" she flattered him and watched his eyes light up. She made a slight yawn causing the handsome hunk of a model to drive her home. "Care to come in for a drink?" She watched all of the signs that Michael was excited about the invitation.

"Yeah, sure!" Michael let her off to get the door while he found a secure place for his car.

"No food for you this time!" the black cat let off a screech as she sent it out the front door.
14523212211212111.title: Stop by my place?

145232122112121112.content:
As Michael entered the house he could hear some music playing. She had already slipped into something more comfortable.

"Wow... nice place!" Michael looked around as if he were assessing its value in his head. "Do you have a hamster or something?" Michael nodded to the mouse cage on a nearby shelf. "No, but I am thinking about getting a pet soon." She patted on the couch next to her for him to join.

Soon they were making out. She offered the hunk of a guy a foot massage and he hesitated. "I am kind of ticklish" he warned as he tugged off his black engineer boots and set them aside. After the play was over she offered him a sip of wine from her glass.

"Here's to us." Michael winked and took a sip.
145232122112121112.title: Something else.

1452321221121211121.content:
"Whoa! What the ..." Michael sprang to his feet. "Something feels......" The witch looked on with delight as her beefy date deflated into his clothes. She gently lifted the pants to find Michael sprawled out unconscious and a mere 8 cm tall.


What the fuck... Michael laid with his eyes closed feeling disoriented and hung over. Did I make it home? God I hope I am not in bed with her. Michael's eyes adjusted to the bright light and the realization he wasn't wearing any clothes. "What the f......" Michael was laying in a pile of wood chips... giant wood chips. He sprang to his feet and rubbed his eyes as he tried to get his bearings. He reached out and grabbed the bars and peered outside. He was still in her house... and her house was huge!
1452321221121211121.title: Whoops! Bad decision.

14523212211212111211.content:
"What? What happened?!" Michael called out to the massive form of his date as he quietly sondered towards the cage. "Ah you are awake! Could you believe I lost my last date to my cat? He looked very tasty."

Michael's now tiny mouth hung open in shock and terror. "That's that's way fucked up... I've gotta get outta here!" Michael spun on his heel and ran to the back of the cage looking for a way out.
14523212211212111211.title: Keep going

145232122112121112111.content:
The tiny model pulled on the bars of his cage in terror while his captor waved her hands and made his clothes disappear. "They'll find my car! They'll find me!"

"Thanks for the reminder handsome. The witch calmly waved her hand and a beautiful black sports car appeared in her hand, toy sized."
145232122112121112111.title: Keep going

1452321221121211121111.content:
The tiny little real estate agent gasped at the sight of his beautiful car, now as shrunken as he was. "Hey! Put that back I just paid for..... " before the tiny little stud could finish his sentence he whined as his sports car disappeared in a puff of dust.

Before Michael could react any more to the loss of his clothes and car the giant turned her attention on the cage that held him. The bite sized Survivor star darted back and forth, but there was no way to escape the cage. "Let's have some more fun shall we?" the witch casually flipped the lock to the cage and poked her hand through the entry.
1452321221121211121111.title: Keep going

14523212211212121.content:
"Right this way Mr. Slaggert." Mitchel follows the receptionist behind the counter of Edible Toys. Mitch doesn't know too much about the process, but from what he could read they are going to make him into some sort of edible toy. Probably some sort of 3D modeling whatever, the money they paid was good. Mitchel is used to modeling so when they ask him to slip into a pair of work boots jeans and a white t he doesn't question it.

"Just a few questions before we begin." The attendant is wearing a white lab coat like a doctor which seems strange to Mitch. The questions are odd too, for example asking him if is ticklish and what his last meal was.

"Uh is this going to be complicated?" Mitch raised an eyebrow showing a bit of concern.

"Not at all Mitch, this is just standard procedure for the process. Please come with me."

They enter a room with all sorts of lights and Instruments. In the center of the room on a platform is a round chamber. It is clear on one half and opaque on the other. "So this is the 3D scanner pretty cool man." The attendant smiles awkwardly and invites Mitch to step up on the platform as the clear side of the chamber slides open.

"Please remove your pockets and put them on the tray." Mitchel is all set as the door slides closed.

The device begins to hum. Mitchel is startled as the opaque part fo the chamber starts to rotate around him at first slow a green light flickering over his entire body. Then, like the next stage of an amusement park ride the opaque scanner starts to spin faster. The air pressure changes and for a moment Mitchels boots lift off the floor as if he were in a falling elevator. "Yo man I think there's something wrong with this thing! Shut it down!" Mitch reaches over and pounds on the surface of the chamber to get someone's attention. The device is moving so fast Mitch can no longer see outside.

With a strange sound the scanner slowly comes to a stop. "What the fuck... " Mitchel is terrified by what he sees.
14523212211212121.title: Mitchell

145232122112121211.content:
The world outside the chamber has completely changed! Mitchell presses against the clear chamber with disbelief. He sees a massive world, some sort of shop. Giant people are moving about, a vendor giving a package to a woman with "Dorian Twins" written on it.

"Hey Hey!" Mitch tracks the muffled cries to his left, a chamber just like his own is to each side of him and because of the curve of it all he can see them above and below too! Trevor Signorino is looking at him. "What is this?!" Mitchell cries out to Trevor who shrugs in response. Before they can communicate further another cry is heard from the right. Xavier Serrano is shouting at them both and pointing wildly outward. Trevor and Mitch look out to see what Xavier is reacting to.

A giant man is peering in at them pointing with his finger. Mitchell's eyes widen as the giant's gaze meets his for a moment. 'Beep beep beep' a muffled vending machine code pad sound travels through the chamber and Mitchell freezes in terror. "No nooooo!" There is a horrendous sound as air rushes out of the chamber containing Trevor. Mitchell manages to see a look of fear on Trevor's beautiful face as his arms are sucked upward by the vacuum. With a thump the sound ceases, Trevor is gone. "Man what the fuck is this?" Mitchell thinks aloud as the sound of Trevor's voice returns. The giant has Trevor between his fingers for a moment then dropping him into a jar and sealing the lid. Mitchell stares on in helpless disbelief as his old modeling buddy gets lowered into a gift bag and carried away to God knows where.
145232122112121211.title: Mitchell is a morsel!

1452321221121212111.content:
Mitchell paces around the chamber looking for some way out. In his imagination he sees the wall behind im as leading back to the room this all began in.. and home! But time passes and Mitchell's situation is hopeless. I need to work on my arms today, the beefy young jock thinks between moments of panic and fear trying to make sense of his situation. He moves back over to the window out Xavier is crying and pacing in his chamber. The chamber that briefly held Trevor spins again and comes to a stop. RJ King looks around in confusion Mitchell shrugs helplessly.

After what feels like eternity a new shadow passes over the chamber. Another giant peers along the rows poking buttons as he goes. The clear barrier in front of Mitchell lights up, the information is mirror reverse from Mitchell's perspective but he can read it.


Mitchell Swaggart
Original Height: 188 cm
Miniaturization Height: 8.8 cm
Shoe Size before: 12
Potential Flavoring: Strawberries and Yogurt
Ticklish on ....


"No way man no way!" the meaty young model flips out as he considers the reason why his chamber lit up. 'Beep beep beep.... beep' a code is entered. Mitchell looks to his sides to see a look of worry in both other men. RJ manages a wave when the sound of the vacuum revs up once again. The ceiling above the chamber slides open like the iris of a camera and a powerful wind sweeps Mitchell upward.
1452321221121212111.title: Keep going.

14523212211212121111.content:
With tremendous force Mitchell found himself being pulled upward into darkness. The sound was deafening as he slid along what felt like a long slide. A light appeared and and Mitchell fell downward through it. "Ahhhh" with a light thud Mitchell landed into some sort of pad. As he oriented himself he heard a loud booming voice.

"Aren't you a delicious looking little thing?" Mitchell turned around to see the same giant that had selected him. "Look man! I don't know what this is all about but I am not food!" Mitchell looked around for an escape route... there was none.

"Ummm .... I don't know why, but the cocky ones always taste just that much better!" Mitchell tried to evate the giant's hand but quickly found himself grasped under the arms and lifted upward. "Let go! Let me go! What do you think you are doing?!" Mitchell's baritone voice registered as squeaky to the giant as Mitchell found himself dropped unceremoniously into a jar labeled Edible Toys! and the vented lid tightly shut.
14523212211212121111.title: Packaged for home!

145232122112121211111.content:
The air in the jar is stale. In the dim light of the bag Mitchell can see the receipt for his purchase:

19 grams lean beefy model:

Nutritional Information:

BMI 22
Calories (entire jock) = 30
Minerals
3 Grams Calcium
Salt: 0.4 % by mass

Instructions for enjoyment: Play with your tiny new toy however you wish! Dress them strip them in chocolate you may dip them! You may pleasure or torture them but in the end all products must be consumed.

Mitchell cried out but all he could hear is the loud sounds of the bag moving with the giant.
145232122112121211111.title: Mitchell is on the menu!

1452321221121212111111.content:
The rustling of the bag came to an end. Mitchell pressed his ear against the glass jar but could only hear distant scratching and thudding sounds. His heart raced as he contemplated his fate. Finally he felt upward motion as the jar was lifted from the bag. Mitchell cowered back as the jar came up to the giant's smiling face. Another round of butterflies as the giant lowered poor Mitchell onto the countertop below. "Whoa! wha.." the giant at the last minute inverted the jar slowly forcing Mitchell to stand on the lid. With a twist the glass barrier lifted away.

There was nowhere to run Mitchell could see countertop in all directions and the giant staring down at him with a serene smile. The beefy young man finally screwed up the courage to speak.

"Uh... like....uh what is this?! I mean, like you aren't really going to ....uh.... eat me....'gulp' are you?"

The giant continued to stare with the same expression as before for what felt like an eternity then finally.... "So your stats say you have ticklish feet... is it true?"

"What? Man that is a crazy ass question!" Mitch vaguely remembers the questions before "Why are you asking that....hey!" The giant's right hand slid behind the beefy young jock picking him up by the back of his t-shirt. He struggled but the grip was firm.Butterflies continued to rush through the tiny man's stomach as he found himself coming to a rest on waxy surface. With a flick of the giant's finger Mitchell fell back on his bottom and with a single motion found himself pinned to the tray by his waist.

"Guy! Why are you unlacing my boots... "
1452321221121212111111.title: Home!

14523212211212121111111.content:
The giant continued to pluck at the laces of both boots and with a thumb and forefinger pried of Mitchell's left boot revealing his meaty sock covered foot.

Mitchell's eyes tracked the boot between the giant's fingers and it was brought up to the giant's nose for a deep inhale. "Intoxicating!"

Mitchell continued to squirm firmly pinned by his waist as the giant set the dislodged boot aside for safe keeping. "Why so wriggly beefy? Big plans for the day?" The giant leaned over the counter placing the tip of his nose over Mitch's lean stomach. "So many delightful smells!" Mitchell winces as the giant's fingers slid under his t-shirt forcing it over his muscular arms.
14523212211212121111111.title: Keep going

1452322.content: Edilson Nascimento, Francisco Lachowski, matthew hitt, Robbie Wadge, Jakob Hybholt, Charlie France, Christopher Wetmore, isaac carew, robbie wadge, marlin texiera, William Eustace, Alex Dunstan or Brent Corrigan?

14523221.content:
Edilson Nascimento, Francisco Lachowski, matthew hitt, Robbie Wadge, Jakob Hybholt, Charlie France, Christopher Wetmore, isaac carew, robbie wadge, marlin texiera, William Eustace, Alex Dunstan or Brent Corrigan?

One of these or another path?

You eagerly browse the menu! Such tasty looking men!

Mike Roulo

Camden Sutkowski
Matthew Noszka
