145232212.title: Another path

1452322121.content:
You make your selection!

On the other side of the world a hot model is in the middle of a session. His photographer is surprised when he looks through the viewer... brings the beefy Matthew Noszka into view and upon the press of the shutter button looks up to find a steaming pair of foot prints where his subject once stood.

Matthew sees a blinding flash of light. The world seems to freeze. "Hey! Are you guys seeing this?" He looks at his entourage including the photographer but they too seem motionless. He tries to walk but finds his foot fall pushes him off the ground! "Whoa! What is this!?" Matthew flips head over heels and comes to a stop in a horizontal position, his feet pointed towards the camera. He feels a strange tug on both sneakers which proceed to pop off and suck into the camera lens. "Hey! What the hell is this? Hello! Hello!?" He feels queasy as his toes start stretching unnaturally towards the same lens. He instinctively tries to swim away from the pull, but he is helpless. Soon his entire beefy form squeezes into the lens and he is gone.

"Ahhhhhhh!" Matthew plunges into darkness. In the torrent of confusion he happens to see that he sneakers are back on his feet and he appears to be whole again. He seems to fall forever when finally he gets the sense he is in some sort of tunnel. The tunnel slowly channels his downward momentum into some sort of slide. As quickly as it began the crazy journey comes to an anticlimactic end as he finds himself plunging into a pad that deflates to decrease his forward momentum. Engulfed by the pad he does not immediately see where he has landed.

A technician watches the entire process and waits emotionless for Matthew to arrive. Years ago he found the process surprising but that is in stark contrast to his current reaction to the bite sized little model making his way to the end of the reception buffer and stumbling back at the technician's enormous size.

"Whoa! What is this?! Where am I?" His mind was in shock. Am I having a dream? Did they put something in my protein shake this morning. The giant man before him wore surgical gloves and had a eye piece that made one eye look larger. Matthew's racing mind stopped briefly on the thought of Mr. Peanut. "Hey! I asked you a question what is...."

The technician didn't invest himself in the product. Once a year they were given a holiday bonus. Last year he snacked on a You Tube star who he found entertaining as well. He gently plucked off Matthew's right shoe and sock using calipers to do a quick height check. Before the miniturization process he was 6'2" tall. "2.06 inches... perfect!"The tech mumbled himself as he worked. Matthew struggles helplessly as the tech quickly returns his dislodged footwear. and plucked him up by the back of his white t-shirt. "Please! Just let me know what's going on! Dude, bro like, what is that... .hey I don't want to go in there... no! hey!" With a brief smile the technician released Matthew and watched him plop into the thick liquid. The beefy little guy didn't have time to protest more because as soon as his body heat came in contact with the polymer it reacted freezing him in place. All poor Matthew could do is move his eyes to track the motion of the mysterious giant as he plucked up the cylinder and placed it in a box for shipping.
1452322121.title: Matthew Noska

choices: Whoops! Trouble with shipping and handling.
14523221212.content: Another model or does something unfortunate happen while poor Matthew is being delivered?
14523221212.title: Something else.

145232212121.content: Shall we play with Matthew again?
145232212121.title: Another model.

1452322121211.content:
"What time did they say we were meeting?" Matthew and his buddies are driving across LA looking for the Cafe Vore when one of Nozoska's friends spots the sign and they find a place to park. They enter the front where a host points them towards an elevator. "Hey bro, I need to hit the uh... bathroom.... I'll meet you upstairs." Matthew shrugs off the departure and the fact that both of his buddies left at the same time. He enters the elevator and hits the button for the next floor... As he leaves the elevator he hears a loud clamor from outside. "Dude! Keep the door open!" A tall young man rushes towards the elevator and screams out as the doors quickly close trapping him on the wrong side.

"Hey guy relax, the elevator will be back." Matthew's chill demeanor in stark contrast to Michael Yerger who looks like he is in full flight for fight mode. "You don't understand man! They brought us here to eat us! They brought us to.." Before Yerger can get another word out a massive hand appears from above and snatches him up right in front of Matthew's eyes.

Matthew looks around and sees that he no longer appears to be in the cafe... In front of him is a rather normal looking waiting room, but a large window shows a different scene. He rushes over and watches as a giant in a chef's outfit proceeds to strip the other young man and drop him screaming into a pot of boiling water.
1452322121211.title: Yes, Matthew N again!

14523221212111.content: "Holly fuckkk....!" Matthew runs towards the elevator... there's no button.. ah shit..... He immediately reaches for his cell phone to let his bros know not to come up. "Hey Charlie.. don't" before the athletic model can warn his friend he gets interrupted "Matthew guy, I know we've been tight and all, but they paid us a shit ton of money dude I hope they totally go humane on you and all... later." Matthew stares at the phone in disbelief for an instant and then continues to seek an escape. The walls are too high to scale, the elevator seems to built for a one way trip...
14523221212111.title: Matthew plots an escape.

145232212121112.content:
The chef again turns his attention to the strange room. "Holly F..." Matthew runs across the room to a bench near the elevator and tries to get beneath it.

"Sorry little guy... nowhere to hide!" The chef's massive hand reaches into the room making contact with the cowering beefcake's exposed right leg. "Let go! Fuck dude no!" Matthew's normally powerful upper arms are no match for the massive chef pulling him free of the bench and upside down.
145232212121112.title: The chef returns...

choices: The package gets lost along the way!
145232212122.content: What is this? Where are they taking me? Matthew is plunged into a container by the technician. Matthew's eyes show panic as he notices the label "Matthew Noszka doll inside! Edible Models! made by Edible Toys Inc." His container is plunged into a box. Matthew looks across at the container closest to him. He immediately recognizes the shocked face of RJ King also suspended in the strange material. The encounter is brief as the box is closed and all the little captives are plunged into darkness.
145232212122.title: Whoops! Trouble with shipping and handling.

choices: Nah, it is time for a beefy treat!
1452322121221.content:
Light bursts into the box after what seems like forever! Panicked or calm it really doesn't mater for Matthew Noszka is preserved from head to toe without need for food or oxygen while he is in stasis. Matthew watches as RJ King's hansom face passes up and out of the box. Behind RJ's package Adam Ayash's suspended form appears. Adam is in a tank top and shorts. One blue sneaker is on his foot but the other is suspended mid fluid as if he managed to dislodge it during the plunge. Darkness returns and light bursts in over and over. Finally. The other packages in the box are all gone. In darkness, Matthew awaits his fate. Finally, the box bursts open again and a rather plump hand with a brown sleeve makes contact with Matthew's container. Thoughts continue to race through the meaty little model's mind as he finds himself lifted out into the open air.

The plump hand predictably belongs to a portly many in a delivery uniform. He has a cigarette hanging from lips framed in a day's stubble. Covering most of poor Matthew's view the man moves him to some sort of table. He removes the cylinder from the package. He removes a small injector from the back of the package and pierces the cylinder. Matthew begins to gain feeling in his hand and feet and soon finds himself free of the polymer that had trapped him for so long.

He moves his head for the first time and takes in his surroundings: He stands on what appears to be the plank of a picnic table that stretches out equally in both directions. Next to him are two containers each about twice as tall as him, but over their tops he makes out what appears to be marinara sauce and some sort of ranch dressing. His eyes return to the delivery man who seems to have been looking at him the whole time.

"Aren't you a buff little fella" The delivery man smiles down at his little meal. "I deliver these once a week and never get to try one for myself. One of my colleagues swiped my leftover bread sticks at the office and it looks like someone lost your paper work so...." the portly man trails off with his eyes and smacks his lips "It looks like you get to be my lunch!"

Matthew gasps and makes a run for it. With adrenalin pumping the world seems to move in slow motion. He sees the end of the table and possible freedom, but out of the corner of his eye he sees the plump hand swooping in for him. "Get the fuck away from me!" Matthew turns to miss the incoming hand, but it is of no use. He finds himself dangling in front of the delivery man's face.

"Ah ah ah tsk tsk. I have already lost one meal today."

"Let me go! Bro, like, I swear I can make it worth your while!"

Without another word the delivery man tugs gently on Matthew's white t-shirt pulling it involuntarily from his muscular body. Matthew finds himself briefly on the table again only to be plucked up by his ankles. His swept blond locks point downward toward the gaping mouth of the delivery man. Matthew winces at the rather bad smelling hot breath. "Damn man get a breath mint!" he finds himself asserting despite the far graver issues at hand. "Please don't please don....ahh ak ak!" Matthew's beautiful features plunge rapidly between parted lips. The giant's massive tongue reaches out to greet him covering his face and chest in saliva. Matthew gasps for breath as he finds himself sucked on like a pop sickle. Moments later he returns from the giant's mouth covered in saliva.

"You taste even better than I expected! Best lunch ever!" The giant grasps his unwilling meal by the lats and with thumb and forefinger begins to take off the red and white high top sneakers.

"Uhhhhh get away from my feet!" Matthew's protests are in vain as he finds his sneakers pried off one by one and set next to his discarded t-shirt on the table below. Matthew's stomach flutters as he finds himself once again returned to the tables surface, but this time he finds himself over his head in marinara sauce. The little human meatball struggles to tread on the surface and make his way for the edge of what for him is a Styrofoam pool. Just as he reaches the edge he feels a sharp tug on both pant legs as the giant proceeds to remove his jeans. "This isn't funny man! When I get back to normal I am going to pound you!"

"Your bravado only makes you more a pleasure to the senses!" The delivery man grabs the now stripped Matthew Noszka by the ankles once more managing to force a face plant into the thick sauce. Matthew manages to get the sauce out of his eyes just in time to see a parting smile feel the breath of his captor once more. Matthew tries to push against the tip of the giant's tongue but his hands slip and he ends up meeting the tongue with his face. A strange suction sensation overpowers the young athletic guy as he finds himself buried up to his now naked waste in giant! The giant cleans the sauce off of Matthew's upper torso and then methodically inserts each meaty leg into his mouth to clean them.
1452322121221.title: The package gets lost along the way!

14523221212212.content:
"What are you going to do now big man? Dip me in ranch?" During his experience Matthew seems to have come to the delusion that he was just going to get played with and released.

"Nah, 'bro' I think it is time I finished this delicious lunch and got back to work." The giant savored one last game of cat and mouse watching the naked little athlete run across the table only to have his hopes dashed one last time as he found himself lifted by his muscular little arms upward.

"Come on guy you don't have to do this... come on man don't do this!" Matthew pleaded hoping to be spared by the giant. Mathew spread his legs wide trying to make his form to big for the cavern now directly below him. He pounded against the giant's tongue whining a little each time a meaty foot made contact but slid downward. With powerful muscles the giant drew his mouth closed bringing Matthew's legs together and sucking him in to his waist. "Oh my God... oh my God! Man don't do this don't do this ... " Matthew was now up to his armpits in the hungry giant's mouth. His muscular arms tried to free him but to no avail. His protests became muffled as his head disappeared. The giant played with him in mouth briefly allowing Matthew's right foot to find it's last bit of freedom.

A buzz from the cell phone on the table sealed Matthew's fate. At tilted head sent the lad deeper than he had ever been. Powerful muscles massaged him from all sides as they undulated pulling him rapidly into the darkness. "ahhhhhh" plop! The perfectly formed boy dropped with a splash into the stomach. His feet and hands met soft slippery material wherever they probed. He cried out gasping for breath in the overwhelming humidity of the giant's stomach cavity. He briefly reached for something, a bit of chewed gum? "Gotta get out of here!" he continued to gasp as he heard a deep rumbling sound. The walls of the stomach collapsed rapidly squeezing him hard knocking out his last bit of wind.

As the truck pulled away, a gentle breeze removed a bit of white material from the surface of the table. Two sparrows tugged at the pair of blue jeans. A passing child found a great pair of very realistic looking sneakers for her Ken doll.
14523221212212.title: Nah, it is time for a beefy treat!

1452322122.title: Another

14523221221.content:
Michael Hoffman stepped into his bathroom. He had just worked out and was about to take his trademark flexing selfie. He just showered and the air was cool against his tight muscular physique. His soft pink toes flexed slightly as he stepped onto the bathmat which he hadn't noticed looked different than the one he normally had.

"Whoa! What the!" Michael had the strangest tingling sensation in the soles of his feet, almost like getting a mild shock. He looked down and to his great distress his feet appeared to have sunk down into the mat. Out of instinct the young man tried to pull his feet up but when he did nothing below the mat returned! "Ah shit! What the hell! Yo what's going on here man!" Michael attempted to remove himself from that bath mat but instead found himself falling onto his hands, both of which were also swallowed up by the strange bathmat. Like a man caught in quicksand Mr. Hoffman struggled but with each effort found his meaty body winnowed further away into the mat. Soon his dimple chinned face with a look of panic vanished into the mat's black surface.
14523221221.title: Michael Hoffman

145232212211.content:
What's happening? What the fuck? Michael was shrouded in darkness and every part of him felt numb, almost like it wasn't there. He had his thoughts but the muscular mass that meant so much to him seemed gone. Just darkness... endless darkness.

His toe curled.... Then he felt a bit of tingling in his hands... but no sense of location....

With an explosion his world returned to him. In a cold sweat sensation returned to every part of his body. Michael looked down at his toes and then checked out his guns.. everything seemed to be there, but where was he?

His buttocks pressed against the cold hard surface below... clear glass with some sort of large wood grain pattern beneath. The world around him was hard to make out, distorted by the curve of glass. Above the round ceiling was sort of a metallic gold.

Motion.. indistinct at first... came into focus...a giant eye peered through the glass.

"What the fuck is this! Where am I?" the vision forces Michael into lucidity as he jumped to his feet and pressed himself against the opposite side of the room in a vain attempt to avoid the massive eye. A defining scraping sound from above, the ceiling turned and then lifted away! The eye from across the room now became two as a massive face smiled downward into the room. "Mr. Hoffman, welcome to my collection!"
145232212211.title: Where did Michael Hoffman go?

1452322122111.content:
Michael slides back to his butt at the sight above. Slightly blinded by the light above the beefy guy puts a hand over his eyes. "Wha what? What the fuck is this? Wha...." The glass room began to tilt! Michael didn't know where he was but he damn well knew he didn't want to be out there with no damn giant. He wined slightly as he struggled to keep friction against the cold glass surface. He was able to put a hand and foot against each wall and for a brief time maintained his presence in the strange room even as it flipped upside down.

"Come out come out my little prize!" The giant's voice boomed melodically followed by a massive blow against the side of the room.

"No nooooooooo!" Michael looked below and saw a massive pink wrinkly surface undulating.... strange... Michael's hold relinquished and a short stomach churning fall later he came to rest hands behind him bottom now squarely planted into the strange surface. The room quickly lifted away revealing the big picture... Michael's eyes grew even wider than they already were and his mouth dropped.

He was in a giant hand. Above, the massive face of the giant came into full view.

"You scrumptious little man! You look even better in person! What percent body fat are you anyway?"

The words hung in the air. Michael out of pride found himself answering "Uh... 7% dude... uh thanks?"
1452322122111.title: Michael Hoffman leaves the jar.

14523221221111.content:
"Your most welcome my dear little man! I am a great admirer of body builders, you might say I am your biggest fan!" The bite sized little muscle man is too terrified to laugh. The Giant continues on realizing the approval of his audience was of no consequence. "You look so tight at the moment! Did you just get back from lifting?" Michael, still in shock nods in the affirmative. "How delightful! Let me guess, legs and arms?"

"Uh I wanna go back right fucking now!" Michael ignores the giant's awkward attempts to speak of his training regiment. He doesn't like being in the palm of the giant's hand and makes a roll for it.

"Tsk tsk tsk, my meaty little boy! I insist you stay for dinner." The giant clenches his hand preventing Michael's escape attempt. Gingerly, the giant plops the little man down on the surface of a nearby countertop island. "It is made of marble my little beef cake, you will find there is no escape!" Michael ignores the giant's words and runs across the island dashing around in search for a way out of his nightmare. "O que está errado?! O que você está fazendo?!" Danielo sees the concern in the giants above. The first giant plucks Danielo out of his clamps and sets him on his desk. Danielo is about to make a run for it when he looks down at his hand. He shouts out in panic as it appears to be melting away! "O que é que você fez? O que é que você fez?!!!" The tech smiles back vacantly at Danielo vacantly. The tingling sensation in Danielo's quickly shrinking hand starts in the toes of his right foot. He quickly slips off his shoe to find his toes dissolving too! His right hand has now gone and soon his muscular tatooed arm disolves.
14523221222211.title: Something goes wrong during re-materialization!

145232212222111.content:
"Socorro! Socorro!" Danielo is disolving fast. "Help! Help!" the handsome little man cries out in English hoping it will make a difference. The technician gives a gentle tug to Danielo's left sneaker only to find it pull away without effort, both feet are now but faded memories.

As the technician looks up from his paperwork, he plucks up the empty shoes, socks, green and yellow underwear, tight jeans, t-shirt and empty skateboarder hat and sets places them in a jar on the edge of his desk.
145232212222111.title: keep going

14523221222211111.content:
A day has passed and Tech 23 returns to the processing center for another shift. As he passes the check point and reports in to his supervisor he passes rows of other techs already processing today's inventory. He nods cheerfully at Tech 7 who is in the process of packing up Joe Jonas to a hungry customer. Tech 10 fails to greet him because he is too busy trying to retrieve who appears to be the sexy model Ricardo Baldin from beneath his work bench.

Tech 23 reaches his station which hums to life as soon as the sensor detects his presence. He clicks on a few buttons and the machine begins to bring in the first catch of the work day.

Lucas Dell snaps a selfie to post on Instagram before heading to class. God I am fucking cute he thinks to himself as he heads out across campus. He has his head buried in his smart phone and does not at first notice the quiet hum above him. "Hey Lucas I think you are being followed by the Paparazzi!" A couple of girls giggle as they pass the handsome young man. Lucas momentarily puts his phone in his pocket and looks for the operator. Seeing no one he glances up at the hovering craft. He spies what appears to be a camera on the device and flashes his trademark sexy face. "Hey perv! Why don't you just check out my Instagram page" <sigh> whatever." Just then the device begins to hum a bit louder and rocks back slightly. Lucas gets an uneasy feeling and starts to walk away. The device follows him and he begins to run. "Dude! Like get the fuck away from me!" Lucas stops and turns back toward the drone "Don't make me call security on your ass!" The device once again hums loudly and cocks back. Lucas watches as a green beam of light quickly scans him from the toes of this white canvas sneakers to the top of his head. "What the fu...." a second red beam vaporizes the young stud sending his computer bag to the grass without an owner. A few students nearby don't notice what has happened until they here the 'pop' of air rushing into the void previously held by the hot young man. One of them picks up the bag while a second snaps a quick photo of the strange scorched footprints on the pristine campus turf.

A flash of red... and then blue shimmering light.... what the fuck was that? Lucas turns around to get a bearing. The bright sunlight of the college campus has changed to an artificial glow. Austin is on a strange glowing white platform. From his perspective, the edge of the platform appears to be about 15 feet or so away. Beyond he is not able to make out anything, only darkness. "Hey what the fuck just happened?! Hello? Hey I asked a fucking question!" A voice through a speaker loudly responds. "Lucas Austin Dell! It is my pleasure to inform you that you are now the property of Edible Toys Incorporated! Please prepare for being inspected and packaged for shipping!"
14523221222211111.title: Sure!

145232212222111111.content:
What the fuck? Lucas looks around for the origin of the voice. His search is short for seconds later a massive face appears through what he now realizes is some sort of glass barrier. "Is this like some sort of joke man?! Who the fuck are you?" Austin assumes he is being punked or some shit like that. He walks towards the giant face and as he does the glass wall begins to lift away. The light beneath his feet dims as this happens and Austin is able to make out the world beyond a bit more clearly. He sees clearly now a giant man in a lab coat before him wearing magnifying glasses that make his eyes seem too large for his already massive head. Without the barrier Lucas begins to sense it might be real and starts to step back. 'thud' the back of Lucas's right sneaker collides with a steel grey barrier that is moving towards him from behind. He instinctively tries to move to the side but in each turn finds a barrier moving him in the one direction he does not want to go.

"My aren't you an arrogant little man!" the giant crouches down to the platform and Lucas recoils at the wind of his hot humid breath. "Your buyer is in for a real treat! torturing and eating someone like you is a delight!" Lucas starts to respond but gasps in horror at the giant hand moving in to retrieve him.

"Help! Somebody help! What the fuck is this? Let me go!" Lucas's feet kick wildly at the air as the tech grasps him by the neck of his long sleeve blue t-shirt.

"Let's get your height measured first shall we?" The tech skillfully plucks off Lucas's right shoe and sock and straps the little man to a glass platform. Lucas squirms helplessly as the giant turns to retrieve something from behind. A device Lucas has never seen before looms over his tiny helpless form and his toes curl tightly as one point of the device digs into his bare foot, his eyes trail upward as the second end of the device burrows through his thick blond locks on the top of his head. "Ow! that hurts! Get the fuck offff now!!!!" The giant's expression indicates he is enjoying his work. While still strapped down Lucas's sock and shoe are restored. He finds himself once again kicking at the air as the tech lifts him from one platform and sets him on another. "Ah! I see the night crew re-calibrated. Good news my little man, you won't be melting into nothingness...." Lucas whimpered and fought against the clamps holding his feet to the platform. "The bad news is of course you will be played with and devoured by a giant. Makes you wish you hadn't posted all of those selfies huh little hottie?"

selfies.... Lucas reaches for his trusty smart phone.... damn no signal.... "hey! noooooo!" Lucas screams out as the giant snatches away his only link to the outside world. "tsk tsk my little morsel, we wouldn't want you ruining your biggest fan's meal now would we." Lucas's eyes stay locked on his lifeline as it passes into a jar on the giant's desk. "Well dear Lucas, as much as I have enjoyed having you here it is time to get you off to your buyer! The stasis gas will erase your short term memory so you get to relive being shrunken all over again!"

Behind the processing station a conveyor belt brings a container with Lucas's name printed on it. Lucas cries out and thrashes at the air as the tech proceeds place him in a chamber. A hissing sound brings a vapor causing Lucas to stiffen up and drift into an involuntary sleep. The tech pulls and pushes until the hot little man looks like an action figure and slips him gently into his container. A moment later the container is sealed, more of the special gas is pressured inside. and Lucas is on his way to an eager customer.
145232212222111111.title: Inspection and packaging

1452322122221111111.content:
The doorbell rings, you sign an electronic pad, he has arrived!

You rush to your room and set the package on your bedspread. Inside the delivery carton there is a clear plastic cylinder, Lucas Dell's handsome form stands in the middle of the platform. Despite his blank stare and grin and lack of movement you can tell he is the real deal! Slowly you twist the top of the canister and hear a slight hiss as the gas in side runs out. Within a minute you notice Lucas's eyes blink. "Whoa wtf... where am I?" He speaks! The beautiful little man begins to explore around with bewilderment and then he sees you. "What the fuck is this? Like who are you?"

I only get to enjoy this once you think to yourself as you choose your response. "Well, I am not entirely sure, what is the last thing you remember?" plenty of time to terrify him you smile inwardly while on the outside you wear a look of empathy and concern.

"This is like totally fucked up. I was like coming out of my dorm room and their was this drone.... Oh my god this is like some sort of prank isn't it?!" Lucas's face lights up like he finally understands what is happening. "Ok man like I don't know who put you up to this, but this is totally freaking me out!" Austin reaches for his iPhone.... "Alright now who took my phone!"
1452322122221111111.title: The package arrives

14523221222211111112.content:
"Lucas, uh I've got some really bad news for you...." you trail off savoring the moment.

"Oh my God you better not have screwed up my phone! I just had it replaced and I would have to wait like three whole days to get another!" Lucas stamps his tiny sneaker clad foot on the foam pad of his holding container.

"Noooo, I am afraid it is worse than that." again you allow the suspense to build. "This is no joke dude! You really have been shrunken down to a 3 inch doll!"

"Yeah right, look I need to get class. Now give me my phone so I can get outta here." Lucas begins searching around the container for evidence of a door.

"Oh you want to get out of the container, well why didn't you say so!" You reach across your bed and into the container. Lucas yelps as he senses the very real presence of your hand in the container. "What the fuck like get the fuck off me!" You ignore your tiny doll's demands and pluck him up by the back of his skinny jeans. He shouts out profanities and struggles in the air wildly "Fucking let me go let me the fuck go!" Lucas now dangles in front of your face. The scent is heavenly! You decide to begin by removing his shoes and having a sniff. The scent of the little man's feet is intense and you savor every moment of it. You place the first shoe and sock into his container as a momento. "Leave my fucking shoes alone!" Lucas continues to protest.

"You smell delicious!" with a straight finger you poke at Lucas's tummy and watch him arch up in response.

"
14523221222211111112.title: Eat him up!

145232212222111121.content: Raf Miller was in Los Angeles and feeling great. The beautiful up and coming model arrived in town the night before and his manager had given him the address of this trendy cafe for brunch. Raf did his morning workout and then showered and dressed for his first meeting. The driver dropped him off at the front. Cafe Vore.. Raf read to himself as he stepped through the front door. The cafe was brimming with activity. The host smiled and looked down at a computer tablet. "Ah yes! Mr. Miller. Right this way sir." Raf followed the host who pointed him into an elevator. Strange, this building only has one story.. Raf decided he must have been mistaken and hopped into the elevator.
145232212222111121.title: Lips Smacking

1452322122221111211.content:
The host hit a button in the car before leaving and the elevator doors closed. Raf heard a humming sound and the lights dimmed oddly. He felt a sinking feeling as if the car was moving downwards. The numbers above the door did not show floors, but instead showed a diminishing percentage. "Four percent... what the..." with a sharp ping the elevator came to a stop. The doors opened.

The lobby was bright and Raf stepped out without hesitation. "Hold the door!" a handsome looking man rushed past Raf desperately reaching for door but missing it as it snapped closed. "Don't worry, I'm sure it will be back shortly." Raf shrugged surprised at the emotional response of the other man.
1452322122221111211.title: There was only one storey.

14523221222212.content:
The drone rockets into the night sky to a high enough altitude for transmission. It has other stops to make this evening and this is the most efficient way to get product to market quickly.

Meanwhile thousands of miles away, a processing center is in full operation. Skilled techs receive newly shrunken boy toys who are then measured and placed in suspension for delivery to their hungry customers. "Ei Você não sabe que eu sou uma a lenda do futebol? Eu exijo ver meu agente!" a resolute little Cristiano Ronaldo pounds on the glass of his receiving chamber. Across from Ronaldo another glass cylinder shimmers with the green light of re-materialization. Tanner Patrick's lean handsome form comes into view and he spins around disoriented and confused. As a tech mounts the cute little Vine star for measure, a nearby chamber begins to shimmer. Tech number 23 quickly examines the small screen below the processing chamber to determine the ID of the new arrival. "Danielo Borgato, yum!" The tech's eye arches slightly at a sputtering sound he hears during the re-composition process. His look of concern disappears as Danielo's handsome form finally comes into view. The tech waits for the Danielo to scan his new surroundings and make contact with him, they almost always react the same way he thinks to himself passively. Danielo fairly quickly notices the most important thing in his new environment, the giant in a lab coat with magnification goggles. "O ooo que é isso? Que fizeste para mim?!" The hot little man wears tight light blue jeans with red canvas sneakers. As he scans around he does so with his sunglasses tilted upward. Atop his head is a black ball cap with with what looks to be a SevenSeven logo. "Ah yes Portuguese" the technician makes a few quick adjustments to the screen at the front of the receiving chamber. "Danielo Borgado, it is my pleasure to inform that you are now property of Edible Toys Incorporated. Please prepare for inspection and packaging." Tech 23 waits patiently while the computer translates Danielo his fate. "Coloque-me de volta ao normal! Você não pode fazer isto!" Put me back to normal! You can't do this! The machine translates both ways, but it is rarely of much use. With the flip of a switch the apparatus holding poor little Danielo lifts the glass cylinder and corrals Danielo toward the technician. "Now my little man, let's make sure you check out!" Danielo finds himself plucked up by the back of his black t-shirt he continues to struggle furiously as the tech plucks off a shoe and sock and straps him to a cold glass board. "You are properly scaled. Let's check out your mass now my little friend" A small platform comes out of the inspection desk and the technician gently inserts each of Dannielo's feet into tared clamps on the balance. The technician looks with a smile at his terrified little model captive when he is distracted by something at a nearby station.

"Meu pé! O que está acontecendo? O que você fez para mim?!" Cristiano Ronaldo's inspection did not go well. The hot young footballer is standing on the inspection table in a pair of skinny jeans and a white shirt. His right loafer now sits empty as he hops around on his left. Another tech gently knocks Ronaldo to the table and plucks off the remaining loafer. Five plump athletic toes wiggle in the liberation.... and then vanish!

"Tsk tsk tsk. Instability in the transfer... Tough break. You are lucky that didn't happen to you... .well the giant who is about to eat you is anyway" Tech 23 flashes Danielo an empty grin. "Let's get you packaged. "No! No! I want to go back!" Danelo squirms helplessly on the balance as the tech plucks him up gingerly. "You won't remember a bit of this little man. One moment you will be skating with your friends, the next you will be a hot little Brazilian snack for our very lucky client." Danielo continues to protest and fight as he finds his muscular form lowered into a tank that fills with a strange smelling gas. Soon he has been rendered catatonic but still bendable. Techniican 23 adjusts Danielo's tiny cap and lowers him into the package for sealing and shipping.
14523221222212.title: Something else.

145232212222121.content:
The drone rockets into the night sky to a high enough altitude for transmission. It has other stops to make this evening and this is the most efficient way to get product to market quickly.

It has arrived! You thank the delivery person for their service and go to your kitchen table. You gently remove the cardboard and find a sealed plastic cylinder inside. Danielo's handsome form is motionless his expression neutral. He is wearing a white t-shirt, black skater ball cap and red canvas skater shoes. You open a small instruction book included with your order:

Thank you for using Edible Toys! The small man enclosed is really the guy you choose! When you remove the seal on top of our patented container he will awaken. His last memory will be of being normal sized. He may recall the drone used for procurement. Play with him, torture him, enjoy him as you wish, but be certain to eat him up when you are finished. Enjoy.

You examine him one more time savoring what may come and then slowly twist the lid of the container. 'pop!' 'hissssss' the gas slowly leaks out. Danielo blinks and then turns his head slowly stumbling back. "Que diabos? Onde estou?" You guess he is asking where the hell he is, he has not seen you yet. The hot little man rocks back and forth on the foam floor of his container and inspects his surroundings. As he turns to take in the vastness that is your kitchen table his eyes finally reach you. "Que porra? Que porra? De jeito nenhum!" He immediately cowers on the far side of the container.
145232212222121.title: Off to the client!

1452322122222.title: Another Choice

14523221222221.content:
A beautiful Miami afternoon. Landon kicks back to soak in more sun. His girl friend has just gone off to get some water at a nearby stand. One could not ask for a better afternoon. Landon senses a shadow passing over the bright sun entering his eyelids. hmmm a cloud the handsome green eyed model thinks at first and forgets about it. The shadow comes back this time accompanied by a whining sound. Landon opens his eyes and shields them from the sun to investigate. Hovering just a few feet above his head is a drone and Landon notices it has a camera. "Ah man! Go bother someone else." With a dismissive swipe the buff young man closes his eyes and tries to return to his afternoon chill. The pitch of the still present drone makes a slight change. The air feels different Landon opens his eyes and instantly jumps to his feet "What the fuck?!"

His beach chair is still beneath him but everything else has changed! He is now on a glowing round platform surrounded by darkness on all sides. On first site Landon is reminded of the catwalk he did last month in Italy. He looks down and flexes his toes on the strange new surface, bits of sand fall from his feet and sitter across the floor. He reaches for his cell phone next to the chair gone... damn! "Hey! Hello is somebody here?" Landon makes his way to the edge of the platform to see if he can figure out what lies beyond. About halfway a loud voice coming from a speaker above "Landon Falgoust! It is my pleasure to inform you that you are now property of Edible Toys Incorporated. Prepare to be measured and packaged for shipment!"

"Edible Toys? Property? Yo man I think there has been some sorta mist......" His words are cut off by the sound of the barrier around the platform lifting and additional walls coming in from the side forcing the young man to move in one direction. Landon steps back against the barrier in shock as something moves out of the darkness. A man, at least a half a mile tall with a white lab coat and rather strange looking glasses as if he were to inspect a diamond or cut up a frog!

"Mistake! Oh I hope not my dear little man. You are Landon Falgoust are you not? The giant is examining a pad and turns it around showing Landon doing an audition video on one of his agencies websites."

"I am, but who wants to know?" Landon's heart is racing as he continues to look around his strange new environment.

"Well, I do of course! If you are not Landon then there are some alley cats out back that are really looking forward to eat... er a meeting you!" The tech puts a hand over his mouth to repress a slight chuckle. Landon is not amused.

"I need to get back to the beach! My girlfriend must be worried." the words hang in the air as the tech seems preoccupied with something on his tablet.

"Oh I am sure she is my dear boy. But her loss is our clients gain. Let's get you measured shall we?"
14523221222221.title: Landon Falgoust!

choices: Pack him for up for delivery!
145232212222211.content:
"Loss! What the hell are you.... Hey!" Landon's protest is cut short as the technician plucks him from the reception platform in a swift motion. Landon struggles against the terrifying sensation of the giant's massive hand.

"Let's make sure you scaled propertly." Landon whimpers and curses as he finds his sandy feet cleaned off with a giant cotton ball covered in rubbing alcohol. Then within an instant each limb is strapped holding him spread eagle on a glass plate. "Ah yes, exactly 3 inches! You have passed the first test, let's now make sure you molecular structure is stable. We wouldn't want our customer opening a box with a tiny pair of board shorts and no hottie now would we?" Landon continues to struggle as he finds himself involuntarily moved to another glass plat form with digital numbers.

Starting mass: 71 kg

Current mass 10.01275 g

"Excellent! Good news Landon, you are not melting! Lost a Brazilian model to that the other day.... so sad."

1452322122222221.content:
One instant Ricardo Baldin is on break doing an outside photo shoot watching a drone and the next instant the young man finds himself in complete darkness. The air is stale and he stumbles panicked on what feels like some sort of foam mat. He runs against a smooth curved wall and feels around for a door. "Merda! Onde está a porta?" He curses to himself as he pounds on the wall in fear. He can see absolutely nothing, but his sense of balance tells him the room is moving. É este um elevador? Onde estou? thougts course rapidly through the models head. He finds himself thrust into the surface of the foam and the room finally comes to a stop. A loud tearing sound draws his attention to the ceiling above when a burst of light forces him to shield his eyes. Once again he gets butterflies in his stomach as the room moves upward into the light.

The beautiful brown eyed man blinks wildly trying to gain focus. The walls of the strange stale aired room are clear. Above he sees something dark that appears to have latched itself to the top of the room... or container.... the motion. He carefully inspects the object above. The main body is too obscured to see but along the edge .... Aqueles parecido com dedos gigantes! Não! the thought is too insane for Ricardo to process. "Olá? Tem alguém aí?!" Ricardo cries out in hopes that someone might either open the room or wake him from this terrible dream.

Suddenly two massive eyes and unsettling smile appear before him! "It looks like someone woke up during shipping!" A voice in English booms across the container from the massive lips. Suddenly the container drops again and lands on a solid surface with a crash. The hand which held the container now rotates slowly and air rushes in much to the very temporary relief of the displaced Brazilian model.

"What is this? Who are you? How did I get here?" Still in shock Ricardo finds the questions rolling off his tongue rapidly. He wants more than anything to be out of the terrifying little room, but at the same time is terrified about what lies beyond. As he cowers in indecision a massive set of fingers. Ricardo's panic stricken mind briefly reflects on that fact that he is still in the clothes from the photo shoot with the drone. The giant now holds him by the back of his unbuttoned blue shirt.

"I like to take pictures of food." Marc glances at you with a grin. The beautiful young man is standing over a plate of food snapping shots and inspecting them in the viewer of his pricey camera. You smile back. "Yeah, I like to do that too." Before the young man can respond you hold up your cell phone and with a flash Marc's beautiful form has disappeared from the small cafe. The spinning stops and he finds himself looking through a strange window suspended in the darkness and the giant eyes of that strange man looking through at him. "Hey! What the fuck man? What did you do?" The window disappears and Marc finds himself in total darkness alone with his terrified thoughts.

After what seems like an eternity Marc feels a tingling sensation in his feet. He looks down to watch both feet disappear! "Oh my God! Help Heeeelp H...." The beautiful guy once again feels the world flash around him.

A wooden floor... sunlight.... a vast plain of wood.... a counter top? Marc spins around trying to soak in his new environment.

"Hello little man! Welcome to my kitchen." Marc's attention darts upward at what appears to be a giant camera lens with an even larger man behind it.

The tiny man looks around his cardboard container as if to find an escape route. "Sorry little hottie, you belong to me now!" 145232212222222221.content:
"Euh? Où tout le monde ne va? Like whad de fuck man?!" Giovanni Bonamy stepped out of the camera area and searched in disbelief. Just moments before the room had been alive with activity. The makeup attendants, the director, the photographer, and hell even the building manager had been nearby working and making noise. A single flash from the camera and then .... silence.... everyone just vanished. " Est-ce une blague? Ha ha gars très drôle! Maintenant, où êtes-vous allé?" The handsome young model was in a blue color themed skateboarder outfit for a shoot where he would magically go from being on a skate board to a surf board, very sexy of course. Gio inspected the food table, looked behind a set of curtains and a few old backgrounds as he made his way to the door to the hallway. "Come on guys whad ze fuck are you doing?" He swung open the door to the hallway and with a bit of adrenaline pushed outside. "Merdi!"

The hallway outside of the studio had changed! The entire building had disappeard. Gio flexed his feet inside his sneakers as he glanced down at the strange stone like material that stretched out in front of him for at least a half kilometer.

14523221222222222121.content:
The handsome French model came into to focus as his 6' 2" body reduced to 2" in the blink of an eye. He was dressed in black stylish boots, skinny jeans, and a tight v-neck t-shirt. His handsome face and hair accented with a grey wool hat. He didn't seem to notice the gravity of his change as he glanced back and forth with a vacant smile. He managed to look at the giant face now before him and wink provocatively.

"Bon jour Monsieur Bonnamy!" The giant looked at his newest toy with hungry eyes. His captive just smiled and responded. "Hello. What has happened here? Is this some sort of computer thing?" Still sporting his signature smile he began to notice the change and walked cautiously towards the giant scene spread out beyond the miniaturization chamber.

The giant's eyes widened. "I am afraid not my beautiful little man. You have been shrunken and are now my personal toy and snack." Gio's confident glaze faded quickly. "I hope you didn't have any big plans my dear man."

Giovanni Bonnamy's looked around him finally letting reality sink in. "Fuck man fuck! Awe man what ze fuck!"

The now morsel of a model first tried to run into the vast black background only to find it ended rather quickly as a wall. "Merde! Merde! What ze fuck man what ze fuck!" He scanned his now limited world with wide eyes quickly calculating that the only path to freedom was past the giant face guarding the stage like area he found himself. He bounded athletically towards his captor leaping from the platform into the world beyond.

The giant, enjoying the game of cat and mouse, allowed Giovanni the false sense of success. The giant watched with amusement as Gio dropped to the surface of the kitchen counter and darted a bit seeking a place of refuge. His beautiful eyes rolled in his head as his mind raced to find a place to hide. There was no path to the floor without a terrible free fall. Gio darted across the marble surface and around the corner of an old wine box.

"My dear Gio! You don't think you will escape do you?" The giant played with his little toy's mind as he pretended to search for Gio. He gently twisted the box keeping one end on the edge of the counter forcing Gio's path. Soon the meaty little fellow found himself pressed against new pine breathing heavily trying in vain to make his form invisible. "Do not feel bad my meaty little Parisian doll, you were never meant to escape! Now let's get you out of those clothes."

Gio's terrified eyes tracked the hand of the massive captor as the giant's fingers closed in on his minuscule form. Gio let off a whimper as two massive fingers gently plucked the hat from his head allowing his hair to flop down freely. Gio, devoid of anywhere to run, watched his hat travel over to a nearby shelf where the giant deposited it gently. "Like you, the hat is now mine my dear Gio. I am afraid those clothes are going to remain in my collection a bit longer than their bearer."

Gio took the brief movement of the giant as a window to escape. He managed to make a few steps when he let out a cry of frustration. " Laisse-moi! Lassie=moi!" Gio kicked frantically as he found his boots lifted from the counter surface with swift force. His lean stomach tightened outwardly while tummy within churned with the butterflies of sudden upward motion. Gio's chiseled features turned in a futile effort to avoid the hot breath of his master who now held him firmly by the waist of his skinny jeans. The giant's smile was wide as he eyed Gio and licked his lips.
14523221222222222121.title: Sure!

1452322222121.content:
Simon leaped onto his board, the waves were high and it was a perfect day. Until the drone came. It maneuvered quickly in front of Simon and he could see the camera lens. "Hey! Get out of here!" Simon was usually a pretty chill guy, but this was not cool. The distraction caused him to loose balance and flip into the air. The drone timed the capture perfectly scanning him from head to toe and then with a zap of the red beam he was gone. His now empty board made its way to the beach as the drone zipped up into the humid air to transmit its latest capture.

At the processing center it was business as usual. A rather displeased Zayne Malik was pounding at the glass of his miniturization chamber demanding to speak with someone in charge. He and others like him would soon be packaged and whisked away to their hungry buyer.

The platform whirled with energy as Simon's form appeared. He thudded onto the bright white surface having been captured in mid air. As he writhed and found his bearing the platform squeaked against the sound of his checkered wet suit. "Hey man what is this?!" Simon began exploring his strange new environment. It was bright light below almost like a photo set, but there was nothing but darkness in all other directions. He took a few steps when a disembodied voice came out of the darkness. "Simon Nessman! You are now the property of Edible Toys. Prepare to be examined for shipment."

The handsome young model looked around in disbelief. "Like is this some sort of joke?! What......" his inquiry to the air fell short as a wall appeared in front of him moving at a rather steady rate. With little choice he proceeded in the opposite direction only to see a barely visible glass move up in front of him.

"Ah Mr. Nessman! Won't you make a delectable treat!" Simon staggered back against the still moving wall at the sight. A giant in a lab coat peered down at him with a rather evil looking grin. The man had to be at least 100 stories tall. "Hey man like what the fuck is this... get the fuck away from me!" Simon's voice shook audibly as he hugged against the still advancing wall pushing his feet forward even as he resisted.

"We just need to get a few measurements and make sure you are stable at the molecular level before we get you off to the buyer." Simon shook his head in shock and defiance as the massive technician's right hand moved in on him swiftly. "Get the fuck away from me...." He whined a bit as the technician pinched the upper part of his wet suit hoisting him upward. The technician ignored the now bite sized little model as he poked and prodded him with various instruments. The inspection came with a fresh water rinse to make sure he wasn't "stinky when he arrived to his buyer." The technician spritzed him with a strange substance that made him stiffen up. The tech then molded him into an upright position and placed him on a cardboard platform. Another spritz... and the now sleeping hottie was ready for shipment.

At a nearby station a rather pleased looking technician was explaining to poor Zayn that the client had changed their minds... and that the technician would be taking an early lunch break...
1452322222121.title: Yep!

14523222221211.content:
Simon swiped at the drone invading his space. He felt himself slipping from the board and his mind braced for the wave...but in a blink it was all gone. He found himself standing on some sort of particle board.... he could see shapes moving around him but they were all blurry. His head swam... Did I get hit on the head by the board? His mind raced to make sense of the sudden change. He heard a scratching sound... and his eyes came into focus.

"What the....." his mouth dropped open as he gained feeling in his feet and turned around a bit. There was what appeared to be a giant kitchen counter, marble surface, stretched out in front of him like a soccer field only larger. He had the sudden sense of being watched and spun around only to meet the gaze of a giant man.

"Simon, welcome to my kitchen!"

Sean's body would still resolve at full size, but with a few adjustments you have him shaved down to a bite-sized 3 inches. He opens his eyes, jumps to his little feet, and looks around in complete disorientation... and then he sees you. "What the fuck is this? Is this some sort of a joke?" You would expect someone in such a vulnerable position to back away, maybe even run, but Sean O'Donnell's pampered form moves forward with his hands on his sides. Models are deliciously arrogant! you think to yourself as you decide what to do next.

Something you just said has made Sean’s bright blue eyes go even wider than they were before. You’re half concerned they will pop right out of his perfectly proportioned head!

“You mean you’ve like- done this before?”

Your smile broadens. “My dear Sean, as scrumptious as you are, did you really think you were my first? I’ve had countless young morsels like you reach their end deep inside me. Ok, fair enough, not all of them died in my gut. The first few I did bite, and chew, not realizing that he struggling inside as they slowly digested alive was such an awesome form of after dinner entertainment! I swear their manicured nails digging into my stomach lining and muscley arms pushing against it trying to get out, all that struggling tickles intensely!” Sean gulps visibly.

“I don’t buy it! You’d have been caught!”

You tsk to yourself before reaching to the shelf above the counter and pulling down a book of memories. You casually flip through a few pages, letting Sean gag at the sights.

Boy celebrities from 12-35 are pictured trussed up, breaded, skinned, boiled, baked into pies, etc. on top of each picture of the screaming meal is the celebrities name followed by the recipe used. Below each picture is a miniature outfit, presumably the last garments worn by the pictured meal.

Now I’m careful to make sure the process is enjoyable for me, torturous for you, and ultimately you survive long enough for a one way dive down my throat.” By now you skip ahead to the last page which is filled. On the left is the title RJ King Crab Fondue with a picture of a screaming young model tied to a skewer with parsley, crabmeat on either side of his nude body, being lowered into a bubbling pot of boiled cheese. On the righy are the words “Sean ODonnell.”
