The giant's left hand came up from below granting Alperen momentary safety, but no security. Alperen struggled to balance on the uneven and slightly moving surface of the giant's left palm. Finally, he gathered the courage to speak. "What is this? Where am I?"

The giant's massive lips formed a smile from pursed lips to a wide toothy grin. "Why, I am your biggest fan of course! I am glad to see you brought me dessert with my lunch!"
14523222222222222222222222211121111121.title: Alp Sah!

145232222222222222222222222111211111211.content:
"d..... desert with ... lunch... what do you mean?" Alperen glanced around desperately seeking where he had put any sort of lunch then his mental machinery caught up as he looked across at his reflection in a nearby mirror. "You... you can't be serious? This is totally fucking crazy!" Alperen tried to climb towards a wrist only to find himself lifted upward by his right boot covered foot. The giant held onto the sole of the boot forcing Alperen's foot to support the weight of his body. It hurt and the boot held firm.

"I never joke about a good meal" The giant winked and brushed the zipper on the side of Alperen's boot allowing gravity to win the war on his tiny body. "Ahhhhh!" Alperen cried out as he fell only to feel the sensation of a soft palm slow him down lowering him onto the counter. Alperen noticed the cold surface of the counter top on his now sock covered foot but on high adrenaline he didn't bother to stop. I have to hide, the tiny model thought to himself as he ran imbalanced across the cold stone surface. He wondered why the giant was not stopping him, but he couldn't afford to look back. As he ran he noticed dining room candles being lit and the sound of music in the background. Just as he reached the far end of the counter his progress was halted by the massive stem of a wine glass deposited directly in his path.

"I like wine with my meal. It enhances the flavor of the meat." Alperen screamed out as he found himself lifted beneath his arm pits and held firmly between two pinched fingers. The giant held him near the edge of the glass, close enough that some of the pouring red wine splashed on his white t-shirt.
145232222222222222222222222111211111211.title: Keep going.

1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.content:
Alperen kicked out and his sock covered toes managed to grip the edge of the wine class. His mass was small, but the balance on the top heavy glass was easy to upset and it quickly crashed to the counter delivering its contents in all directions.

"Naughtly little meat ball!" Alperen heard the giant's words as he found himself jerked about chaotically. "I will need something to clean this up!" Alperen held his plump muscular arms close to his torso as the giant tugged at his t-shirt. The force of the giant won out and soon Alperen felt the cold air of the room tickling his shaved upper body. His t-shirt was so tiny it only soaked up a tiny fraction of the wine that was now scattered across the counter.

The giant lowered him to the counter and turned, likely to get a better towel than Alperen's doll sized t-shirt. The moment he reached the counter top he made another run for safety. At the far end of the counter there were utensils in a holder, a fake fruit bowl and other places to hide. Alperen stopped only to kick off the remaining boot that was slowing him down. He could hear the giant humming as he went to clean off the counter. Alperen slid slightly as he rounded the cutlery holder and reached the in-counter range top. At the back of the counter he spied a small hole produced to run electric, but perfect for a morsel sized Instagram model. Alperen spared no time dashing to the small opening and diving through. He thought he had succeeded until he felt the sensation fingers pressed down firmly on both feet. "Oh shit! No!!!!" Just a few seconds more and he might have made his way to relative safety behind the counter and in the wall, but the fates had other plans.

Exhausted the model found himself hurling upward once again. His uneasy grip in the giant's hands was short lived as he found himself dropped into a massive glass bowl. He attempted many runs to make it out before he collapsed in exhaustion and tears. The giant reached in briefly stripping off his wine soaked little socks. Alperen now sat shirtless and barefoot in the center of the massive bowl sulking in defeat.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.title: Keep going

1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.content: Through the distorted lens of the glass bowl Alperen watched in horror as the giant. poured and enjoyed a new glass of wine, stopping occasionally to wink and lick his lips at his bite sized captive. The giant approached the bowl again and Alperen cried out at the pair of massive hands that managed to pluck off his remaining clothes. "Time to marinade!" Alperen gasped as he found himself drenched and then treading in red wine. He tried to swim to the edge of the bowl, but his hands and feet merely slipped helplessly. He tried no to, but found himself gulping a bit of the wine. After what seemed like hours the giant lifted the bowl and poured Alperen into a stainless steal colander giving him a tiny towel to dry himself. Red wine stained his toe nails and hair. He belched realizing his stomach was now filled with a considerable amount of wine. The massive hands returned dropping the buff little man into another bowl filled with flour. He gasped and struggled as the giant worked to cover his muscular body with flour. Alperen peered up through the dust with flour covered eyelids. "Please stop... ple" he was lifted again, this time deposited into a bowl of slimy egg he nearly drowned as he kicked and squirmed in the thick protein liquid. He managed to clear his eyes only to see his reflection in a nearby surface. Now powder white from the flour and shiny from the dripping egg Alperen could hardly recognize himself. He cried out has his feet landed on the sharp crusty surface of bread crumbs which now stuck to the flour and the egg. He could feet crumbs between his toes ..... Alperen had watched schnitzel made countless times and he knew what came next. "Please..... please don't fry me!!!" He whined out as the giant laid him gently into a bath of hot oil. Strangely it only tingled and felt almost like a shallow hot spring, but when he was removed he could not move his arms and legs. From the corner of his eye in the water glass he could see what he had become. His well sculpted figure was now completely covered in golden bread crumbs and his head lay against a wedge of lemon. His spread out legs were divided by a mound of roasted potatoes and under his right and left arms were smaller mounds of pickled cabbage.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.title: Time to eat!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.content: My God he has turned me into a schnitzle! The tiny model twirled his feet and hands helplessly as he watched the massive figure above him begin the meal. Alperen whined helplessly as the giant dove into the plate ravenously. The fork tines grazed the sole of Alperen's right foot and he cried out curling his toes in response. "Oh, my morsel, it won't be long!" The sound of the giant chewing rang in the tiny man's ears.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.title: Keep going

1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.content: "P.... please don't eat me! I can pay you money... anything you want!" The tiny internet star cried out as he noticed the giant's focus shifting to his right foot. "Wha what are you... no!" The giant slid the fork under the tiny man's heel and with a quick motion sliced it away.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112111.title: Keep going

14523222222222222222222222211121111122.content: The Stenmark Twins Zac and Jordan?
14523222222222222222222222211121111122.title: Another Model?

145232222222222222222222222111211111221.content:
Zac and Jordan looked with wide eyes at the sight. "I can't believe we are actually in LA!" Zac flashed a smile at his brother Jordan and slugged him on the shoulder in excitement. The two hot young men walked down Rodeo Drive until they came across a cafe. "Edible Models... what an odd name for a restaurant." Jordan shrugged his shoulders and both boy decided to give it a try.

"We'd like..." before Jordan could make the request the hostess smiled and interrupted. "The Stenmark Brothers! Hi Welcome to Edible Models please write your modeling stats down and we will serve you both shortly." The two handsome young men looked at each other in disbelief. "How did you know who we are? Why do we need to write our shoe sizes and waist to get a table?"

The bubbly hostess peered over her glasses "Well, our standards are very high and we only serve the best! You are very highly sought after models." This satisfied the boy's curiosity for the time and they complied. Soon the hostess led them through a few series of doors to an elevator. "When you get to the top floor you will be served." The hostess winked and left the two boys to enter the elevator and hit the button for the top floor. A bright light greeted them with the swish of the elevator doors and both young men stepped out the door quickly closing behind them.

"Dude hold that door!" Neels Visser screemed desperately as a group of hot young men rushed the Stenmark twins trying to get to the elevator. "Hey, mate like what's the matter?" Zac asked a bit taken back by the group of desperate young men.

"Dude! This isn't a cafe for models, it's a cafe for people who eat models!" Zac and Jordan scanned the surroundings. It looked like a waiting room, the bright light was coming from above and the window where the world appeared to be endless light. Jordan ventured closer. Beyond the window lie the massive interior of a restaurant kitchen the size of a canyon.
145232222222222222222222222111211111221.title: Yum!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.content:
"We've gotta get out of here!" Zac and Jordan exclaimed together as they made their way back to the elevator. The door opened and closed quickly this time depositing Marc Forne Martin who looked dazed and confused as they had. "Nooooo!" a voice cried out from another part of the room as a shadow engulfed. Michael Dean Johnson struggled in the grip of a massive hand that had manged to grip Michael by the back of his jeans waist. "Bro!
Stop her! Don's let her get me bro!" Michael kicked out as Sean Alexander reached desperately for part of Michael to get hold of. Sean cried in frustration holding Michael Dean's right boot, defeated.

The room of tiny men including Zac and Jordan shifted to the viewing window as they watched a giant female chef carry Michael dean over to a nearby steel prep table. They could not hear but watched as the chef pulled off Michael's remaining boot. He tried to run across the cold metal table only to have the chef scoop him up again. He was stripped, tied up with sausage casing and positioned on a plate with a few vegetables and a tiny dinner roll stuffed in his mouth. The plate passed by the models location and they saw his wide eyes as he disappeared on a server's tray beyond a pair of swinging doors.

"What is this shit?" Zac's voice was high with panic. "Brother we have got to get out of here." Jordan reached for his cell phone... no signal. The elevator opened again, this time Drew Schiff appeared with Charles Laurent. Another scream, this time Neels Visser was plucked from the room. Neels found himself stripped and trapped in a Neels Visser stuffed bell pepper. The chef artistically arranged his removed clothes around the plate and put a dollop of sour cream on his head.

"Nah bro nah!" Sean cried out as the plate that once held his buddy returned. It was clean except for a few sauce foot prints that led to the center of the plate and what looked like the final pounce.

"Uh Zac... I don't like the looks of this!" Jordan looked up to see the chef over the top of them again, this time, the chef's eyes were on the two young men. Zac cried out and ran the opposite direction of Jordan. He reached the wall of the room and managed to grab a bit of molding. His grip was no match for the powerful hand of the chef. He squirmed helplessly as he felt the strong upward force of acceleration at the hand of the chef. Zac's stomach churned with butterflies and soon found himself in the opposite hand of his brother moving rapidly away from the holding room.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.title: The Chef Makes a Selection

1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.content: The world around Zac spun quickly. He felt himself lowered to the surface of the metal counter. He instinctively ran across the slick metal surface. Soon his brother was beside him. They managed to reach a cutting board when a giant spatula swept in front of them sliding beneath their feet flipping them both into the air flailing. With a thud Zac landed on top of Jordan in a bowl of flour. "Oh my God Oh my God!" neither little man had time for talk. They sprung up and made their way for the edge of the bowl, but it was too steep and the flour on their boots made the surface slippery. Jordan managed to kick off his boots and pull away his socks to make another attempt. His feet managed to stick to the glass a little better but soon his was back in the flour his sweat moistened feet now covered with white powder.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.title: Stenmark Twin special!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.content: "Well since you got the process started." Jordan and Zac looked upward to see the chef staring down directly at Jordan. The meaty young model let off a yell as he was plucked from the bowl of flower. Zac watched in horror as Jordan's clothes fell next to the bowl and his brother, now nude was tossed back beside him. "Oh God no noo!!" Zac found himself lifted upward lifted by his sports jacket collar. He wriggled himself out just land in the giant's other hand. The chef's hand came prepared with a paring knife. "Oh God please don't!" Zac screamed as the dull side of the knife grazed his tight abs and sturnem slicing his white v-neck in two parts. Zac found a massive index finger pinching him against the thumb as the chef sliced off the soles of his boots and plucked the tops away.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.title: Keep going.

1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.content:
"What is this?! Who are you people?! You can't get away with this!" Zac's tiny heart raced as he found himself being peeled free of clothing in the hands of a giant chef. His shirt and boots laid on the table below mixed with the striped clothes of his twin brother. The butt of his jeans now rested in the palm of the massive female chef staring down at him.

"Oh, I think we will do just fine Zac. Our client paid top dollar to have you two little beefcakes imported from Australia. With so many hot men in the world we need to remove a few from the system to raise their overall value. Don't worry little fella, I am a professional and you and your brother are going to be as fine to our client's taste buds as you are to the eyes!"

Zac whined in horror as she shifted her grasp and dangled him by the cuffs of his jean legs. A flick of her finger un buttoned his fly and a terse jerk forced him out of his jeans and back into the bowl next to his brother. The tiny little man cried out as the chef's fingers plucked away his underwear leaving him naked and coated with flour.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.title: Keep going

1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.content:
"Oh my God!" Jordan whimpered as his brother explained their fate. "We have got to escape and let others know!" The two meaty young men conspired trapped in a giant bowl of flour. In the distance across the stainless steel counter they watched the chef. "What's she doing?" Oh man she's making pie crust!"

Sure enough, the chef worked some lard into flour and rolled out a pie crust. The boy's eyes tracked her movements as she brought out two small pie tins, lowered and trimmed a bottom for each. "Here she comes!" the two men trod across the bowl of flour to the far side. Zac was plucked from the trap first the chef pinned his naked bottom in the center of the pie crust while she dumped a warm mixture of vegetables and shredded beef on top pinning him down. The tiny model squirmed helplessly as she trimmed and finished the pie with the top crust. Zac twirled his feet and hands, the only remaining parts of his body free of the the Australian meat pie. With a bit more struggle Jordan found himself in his own pie tin. Both tiny men's stomachs churned as the rack containing them both was slid into a hot oven.

"Oh my God this is terrible. It's so hot!" Zac whined to his brother as the two hot models began to bake into beefy Australian meat pies!
1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.title: Keep going

1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.content:
The two savory young men were removed from the oven. The cool air tickled their exposed feet and hands. The chef slid them off the tray and onto the counter briefly before arranging each brother on a separate plate and sending them out into the restaurant on a tray.

The two brothers looked at each other helpless for what to do next. The sunlight caused Zac to turn his head and Jordan to squint. Compared to the hot oven they two men still felt cool.

"You ordered the Stenmark Twins?" The waiter spoke with someone out of either brother's sight. With another fast drop the two young men found themselves in front of the one who purchased them. The head of their agency looked down at the two young men and smiled.

"Oh thank God! We thought someone really was going to eat us!" Zac's heart continued to race as he tried to believe everything was going to be ok.

She looked down at the two men and gave an innocent smile. "We needed to thin the heard for this year and you boys look so yummy! Which one of you shall I devour first? "Unfortunately for the two hotties the head of their model agency tucked in a napkin and prepared her knife and fork.

Jordan cried out as she dug her fork between his legs. As she worked around his form, he couldn't quite get freed of the pie filling or the crust which was now backed quite firmly around him. She skillfully kept Jordan trapped as she savored each bite of the filling. She toyed with her two captives stopping briefly for a call putting the knife across Jordan's trapped body. Just as Jordan thought he might be able to free himself he found his right ankle caught between the tines of the fork and his body pulled forcably upward. He dangled helplessly from the fork pain from the strain on his ankle. He still managed to see her massive face coming forward. "You don't really want to eat us do you?" She smiled and opened her mouth wide. Jordan let out a scream as he plunged between her massive lips.

The inside of her mouth was dim, but he could see glimpses of her teeth and that thing at the back of a person's throat. He held his breath and tried to swim through the saliva towards the source of the light. He felt another tug and found himself outside once again this time trapped between the middle aged woman's fingers. "Oh Zac your brother is absolutely delicious! I hope you boys are flavor twins!" Jordan screamed out again as he passed one last time between the giant's lips. With a swallow Jordan was gone.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.title: Pies are ready to serve!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.content:
Zac watched in horror as his brother Jordan disappeared as a lump in their Management company's president's throat. The handsome little Aussie twirled his hands and feet and struggled in vain against the crispy crust and thick muck of cooked vegetables that pinned im in place still.

His captor's fork dived right for his middle and he let out a yelp. The pointy tines of the pushed through the thick crust and managed to graze the surface of his lean abs. He cried out in horror too overwhelmed to have time to think about the fate of his brother.

The fork went deep placing pressure on his buttocks from below. With a tremendous amount of force the tiny man broke free of his pastry trap only to find himself rising upward on the end of the fork. His ride came to a halt and he was able to see her massive face before him. The world seemed to move in slow motion as the fork plunged forward and her mouth opened wide to receive him. "Nooooo...." the tiny man's final cry went quickly silent as her lips closed behind him.


The End
1452322222222222222222222221112111112211.title: On to Zac!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content: The vending machine is full of delicious looking men. Each hot guy spread out temporarily stiff only their eyes able to track what was happening around them. Spencer James looks your direction and then away when he notices you looking at him. His face is handsome. He must have been procured by the Edible Toys while skateboarding because he is wearing a worn pair of Vans, shorts and a t-shirt. His eyes go wide as you run your debit card through the machine and a light near him indicates he is about to be dispensed. A clip releases and the tiny man slides gently into the distribution tray below.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Yum! Spencer J

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
At home you put your new toy on the kitchen table and break the seal on the bag. As soon as the bag fills with air the tiny muscular man comes to life. At first he seems a little stiff but within a minute he has struggled his way out of this bag. His head pops up and looks at you as he reaches the bag's opening.

"Hello Spencer. This must be very disorienting to you." You look down at your purchase with feigned sympathy.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Take him home.

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content: "Yeah!" Spencer climbs out of the bag and rubs his eyes. "I was out at the park skateboarding when this drone flew over. Next thing I knew I was completely paralyzed and in this bag. Like did you just rescue me?"
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: He buys it

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content: "Rescue you?" you are astonished that the tiny model thinks he is in a rescue. "Yeah, I am here to rescue you. Are there any other of your friends you would like 'rescued?'" The tiny man pondered the question for a moment and responded. "David Bywater and Nick Truelove! My bros were with me at the skate park and I think I saw them as I dropped through the vending machine!"
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Keep going

choices: You return with two more shrunken models for play/snack.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
"I will go retrieve your friends!" you try to sound sincere to keep the tiny man calm and tender. "Could you, like return me to my normal size? I can help."

"First things first Spencer. I do not know how you were miniaturized. I will retrieve your friends then we can seek a way to return you to your original height. In the meantime I think it would be wise to place you in a safe space."

Before the miniscule model can object you pluck him up beneath his arms and deposit him in a tank.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: 'Rescue' David and Nick

choices: Three toys are better than one!
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content: You return to Edible Toys. As Spencer said his two buddies were in the machine. Nick is in a white t-shirt and skinny jeans his skateboard wrapped along with him. David also wore a pair of black skinny jeans but his lean torso was covered in a blue and white plaid. You smile as you notice one of his canvas boat shoes dislodged in the packaging, likely a result of the shrinking process. Both men trace your movements with their eyes as you select them and remove them from the vending machine.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: You return with two more shrunken models for pl...

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
Spencer is excited when he sees you have returned. You quickly open the two new containers and set them into the tank near Spencer.

"Thank you so much!" Spencer helps his two buddies out of their containers. He explains what he thinks is happening and you watch as David slips on his dislodged shoe.

"So! Now we can figure out how to return us to our normal size!"
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Three toys are better than one!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content: "Ah yes your normal size" You turn your back on the tank holding the three toys. "I'm afraid I have not been entirely honest with you. Only one of you will be able to return to your life. The other two are to remain a part of my collection."
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Disappointment....

choices: Wait a minute... that was too fast.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content: "No way! This is total bull shit!" David looks around as if to find a means of escape but the walls of the tank remind him there isn't one. "You said you were going to save us!" Spencer ran to the tank and pounded as if to strike you through the glass. Nick drops down and whines trying to soak in what he has just learned then jumps to his feet "I elect David and Spencer!"
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: They choose quickly.

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
David and Spencer glare in disbelief at Nick then with terror towards you.

"That was too easy!" you laugh as you bend down to meet the boys' faces. "We have our first volunteer for consumption. Nick... say goodby to your former friends."

The tiny blond man trembles frantically looking towards his buddies for help. Then, he darts for the far side of the holding tank.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Wait a minute... that was too fast.

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
Nick reaches the other end of the tank and bangs on the glass.... after a few minutes of desperate banging he realizes you haven't taken him.

Spinning around on his black sneakers and returning to the other side of the tank he finds his two friends staring in horror into the distance. "What is he...." Spencer and David cut him off with a turse 'shh!'

You are rolling out some pie dough and laying it gingerly into a pan. You roll out the remaining dough and set it nearby. "Boys! If Nick is stripped and ready for baking I will not reconsider my first decision. It's up to you of course." you look at the three men and give an evil wink and lick your lips.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: The first toy!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
"Hey!" Nick screams out as Spencer dives down to unlace and yank free his black canvas sneaker. David reaches down and pulls up Nick's baggy white t-shirt. The two men engage in a tug-of-war David wins the first round forcing the t-shirt over Nick's head. He quickly reaches under Nick's arms and holds him firm while Spencer finishes off the shoes and plucks away the socks. Nick tries to curl up as the two men struggle to remove his jeans. It takes a bit of work but soon Nick is stripped and back on his feet. He tries to run for his clothes to redress, but his tank mates keep him subdued.

"Ah! Nick it looks like you are ready to cook!" The three tiny men look towards the opening of the tank as your arm reaches in to snatch up Nick. "Nooo!" Nick manages to break free and make a run for it. He doesn't make but a few steps before you snatch him up by the waist and remove him from the tank.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Fate sealed

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
"Ah Nick! Thank you for being the first volunteer!" You hold the struggling little man up to your face for a closer inspection. He kicks and punches as you hold him by his waist between your forefinger and your thumb.

"I..... I didn't volunteer!" he strikes out whimpering and whining.

"Just think, those handsome feet will never touch the ground again. You are going to make a delicious pie filling!"

Nick continues to squirm as you pin him down in the pie pan and layer him with some diced peas and carrots. The veggies are in a gravy that is thick enough to hold him down by the middle. His head, hands and feet stick out of the pan. "Stop! Dude I will pay you anything you want jus.......mmmmmmm!" As you add the lid to your Nick Truelove pie his desperate cries are momentarily muffled. With the delicate flick of a sharp knife holes for the tiny man's appendages are made and his cries for mercy continue. You present your Nick pie to Spencer and David before popping him gingerly into a hot oven.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Nick pie

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
You look on as Nick twirls his feet and hands surrounded by the red hot heat of the oven.

"Smells lovely doesn't it?" you inspect the remaining two morsels.

The two remaining toys appear to have been conspiring. "This is crazy! You can still pull Nick from the oven and return us to normal! We will pay any ransome and we won't tell a soul!" The two men nod in agreement.

"My tasty gentlemen, I believe I have told you the terms of your predicament. Nick's fear made him an easy first snack... but now we must decide which one of you two lean muscular specimens becomes food.... and which one of you gets to return to the land of the privileged and full sized. And don't worry about telling, the survivor won't remember a thing."

The two men glance at each other with wide eyes. "A few contests will determine your fates." You set out a deep tray of water, a lasagna pan, but to the two young men an olympic sized swimming pool. "Ok, I need you guys to strip down. Wouldn't want the drag of your preppy little clothes to seal your fate!"
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Who to prepare next?

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
"We are not going to participate in your sick contests!" Spencer's tiny voice still rings with confidence.

"Wonderful! Then I guess I will have three snacks." You smile and begin to reach into the tank. "Uh... no wait... uh wait...." David whispers something to Spencer and the two hot young men begin to strip for the first contest.

"Ah! Fantastic. Let's get you to the competition venue." You reach in and pluck up the two tiny men depositing them into the lasagna pan. The two men went under for a moment and then resurface. "Ok, the first one of you to make it one lap wins this contest. Winner of the most contests gets a magical trip back to the land of the living... the other...." you smack your lips and rub your stomach.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: They refuse!

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content: The two tiny men nervously nod. "On your marks... go!" Spencer and David crawl across the water as fast as their bodies can carry them. Spencer does an expert turn at the middle of the lap and David falters. By the end Spencer has won. David cries a little as Spencer consuls him. "Don't worry David, Spencer still has a chance to find himself on the menu, that was just the first competition." With thumb and forefinger you lift the tiny men from the dish and return their cold wet little bodies into the tank. You toss in a few tissues for them to dry themselves. Just then, a buzzer indicates Nick is ready to come out of the oven.
1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.title: Let the swim meet begin

1452322222222222222222222221112111112221.content:
The two men look up at the sound of the buzzer. With a pair of hot pad holders you lift the tiny pie plate out of the oven. Nick looks a little worse for the wear his blond locks are singed and a bit of smoke wafting up. His ivory complexion has become red with a bit of brown like he stayed in the sun too long. The beefy young model could only remember entering a chamber to be 3D imaged for a promotional doll at a company called Edible Toys Incorporated. They asked some rather detailed health questions asked him to remove his phone "to keep from interfering with the equipment" next thing he remembered he was here in this dark room with no moving air. His boots slid across the surface, sort of like a particle board from the feel. Above a very faint light came from a few small holes in the ceiling. "Hello! Hey! What is this?! Somebody open a door!" Michael shouted in desperation. From beyond his dim cell he could feel the ground moving like he was on a train or a plane... so strange. A few muddled voices and the sudden feeling of dropping. Michael found himself on the floor as if he had just been through an earthquake. I am so gonna sue this Edible Toys Michael thought to himself as he regained his balance and stood up. Just then the ceiling of the room began to emit strange scratching sounds like there was someone on the other side. A burst of light signaled the opening of the ceiling. Michael stepped back shielding his eyes from the sudden change. "Uh hello!? Yo what is this shit? Did the scan work?" Michael's voice trailed as he scanned around.

The room was without windows or doors and seemed to be completely made of particleboard. Michael looked down at his boots and noticed he was in the same black skinny jeans and beige cotton shirt as for the scan. Above he could see only white at first and some sort of shadowy figure... "Holy shit what the fuck man!?"

A massive face peered down at Michael with a pleased smile. "Michael! You looked so great I couldn't ignore you!" Michael Dean's heart raced as he tried to make sense of what was happening. "Oh man.. like this isn't real, like you are some sort of joke, some projection or something? I mean what the hell?!"

The giant looked down at his new toy with a smirk as the tiny model fished for understanding. "Ah Michael, the brochure said you might be disoriented, what is the last thing you remember?" Michael responded quickly hoping to finally have an rational explanation for what had happened.

"Oh, yes, that is right you were made into an edible toy. We are going to play and when I get board with you I will gobble you up like the other hotties." Michael let out a yell and tried to run to the far side of the box only to find himself lifted up by the back of his jeans.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Something else

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Ah shit man this isn't real this isn't real Ahhhhh!" Michael cried out at the feeling of force at his waistline. The beefy young model kicked helplessly as his boots left the security of the cardboard box. The young man's world blurred and his stomach reeled with butterflies at the strange ride. As the upward motion stopped Michael found himself face-to-face with the giant. He was so close he could feel the giant man's steamy breath against his skin.

"My you are a beefy guy!" The giant's massive brown eyes noticeably scanned Michael from head to toe. "Just think, all of that time you spent eating protein supplements and working out was all for me!" With his declaration he poked an index finger into Michael's stomach.

"Wha... what are you doing? No!" Michael protested as the giant proceeded to pry on his right boot in an attempt to remove it. Michael Dean clenched his toes, but his effort was no match against the massive fingers. Michael's movement temporarily paused as he watched the dislodged boot travel towards the giant's nostrils. "Ahhh you smell as savory as you look!" The giant set the freed boot down in the box below as if it were a prized possession. The giant repeated the action with the second boot then eyed Michael's kicking sock covered feet with temptation. "Dude! Stay away from my feet!" Michael's voice of attempted intimidation only aroused the giant further as the giant forced Michael Dean's two meaty legs together and sniffed his feet. Sniffing was not enough for the engrossed giant and soon his tongue lashed out drawing both of Michael's plump athletic feet into the giant's waiting mouth!

"Ugh, dude this is disgusting! Stop and put me down!" Michael's demands were ignored as the giant probed the beefcake's feet with his inquiring tongue. Michael panicked as a suction sensation pulled his socks off. Eventually two saliva soaked feet reemerged from between the massive lips and Michael found himself deposited into the giant's awaiting left hand. Creeped out and terrified the tiny jock massaged his violated feet now covered in the giant's thick saliva.

"Better get used to that my little hottie" the giant moved in close with a smirking grin "that was just the appetizer!"
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Off with the boots!

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Dude! I don't know how all of this happened but you have got to let me go man!" Michael Dean continued to tend to his violated feet while looking up at his captor with the eyes of someone who was used to being in charge.

"Michael my tasty young hottie, you are mine now. I can do with you whatever my desire. As a matter of fact, I think it is time for a game of cat and mouse!"

Before Michael could respond he found himself set on the surface of the counter next to the box that once held him. Michael noticed the label on the box "Edible Toys Incorporated, Making hot clueless jocks into a fun snacks since 1962" Quickly Michael sprang to his feet and began to run. If I can escape this fucking lunatic I can find help and be returned to my normal size! as Michael's thoughts raced he scanned for his escape route. The box sat on the edge of a long surface that seemed to be a kitchen island. On the far side of the island there was a short drop that led to counter with a stove and oven. Across the great cavern of the kitchen there was a counter with appliances like a blender and a toaster and a phone with a cord that appeared to reach the floor below. Ever aware of the giant watching him Michael made his move. He ran across the counter the sound of his heavy breathing and the patter of his bare feet dominating the environment. Soon he reached the first counter drop off. It was about 5 inches but from his perspective a drop of about 8 feet to the hard surface below. Athletic he had little trouble but as he reached the stove top the giant stood between him and the third counter placing a pan on the stove. "Don't mind me little hottie! Just remember all of this ends inside my tummy!" The giant pretended to ignore the hot blond man as he slid behind the countertop stove and made his way to the next surface.

"Oh god oh fuck!" Michael Dean jumped twice before he could get a grip on the smooth ledge of the raised third counter. He succeeded and made his way to the appliances and the phone. The phone had a winding cord that almost reached the floor. Michael had a fair amount of experience with rock climbing but never without a belay rope! As he descended on the green cord he scanned for the next step. He could see a crack in the doorway to the kitchen that appeared to lead outside. There's my chance! he thought to himself as he reached the end of the cord and dropped the 10 or more inches to the ceramic tile below. As he made his way to the door the giant blocked the path. "Sorry Mr. Dean! You will have to choose another way. The veggies are just about ready for me to add the meat!" Micheal gasped and ran the other direction darting chaotically in search of an escape. He spotted a dark crevasse below the counter and decided to make a go for it. He screamed in defeat as he found the opening only went an inch back.

The giant knew how the game was going to end all along the cat always wins the meaty little mouse the giant chuckled to himself as he pulled on Michael's right foot to extract him from the false hiding place.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Keep nibbling Michael D

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"No! No! Oh god! Please don't eat me dude... I will do anything you want!" Michael Dean panicked as his escape plan failed. He kicked out with his free left foot to try and escape the giant's firm grasp. Soon the bite sized little hottie was dangling upside down in the face of his captor. "Michael my hot little man haven't you figured it out? You are going to do anything I want.... and I am going to eat every last blond lock and meaty toe!" The giant hummed to himself as he proceeded to pull downward on Dean's shirt forcing his arms to dangle temporarily before crossing in defiance and then waving around as if to find something to grasp. "My Micheal Dean you must have had a legs day!" The giant marveled and licked his lips at the two succulent appendages now wrapped tightly in black denim. "These are going to bread very nicely!" Micheal groaned and protested as he found himself gripped firmly around the torso. He tried to bend his legs but the force of the giant's hand was too much and soon he watched his jeans join his boots and shirt in the Edible Toys box.

"My all this cat and mouse fun made you get a bit ripe!" The giant bounced the tiny model helplessly between his fingers as he walked across the kitchen to a nearby sink. "Let's get you cleaned up!" Michael yelled out once more as he found himself dropped unceremoniously into a large pot filled with hot soapy water. Michael surfaced and swam through the cloud of bubbles for the edge only to find himself submerged once more by the giant's massive hand.

Michael Dean struggled and gasped as he found himself manhandled by the giant. "Ooo aren't you a ticklish little man!" Michael Dean convulsed as his feet and armpits were subjected to a stiff plastic brush both tickling and cleansing his parts of soil. After an extended time in the soapy water the giant lifted him up, indicated with an exaggerated puffed face for little Michael Dean to hold breath before dropping him into the rinse. Finally Michael was plucked from his last swim and dropped without caution onto a large terrycloth towel with a small bit of paper towel for him to self dry. Michael whimpered and tried to pass on the towel for escape but soon the giant's hand took control and pressed his struggling form against the massive blotter.

"Boy! I bet you are exhausted little hottie. I bet you are looking forward to getting eaten by this point eh?" The giant looked at his captive with feigned empathy.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Micheal D needs cleaning

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Stoneismynamee, ileovlogs, megaglowen, radikalsive, and mickeyprojects?
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Keep going.

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Fitness Expert Ryan Greasely?
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: More

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The ship pulled into a low orbit. The sole occupant of the vessel had been monitoring Earth's transmissions for a few days and his stomach was rumbling. As he tapped at the console of his navigation unit he glanced over at his collection. Various mementos from hot aliens he encountered in his vast travels. He smiled and patted his stomach as he remembered his last visit to Earth. The Tim Tebo's tiny clothes stood suspended in a jar as if his hot form still graced them. I need to go for healthier fare this time around he thought to himself as he entered "fitness" into the computer linked with Earth's network. A number of tempting options went by when he finally made a decision.

With a few more taps and an execute command a product arrived on one of his teleporter pads. He scanned the pages of the book with lips licking. A short time later he returned to the teleporter to retrieve the main item of his Terran shopping adventure.

Ryan Greasely was stepping out of the gym after a hard day's workout when he experienced a strange warming sensation. With a blinding flash the parking disappeared and he found himself on a strange platform lit from below. Darkness surrounded him.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yes Ryan G!

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Whoa! Like what just happened?!" Ryan staggered a bit at the sudden change of venue. "Hey! Is there anybody out there!?" Ryan stepped towards a point in the darkness cupping a hand under his eyes to try and see into the dimmer background beyond. HIs white Adidas sneakers squeaked a bit on the shiny glass surface. He wore fashionably torn skinny jeans and a tight black t-shirt. Ryan knew he was hot and he didn't mind promoting his brand.

"Mr Greasley! Welcome to my spaceship! I was just reading through your book and I must say the recipes here look very tasty!"

Ryan's eyes widened and he went into flight for fight mode scanning the darkness for the source of the loud voice. A face ten times as tall as Ryan's entire body appeared out of the darkness directly behind the young model. "I do hope I didn't startle you too badly using my teleporter as you will soon see my coming down to speak with you might have been... problematic." Ryan spun on his heels to meet the source of the voice. "Holy shit! What is this!? Like what did you just tell me?" Ryan backed up away from the towering face as he felt the giant's hot breath against his skin. The warm wind had a strange... alien smell Ryan did not care for.

"Now mister Greasely I just wanted to have some pointers on that delicious salad you suggested. I assure you your visit here will be brief." The giant raised innocent looking eyebrows hoping Ryan would see his cooperation as a way out of his situation.

"Uh.... yeah mate sure why not." Ryan's voice sounded as if he didn't quite believe what he was experiencing. Please the giant alien, get home in time for a protein shake and bed Ryan thought as he slowly approached the massive face to cooperate. "Alright then big guy you will need 200 grams of romaine lettuce, Two tomatoes and......"

"I am afraid that salad would be much too small! I must scale up the recipe!" The giant reached out for Ryan causing him to cry out. Ryan could see beyond the blinding platform. It was like something out of a science fiction movie! There were strange lights and consoles everywhere. Near place where Ryan was standing in the blinding light just a few moments before was a rather normal looking tele screen. Ryan felt a moderate sense of relief as he found himself deposited on what looked like a scanner bed near the screen.

"Let's see... lettuce onions tomato.... " the giant hummed as he went about beaming in the ingredients for his massive salad. "Don't forget the protein... you will need 50 grams of chicken or equivalent lean meat"

The giant turned to face Ryan. "Hmmmm all those tiny little chickens... let's see what the scale value is.... ah here I need 35kg of lean meat"

Ryan heard the number and gasped hoping the giant wouldn't notice... he did "What's wrong Ryan is there something wrong with my calculations?" The question hung in the air as Ryan's handsome face curled into a nervous grin. "Uh no, that just happens to be my mass exactly."

Ryan stepped back as the massive face leaned in towards him. "Why you delicious looking little man! Are you volunteering to be the lean meat in my heart healthy Ryan Greasley salad?"
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Keep going.

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Rather than respond Ryan made a dash for it. The giant watched with glee as his tiny captive hopped from the scanner and proceeded across the control console. Ryan's tiny muscles bulged as he used his upper body to climb down the console to the floor. Ryan's sneaker soon became lodged in some sort of goo the alien had tracked in from one of his planetary visits. "Oh Ryan! I am a terrible house keeper do excuse the mess!" The giant reached down towards Ryan forcing the hottie to ditch the glued tennis shoes in the strange substance. "Oh drat, I had hoped it was time to eat!" the giant feigned defeat as he watched the bite sized little man climb up a nearby shelf. "It is a long way down my dear boy how do you plan to get off my ship?" Ryan ignored the taunting running along the shelf. Ryan's heightened senses were able to notice the contents of the shelf one container having what looked like a swimmer trapped in amber. "I've got to get home!" Ryan muttered to himself as he reached what looked like a source of light and maybe escape. He wriggled into a crack in a small door that led from the shelf in the alien's room to somewhere else. I've got to buy time... think Ryan think Ryan struggled to think of a way out ... his usually slow beating heart raced. The other side of the door was a dead end. It was just the cover to a port and Ryan found himself pressed against a clear barrier looking at the Earth far below. He whimpered as he felt the pressure of the port door removed and a massive force plucking him up by the back of his tight t-shirt. "Let me go! Let me go!" Ryan kicked out and swung as he dangled helplessly between the giant alien's fingers.

"Ryan! I hope you enjoyed your little tour of my ship. I want to thank you for providing me with tonight's healthy meal."
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ryan tries to escape.

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"No! No!" Ryan cried out as the giant dangled the meaty little model between his fingers. "How do I know you aren't lying about your weight? I know! I can see for myself." Ryan continued to struggle as the giant reached out and plucked free Ryan's tiny socks. "Let's check out what you are made of!" The giant gently lowered Ryan's bare feet back to the scanner where his escape had begun. Ryan tried to run but found both feet stuck firmly to the strange scanner platform. Ryan looked down below him as numbers projected onto the scanner bed gave the result. "37 kilograms! My Ryan did we have a leg day? Your are a tad bit meatier than you reported!" The giant poked a finger towards Ryan's lean stomach and flicked downward releasing the fasteners on Ryan's tight jeans. "I ..... want .... to ..... go home!!!!" Ryan's voice quivered as he found himself bobbed up and down by the legs of his skinny jeans until he was forced out of them. "Let's get you out of that shirt little man!" Ryan hit the surface of the table and tried to run only to find two giant thumbs pushing his uncooperative head through the neck hole of his t-shirt. The spacecraft suddenly felt a bit colder as Ryan once again tried to run only to find two fingers around his abdomen drawing him back towards the giant. "Why do you humans wear so much clothing! Such terrible packaging for food!" With a final pluck and pull Ryan found himself completely naked and trapped at the will of the space giant.

The giant looked down at Ryan's naked form and licked his lips. With a grasp on Ryan's right ankle the giant walked over to the awaiting salad. Ryan could only look down at the massive pile of lettuce and tomatoes (there were hundreds at least) when he felt the pressure on his ankle release. "Ahhhhhhhhh!" the beefy young trainer landed in the pile of lettuce and immediately tried to climb to freedom. The oily salad dressing clung to Ryan's skin making him very slippery. He cried in horror as he found the bowl that contained him and the rest of the Ryan Greasely salad proved too steep for escape.

With the last of the leafy treat crunching between his massive teeth the giant peered down at the bit of lean protein curled up in a fetal position at the bottom of the bowl. With his fork the giant proceeded to trap both of Ryan's wrists lifting him out of the bowl. "Please no! Help somebody help!" The tiny athlete cried out in desperation his hands too plump to pull free from the tines of the massive fork.

The giant relished the moment watching Ryan's tiny muscular form writhe helplessly his meaty little soles kicking back and forth as if to run to safety. Ryan whimpred as he found himself lowering slowly toward the massive opened mouth below. He swung a bit on his wrists crying out as he reached a toe out to grasp the giant's upper lip in hopes of avoiding the planned destination. His toes slipped and he found himself waist deep in the giant's mouth below he could sense the tongue tasting him. Ryan tried to push up but his well toned muscles were no match. Soon he felt lips brush past his arm pits as he disappeared in to the rank darkness of the giant's mouth.

A strange freedom came over Ryan as he could move his limbs again and at least crawl. Nearby he could see the incisors and beyond freedom. Ryan wriggled army style across the thick mucus covered tongue towards the light at the end of the tunnel. "No no nooooooo!" Ryan's foot slid and kicked the back of the giant's throat ending the taste session prematurely. Powerful muscles pulsed around Ryan as he found himself in complete darkness. He stood up knee deep in what had to be the giant's stomach. Somehow, a dimb light permiated the giant allowing Ryan to see the soft pink walls of this strange and treacherous cave.

Ryan heard a strange vibrating sound which he soon realized was a belch from the inside. He tried to cry out but the remaining air space in the giant's stomach disappeared in instant beginning the processing of the hot little man.

The giant picked what appeared to
be a tiny watch from his teeth, performed a few of the exercises in the book and still felt hungry... Perhaps one more snack before moving on? He thought to himself.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Time to eat!

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The lean diet was unsatisfying so the alien decided to snack on one more model before moving on. Scanning Earth's network he landed upon a tasty option soon the platform glowed with the arrival of the next hottie.

Sam Withers materialized with his head down and headphones on as if still deep in a DJ session. With the loss of his music and his turntable he quickly looked up. "Whoa! What just happened?!" His exclamation was followed by a gasp and a step back as he spied the massive alien and his strange surroundings.

"I just brought you up to my ship for a snack." The alien smiled down waiting for Sam to process. "Wha what? I ... I had something to eat before my gig uh could you put me back please?"

Sam backed up as the giant drew his face in closer. "My dear man I don't intend to feed you, I am going to eat you."

Same cried out and attempted to run only to find himself quickly entrapped in the giant's hand and lifted upward by the waist of his jeans.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yep he needs another model!

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Brad Commerford?
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Something else.

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
It was so easy. The handsome real estate salesman looked up and smiled as you activated the device disguised as a camera. He disappeared in a flash his last moment captured on the display screen. It was the perfect moment and passersby were too busy with their own interests to notice the beefy man blinking from existence.

You return home and hook up the miniaturization device to a processor. You adjust the settings. Original height: 6 foot 3 inches processed height 3 inches. The body mass and other specs will go to scale. You hit enter and watch as Brad's hot form flashes back into existence greatly reduced in mass. At first his beautiful grin is still on his face, but instantly he notices the world around him has changed. "Whoa! What just happened?" Brad looks around wildly and finds your massive face looking down at him. "Hey! What just happened? Aren't you the guy at the cafe?" The now tiny figure rocked back and forth on his boat shoes and folded his muscular arms.

"I am." You respond to your bite sized prize and smile an evil grin.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Brad C!

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Uh, what happened? Is this some sort of simulator or something?" The confused hottie walks toward you and meets the barrier of the processing chamber. It is fun watching him press against the glass barrier trying to figure out the 'illusion.'

"I'm afraid this is very real my beautiful little specimen." You bend down bringing your comparatively massive face down to meet his. The tiny jock steps back as you approach and his eyes go wide as your breath makes the glass fog up. "Well, whatever this is you have to put me back!" The tiny figure accented his point with a pound against the barrier.

"Ah Brad, I am afraid the process does not have a reverse. You reduced situation is quite permanent. Well, at least you will not be returning to your original height. " You lick your lips and smile an evil grin.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Keep going

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: "Uhhhh.... " The morsel turns to run as you lift up the glass of the processing chamber. Brad's boat shoes patter across the glass surface as you effortlessly reach in pluck him up. Brad kicks out and squirms helplessly as you lift him up for a close inspection. The tiny man dangles in front of your face. He is wearing boat shoes and khakis with a casual beige shirt, his muscular arms trying to find a place to reach. "I don't know who put you up to this, but let's you know let's work something out... uh anything man anything!"
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Lift the glass

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Anything?" You gently set your new toy into the palm of your right hand allowing him to sit with his legs dangling off the side. "Are you willing to pay? Exchange yourself for a more tasty man?" You smile waiting for Brad to process.

"Uh yeah yeah... I can do whatever you want just put me back to normal!" Brad reaches into his pockets and removes his tiny wallet. You chuckle and pluck away the tiny object. "I'm afraid... your money is no good here." you reach up and pluck away his right boat shoe.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Work out a deal.

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Model Fabio Marra?
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Keep Shopping.

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Where.... am..... I" The hot young model and personal trainer looked around the strange environment. It looked like a space ship built for some sort of giant. I hope I don't get to meet the owner of this place. Fabio Marra's mind raced as he retraced his memory. I was at the gym, I was dressed to go home... and then here...

"Ah! You have arrived!" Fabio spun around 180 tracking the sound of the giant voice. A massive man crouched down to meet Fabio eye-to-eye. Fabio braced at the feeling of the giant's warm breath against his skin.

"Uh, where am I? What have you done to me?" Fabio felt his adrenaline rush as he scanned for possible escape routes.

"You are aboard my ship. I just ate two of ... what do you call yourselves? ah yes 'personal trainers' I was about to leave orbit when I came across you. I have eaten some tasty humans, but you personal trainers are the best!"
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Bien! Fabio M!

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Oh shit nooo!" Fabio spun on the heels of his black boots and made a run for it. In his mind he waited for the hand of the giant but for the moment there was not pursuit.

He ran across what looked like some sort of touch screen to the back of a console. There he dashed behind and into the wall. He saw what looked like fiber optic cables and technology beyond anything he had seen before. He climbed over some cable and once secure stopped to collect his thoughts. How am I going to get out of this? Am I in a space ship? Think Fabio think!

After a short while he found an opening higher up and peered out. The controls looked very large and very confusing. In the distance he could see a view screen and the Earth rotating from a distance. Finally his eyes came across a console near where he arrived that said in plain letters "Back to Earth". It seemed too good to be true, but it was Fabio's only option.

The tiny Italian model crept back down and across the now seemingly empty room. He tried to activate the touch screen with his tiny hands but there was no response. Finally, he kicked off his right boot and plucked off his sock to see if it might work. His heart raced knowing the giant could return at any moment.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Fabio runs

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"My tasty little man! Where do you think you are going?" The giant easily reached out and plucked poor Fabio from the console. Fabio instinctively reached out for his missing boot, but he was too late.

Fabio's surroundings blurred as he felt himself yanked upward by the neck of his black leather jacket. His boot and stray sock remained down by the console, he felt the air between his naked toes. His stomach churned from the sudden acceleration like an amusement park ride from hell. Suddenly the motion stopped and the hot little model found himself once again face to face with the giant.

"P.... please please let me go home!" Fabio cried out and kicked out whining.

"But I brought you hear for a snack." the giant smiled an evil grin and licked his lips.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The giant returns.

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: How about Florian Macek?
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Keep looking

1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The meaty model with the face of an angel has just shown up for his audition for “Ferngully: the last Rainforest” the live action film and he seems pumped to be in his first feature film. His was one of the first agents you called, as the hunky tanned Austrian seemed perfect for the role of Zak Young. You’ve been auditioning muscular tan blondes all day and have a small cage full of boys you’re saving for a “callback” backstage and a stomach stuffed with those who didn’t make the cut. Fortunately you’ve already narrowed down your search for “Pip” to a few lean redheads, in a nearby cage.

“Welcome Florian. I see that you’ve signed all of the necessary paperwork so we can begin the screen test just as soon as you’re ready. The plan is to do the Goanna song. Are you familiar with the film?”

Florian grins with that cocky, yet somehow innocent look of his. “I have watched it three times since my agent gave me the call” he eagerly pronounces each word carefully in that lovely accent of his. “But how will this be done? With computers or-“

“There’s definitely a computer involved Florian, but we found that it’s actually more cost effective to green screen one character instead of two and then putting them together. The Goanna will be in front of a green screen so they can computer generate his appearance after the scene. You, however, will be exactly as you appear.”

Florian wrinkles his perfect forehead and crinkles his nose for a moment. “But aren’t I too big? Won’t we need two green screens so I can be small and he can be a big lizard?”

“That’s where the computer comes in. The scene will be the Goanna’s Kitchen in his home under some rocks. He’ll have a full kitchen so the lyrics about the different ways of- er- making you a snack will make sense. It’s a little bit more cartoony of an idea than the original which is kind’ve Ironic, but it saves us having to film you running through a giant forest.”

“I still don’t-“ he cuts himself off. He doesn’t understand and just resolves to stop asking questions and trust in the direction. “Well who is playing the goanna?”

“That’s the beauty of using computer generated animals. I’m going to be playing the role, and my arm will look like a tongue coiled around you in the finished product.”

Still not fully grasping how he will ‘look’ small, Florian just decides to read through the script and nod with acceptance. While he is busy preparing you set up the giant kitchen in front of the green screen, don your green suit, and hit a few keys on the computer, readying the shrink ray.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Serve him up!

choices: The game of iguana and beefy blond morsel begins!
Rewind... let's do this another way.
1452322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The meaty Austrian model soon to be snack actor is staring intensely into his script as you hit the "begin miniaturization process" button on the screen. "Whoa! What is happening?!" you curse to yourself as you realize you forgot to include clothing in the matrix. While they ultimately figure it out keeping them fooled usually leads to a more tender snack.

Florian drops his script and glares at you for a moment then finds himself preoccupied with his rapidly shrinking body. He lifts his right foot only to feel his size 43.5 sneaker way too large to lift. "Whoa! whoa!!!!" Florian lets off a cry as he falls and the rays of the shrinking device take him down to his new stature.

You walk over to his left sneaker and peer at the movement inside the short athletic sock. Florian's trademark messy hair emerges with a terrified look in his big blue eyes.

15131221.content:
You pull the two shaggy haired twins out of your box of delights and waste no time telling them your plan. "Hello boys, and don't you look delicious this evening?"

Their tan baby faces grimace in fear as they huddle together, cowering in fear in the palm of your hand. "I was just watching an episode of your show the other day, and I was very dissappointed with the ending. So I have here some new scripts, starting from where the story lost it for me. I wrote it as small as possible on the back of this matchbox. You should remember the first part since it's directly from the original. I'll be playing all three Cheetah girls...

"Who do we play," Dylan questions?

"Guess," it's obvious who the smarter twin is. "You guys start."

You deposit them on the table and wait for your cue. They look at you doubtfully and then scramble to their places before you get mad.

Cole taps nervously on the matchbox. "Whose there," you call out?

"Room service," Cole answers. The boys look at each other fearfully.

You mime opening a door and speak your next line. "Yo, who ordered two blonde boys?"

Cole trembles and whispers into Dylan's ear, "oh no, I think I know where this is going..."

"I thought I ordered nachos," you say.

Dylan grudgingly steps forward and speaks his first line in a quaking voice, "well feel free to cover me in cheese sauce."

This is the last line of the original script. You lick your lips and croak, "well they do look cute enough to eat."
15131221.title: Special Episode

choices: Put them through the mincer and make Sprouse mince
Throw them in whole and alive

"Please don't do this to me,do it to Dylan,look at him".He reaches down and pulls up Dylan's shirt and rubs his guts.
"Well you guys are going to become my next serving of nacho".
How will you make them into nacho?

Dylan looks down in shame and looks over to his brother,who is jumping for joy that he isn't going to die."So you think this is funny Cole?,that your brother is going into a sadist boy's pie". He rushes Cole and they start to fight.You pick up Dylan from the fight and start to strip him naked,looking at his nice belly and tanned body.You place him on the kitchen bench,away from Cole and start to prepare the pie making and the pastry.You roll it flat and place it in the pie maker,while Dylan is sitting,naked on the bench,awaiting his fate."How are you taking this Dylan?" you ask."I have finally come to terms with what you are going to do,you bought me and now I will for fill my purpose". You smile and lift him up and place him in the pastry.You gather up some veges and mix up a gravy and add them all to the mix,pop the lid on the pie and start to cook it.

1521.title: F

152131.content:
"Welcome to Fantasy Spa." The smiling attendant guided Fabian Froehlich down a light filled hallway with lightly playing music and green plants. "You may switch into your robe here." Fabian entered the room and changed into a bathrobe. "Am I really going to feel shrunken down?" Fabian looked eager as the attendant led him further into the spa. "Oh yes Mr. Froehlich... you feel like you have been shrunken down to a bite size morsel at the whim of a giant, just like you have dreamt. Just walk down that corridor and the fantasy will begin."

Fabian followed the attendant's finger to a long rather dark looking hallway with a pinpoint of light at the end. That looks rather strange Fabian thought to himself as he proceeded. After about a 10 minute walk Fabian reached the door at the end and pushed a glass door to enter. "What the hell? This is amazing!" Fabian looked in awe at what appeared to be a giant version of the dressing room he had just left. Fabian walked up to one of his boots and looked up in amazement. "Wow this all looks so real!" Fabian smiled and reached out to feel the surface, the suede feeling coarse to the touch.

"Hello Fabian.... don't you look tasty." The beefy young trainer spun around towards the origin of the voice. "Hey! You are supposed to be a woman... this isn't what I paid for."

The massive figure knelt down bringing his face close enough for Fabian to feel the wind of his breath. "That's odd, this is exactly what I paid for."
152131.title: Froehlich!

1521311.content:
"This is not what I ordered. I am leaving the simulation!" Fabian made his way back to the door to the simulator but it was locked.

"Fabian, my dreamy little snack" the giant's voice reverberated in its volume. "That would not return you to your original height... I am afraid yours is a one-way trip."

Fabian spun around "This is just a simulation, this is stupid I need to speak with the...." Fabian's voice trailed as he watched the attendant walk with another client to a dressing room. The giant looked down with a toothless smile. "Hey! Hey! It is a trap! Don't go in there! They are shrinking people!" The giant caught up with the Fabian's tiny form in a single step. "Ah ah ah... tsk tsk my meaty little man. We musn't disrupt their dreams now."

Fabian cried out as he felt the hand of the giant reach around him. "Relax Fabian, this will be fun, well for me at least, and when we are finished I promise you will be gone in a single bite!"
1521311.title: Fabian Runs

152332222221.content: Once again Justin Bieber's 'Influencia' has kicked in. The bad boy just got drunk and a little stoned at an LA night club. He started to get into a limo with his entourage when paparazzi tried to get a photo and he jumped out of he car. "Justin Bro! Get back here man!" One of his body guards tried to talk reason, but it was no use. Justin staggered down the street a short ways and down an alley. He stopped to check out his cell and snap a selfie when he heard a strange humming noise above him. "Ah man, fucking Paparazzi!" Justin's speech was slurred. He adjusts his backwards ball cap and flips off the hovering drone above. The drone seems to respond to Justin's behavior by shifting backwards slightly and making a higher pitch sound. Justin drops his sunglasses over the brim of his nose and stares blankly as a blue light shoots out of the hovering craft scanning him from toe to head. "What the fuck? Yo man wha....." His less than profound words are cut short by a second beam of red light that vaporizes him. His sunglasses drop squarely into his right sneaker which is smoking slightly. The drone climbs quietly into the smoggy city sky.
152332222221.title: Justin Bieber?

choices: We get to eat the mistakes!
1523322222211.content:
Another day at Edible Toys. The Jonas Brothers, united again at last, attempting to negotiate their return in vain with tech 12. Chris Zylka being measured and prepared for shipping to a happy customer....

Tech 23 awaits his next arrival. He sees the name come up on the screen Justin Bieber hmm tasty but as the young pop singer's lean muscular form begins to materialize he can tell something is not right. He examines the site on the platform and raises the chamber without the usually protocol. "Justin, do you er happen to remember the last thing you ate?" The young man, rather stoned just moments before now seems quite lucid. His hands and feet twirl helplessly and his head rolls about trying to get a sense of what has happened. "I was totally wasted and I asked Marty to get me a burger from Zak's Burger Bus. Bro, everything looks really big right now what's going on?" The tech does not bother responding but gently pulls away the bun covering the now bite sized pop star. Rather than being embedded in beef Justin seems to have merged at a molecular level with his last meal. Justin's head two hands and two feet are all that remain of "pure" Bieber. The tech plucks away the remaining high top.
1523322222211.title: He arrives

15233222222111.content:
"Yo! Bro! I asked you a questions!" Justin does not appear to be aware of his nature as a hamburger.

Tech 23 makes a quick entry into his log. Bieber did not materialize properly please notify customer offer... Drew Chadwick as suitable replacement. With wide eyes the tech turned his attention on the bite sized pop star below. "Yo! Dude! I need to get back to my wheels. Hey what are you doing!?" Bieber strains to see what as happening as the tech begins to eat. The scent Justin's freshly liberated right foot is divine! "Uh dude like what are you... ahhhh hey!" With a nibble the plump athletic appendage is gone. The giant savors the first bite and then continues... soon Bieber's left foot is gone... then his hands... the massive tech continues to gulp down until nothing remains. With a smack of the lips the tech turns back to his controls. A short while later the next product arrives.

"Hey! What is this?!" Drew Chadwick pounds on the clear barrier of the chamber.
15233222222111.title: We get to eat the mistakes!

153231.content:
Liam shielded his eyes from the bright light above. The last thing he remembered was skating on Melrose avenue when a man took his picture. What the hell? he thought to himself scanning the strange surroundings as his eyes adjusted. It looked like the inside of a giant cardboard box! With his eyes adjusted he once more peered upward to see your face massive smiling down on him.

You admire your new toy. You made no special request of it, but are delighted to see him dressed in a blue v-neck t-shirt, jeans and a pair of vans. The skate board laying near him in the box tells you where your merchant found the handsome cutie!

"Hey! What the fuck is going on here?" Liam's Australian accent carries even when his voice is tiny! He stumbles back a few steps as he watches your smile transform into a lip smack.

"I purchased you from and edible toy merchant!" You watch with delight while your words sink into the mind of the little hunk. He stumbled back again and ran for the far end of the box. "Get the fuck away from me! I gotta get outta here.." you hear him mutter as he scans the edge of his prison for options.
153231.title: Liam-licious

choices: Let's see where the little guy goes.
1532311.content:
"No way mate! No way!!!" Your hand breaches the opening of the box and overshadowns poor little Liam. He scrambles to a corner and cowers out of instinct. Gingerly, you pluck him up by the seat of his tiny jeans. He kicks and struggles. His muscular little body is no match for your massive hand. His miniscule tummy churns as you bring him up out of the box and downward toward the floor of your kitchen.

"Alright little hottie, it is time to play!" Liam looks in confusion, and then starts to run.
1532311.title: Pick him up!

1532312.content:
With delight you lift the box and slowly begin to turn it upside down putting your dear little toy on the opposite side of the initial tilt. He resists, trying to keep friction on his little sneakers... no luck he slides unceremoniously to the far corner of the box. You continue to tilt the box and he slides to the lip of the carton. "Shit..." you hear his tinny voice squeek as he manages to grab ahold of a fold in the cardboard. The box is fully inverted and your toy Liam kicks helplessly hanging from the box edge! "You put me back to normal this instant you ass hole!!"

You chuckle as you decide what to do next. You soak in his handsome little bod! Cuter than ever now that he is struggles and kicks in the air. Your eyes wander towards his plump little biceps and meaty legs. You walk over to a large glass bowl you prepared before the little dude was unpackaged. With a sharp movement you dislodge your little doll and watch as he plunks into and slides down the side of the steep sided bowl. "Please let me go!!!" he struggles to his little feet and scrapes helplessly at the surface of his newest prision.
